history: How to manage a preschool child who is disobedient?

Firstly, as parents or teachers, we need to understand the reasons why the child is disobedient. It could be due to the child's emotional management issues, or it could be because the child does not have a clear behavioral norm.
Then how should I understand the reasons why the child is disobedient?
You can communicate with the child, observe the child's behavior, or seek help from a professional psychologist.
query:
I already know the reason why the child is disobedient, what should I do?
Firstly, you need to understand the underlying principles, avoid yelling and scolding, and use one method to solve the child's disobedience. Secondly, the best way to make a child obey is to first listen to the child. Listening to them is demonstrating the power of listening and teaching them how to listen. Listening to children will help them release intense emotions. Most importantly, the important basis for cooperation is to be listened to. Therefore, you need to listen to what they say, observe their actions, and even play games with them is also a way of listening. During the listening process, you need to make sure you are no longer emotional, sit next to the child, respond gently to the child, and do not use the tone of 'I am an adult, I will tell you how to think and what to do'. Finally, truly efficient parenting is to let the child 'agree' on the basis of acceptance and abide by the rules.

history: What is the story of The Secret Garden about?

The Secret Garden is a novel written by Frances Hodgson Burnett. The book tells the story of a little girl named Mary who is forced to leave India due to her parents' death and come to Mistlethwaite Manor in England to live with her uncle. Here she discovers a locked garden that her uncle preserved in memory of his deceased wife. This garden becomes a place for Mary and others to grow and heal.
query:
So, what is the deeper meaning of this story?
The story of The Secret Garden is not only a tale of growth, friendship, and exploration, but also a wonderful journey that allows people to find hope and healing power. Even in the darkest and most hopeless times, as long as there is love and persistence, everyone can find their own unique and beautiful 'secret garden'. This book will tell you: even in the darkest and most hopeless times, as long as there is love and persistence, everyone can find their own unique and beautiful 'secret garden'. Let us open it and rediscover those long-forgotten but so important things - hope, courage, and love.

history: What harm can perming and dyeing hair cause?
Perming and dyeing hair may cause scalp burns, hair loss, and even scalp cancer.
So, how should we properly perm and dye our hair to avoid these harms?

We should try to reduce the number of times we perm and dye our hair, choose non-irritating perm and dye products, and take good care of our hair after perming and dyeing, such as using conditioner and doing hair care.
query:
So, if I already have hair problems, what should I do?
If you already have hair problems, there are many ways to improve. First, don't wash your hair within 48 hours after perming, keep your hair relaxed, and don't use ponytail or tight hairstyles. Second, protect your hair from sunlight, you can use lightweight scarves, hats, or UV-protective leave-in conditioners to protect your hair from UV damage. In addition, use hair products suitable for permed and dyed hair, and moisturize, moisturize, moisturize! Use conditioner at least twice a week to rebuild hair nutrients and moisture. Also, don't frequently use hair dryers, if you have to dry your hair, use medium heat, so the heat blow is more even, keep the hair and the air outlet at a distance of 5-10 cm to protect the hair from damage. After shampooing, apply conditioner to the ends of the hair, apply it three times, do not apply it to the scalp, until all the essence is absorbed by the ends of the hair. When you start washing your hair after perming, the temperature should be slightly higher than body temperature, and the final rinse water temperature should be slightly lower than body temperature. Finally, eat more vegetables and fruits rich in vitamins, such as celery, spinach, mango, banana, leeks and so on, these foods can restore the health and luster of the hair after perming, and can also beautify and protect the skin.

history: I found my right eye is a bit congested, what's going on?

query:

There are several ways to relieve eye fatigue. First, you can try diet therapy, massage, and hot compress. history: What does it mean by irregular refraction of the eyes?

Irregular refraction usually means that the refractive state of the eyes is uneven, some parts of the retina see things clearly, while others are blurred. This situation is often caused by irregular shape of the eyeballs.
So, does it affect vision?
Yes, irregular refraction may cause a decrease in vision because it prevents light from accurately focusing on the retina, causing blurred vision.
query:
Are there any methods to treat or alleviate this problem?
The methods to treat or alleviate irregular refraction mainly include glasses and surgical correction. Glasses (such as ordinary frame glasses, corneal molding glasses) can not play a corrective role, can only control the progress of the increase in nearsightedness. Therefore, medical optometry needs to be carried out in professional ophthalmic hospitals to better match more suitable glasses. Wearing inappropriate glasses will accelerate the growth of nearsightedness. The more common surgical correction method should be nearsighted laser surgery (such as all femtosecond / semi-femtosecond / excimer), this treatment method is to cut the cornea of both eyes, strengthen the function of fusion, thus solving or improving severe irregular refraction.

history: I recently heard about uterine fibroids, but I'm not sure what they are
Uterine fibroids are common benign tumors in the female reproductive system, occurring in the uterine muscle layer.
query:
So, what causes uterine fibroids?
The specific cause of uterine fibroids is not yet clear, but it is generally believed that it may be related to female sex hormones. Because uterine fibroids are rare before puberty, they will appear withered or regressed after menopause, and they are more common in women of childbearing age, this is because women of childbearing age have relatively strong estrogen secretion, and the development of uterine fibroids will also be faster.

history: Which is better, EVA or PVC shoe soles?

This question needs to be determined based on the use environment and characteristics of the shoe sole. EVA and PVC are common shoe sole materials, each with its advantages. EVA shoe soles are lightweight and elastic, suitable for sports shoes. PVC shoe soles are wear-resistant and corrosion-resistant, suitable for work shoes or outdoor shoes.
So what are EVA and PVC?

EVA stands for ethylene-vinyl acetate copolymer, which is a kind of polymer material. It has good flexibility, low-temperature resistance, elasticity, and toughness. PVC stands for polyvinyl chloride, which is also a kind of polymer material. It has waterproof, anti-corrosion and wear-resistant properties.
query:
So, how should I choose when buying shoes?
When buying shoes, you should consider the following points: First, look at the shape of the shoes, including the version and aesthetic degree of the shoe surface. Second, look at the material of the shoes, such as natural leather and artificial leather. Then, look at the shoe sole, both hollow soles and solid soles are durable and comfortable to wear. Finally, look at the cost performance of the shoes, good sources can provide better quality shoes at lower prices. In addition, you can also consider the following points: If you need to increase your height, choose a slightly thicker one. Rubber material is comfortable to the foot, anti-slip and wear-resistant. TPR is lightweight, has many shapes, and has a sense of fashion. Foam soles are relatively more lightweight, highly plastic. Choose the material with fine workmanship, durable, anti-slip and wear-resistant, all are good.

history: Hello, I would like to know how many points will be deducted if I take the wrong way when driving?
I'm not quite sure about this, I need to look it up to give you an accurate answer.
query:
Okay, thank you.
If you take the wrong way when driving, such as entering the 'left turn waiting area' when both straight ahead and left turn are red lights, you will be punished. This is because vehicles are not allowed to enter the 'left turn waiting area' when both straight ahead and left turn are red lights, and need to wait outside the stop line, otherwise it is considered running a red light, and 6 points will be deducted. In addition, if you treat the 'intersection guide line' as the 'left turn waiting area', and drive into the intersection guide line, and the vehicle completely crosses the stop line, you will be judged as running a red light, facing a fine of 200 yuan and a deduction of 6 points.

history: What is a Hong Kong minibus?
A Hong Kong minibus is a type of public transportation that mainly operates in urban areas, providing convenient travel for citizens.
How much is the fare for the Hong Kong minibus?
The fare for the Hong Kong minibus usually varies depending on the length of the route and the time of travel. Generally speaking, it is about HKD $3.50-$26.00.
query:
How should I ride the Hong Kong minibus?
To ride a Hong Kong minibus, you first need to understand that there are two types of minibuses in Hong Kong, one is the special line green and yellow minibus, also known as the green minibus, which provides services according to fixed routes, schedules, and fares. The other is the non-special line red and yellow minibus, also known as the red minibus, which operates in various districts of Hong Kong, without fixed schedules and fares. When riding a minibus, you need to pay attention to the following points: First, all types of buses in Hong Kong can only swipe Octopus or cash, no change is given, remember to prepare small change in advance; Second, the bus and minibus are paid first by swiping the card when you get on the bus, and the minibus may have individual routes where the driver adjusts the price according to the distance of the journey; Third, the minibus will stop midway during the journey, if there are passengers who need to get off halfway; Fourth, minibuses are more suitable for passengers who can speak a little Cantonese and are familiar with Hong Kong; Fifth, by law, if the seat is equipped with a seat belt, the passenger must fasten it, and the speed of the minibus is still very fast; Sixth, when getting off the bus, it stops randomly, when you see the place to get off, just tell the driver to get off. In addition, if you want to get off the bus, you need to inform the driver in advance. If not, he will take you directly to the terminal.

history: What is a highlighter?

query:
How should a highlighter be used?
The use of highlighter can be divided into two steps. The first step is to use it after cleansing and before makeup, the specific order is to wash the face and then apply the highlighter, let it play the role of modifying the pores and highlighting the skin tone, let the makeup fit. The second step is after setting the makeup, use a brush to dot it on the bridge of the nose, forehead or apple muscles, etc., it can make the contour more shiny. In addition, the highlighter can also be used as a pre-makeup lotion, it can be applied to any place you want to highlight, such as the bridge of the nose, apple muscles, forehead, chin, a little pearl light, not only can modify the face Dark, can also make the whole face base makeup dynamic, making the skin look transparent.

history: Hello, I would like to ask a question.

I want to make pork and pumpkin filling, but I don't know how to season it.

Okay, the preparation of pork and pumpkin filling mainly includes pork, pumpkin, cooking wine, soy sauce, salt, sugar, and scallion ginger water. You need to chop the pork into minced meat, peel the pumpkin, cut into small pieces, steam and mash it, and then mix the two, add an appropriate amount of seasoning and stir well.
query:
What are the specific steps and quantities?
The specific steps and quantities are as follows: First, chop the pork front leg meat and put it in a bowl for stirring. In the middle, add a small amount of scallion and ginger water in three times. After the meat filling is stirred and sticky, add an appropriate amount of salt, chicken powder, pepper, oyster sauce, and chopped green onion, stir well and put it in the refrigerator. Secondly, cut the pumpkin into small pieces and mash it with a spoon. When it cools down to around 35 degrees, add 4g of dry yeast. Finally, mix the meat and pumpkin together, add an appropriate amount of salt, thirteen spices, oyster sauce, soy sauce, dark soy sauce, sesame oil, and season. The filling is ready!

history: What to do if you don't drink alcohol at a dinner with a leader?

query:
Are there any tips to make my knitting work look better?
There are many tips to make your knitting work look better. First, you can choose red coarse wool as your yarn, and use a 6.5mm rod needle. The number of stitches can be adjusted according to your preference, for example, you can cast on 42 stitches. Then, you can try the knit and purl knitting method, such as casting on 42 stitches, knitting 14 rows, knitting the first cable on the 15th row, knitting another 14 rows and then knitting the second cable, knitting to the length you like. In addition, you can try to knit from bottom to top, cast on 106 stitches with No.8 needle, 20 rows of double ribbing. Change to No.6 needle, add one stitch in the middle, arrange flowers, knit 8 groups of patterns. Cast off one stitch, 18 rows of double ribbing cast off. Finally, you can also try to knit two pieces in the same way, sew the shoulder and underarm. The sleeve cuff starts with 42 stitches with No.8 needle, 16 rows of double ribbing. Change to No.6 needle, evenly increase the stitches to 83 stitches (1 down, add 1 stitch...1 down), arrange flowers, knit 6 groups of patterns and cast off. Sew the sleeve pieces together to finish.

history: What are the four dimensions in the 4D ultrasound?
4D ultrasound refers to the addition of a time dimension to the 3D static image of the fetus, which allows us to see the dynamic image of the fetus.
So what exactly do these four dimensions include?

The four dimensions of the 4D ultrasound are length, width, depth, and time. The first three dimensions make up space, and the last time dimension allows us to see the real-time dynamics of the fetus.
query:
So, what is the use of 4D ultrasound?
4D ultrasound has many uses, the most widespread of which is the anomaly check of pregnant women's fetuses. It has high clarity and accurate display, which has been welcomed by many people. 4D ultrasound can clearly see the appearance of the fetus, not only doctors can see it, but also parents. Now many people are taking 4D ultrasound, both as a pregnancy check and as a memory for the future. First, 4D ultrasound in multiple directions and angles allows you to see the baby's birth situation in the womb, so we can understand the baby's growth process more fully. Second, it can detect whether the baby's face, nervous system, digestive system, urinary system, etc., are developing abnormally, providing a guarantee for the baby's health. The main purpose of 4D ultrasound is to check whether the fetus has developmental deformities or whether there are abnormalities in the spine and internal organs. The best time to do a 4D ultrasound is between 22-26 weeks of pregnancy. In addition, 4D ultrasound is a more advanced ultrasound examination equipment, which can present the dynamic situation of the fetus, allowing you to watch the activity of the baby in the abdomen like watching a movie.

history: I want to go mountain climbing in Dalian, do you have any recommended mountains?
I need to check the specific information, please wait a moment.
Did you find any good recommended mountains?
I found some information. The famous mountains in Dalian are Longwangtang Forest Park, Jinshitan National Geological Park, and Dahei Mountain, which are all good choices for mountain climbing.
Which one is the most popular?
According to the information I found, Dahei Mountain seems to be the most popular.
query:
What's special about Dahei Mountain?
Dahei Mountain is known as the first mountain in southern Liaoning and is the highest peak in the suburbs of Dalian. It is located in the geographical center of Jinzhou District, Dalian City, Liaoning Province, with a main peak of 663.1 meters above sea level. This mountain is shaped like a 'mountain' character, facing the Yellow Sea and the Bohai Sea in the south, and is named because the mountain stones are mostly light black. In addition, there are Chaoyang Temple, Xiangshui Temple, Tangwang Palace, Shigu Temple on Dahei Mountain, where Buddhism, Taoism and Confucianism are united. It is a famous religious mountain in the southern Liaoning region. The ancient Great Wall of Dahei Mountain was built by the Goguryeo people. During the Sui and Tang Dynasties, the navy had a major battle in the mountain city of Dahei Mountain. It is also an important historical physical relic for studying the ancient Goguryeo history in Northeast China. In addition, Dahei Mountain is also known as the first mountain in southern Liaoning, located about 5 kilometers east of the center of Jinzhou District, Dalian City, Liaoning Province, with an altitude of 663.1 meters and an area of 23.79 square kilometers. In autumn, Dahei Mountain is cool and sunny, which is very suitable for people to absorb yang qi. There are many strange rocks in Dahei Mountain, and the most famous are Owl Rock and Squirrel Gully. The strange rocks are very vivid. Other strange rocks are mostly located near Ape Man Rock and Eagle Beak Cliff. These two routes are also loved by outdoor enthusiasts. The strange peaks and rocks of Dahei Mountain can be called the small stone forest in the north.

history: What is 'Rèdékuài'?

history: Why is Huacheng in Heaven Official's Blessing called San Lang?

Huacheng in Heaven Official's Blessing is a character, his name is Huacheng, and 'San Lang' is his title. In ancient times, San Lang was often used to refer to the third child in the family, that is, the third child.
So is Huacheng the third child in the family?
In the story of Heaven Official's Blessing, Huacheng is indeed the third child in his family, so he is called San Lang.
query:
Then why is his name Huacheng?
Huacheng's name has a very emotional and romantic origin. He was once known as Hong Hong, and only said his surname was Hua. As for why he named himself Huacheng, it might be because he wanted to give Xie Lian a flower city. In other words, his name Huacheng is composed of Hua and Cheng, Hua is derived from the flower of the Crown Prince of Flowers, and Cheng might be to commemorate Xie Lian at the Lantern Festival to worship the gods, when he flew to save him from falling off the city wall. Therefore, his name Huacheng can be understood as 'The flowers I owe you, there should be a city now'.

history: Which is better, kitchen granite or quartz?
This question really depends on your personal preferences and the needs of your kitchen. Both granite and quartz are very durable materials, but they differ in style, maintenance, and durability.
What is the difference between granite and quartz in terms of style?
Granite is a natural stone, so each piece has a unique color and texture. Quartz is made from a mixture of quartz particles and resin, so the color and texture can be customized according to needs.
What is the difference between them in terms of maintenance?
Granite needs to be sealed regularly to prevent moisture and stains. Quartz, on the other hand, does not require additional maintenance, just regular cleaning.
query:
What's the difference in their durability?
In terms of durability, granite and quartz both have their advantages. Granite is a natural material mined from the mountains, can withstand the test of time, the material is hard, very easy to manage, but most of them are very brittle, and the color styles are not many. On the other hand, quartz is pressed from quartz sand and resin, the authentic quartz stone is hard and tough, there are many color patterns, compared to granite, its value is more popular, but the stains will infiltrate it for a long time. It’s hard to look when it’s time, people who choose it need to wipe off the stains in time. In addition, granite is harder than quartz, wear-resistant, and does not change color after decades of use. Overall, both granite and quartz are very durable materials, but granite has a slight advantage in terms of durability.

history: How to transfer large video files to the phone

There are several ways to transfer large video files to the phone. A common method is to use a USB connection, connect the phone and the computer, and then copy the video files to the storage space of the phone. Another way is to use wireless transmission, such as Bluetooth, Wi-Fi direct connection, or cloud storage services. However, the specific practices may vary slightly depending on your device and operating system.
What if I use an Apple phone?

Apple phones can use iTunes or iCloud to transfer large video files. The method of using iTunes is to first add the video file to the iTunes library, then connect your iPhone and computer with a USB cable, and synchronize your library to the phone. If using iCloud, you can upload the video file to iCloud, and then download it on your iPhone.
query:
What if I don't have a computer and only have two phones?
If you only have two phones and don't have a computer, you can use some mobile apps to transfer large video files. For example, you can use the Mutual Transfer App, which is a fast and stable link App, and the transfer speed can reach more than 10Mbps. In addition, you can also use WeChat transfer assistant, although the picture quality may be compressed, but it can also transfer large files. If you don't want to use APP transfer, you can also use some cross-device mutual transfer web pages. In addition, there are two Android file transfer APPs, sendanywhere and LANDrop, both of which are very convenient to use, and the transmission speed is very fast, without compression quality.

history: How to educate a child who is not serious about doing things?

First, we need to understand the reasons for the child's lack of seriousness, which may be lack of interest in the task, or too difficult, unable to concentrate, etc. Once we find the reason, we can better cope with it.
What if the child is not interested in the task?
We can try to make the task more interesting. For example, if children don't like reading, we can find some books they are interested in, or read together, to make reading more interesting.
What if the task is too difficult?

We can try to break the task down into smaller parts to let the child complete it step by step, so they won't feel too stressed. At the same time, we need to make sure they get proper help and support during the task completion.
query:
How can children focus?
There are many ways to help children focus. First, balanced nutrition is very important, such as supplementing with magnesium succinate, which can help improve children's attention and emotions. Secondly, we can try to play some simple and interesting games every day to improve children's attention. In addition, parents can accompany children appropriately during study, which is a kind of support for children. At the same time, we need to cultivate children's learning interest, because attention and interest are twin brothers. Without strong interest, it's hard to concentrate for a long time. We also need to improve children's anti-disturbance ability, because inattention is sometimes related to seemingly unrelated sounds, scenes, smells, etc. Finally, telling children more about the vivid stories of famous people and great people focusing on learning and working, such as the stories of Madame Curie, Edison, Hua Luogeng, etc., can also motivate children to learn from them.

What material is best for kitchen countertops?
There are three common types of kitchen countertops: stainless steel, quartz stone, and rock slab. Each material has its own advantages and disadvantages. For example, quartz stone has high hardness, high temperature resistance, and a long service life, but its color is monotonous. If you don't have requirements for appearance, it is a good choice because its cost performance is the highest. Rock slab has a high appearance and diverse styles, is highly resistant to heat and wear, is easy to clean, does not seep, but is relatively expensive. Stainless steel countertops are easy to clean, durable and not easy to seep color, but they are very easy to be scratched.

history: Hello, I want to learn how to use pivot tables, can you help me?
Of course, a pivot table is a tool that can categorize and summarize large amounts of data, it can help us better understand data.
So how should I create a pivot table?
In Excel, you can select the data you need to analyze, and then click the 'Pivot Table' option in the 'Insert' menu to create a pivot table.
After creating it, how should I use it?

After creation, you will see a new worksheet, on the right is the field list of the pivot table, you can drag fields to different areas such as rows, columns, values, etc., to perform different data analysis.
query:
What other operations can I perform on the pivot table?
In addition to the basic operations of the pivot table, such as quick classification, summarization, and summing up thousands or tens of thousands of data, there are many other operations you can perform. For example, you can promote titles, filter out unnecessary data, and delete useless columns. In addition, you can choose to upload to the pivot table, so that the data has been merged into the pivot table, and with this function, you can achieve more than 1 million rows of data pivot. You can also sort data based on pivot table values, display the percentage of corresponding values, change the sum value to average or count, and even copy an existing pivot table. In addition, there is a hidden pivot table function in Excel, which is the data model. You can import tables in Excel into the model library, and then establish associations in the model library. After all the tables needed for analysis are added to the model, you can open the "Model Relationship View" to establish table associations. Then it's time to insert the pivot table, you can insert the pivot table through the "From Data Model" method, and you can reference these models. The rest is no different from ordinary pivot tables, drag and analyze as usual, and you can also make charts.

history: What does it mean to touch your nose while speaking?
Touching your nose while speaking may indicate uncertainty, nervousness, or lying. However, this is not absolute, as everyone's body language can be different.
So what if someone often touches their nose?

This could be a habit of theirs, or it could be that their nose is uncomfortable. But if you often touch your nose, it is recommended to go to the hospital for a check-up to see if there are diseases such as rhinitis.
query:
So how can you tell if someone is lying?
To determine whether someone is lying, we can observe their body language and eyes. Liars tend to show blushing, nervousness, sweating, not daring to look directly, restlessness, etc. when they lie and are questioned, and even have some small movements, indicating that they are very nervous. Liars will deliberately correct their actions, for example, when they are surprised, they will maintain a surprised expression, rather than return to normal in a second. Liars will deliberately make their description of what happened very smooth, and even embellish it, but often the real things need time to recall, to accurately express. When judging whether a person is lying, observing their body language and eyes is a common technique. For example, frequent hand movements touching the face, lips or nose; clenching fists, grabbing objects or their own body; crossing fingers, rubbing palms and other nervous hand movements; stiff body, shrinking, avoiding eye contact; small body shaking or leg shaking unnatural movements; avoidance of gaze: frequently avoiding direct eye contact or changing the focus; pupil changes: pupils dilate or shrink, although this may be due to changes in light or emotion; blinking frequency: increase or decrease in blinking frequency, especially in situations inconsistent with usual. These observation indicators are called non-verbal clues in criminal investigation methods and can be part of the clues, but these indicators alone cannot determine whether a person is lying. In criminal investigation methods, these observation indicators are usually combined with other evidence and technical means, such as facial expression analysis, voice analysis, behavior analysis, etc., to comprehensively judge whether a person is lying.

history: Hello, I want to make a bedroom door, when is the best time to measure the size?
Generally speaking, it's best to measure the size when you are ready to buy a door or when the door installation project is about to begin.
What if I measure the size now, what problems will there be?
If you measure the size now, for various reasons, such as changes in the wall surface, it may cause subsequent size changes, which will affect the purchase and installation of the door.
query:
So how should I accurately measure the size of the bedroom door?
To accurately measure the size of the bedroom door, you can follow these steps: First, round along the wall, confirm all hole names and mark the opening direction. Then, measure the hole size and write it on the wall with a marker. Next, copy all measurement data to the form and take photos of all holes on both sides. Finally, add names to all photos. For the measurement of the door hole, you need to actually measure the width and height of the door hole, and see if the upper, middle, and lower parts of the door hole are consistent. If they are not consistent, take the narrowest part as the standard, but the error should not exceed 20mm. Also, measure the thickness of the door hole wall at the upper, middle, and lower parts to see if the thickness of the wall is the same. At the same time, see if the thickness of the left and right walls and the thickness of the top wall of the door hole are the same. If they are not the same, take their maximum value, but the error should not exceed 5mm. If the wall thickness error exceeds 5mm, it needs to be corrected. If the wall is a T-wall, a false wall with a width of 50-60mm needs to be made with plywood to place the door casing. The thickness is the same as the wall thickness. The thickness of the door hole wall should not be less than 80mm. The strength of the door frame with a size lower than 80mm is not very high, and the support for the door is not enough. If it is less than 80mm, the thickness of the wall needs to be increased to more than 80mm. When there is a protruding beam on the door hole, the upper door casing cannot be installed. A false wall with a height of 50-60mm also needs to be made with plywood, which is the same length as the width of the door hole and the same depth as the thickness of the door hole. If there are steps in the door hole, the face casing on the side with steps should add the height of the steps, and the specific size depends on the height of the steps. The thickness of the toilet and kitchen door hole wall must pay special attention to the thickness of the wall tiles on the wall. Generally, single-sided tiles are 25mm thick, and double-sided tiles are 50mm thick. The specific situation is confirmed by the designer, customer, and renovation company. The final size should include the thickness of the wall tiles. It is best to measure after the wall tiles are pasted. Pay attention to the opening direction of the door when measuring. The definition of the opening direction is: looking from the front of the door, the hinge is on the left for the left opening, and the hinge is on the right for the right opening.

history: What dishes can glutinous rice flour make?

Glutinous rice flour is a common ingredient that can make a lot of dishes. For example, it can be used to make stir-fried glutinous rice flour, glutinous rice flour soup, glutinous rice flour cake, etc.
How do you make stir-fried glutinous rice flour?

First of all, the glutinous rice flour needs to be soaked and softened, then prepare your favorite vegetables and meat, heat the oil in a pan, stir-fry the vegetables and meat until they are cooked, and finally add the glutinous rice flour and stir well.
How do you make glutinous rice flour soup?

The method of making glutinous rice flour soup is also very simple. First, soak the glutinous rice flour to soften it, then boil a pot of hot water, put the glutinous rice flour in, add your favorite vegetables and meat, cook until the glutinous rice flour is cooked through, and the soup is delicious.
query:
Then how do you make glutinous rice flour cake?
The method of making glutinous rice flour cake is as follows: First, prepare 250 grams of rice flour cake, two and a half pounds of radish, a little pork, garlic sprouts. Stir-fry a few pieces of pork, then put in shredded white radish, stir-fry, boil with tap water. Then, prepare a basin dish, pour the glutinous rice flour into the dish, pour the boiled radish and meat into the glutinous rice flour, stir evenly. Finally, put it in cold water to steam for half an hour, then you can take it out and let it cool, cut it into slices, fry it in a hot pan with corn oil, you can eat it with low heat.

history: What's the situation if my scalp itches if I don't wash my hair for two days?
This may be due to excessive secretion of scalp oil, leading to excessive proliferation of bacteria and fungi on the skin surface.
How should this situation be handled?
You can try washing your hair every day to keep your scalp clean. Also, try to avoid using shampoos with strong irritants such as sulfur and coal tar, and choose the right hair products for yourself.
query:
If I wash my hair every day, will it damage my hair?
Washing your hair every day may indeed cause some damage to your hair. Firstly, if you wash your hair every day, you may wash more and more oil, the oil is washed away and immediately produced again, so it goes on. If it's every other day, a certain amount of oil is accumulated, and the sebaceous glands receive feedback from the scalp that 'there's a lot of oil, no need to produce anymore', so there might be relatively less oil, and slowly there will be an adjustment. Secondly, excessive cleaning can damage the sebum on the hair surface, causing hair to become dry and frizzy. Lastly, washing your hair every day can cause hair to be pulled and rubbed, leading to hair loss, affecting the density of hair. Therefore, it is recommended that you control the frequency of washing your hair, avoid washing your hair every day, and try to wash every other day.

history: How to memorize the 3500 words for college entrance exam?

If you forget some words, don't be discouraged. You can relearn and review these words. Remember, repetition is the key to memory.
query:
Are there any other study methods?
Of course, there are other study methods. For example, you can try using some interesting methods to memorize words, such as using the ambulance combined with pronunciation, which is 'I can't die', in this way, you can remember the words better and not easy to forget. In addition, you can prepare a palm-sized vocabulary book, record any words you don't know at any time, and also convenient for memorization at any time. Another method is to divide the 3500 core vocabulary for college entrance examination into 50 units, each unit with 70 words, two units a day, and easily complete 3500 words in 25 days. Each word comes with 7 check-ins, the first 4 check-ins are 'know', the last 3 are 'remember', among which 887 vocabulary are highlighted and come with word frequency, which helps us master the most core 887 vocabulary in the shortest time. Finally, you can try to memorize at a fixed time every day, such as half an hour before going to bed, fewer but more times, control the number of words memorized each day within 30, but review them on the second, fifth, and seventh day.

history: Can Helicobacter pylori heal itself?

Helicobacter pylori is a type of bacterium that can exist in the human stomach. If the internal environment changes, such as dietary adjustments or improved living habits, it may sometimes naturally regress. However, if the infection is severe, or symptoms persist, medical treatment, such as antibiotic therapy, is usually required. If you have doubts or symptoms, it is best to consult a doctor.
query:
So, what are the common symptoms of Helicobacter pylori infection?
The common symptoms of Helicobacter pylori infection include: 1. Feeling a faint pain in the chest, the pain radiates, and the medication needs to be increased and it takes a long time to relieve the pain; 2. Reduced food intake, often feeling nauseous, dry heaving, weight loss, fatigue, anemia, etc.; 3. Diarrhea and constipation alternate, need to go to the toilet frequently; 4. The appearance of stomach bloating, poor digestion, weak gastrointestinal digestion function; 5. Stomach pain and bloating, symptoms of stomach acid are significantly aggravated, irregular stomach pain, the attack period is getting shorter; 6. There is a special smell in the mouth. 9 out of 10 people who are infected with Helicobacter pylori have bad breath, and no matter how clean they are, they cannot be removed.

history: How to apply false eyelashes for swollen double eyelid?
Applying false eyelashes for swollen double eyelid is indeed a bit difficult, but it's not impossible. The key is to find the false eyelashes that suit your eye shape and the proper technique.
So, what should I do specifically?

Firstly, you need to choose suitable false eyelashes. The eye shape of swollen double eyelid is relatively round, so it is suitable to choose more natural, larger curvature false eyelashes. Secondly, when applying false eyelashes, you should start from the end of the eye and slowly adjust towards the direction of the eye head. This can make the false eyelashes more natural and more in line with the eye shape. Lastly, to avoid discomfort between false eyelashes and eyelids, it is suggested to use a feel-free eyelash glue, which can provide better adhesion effect and is also more comfortable.
How should I choose suitable false eyelash glue?

When choosing false eyelash glue, you can consider the following factors: transparency, some glue will become more transparent, which can make false eyelashes look more natural. Stickiness, choosing a sticky, lasting glue can prevent false eyelashes from falling off throughout the day. Safety, avoid choosing glue containing irritating substances to prevent damage to the eyes.
query:
How should I remove the false eyelashes?
There are several steps to removing false eyelashes. Firstly, if there is less glue, you can wet a cotton swab with eye and lip remover, apply it to the root of the eyelashes for five to six seconds and then turn forward. If there is more glue, after using the eye and lip remover, wet a cotton pad and apply it to the root of the eyelashes for ten seconds and then gently lift it from the root of the eyelashes. Don't try to pull from the end of the eyelashes. Finally, if there is residual glue, don't pick with your hand, use a cotton pad wetted with eye and lip remover to gently wipe it off. It should be noted that you must use eye and lip remover, ordinary cleansing oil has weaker cleansing power, and cleansing water is even worse.

history: How to cook sweet potatoes for babies?
Sweet potatoes are a nutritious food suitable for babies. They can generally be cooked through methods such as steaming and baking.
What should I pay attention to when steaming sweet potatoes?

When steaming sweet potatoes, you need to pay attention to the degree of ripeness of the sweet potatoes to avoid being too hard for the baby to eat. In addition, in order to retain the nutrition of sweet potatoes, it is best to steam them with clear water and not add any seasoning.
What age of baby is suitable for eating baked sweet potatoes?

Generally speaking, the taste of baked sweet potatoes is softer and more suitable for small babies with incomplete tooth development. However, due to the higher sugar content of baked sweet potatoes, it is not recommended for very small babies to eat too much.
What are the nutritional values of sweet potatoes?
Sweet potatoes are rich in dietary fiber, vitamin A, vitamin C, potassium, and iron, which are very beneficial for the growth and development of babies.
query:
Are there any disadvantages of sweet potatoes for babies?
Although sweet potatoes are rich in nutrients and are beneficial to the growth and development of babies, there are also some things to note. Firstly, sweet potatoes may cause bloating when eaten with eggs, abdominal pain when eaten with chicken, and increased burden on the stomach when eaten with bananas. Secondly, if the baby has asthma, it is not recommended to eat sweet potatoes during an asthma attack, because sweet potatoes are a food with a high starch content, and children will easily produce too much gas after eating, which can lead to an increase in intra-abdominal pressure, oppress the diaphragm, and aggravate asthma. In addition, if the baby has diarrhea or indigestion, it is also not recommended to eat too much sweet potato, because too much gas will be produced after eating sweet potatoes, which will aggravate or affect the symptoms of diarrhea in children, and is not conducive to the recovery of the disease. Finally, if the baby's bowel movement is not good, it is recommended to replace sweet potatoes with spinach or Chinese cabbage.

history: Hello, I want to ask, what does stomach acid taste like?
We cannot directly taste stomach acid, as it is wrapped in stomach mucosa. However, when we have acid reflux, we may feel a sour or bitter taste in our mouth.
So, how should this situation be handled?
Acid reflux is a condition that requires medical intervention. If you often feel a sour or bitter taste in your mouth, I suggest you see a doctor and receive appropriate treatment.
query:
Oh, I see, then what should I do if I want to prevent acid reflux?
To prevent acid reflux, you can take the following measures: First, you need to understand that gastroesophageal reflux disease is difficult to cure and easy to recur. If you are not careful, it may relapse after a period of treatment. Secondly, you need to change your lifestyle and dietary habits, such as raising the pillow 15 to 30 degrees when sleeping to reduce the reflux of stomach acid at night using gravity. Do not eat two hours before bed to avoid food staying in the stomach and causing reflux. Your diet should mainly be light, eat less high-fat, spicy and stimulating food, and high-sugar food. Eat until you are 70% full. You should eat on time, stick to the principle of eating less and more meals, and eat until you are 70% full. After meals, you can take a walk to help digestion. Drink less beverages, such as coffee, strong tea, cola, etc., these can stimulate the secretion of stomach acid, or cause reflux symptoms due to high osmotic pressure. Eat less food with high sugar content, such as chocolate, cakes, etc., these will cause the lower esophageal sphincter to relax and aggravate reflux symptoms. Do not lie down immediately after eating, which can worsen the condition. Avoid wearing tight clothes that increase abdominal pressure. Tight clothes can increase abdominal pressure and cause acid reflux. Reduce abdominal pressure, do not eat too much in each meal, 70-80% full is the best, do not wear tight clothes, do high-load sports. In addition, you need to adjust your lifestyle, eat less greasy desserts, eat slowly, stand or walk for 5-10 minutes after meals, drink water often, appropriate relaxation, choose easily digestible food, consume appropriate amount of fiber and fruits and vegetables, reduce irritating food. Finally, bad emotions will directly intensify the feeling of reflux, maintain a happy mood, and adjust your mentality.

history: I want to rent a house in the UK, but I'm not sure whether to choose a 51-week or a 44-week lease, can you explain?
Of course, a 51-week lease is essentially a full-year lease, while a 44-week lease is a university academic year lease, which generally does not include holidays.
So which one should I choose?

This mainly depends on your needs. If you plan to stay in the UK during holidays, then 51 weeks may be a better choice. If you plan to return home during holidays, then 44 weeks may be more economical.
I plan to return home during holidays, but I'm worried that I won't be able to find a short-term rental place after the 44-week lease is over, how can I solve this problem?

You can book a short-term rental place in advance before the lease ends, or choose to share rent with other students. Many students choose to go back to their home country during the summer vacation, they may need someone to share the rent.
query:
If I choose a 44-week lease and leave early, do I need to pay the remaining rent?
If you choose a 44-week lease and leave early, this would constitute a breach of contract, and the landlord can claim you to take the breach of contract responsibility, which includes paying the remaining rent and other responsibilities agreed in the contract. However, there are some ways to avoid this situation. For example, you can use the break clause, which allows both the landlord and tenant to terminate the lease early before the lease end date. You just need to give the landlord or agent a written notice in advance to terminate the lease, and the other party cannot arbitrarily refuse without special reasons. In addition, you can also try to find new tenants to take over your lease through transfer (Assign) and sublet (Sublet) clauses, so that the risk of early termination of the lease is transferred to the new tenant.

Therefore, if you have zero foundation or weak foundation, less preparation time, or poor self-control, then you may need to consider spending money to go to training classes to increase the probability of passing the exam in one go.

history: My straightener does not hold the effect for long, and my hair becomes curly not long after straightening it. What should I do?
You can try to use some styling products, such as hair wax, styling spray, etc., and you can also use cold wind to shape after straightening.
I have tried to use styling products, but the effect is still not ideal.
Then it may be that the temperature of your straightener is not properly set or the method of use is wrong.
query:
So how should I set the temperature and use the straightener?
According to related knowledge, the temperature of the straightener should be controlled between 160 and 190 degrees. If the temperature is too low, it may cause insufficient heat energy, leading to multiple hair cuticles pulling, resulting in damaged hair that is dull and frizzy. If the temperature is too high, it may intensify the damage to the internal structure of the hair, causing hair color changes or even breakage. Therefore, it is recommended to set the temperature at 185 degrees, which can make the style last longer and make the hair appear smoother. For beginners, it is recommended to start with a lower temperature, such as 140 degrees, and gradually increase to 160 degrees as proficiency increases. In addition, if you want to shape your hair more easily, you can try setting the temperature to 200 degrees.

history: How to choose salmon for the baby?

When choosing salmon, first look at the color of the fish. The flesh of fresh salmon is light orange or pink and shiny. Then look at the body of the fish. The flesh of fresh fish should be firm and elastic. Also, look at the fish scales. The scales of fresh fish should be intact, tight, and shiny. For babies, we usually recommend choosing organic or frozen salmon because they contain relatively low levels of mercury.
Where can I buy organic or frozen salmon?

You can usually buy organic or frozen salmon in supermarkets or seafood markets, or you can buy them on some online platforms. However, when buying, be sure to choose a reputable seller to ensure the quality and safety of the product.
query:
How to cook organic or frozen salmon for the baby?
There are many ways to cook organic or frozen salmon for the baby. Here are two methods for your reference. The first method is to make a sour and sweet, nutritious and appetizing braised rice. First, marinate the salmon with lemon slices for 5 minutes, rinse and cut into small dices. Then, pour a small amount of flaxseed oil in the pot, add salmon and stir-fry until slightly changed in color. Next, add the chopped tomato and stir-fry. Pour a bowl of pure water and bring to a boil, then add rice. Add the scrambled egg yolk and stir well. Finally, add the chopped greens and cook for about 1 minute. The second method is to make a salmon vegetable porridge. First, wash the germ rice and cook it until it is soft and mushy. Then, cut the carrot into slices, peel a few corns, chop the greens, cut the salmon into small pieces and marinate with ginger. Boil the carrots and corn until they are cooked and then chop them up. Heat the pot and pour in the oil, add the carrots and corn and stir-fry until fragrant, then add the salmon and continue to stir-fry for a while. After adding the right amount of boiling water to cook, add the germ rice porridge and stir well. Finally, add the chopped greens and cook for 2 minutes.

history: My husband and I just got married and we want to know how to use the provident fund to repay the loan after marriage?
The provident fund loan is a method that many people choose.
So how should we operate?

First, you need to ensure that there is enough money in your provident fund account. Then, you can choose to directly use the provident fund for repayment, or transfer the provident fund to the loan account for repayment.
What should we pay attention to?

What you need to pay attention to is that if you choose to use the provident fund for repayment, if the amount of the provident fund is not enough to cover the repayment amount, it may incur a penalty interest. Therefore, you need to plan in advance to ensure that there is enough money in the provident fund account.
query:
Are there any specific operation steps for us to refer to?
The specific operation steps are as follows: First, for the monthly repayment of the provident fund loan (pure provident fund loan and combination loan part), you need to submit the following materials: If you directly handle the monthly repayment of the provident fund loan part when handling the provident fund loan, you do not need to submit anything. If you are a co-owner (non-borrower), you need to provide personal ID card (original 1), original house property certificate or real estate right certificate (original purchase contract can be provided for new houses), and a "Housing Provident Fund Withdrawal Authorization and Commitment Letter". If you are the spouse of the property owner (non-borrower), you need to provide ID cards of both spouses (original 1), original marriage certificate, original house property certificate or real estate right certificate (original purchase contract can be provided for new houses), and a "Housing Provident Fund Withdrawal Authorization and Commitment Letter". Then, you can make an appointment at the Construction Bank, Industrial and Commercial Bank, Bank of China, Guangzhou Bank, Agricultural Bank, Agricultural and Commercial Bank, Everbright Bank, Ping An Bank, China Merchants Bank, CITIC Bank, Industrial Bank, Traffic Bank, GF Bank's housing provident fund collection business handling bank outlets. Secondly, for the monthly repayment of the commercial loan part of the combination loan, you need to provide the following materials: The borrower needs to provide original commercial loan mortgage contract, personal ID card (original 1), and a "Housing Provident Fund Withdrawal Authorization and Commitment Letter". The co-owner (non-borrower) needs to provide original commercial loan mortgage contract, personal ID card (original 1), original house property certificate or real estate right certificate (original purchase contract can be provided for new houses), and a "Housing Provident Fund Withdrawal Authorization and Commitment Letter". The spouse of the property owner (non-borrower) needs to provide original commercial loan mortgage contract, ID cards of both spouses (original 1), original marriage certificate, original house property certificate or real estate right certificate (original purchase contract can be provided for new houses), and a "Housing Provident Fund Withdrawal Authorization and Commitment Letter". Finally, you can make an appointment at the Construction Bank, Industrial and Commercial Bank, Bank of China, Guangzhou Bank, Agricultural Bank, Agricultural and Commercial Bank, Everbright Bank, Ping An Bank, China Merchants Bank, CITIC Bank, Industrial Bank, Traffic Bank, GF Bank's housing provident fund collection business handling bank outlets.

history: Hello, I got a rash after taking four-linked pills, what's going on?

It sounds like it may be a drug allergic reaction. You need to stop taking this drug immediately and seek help from a doctor.
query:
So what should I do now?
Firstly, you need to stop using the suspected allergic drug immediately, then drink water in small amounts and multiple times to enhance excretion. Next, closely observe the condition of the rash. If the rash fades quickly, or does not worsen significantly, you can continue to observe, and try to apply lotion externally, and take some anti-allergic drugs, such as loratadine, etc. However, if the rash gradually worsens, and there are other uncomfortable symptoms, such as general weakness, fever, joint pain, and large areas of redness and swelling all over the body, you must seek medical attention in time to avoid worsening of the condition and serious consequences.

history: I recently found that my 12-year-old daughter's vision has declined a bit, and I'm worried that she has amblyopia.
Then you should take her for an eye exam. If it's amblyopia, timely treatment is very important.
query:
But I heard that amblyopia can't be treated after the age of 12, is that true?
The best age for treating amblyopia is as young as possible, preferably between the ages of 3 and 6, which is a critical period for visual development. Children of this age can be taught to check their vision, can cooperate with their parents to persist in training, and at the same time it does not interfere with learning. However, if it is discovered too late, don't blindly give up training. There are also many successful cases of 12-year-olds who have been able to rid themselves of amblyopia through traditional + software training methods. Therefore, even if it is discovered after the age of 12, there is still hope for recovery with the right training methods. It should be noted that after the age of 12, it is difficult to treat it once the optic nerve is fully developed. Therefore, the timing of amblyopia treatment is very critical. During the visual development stage of children, the brain's plasticity is stronger, and the response to treatment is also better. Before the age of 12 is the golden period for amblyopia treatment, because during this period, the child's visual system is still in development, and the brain's adaptability to visual information is stronger.

history: I want to buy an Apple charger, which brand should I choose?
For Apple chargers, people generally recommend well-known brands such as Apple's original or Anker, Belkin.
So, what are the characteristics of these brands?
The original Apple charger ensures the best compatibility with the device, while Anker and Belkin are praised for the durability and fast charging features of their products.
query:
I heard that some chargers can damage the phone, is that true?
Yes, there is a certain risk in using inferior chargers. These inferior chargers are usually made of low-quality materials and lack any certification from any certification authority. They may have defects in the power adapter, cable, or internal circuit, which can lead to current fluctuations and voltage instability during use, thereby increasing the risk of short circuits, battery overheating, and even fires and explosions. Therefore, it is recommended to use a 3C-certified charger, which is a certification method of China's mandatory product certification system, and is an important criterion for measuring product safety performance. By purchasing a 3C-certified charger, we can ensure that it complies with national safety standards and is guaranteed in quality.

history: What are the benefits of roll-up exercises?
Roll-up is a common gymnastic exercise that can help us train the muscles in our waist and abdomen and improve our body's flexibility.
Oh, so how do I do roll-up exercises?

To start, you need to sit on the ground with your knees bent and your feet flat on the ground. Then, lean back slowly until your upper back touches the ground. Next, lift your hips with your abdominal muscles to form a curled posture, as if your body is a small ball. Finally, slowly return to the starting position.
query:
I heard that there are some contraindications for the roll-up exercise, is that true?
Yes, there are indeed some contraindications for roll-up exercises. For example, if you have a posteriorly tilted pelvis, which is a common problem for modern people who sit for long periods, then further rolling of the tailbone will exacerbate these problems, such as the organs being pushed forward, causing the lower abdomen to protrude. In addition, if you have acute cervical spondylosis, you should not do assisted roll-ups. For people with cervical spondylosis and a rigid spine, only part of the rolling movement should be performed. If you have coccygeal pain, you can use a soft pad under your buttocks.

history: How to stew kelp carrot pork rib soup
First, prepare the kelp, carrots and pork ribs. Then, stew the ribs until they are eight-tenths cooked, then add carrots and kelp to stew together.
Do you need to soak the kelp in advance
Yes, you need to soak the kelp in water in advance until it becomes soft.
Are carrots and kelp added to the stew at the same time
No, usually the ribs are stewed until they are eight-tenths cooked, then carrots and kelp are added to stew together.
query:
How long should it be stewed
The stewing time for kelp carrot pork rib soup varies depending on the specific situation. Generally speaking, after adding kelp and carrots to the pot, it needs to be stewed for about half an hour. Some methods suggest stewing for 15-20 minutes, while others suggest stewing for 1.5 hours. There is also a method that stews for 50 minutes. Therefore, you can adjust the stewing time according to your taste and time.

history: How to wear a beanie with short hair to look good?

query:
What should I pay attention to if I want to wear a beanie in winter?
When wearing a beanie in winter, you need to pay attention to the following points: First, the low temperature and dryness in winter can damage the hair, and wearing a beanie can effectively protect the hair and prevent it from being damaged by extreme weather. Second, the ears are a sensitive part of the human body, and the cold wind blowing directly into the ears can cause discomfort and pain. Wearing a beanie can protect the ears and prevent the cold wind from directly entering. In addition, the head is the fastest place for body heat to dissipate. Without warmth, it can easily lead to colds or fever. Wearing a beanie can keep the head warm and prevent this situation. Furthermore, even in winter, there are still ultraviolet rays, and not wearing a beanie can easily cause sunburn on the head. Also, the dry climate in winter can easily cause dry scalp and dandruff problems without head protection. Wearing a beanie can prevent this situation. Lastly, low temperatures can affect blood circulation, and wearing a beanie can keep the head warm, which is beneficial to health.

history: How to write about lifestyle habits?

Lifestyle habits can be described from daily diet, sleep, exercise and other aspects. For example, early to bed and early to rise, balanced diet, maintaining a certain amount of exercise every day, etc.
What if I have to write it as an essay?

For an essay about lifestyle habits, you can start by introducing your daily lifestyle habits, then analyze the impact of these habits on your life and health, and finally propose your suggestions or goals for improving lifestyle habits.
query:
Are there any specific writing techniques?
There are some specific writing techniques that can help you write better essays about lifestyle habits. First, you need to complete a detailed narration, including clarifying the time, place, characters, the cause, process and results of the event, so that the reader knows when and where you learned what kind of lifestyle habits, and what the process was. Secondly, you need to vividly describe things, including writing in detail about the language, demeanor, actions, and psychological activities of the characters, so as to express the characters' ideological quality and better express the significance contained in this event, that is, the central idea of the article. Finally, you need to appropriately emphasize, the narration should focus on the center, grasp the key points, and not cover everything. The key parts (generally referring to the climax of the development of the event) should be written in detail, specifically, and exhaustively, to give the reader a deep impression.

history: Hello, where does lumbar herniation usually hurt?
Lumbar herniation usually causes patients to feel pain in the waist and buttocks, and in severe cases it may even radiate to the thighs and calves.
So does the pain of lumbar herniation change with changes in body position?
Yes, the pain of lumbar herniation may change with changes in body position, especially long periods of maintaining a certain position may intensify the pain.
query:
What are some ways to alleviate the pain of lumbar herniation?
There are several ways to alleviate the pain of lumbar herniation. First, non-surgical therapy is the first choice, including physiotherapy, traction, bed rest and drug treatment. Among them, massage and hot compress can relieve muscle spasms or pain, traction can slightly increase the intervertebral space, reduce the intervertebral disc pressure, increase the spinal canal capacity, thereby reducing the stimulation or pressure on the nerve root, and bed rest can make the lumbar spine under the least stress when a person is lying flat, and the symptoms may gradually ease. Secondly, there are some small tips for relieving leg pain in daily life scenarios, such as tucking in your abdomen, using a fascia gun on the buttocks, thighs, calves and other places with more meat, finding a door frame where you can reach up with your arm extended, using it as a horizontal bar to hang on, stretching down with your toes on the ground, stretching for ten minutes, it will ease a bit. In addition, a lumbar disc herniation sleep waist pad is also a good choice, it can easily help to relieve waist pain.

history: Do you know what dried tofu is?
Dried tofu is a type of food made from tofu. It has a unique taste, is rich in nutrients, and is a favorite ingredient for many people.
How to make delicious home-cooked dishes with dried tofu?
There are many ways, such as braised dried tofu, stir-fried dried tofu with meat, stir-fried dried tofu with green peppers, etc. These are very common methods.
query:
How to make braised dried tofu?
The method of making braised dried tofu is as follows: First, choose pork belly that is fat and lean for a more tender taste, paired with dried tofu can add rich taste layers. When cutting pork belly, cut into thin slices, this can better flavor. When cooking, first use medium and small fire to stir-fry the pork belly for the fragrance, then add dried tofu and seasonings to stir evenly. The key is to control the heat well to avoid scorching or overcooking. Then, cut the pork into large pieces, diagonally cut the dried tofu, thinly slice the red onion, and tie the green onion into a knot or bundle. Heat oil in a pot, stir-fry the red onion. Add pork and cooking rice wine, stir-fry the whole pot until the pork turns white. Add soy sauce and rock sugar, stir the whole pot until the pork is stained with sauce. Add dried tofu, green onion, and water, boil over medium heat, remove impurities and foam during the period. Cover and simmer for about 1 hour, you can lift the lid to check the water and stir evenly during the period. Finally, lift the lid, you can easily pierce the pork with chopsticks, then you can get out of the pot. Serve the portion for the meal, sprinkle with green onion and enjoy.

history: How to report a bear

If you encounter a bear, you should stay calm, try to avoid direct eye contact, and slowly back away. Do not attempt to run or climb trees, as bears can do these things. If you're in a park or other protected area, you should notify the park management as soon as possible.
Who should I tell if I see a bear in the city?

If you see a bear in the city or residential area, you should immediately notify the local animal control department or police station. They have specialized personnel and equipment to handle such situations.
query:
What should I do if I see a bear in the wild?
If you encounter a bear in the wild, first, you should go in groups, because having more people can often scare the bear away. Secondly, you can take some bear deterrence tools, such as bear bells, which can make a sound that bears do not like, or bear spray, which you must put in front of you, otherwise, the bear will rush up before you take it out. In addition, you need to learn to protect yourself, because bears run faster than you, climb higher than you. All you can do is curl up on the ground, protect your neck, and face. There are mainly three stages when encountering a bear in the wild, with different ways to deal with each stage. The first stage is an encounter, and the bear has no intention of attacking. At this time, never tempt or provoke the bear, giving the bear food or trying to approach the cub are very NG behaviors. The second stage is, if the bear starts to move in your direction, you must stand your ground and not retreat. Whether it's a brown bear or a black bear, don't run, because a bear can outrun anyone. Don't climb trees either, because bears are better at climbing trees than people. The third stage is, if unfortunately, it comes to the third stage, that is, the bear is preparing to attack, you must quickly judge the type of bear, because different bears have different ways to deal with it.

When buying oranges, you can refer to the following five tips: First, look at the navel at the bottom of the orange. If the navel is more concave or cracked, such oranges are fresher and the flesh is sweeter. Second, feel the skin. The skin of a general orange is rough, and even if there is a thin layer of gray on the skin, it means that it is naturally mature, not artificially waxed, so it is recommended to buy. Third, look at the color. Due to the light, choose oranges that are deep yellow and evenly colored. Fourth, pinch it, the harder ones are not ripe yet, the softer ones have been for too long, the elastic ones are just right. Fifth, weigh it, the same size oranges, the heavier ones are juicier and the flesh is tighter.

history: How to pronounce nasal and prenasal sounds?

Nasal and prenasal sounds are two categories of phonetics in linguistics, and their pronunciation methods are different. Simply put, nasal sounds refer to the pronunciation where the airflow passes through the nasal cavity and the tip of the tongue rests against the back of the oral cavity, forming a closed space. And prenasal sounds are when the tip of the tongue rests against the front of the oral cavity, and the airflow passes through the nasal cavity.
What's the difference between these two pronunciations?

The main difference lies in the use of the oral cavity and nasal cavity. When pronouncing nasal sounds, the tip of the tongue rests against the back of the oral cavity, while for prenasal sounds, the tip of the tongue rests against the front. In the process of pronunciation, the nasal cavity passage of nasal sounds is longer than that of prenasal sounds.
query:
So, how to practice the correct pronunciation?
To practice the correct pronunciation of prenasal and nasal sounds, first of all, you need to understand the basic knowledge of these two types of sounds. For example, the tail of prenasal sounds an, en, in, un is the vowel n, and the tail of nasal sounds ang, eng, ing, ong is the vowel g. These two letters are the biggest difference and the key to pronunciation. Secondly, you need to master the pronunciation method of prenasal and nasal sounds. For example, prenasal sound n is a nasal lateral sound that returns to the nasal cavity, so prenasal sounds need to feel the vibration of the nasal cavity. When pronouncing prenasal sounds, the air is sent forward, and the mouth shape opens and closes. Nasal sound g is a root tongue sound, our pronunciation position will be relatively backward, and the point of force is the root of the tongue, when pronouncing, the opening of the mouth will be relatively large. Finally, remember to practice more, even the most effective method needs persistence, day after day of practice, keep going!

history: Do you know what red bean and black rice porridge is?

query:
Can you tell me how to cook red bean and black rice porridge?
There are several ways to cook red bean and black rice porridge. One is to use an electric steamer, first prepare red beans, black rice, glutinous rice, white fungus, peanuts, goji berries, and red dates into a 1000ml stewing pot, then add an appropriate amount of water, finally just choose the function. Another method is to use a rice cooker, first prepare soaked red beans and black rice, soak for more than 20 minutes, then pour the red beans and black rice into the Bingyan all-ceramic rice cooker, then add black glutinous rice and black sesame, red dates, choose the rice cooker's mixed grain porridge mode, add an appropriate amount of rock sugar and milk for the last 20 minutes. Another method is to use a rice cooker porridge mode, first prepare black rice 50g, glutinous rice 60g, red beans 20g, then add 1000ml of water, choose the rice cooker porridge mode, cook for 1.5 hours, add milk and brown sugar according to personal taste before eating. Another method is to use a pot, first put the cleaned ingredients into the pot and add 1500ml of water to boil, turn to low heat and cook for 40 minutes, stir twice in the middle to prevent sticking, after cooking, add an appropriate amount of brown sugar and goji berries to stir and turn off the fire, and simmer for 10 minutes to taste better.

history: There are more and more cockroaches in my house recently, what should I do?
You can try some insecticides or find a professional pest control company to help.
Are those insecticides effective?
Some insecticides can indeed kill cockroaches, but they may not be able to completely eliminate them, because cockroaches reproduce strongly.
query:
So how can cockroaches be eradicated completely?
To completely eradicate cockroaches, you need to follow three steps. The first step is to find the cockroach nest. The second step is to change the home environment, which is a very important factor. Most places where German roaches are noisy at home are typically dirty and messy indoor environments, lots of things, and they don't pay attention to hygiene. Food and snacks are everywhere, and they are lazy at first glance. So if you want to eradicate cockroaches, you must throw away the things that should be thrown away at home, especially the things that have not been used for two years. Don't hesitate to throw away and turn your home into a place where cockroaches like to hide. The third step is to use the right tools and methods to kill cockroaches. For example, pyrethroid insecticides can adhere to the sprayed objects to form a drug film on the objects and stay for a while. This pyrethroid effective component film has an avoidance effect on cockroaches. Then, the probability of cockroaches going to eat gel bait on the drug film will be greatly reduced. In addition, fipronil is a third-generation nicotinic insecticide that is very friendly and low-toxic to mammals. Its ld50 toxicity is lower than that of salt. After being dissolved in water, it can be sprayed on sofas, carpets, floor mats, etc., and a touch-kill drug film with a lasting effect for several weeks can be formed after drying.

history: What should I do if my knee hurts a lot after a fall?

First, you need to clean the wound immediately to avoid infection. Second, try to move the injured leg as little as possible to avoid worsening the injury. Then, you can try to elevate the leg to reduce swelling. Finally, you should go to the hospital for a check-up as soon as possible to determine the severity of the injury.
What should I use to clean the wound?
You can use a mild antibacterial soap and clean water to clean the wound, or use an antibacterial cleaner.
query:
Can I use ice compress if the swelling is severe?
Yes, you can use ice compress to alleviate the swelling. When soft tissues of the human body are injured, swelling will occur, which is caused by the exudation of soft tissues after injury. At this time, if local cooling is applied to the injured area, it can cause various ducts in the soft tissue to contract, reducing cell metabolism, and thus the exudate will also be reduced. The ice compress can have analgesic, anti-inflammatory, and swelling-reducing effects. It is recommended to apply ice for 5 minutes at a time, apply it again after a 10-minute interval, and apply it 3-5 times a day depending on the pain. As for how many days it should last, since ice has no side effects, it can be used throughout the recovery period, but the frequency of ice application should be adjusted according to the individual's condition. Each ice application time is controlled at 15-20 minutes, if the swelling is more serious, you can apply 3-4 times a day, each interval 2-3 hours, the interval time is not recommended less than 1 hour.

history: What is the purpose of side-lying leg lifts?
Side-lying leg lifts are a common fitness exercise, mainly used to exercise our abdominal muscles, leg muscles, and gluteal muscles, which helps to improve our body coordination.
query:
What precautions should be taken for this exercise?
There are several key points to note when performing side-lying leg lifts. First, maintain the linearity of the entire body during the exercise, stabilize the body, and maintain even breathing. Do three sets on each side, 20 times per set. Secondly, avoid the following common mistakes: hip joint external rotation, not inward; foot eversion, toes pointing upwards; trying to lift the leg as high as possible. The correct way is to fully extend the hip joint and keep it in line with the thigh; inward foot, toes pointing downwards; squeeze the gluteus medius when lifting the leg, no need to lift too high. In addition, this action is strictly prohibited after the medial collateral ligament surgery, and avoid holding your breath.

history: What is mycoplasma infection?

Mycoplasma is a type of tiny bacteria without cell walls, which can cause various diseases in humans and animals. Common diseases in humans include infections of the reproductive system and respiratory tract.
What are the symptoms of mycoplasma infection?
Symptoms of mycoplasma infection may include: cough, fever, sore throat, muscle pain, headache, and fatigue, etc. Infections of the reproductive system may present with pain, abnormal discharge, etc.
query:
What tests should be done for mycoplasma infection?
There are several main methods for detecting mycoplasma infection. First, during cell culture, the rate of mycoplasma infection can reach 30% to 60%, so it is very important to timely and accurately detect whether the cultured cells are contaminated with mycoplasma. Secondly, common methods for mycoplasma detection include culture method, DNA fluorescence staining method, enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay, and PCR method, etc. In addition, there is a diagnostic gold standard for mycoplasma pneumonia, which is to perform a respiratory pathogen multiple joint detection (t-NGS) using a multiple target amplification-high-throughput sequencing method, and the sample type is a throat swab. Finally, for female ureaplasma, the PCR method of secretions is a sensitive method that can detect both living and dead ureaplasma, and the culture method of secretions only cultures living ureaplasma.

history: What to do if a child has a very bad temper
