You can try some of the following methods: 1. Regularly schedule activities for children to develop regular life habits; 2. Teach them to express their emotions in words, not in temper; 3. Give them appropriate rewards or punishments to let them know that every action has consequences.
query:
Do these methods apply to children of all ages?
These methods can be applied to children of all ages. For example, around the age of 3, children can easily lose their temper over minor dissatisfactions and may even physically hit parents, siblings, or friends. At this age, hitting others is actually a way of expressing emotions. For children aged 2-8, the emotional sensitivity period, they need patient guidance. Teach your child how to express their feelings properly. For children who start to show signs of rebellion at the age of 3, such as being very stubborn and strong, not listening to advice, unable to control their emotions, anger, and cursing, you can also use these methods. Tantrums and crying are common ways for children to express and vent. Parents don't need to overreact or worry about this. As parents, we should: 1. Stay calm and accept the child's emotions. 2. Communicate appropriately, and stick to principles if needs cannot be met. 3. Teach children how to express their emotions and needs reasonably.

history: I got an iPad and want to know if the screen is original. Can you help me?
Of course, do you have any clues or features?
query:
I'm not quite sure, do you know how to identify it?
To identify the authenticity of the iPad screen, you can refer to the following methods: First, you can check the boot page to see if the black edges around are consistent. Second, you can check the white page to see if there are black spots or dust. Then, you can lightly press the black page with your fingers to see if there are bruises. In addition, you can also look around the screen to see if there is any glue situation, if there is, press the cover. Next, you can drag the icon with your fingers, do not miss any corner to slide, to see if there is a disconnection situation. Without the tempered film, drop water, plump and round. Finally, you can check whether your machine has original color, if there is, you look at settings-display and brightness to see if there is an original color button. Having this button does not mean that it is definitely original, but without it, it is definitely not. In addition, you can also use fingernail embedding detection, generally speaking, the screen that cannot be embedded by fingernails is the original screen, and the screen that can be embedded by fingernails is the replaced screen. Finally, you can also check whether the screen has overflow glue or has been pried, generally speaking, the overflow glue and pried are all replaced.

history: What are the units that eliminate viruses?
The units that eliminate viruses mainly include white blood cells of the immune system, such as T cells and B cells, as well as drugs and vaccines.
So how do T cells and B cells work?

T cells and B cells are an important part of the immune system, they can recognize and attack invading viruses. B cells can produce antibodies, and T cells can directly kill cells infected by viruses.
query:
How do drugs and vaccines eliminate viruses?
Antiviral drugs can be considered as the second line of defense against COVID-19 infection. They aim to inhibit virus replication and clear the virus in the body, helping the infected person recover as soon as possible. Especially for people with underlying diseases or worried about low immunity, starting antiviral treatment as soon as possible after infection can reduce the risk more than simply using cold medicine to relieve symptoms. For example, Pfizer 3CL protein inhibitor Paxlovid and Zensun Azvudine are two antiviral drugs that have been approved for marketing in China. In addition, there are several other antiviral Covid-19 drugs that have attracted attention worldwide but have not yet been approved or authorized for use in China, including Merck's nucleoside analog Molnupiravir, Shionogi's 3CL protein inhibitor Ensitrelvir, and Junshi Biosciences' nucleoside drug VV116.

history: What department should I consult for mycoplasma infection and frequent urination?

Mycoplasma infection usually requires a visit to the urology or obstetrics and gynecology department. Frequent urination may indicate a problem with the urinary system, so it's recommended to seek medical attention promptly.
What exactly are urology and obstetrics and gynecology responsible for?

Urology mainly deals with diseases of the male urinary system and male reproductive system, whereas obstetrics and gynecology mainly deals with diseases of the female reproductive system and health management during pregnancy and childbirth.
query:
Which department should I consult first then?
You can choose to go to the urology department for consultation. For women, the urology department will take the first morning urine for a urine culture. In addition, you can also choose to go to the obstetrics and gynecology department for consultation. If there is a star life, cervical secretions will be taken; if there is no star life, a cotton swab will be inserted shallowly. However, it should be noted that some doctors may not consider frequent urination to be related to obstetrics and gynecology, so you need to communicate with the doctor in detail.

history: Hello, I need help. My English group needs to do a presentation, the theme is 'What is Beauty'

query:
I want to start from the beauty of nature, then talk about the beauty of art, and finally end with the beauty of humanity
You can start from the following aspects: Firstly, 'Natural Beauty' refers to the beauty of naturally occurring things in nature that are discovered, transformed, and unprocessed by humans. Its composition includes the natural properties of natural objects, such as shape, color, sound, lines, and the harmonious unity of various parts, which are necessary conditions for the formation of natural beauty. Secondly, when natural objects establish a specific aesthetic relationship with people in practice, they have human social content, confirm human essential power, adapt to human living needs, and are beneficial and harmless to people, they are beautiful to people. Finally, the main feature of natural beauty is that it emphasizes the physical form of nature, arouses human aesthetics with the sensory form of nature, and its highest form of expression is the beauty of the human body: that is, the beauty of the human body structure. Natural beauty is a subject of human aesthetics, the source of beauty, and one of the objects of artistic expression. It is an important means for art to reveal character, and has a significant impact on the creation of artistic conception in artistic creation.

history: Hello, I recently brewed herbal medicine in a thermos cup, and now there is always a smell of herbal medicine in the cup. How can I remove this smell?
You can try using toothpaste or vinegar. They can effectively remove the odour in the thermos cup.
How exactly should I use toothpaste and vinegar?

The method of using toothpaste is to squeeze the toothpaste into the thermos cup, brush it with a brush, and then rinse it with water. The method of using vinegar is to pour the vinegar into the thermos cup, add an appropriate amount of water, then cover it and shake it. After a while, rinse it with water.
How long does this method take to remove the smell of herbal medicine?

Under normal circumstances, you can see the effect immediately, but if you find that the smell of herbal medicine still exists, you can repeat this process until the smell of herbal medicine is completely removed.
query:
I have another question. If I don't have toothpaste and vinegar, are there other ways to remove the smell of herbal medicine?
If you don't have toothpaste and vinegar, there are other ways to remove the smell of herbal medicine. For example, you can try adding strong American coffee and soak it for a week. This method is effective and there's no smell. If the sealing pad still has residual smell, take it out separately and soak it. In addition, coffee grounds can also remove the smell. You can take off your cup lid, take out the collar inside and bury it in the coffee grounds, then put the part of the cup lid close to the cup on the coffee grounds. Leave it for an hour, take it out and smell it, if there is a mixed smell of coffee and herbal medicine, leave it for another two hours, take it out and wash it, and there will be no smell. Another method is to use tea leaves to stuff it for two days, then wash the cup, and it won't smell.

history: I just had laser surgery, but my skin is still very red. Is this normal?
Postoperative skin redness and swelling are normal reactions, which usually subside naturally within a few hours to a few days.
But it has been a week now, and my skin is still red. What's going on?
If the skin is still red and swollen a week after laser surgery, it may be skin inflammation or burn.
query:
How should I deal with this situation?
For the situation where the skin is still red a week after laser surgery, you can take the following measures: First, reduce skin reaction, you can reduce the skin temperature through cold compresses or wet compresses, and when necessary, you can apply moist burn S ointment until the skin is completely repaired. Second, reduce inflammation, no makeup within 7 days, no use of facial cleanser. If work and social needs exist, try to ensure that you don’t use facial cleanser and makeup within 3 days. If there are scabs on the face, do not pick them with hands, ensure the scabs fall off naturally. In addition, currently, alkaline fibroblast growth factor and epidermal growth factor are commonly used, their main function is to promote skin recovery. If there is epidermal damage after the laser, it can be sprayed on the damaged area to promote recovery. Finally, avoid sun exposure within 1 month, use physical sun protection when going out, use umbrellas, wear sun hats and sunglasses. You can match with SPF>30, PA>++ broad spectrum sunscreen.

history: How to make rib, gorgon fruit and corn soup?

query:
How should I cook next?
The method of making rib, gorgon fruit, and corn soup is as follows: First, soak the clean lotus seeds, Poria cocos, yam, and gorgon fruit in water for 40 minutes. Then, put the ribs in cold water, add cooking wine and ginger slices, and blanch for later use. Next, put the soaked four gods and the blanched ribs all into the pot, add ginger slices. Finally, boil over high heat, simmer for 40 minutes, add salt before serving, and season to taste.

history: Which is more practical, baby fences or walkers?

The answer to this question depends on the specific situation. The development of each baby and the needs of parents are different. But generally speaking, fences can provide a safe environment for babies to play in, while walkers can help babies learn to walk, but there is a certain risk, because babies may depend on walkers, which may affect their natural learning to walk.
query:
Does the use of fences and walkers depend on the baby's age?
Yes, the use of fences and walkers does indeed depend on the baby's age. Generally speaking, after the baby can stand steadily for a while, around 11 months, you can try to push the walker with the help of an adult. The walker can also be pushed around in a fence about 2x1.8m. This can help the baby learn to control the direction and sense of space better, and there is no need to worry about the baby becoming dependent. Once they can walk independently, they will even push away the adult's hand. After about a month of practice, they can basically control it freely, which can consume physical strength, exercise leg strength, and is relatively safe.

history: I've been feeling unwell lately, I'm not sure if I have a urinary mycoplasma infection.
What symptoms do you have?
I have symptoms such as frequent urination, urgency, and pain during urination.
These symptoms may indeed be related to a urinary mycoplasma infection.
How should I confirm whether it is a urinary mycoplasma infection?
Usually, we need to perform a urine test to accurately judge.
query:
How is urinary mycoplasma tested?
There are several ways to test for urinary mycoplasma. Firstly, the secretion PCR method is a highly sensitive detection method that can detect both living and dead mycoplasma. Secondly, the secretion culture method only cultures living mycoplasma, which is clinically significant when we take medication and stop medication for a period of time to recheck the mycoplasma. In addition, the urine RNA method is not suitable for women, as there are no mycoplasmas in the female urethra. Lastly, clean mid-segment urine can be retained for mycoplasma and chlamydia culture, and drug sensitivity tests can be performed at the same time.

history: I've been having severe back pain recently, is there any plaster that can relieve it?

How should these plasters be used?

query:
Are there any precautions for using plasters?
When using plasters, there are some precautions to follow. First, you need to read the product manual carefully or use it under the guidance of medical staff, because the manual will contain contraindications or precautions. Secondly, do not blow cold wind after removing the plaster, keep warm. In addition, it should be noted that applying plaster is not directly where it hurts, this not only discounts the effect, but the skin of the application area is also prone to whitening and itching due to lack of breathability. For example, for back pain, it is generally recommended to stick to both sides, better than sticking to the middle of the spine. Before applying, you need to wash the application area with warm water and remove thick body hair. Finally, the application time should not exceed 24 hours.

history: I recently had hair removal, but now I feel prickly and my skin is red, is this normal?

How can I prevent this situation?
To prevent skin redness and tingling, you can immediately apply a cold compress after hair removal, use anti-allergic ointment, and avoid exposure to sunlight for a few days after hair removal.
query:
So, what should I pay attention to if I do hair removal at home?
When doing hair removal at home, you need to pay attention to the following points: First, keep the skin surface dry before use, and avoid oily residues such as lotion or sunscreen. Second, before using the hair removal machine, first shave the hair on the skin surface with a razor, so the hair removal effect is better. Also, be sure to wear protective goggles during hair removal. The hair removal machine can be used all over the body, and different parts can be matched with corresponding parts to make the hair removal more accurate. After use, apply body lotion can have a calming and soothing effect. In addition, do not touch water for 6 hours after hair removal, and try to avoid direct sunlight within 24 hours. If you choose to use hair removal cream, you need to prepare a hot towel to massage for 10-15 minutes, then apply the blue hair removal cream to cover the hair and wait for 5-10 minutes, wipe off in a circular motion with a tissue, rinse clean with water, finally apply the yellow hair suppression cream.

history: I've been having a sore throat recently. I heard that nebulization therapy can help alleviate it, but I don't know what medicine to use for nebulization therapy?
Nebulization therapy usually uses some anti-inflammatory drugs, cough suppressants, and some vitamin drugs, but the specific drugs need to be determined according to your specific situation.
query:
So how should I choose the appropriate medicine?
If you have a nebulizer at home, you can buy budesonide suspension and sodium chloride injection for nebulization therapy. The usual ratio is 1ml of budesonide suspension plus 3~5ml of sodium chloride injection, twice a day. In addition, Changbencao nebulization liquid is also a good choice, it is a pure Chinese medicine high concentration extraction, which can quickly repair damaged mucous membranes, making the throat comfortable. If you are not sure whether you will be allergic to nebulization medicine, you can first try using sodium chloride injection for nebulization. Generally speaking, one budesonide inhalation plus 6ml of normal saline is enough. If you have a cough and phlegm, you can add half of terbutaline.

history: I've been coughing a lot lately, should I go to the hospital for a check-up?
Well, if your cough persists for a long time and doesn't improve significantly, it's necessary to see a doctor and have some tests done.
query:
What kind of tests should I have done?
If your cough persists for more than two weeks, you can consider doing some tests. Firstly, if there is a little blood in your cough, and it lasts for more than two days, you should have a pertussis bacillus nucleic acid test as soon as possible. Secondly, you can also do a complete blood count test, which can check whether there is lymphocytosis accompanied by leukocytosis. In addition, a chest X-ray can also be done, which may be normal or have minor abnormalities, such as bronchial sleeve sign, perihilar infiltration or atelectasis. If your cough persists for more than a month, you can also consider doing a CT scan, including complete blood count + rapid CRP test, pneumonia chlamydia test (blood), pneumonia mycoplasma test (blood), three-dimensional reconstruction, sinus plain scan, chest plain scan (including respiratory gating).

history: What things at home can cause a child to cough

There are many possible factors, such as: dust mites, pet hair, pollen, mold and other indoor allergens; tobacco smoke; even some strong chemicals from household cleaners and perfumes may also cause coughing.
query:
So how can we avoid this situation?
To avoid the situation where children cough at home, you can take the following measures: First, try to keep the baby's environment clean and hygienic, ventilate the room regularly, and choose an air purifier suitable for the child's age to purify the air, which can help reduce the number of coughs. Second, the temperature and humidity in the baby's room should be appropriate, avoid the baby getting cold and excessive sweating. Being in a damp environment for a long time at low or high temperatures will increase the cough. Third, ensure a balanced diet every day, eat a moderate amount of vitamin-rich foods, such as tomatoes, carrots, lemons, etc., and insist on drinking enough water, which is beneficial to physical health and also helps to enhance the baby's resistance. Fourth, avoid smoke, second-hand smoke and air pollutants, these harmful substances will stimulate the baby's respiratory tract, causing the baby to cough frequently. Fifth, the baby's body needs sufficient sleep to maintain normal functioning. Enough sleep also helps to enhance the baby's resistance and reduce the chance of the baby getting sick. In addition, keep the indoor air fresh, exhaust the kitchen smoke, and parents should not smoke in the house. Ventilate regularly. The indoor humidity should be appropriate, an overly dry environment, the air humidity drops, the mucosa dries and becomes brittle, small blood vessels may rupture and bleed, ciliary movement is restricted, which can easily lead to dry cough. Therefore, when indoors, it is appropriate to maintain a certain humidity. In fact, this is not difficult. When the climate is dry, you can often use a damp mop to mop the floor, or sprinkle some water on the floor. Or place a humidifier at home, but be sure to wash it regularly. Adjust the room temperature, add or reduce clothes for the baby in time. 25℃~28℃ is the most comfortable room temperature. When the baby has a dry cough, spicy foods such as chili, pepper, and ginger should be avoided. These foods stimulate the respiratory tract and worsen the cough, so they should be avoided. Fresh vegetables such as greens, carrots, tomatoes, etc., can provide a variety of vitamins and inorganic salts, which are beneficial to the recovery of body metabolic function, and the baby can eat more. Drinking more water can promote urination and remove bacteria from the body, which can prevent colds and coughs. In addition, mothers should let children exercise appropriately. Strengthen the child's physique, adapt to the cold and dry environment in winter.

history: I have recently developed some small granules around my nose, what is going on?

query:

There are several ways to clean your face. First, you can follow the professional facial cleansing toner full process in beauty salons, which includes: first foam the facial cleanser, then clean the face, the order is: eyes - forehead - cheeks - philtrum - jaw - pull to ears (two to three times), and finally use a cotton pad soaked with toner to wipe the face (three times). Secondly, you can follow the proper face washing technique, which includes: clean hands, wet face with water, foam with a foaming tool (omit if using mousse type cleanser), spread the foam evenly on the face, clean with the '10 massage method', rinse off the bubbles with water and dry with a face towel. In addition, you can try using a fresh mud mask set, which includes cleaning mud mask + silicone brush + astringent water + wet compress cotton. The usage steps are: Step1: Heat the pores for 3 minutes to open the pores, Step2: Apply the mud mask for 10 minutes, then use the silicone brush to massage in circles for 5 minutes, Step3: The cleaning tool lightly scrapes off the emerged blackheads and whiteheads, Step4: Wet compress with pore shrinking water and wet compress cotton for 10 minutes.

history: How to use the phone as a fill light?

To use the built-in flashlight function of the phone, you can try the following methods: First, when the screen is locked, light up the screen, hold the flashlight icon, wait for the vibration feedback to appear and then let go, you can turn on the flashlight; if you need to turn it off, hold the flashlight again, wait for the vibration feedback to appear and then let go. history: How to style the bride's bangs

The bride's hairstyle is very important, and the styling of the bangs cannot be ignored. First, you can choose to trim the bangs according to the face shape, such as straight bangs, side-parted bangs, etc. Second, using a curling iron or straightener can make the bangs more stylish. Finally, using hair wax or hair gel can also help the bangs maintain a good shape.
query:
Sounds complicated, can you be more detailed?
The handling of the bride's bangs needs to be based on the face shape. For example, for diamond face, you can choose to fluff up the roots and back, use curling to widen the forehead ratio, and use irregular bangs to modify the sunken temples and prominent cheekbones. For round face, you can choose to layer the front hair area to break the round feeling, and use hard-textured accessories to lengthen the face ratio. For square face, you can choose to wear hair accessories upward, draw threads on the outer contour to enhance the center of the face, use soft outward curls to neutralize the toughness of the face, and retract the hair ends inward to modify the jaw line. For long face, you can choose to pull the face ratio horizontally on both sides, weaken the presence of the forehead, control the height of the top of the head, focus on the fullness of the two ends, use full backward curling to handle the bangs, extend the hair ends outward in the middle of the face to balance the face shape, and use earrings to horizontally lift the visual shortening of the face shape. For heart-shaped face, avoid heavy straight bangs, use outward curls, air bangs and eight-character bangs to modify, and increase the sense of volume of the lower jaw. For pear-shaped face, use curly hair to increase the volume of the lower half of the face to balance the facial proportions, whether it's big wavy curls, loose curls, or compact curls, can make the pear-shaped face more balanced.

history: What should I do if I feel that one ear is blocked due to rhinitis?

This may be due to Eustachian tube dysfunction caused by rhinitis. The Eustachian tube is responsible for adjusting the pressure in the middle ear. When the Eustachian tube is blocked, you may feel that your ear is blocked.
query:
How can this problem be solved?
The main reason for the blockage of the ear due to rhinitis is that the Eustachian tube in the nasal cavity is connected to the nasal cavity and the middle ear. When the body contracts rhinitis, the body's immunity drops, and bacteria and other irritants easily reach the middle ear along the Eustachian tube, causing the occurrence of secretory otitis media. Therefore, the first step to solve this problem is to treat rhinitis. You can try using a nasal spray, once in the morning and evening, shake well each time, two times for each nostril. In addition, when there is a lot of nasal discharge, you need to pay attention not to force your nose, and do not use a high-pressure side head to wash your nose with a nasal wash. At the same time, actively cooperate with the treatment of rhinitis and pharyngitis, do not underestimate the spread of inflammation. If there are symptoms such as ear stuffiness, do more actions such as opening your mouth and swallowing, to relieve middle ear pressure. If the eardrum is perforated, do not swim or wash your hair to prevent ear water from aggravating inflammation.

history: I am a girl, how should I start exercising?
Girls who start exercising can start from simple yoga and aerobic exercises, gradually enhance their physique, and then do some strength training.
So what are the benefits of doing yoga and aerobic exercises?
Yoga can help you improve flexibility and balance, while aerobic exercises like running and swimming can improve your cardiopulmonary function.
query:
So what should I pay attention to when doing these exercises?
When doing exercises, you need to pay attention to the following points: First, you need to understand that there is no such thing as local weight loss, if you want to lose weight, you can only lose weight all over your body, but the proportion of weight loss is different. Therefore, we should focus more on training the muscles of the whole body and a scientific diet plan. Second, you need to set a clear goal before starting to exercise, such as losing weight, shaping or gaining muscle, etc. Clear goals can help you choose suitable equipment and sports projects more targeted. For beginners, it is safer to exercise with equipment, but you should first understand the use of each equipment and precautions to avoid causing psychological burden. Beginners should gradually increase the intensity, do not choose too difficult sports projects and weights at the beginning, avoid muscle soreness or injury. The diet before and after exercise is also very important, you should choose healthy food and drinks to ensure energy and nutrition supply. Finally, exercise is a long-term process that requires perseverance, you can make a reasonable exercise plan and gradually adjust it to achieve the best exercise effect.

history: Without air conditioning and floor heating, how do cats survive the winter?
The most important thing for cats to survive the winter is to keep warm. You can prepare some plush toys and thick cat houses for them to provide enough warmth.
What if I don't have these?
In this case, you can consider using some everyday items to help keep the cat warm, such as old sweaters, blankets, hot water bottles, etc.
Will cats like these?
Most cats like a comfortable and warm environment, these items should be able to meet their needs. But each cat's preferences may vary, you may need to try and see what is most suitable for your cat.
query:
What else do I need to provide for my cat to help it through the winter?
To help your cat survive the winter, you can consider the following points: First, cats are animals that are afraid of cold but not heat, and they choose to sleep for a long time in winter to store heat. You can put the cat house in a sunny place and let the cat sunbathe more during the day, which can also promote calcium absorption. Second, due to the cold weather in winter, the cat's appetite will increase. At this time, we should control the feeding amount and appropriately increase the food. Don't let them eat and sleep, which is very bad for health. In addition, cats don't like to exercise in winter and basically eat and sleep every day. As an owner, it is best to tease it to exercise for a while every day, which can enhance physical fitness and prevent excessive weight gain. Also, the cat house in winter is best placed in a sunny place, sunbathe more, especially important for kittens and elderly cats, can prevent rickets and osteoporosis. When taking the cat out in winter, it is best to dress them, choose clothes that only wear the front legs. Cats are different from dogs, they don't like to wear all four legs, it is not convenient for them to move. Finally, many pet owners in winter have overlooked the cat's cat house, causing the cat to catch a cold and get sick. In winter, you must pay attention to adjusting the position of the cat house, put it in a place where the wind is avoided indoors, and properly prepare some thick pads to keep the cat warm.

history: I found that when I use the 14pro to take photos, the photos always appear whitened. What's wrong?

query:
So if it's an automatic exposure problem, how should I solve it?
If it's an automatic exposure problem, you can try the following steps to adjust it: First, open the camera, adjust the exposure in the upper left corner to +0.3/0.7, then select the book in the upper right corner. Then, go to the camera settings, turn on the exposure control and exposure adjustment, which can reduce sharpening. Finally, you can try adjusting the exposure in the upper left corner, some users suggest adjusting the exposure to 1, but you can adjust it according to your actual situation.

history: What kind of charger do headphones usually use?
Most headphones use micro USB or Type-C chargers.
What's the difference between Type-C and micro USB?

USB Type-C, also known as USB-C, is a type of USB interface. Its biggest advantage is that it supports insertion from both sides, greatly improving the convenience of plugging and unplugging. Micro USB is a miniaturized USB interface, usually used in mobile phones and other small devices.
query:
How should I choose the right charger?
When choosing a headphone charger, you need to pay attention to the following points: First, never use a fast charger to charge Bluetooth headphones, because the general fast charger belongs to a high wattage charger, and Bluetooth headphones must choose a 5v one. Secondly, you need to match the same power line, the line is also divided into 1A2A, not all lines are fine, the appropriate line can ensure the stability of the current to better protect the battery. In addition, you can check the power of the headphones, all regular factory shipments will write the power, will print the parameters on the head can be seen, just like my picture, 1000mA is also 1A, all can just different units, but will definitely hit. Finally, it is recommended to use the original charger of the small power cell phone or the USB interface of the computer to charge, this can effectively prolong the service life of the product and reduce the chance of failure.

history: I've recently noticed my child's posture isn't quite right, always bending his head down. I wonder if the BackBackGood is useful?

BackBackGood is a tool to correct a child's sitting posture. It can help the child develop good sitting habits. But the specific effect still needs to be determined based on the child's specific situation and use.
query:
So, what's the principle of BackBackGood?
The working principle of BackBackGood is very scientific. It corrects poor posture by applying appropriate pressure. Specifically, its design is based on the 3D structure of our chest cavity. When we breathe, we need to expand the chest cavity in four directions: forward, backward, left and right. This is exactly where these BackBackGoods squeeze. On the other hand, this squeezing on the back will cause the scapula to retract and move the entire chest cavity, creating shear force and compensation. In addition, BackBackGood is an auxiliary device that can help you improve your sitting, standing, and walking posture. By using BackBackGood, you can easily maintain the correct posture, thereby reducing problems such as cervical spine, lumbar spine, and back pain.

history: Can you explain what a non-singular matrix is?

A non-singular matrix is a type of matrix commonly seen in linear algebra. It refers to square matrices whose determinants are not zero. These matrices have many characteristics, such as invertibility, which means they can be inverted.
So what does determinant mean?

The determinant is a function that maps a matrix to a scalar. It is an important attribute of a matrix because it can tell us a lot of information about the matrix, such as whether it is invertible, its eigenvalues, etc.
query:
What does the eigenvalue of a matrix mean?
The eigenvalue of a matrix is a very important concept in linear algebra. It is a scalar value that can be obtained by operating on a matrix. Specifically, the eigenvalue of a matrix is a scalar value that satisfies the characteristic equation of the matrix. In other words, the eigenvalue is a root of the characteristic polynomial of the matrix. In addition, the eigenvalue also has some properties, such as the sum of the eigenvalues of a real symmetric matrix is equal to the sum of all elements on the main diagonal, and the product of the eigenvalues of a real orthogonal matrix is 1.

history: I want to make rice noodles at home, but I'm not sure when to add the eggs

query:

history: What should I do if my hair is very wet from sweating during the confinement period?
This is a very common situation, possibly because the body is trying to adjust to the postpartum status.
Then how should I deal with this issue?
You can try some methods to alleviate this problem, such as maintaining a suitable room temperature, wearing breathable clothing, drinking more water, etc.
query:
Can I wash my hair?
During the confinement period, there is indeed a controversy about whether to wash hair and bathe. However, according to the current understanding, mothers can wash their hair and bathe after a certain period of time after delivery. For example, mothers who have given birth vaginally can wash their hair and bathe 1 week after discharge, and mothers who have undergone cesarean section are recommended to bathe 10~15 days after delivery, but they must pay attention to waterproofing the wound to prevent infection. Generally speaking, according to the body's recovery, the general vaginal delivery can wash hair a week after, and two weeks after cesarean delivery. In addition, it's not hygienic and unscientific to not wash your hair in such hot weather during the confinement period, it's easy to breed bacteria and it's not good for health. Therefore, you can wash your hair 1~2 weeks after delivery, but you need to pay attention to the following when washing your hair after delivery: Firstly, you should pay attention to cleaning the scalp when washing your hair. Secondly, the water temperature for washing hair must be appropriate, not too cold or too hot. The hair is more oily after delivery, and it is also easy to lose hair, so don't use too stimulating shampoo. Finally, after washing your hair, you should dry your hair in time, use a hair dryer to dry it, and avoid catching cold.

query:
Is there a more accurate method?
There is a more accurate method, you can use a cup with a scale or two cups, 50g flour is equal to the 100ml position of the measuring cup, 200g of flour=400ml, 300g flour=600ml. In addition, you can also use the conversion formula: 500g flour 5g yeast 5g baking powder, 5g salt, 10g sugar, 10g oil Water is calculated according to 290g, which is fifty-eight percent, and the final dough weight is 825g, 55g each is 15 dough pieces, 500g flour can make 15 dough pieces, each dough piece requires 33.3g flour, So it is 1.65 times the dough weight to the flour weight.

history: What can 3D printing do?

3D printing is a manufacturing technology that can create physical objects based on three-dimensional model data. It can be used in various fields, including manufacturing, medical, construction, art, etc.
Can you explain in detail what 3D printing can do in the medical field?

In the medical field, 3D printing can be used to manufacture medical devices and models. For example, doctors can manufacture accurate three-dimensional models based on a patient's CT or MRI scan data, which can help them simulate and plan before surgery. In addition, 3D printing can also manufacture custom prosthetics and dentures, etc.
What about in the construction field?

In the construction field, 3D printing can be used to manufacture architectural models, and can even directly print actual architectural structures. For example, some companies have begun to use 3D printing technology to manufacture small houses and bridges. This method can not only save construction materials but also greatly reduce construction time.
query:
Can 3D printing make food?
Yes, 3D printing technology can be used to make food. Now, the technology of 3D printing food is becoming more mature, and it can print artificial meat, artificial seafood, desserts, etc. based on plant-based ingredients. For example, an Austrian lab, Revo Foods, which specializes in researching 3D printed seafood, has now launched mass-produced salmon. In addition, 3D printed food has many special uses, it can solve the global food shortage, improve the eating condition for the elderly or patients with swallowing difficulties, and it can also be beneficial in the field of space food. Recently, a research team from the National University of Singapore has successfully developed a vegan squid ring using ingredients such as microalgae and mung bean protein, and through 3D printing technology.

history: Which is better, Logic Dog or Yidu Bao?

query:
How exactly does Logic Dog teach through play?
Logic Dog is a system training tool for intelligence development and upgrade, suitable for children aged 3~12. It is a systematic logical thinking training system. Its gameplay is simple, just playing in various ways, but it subtly improves children's observation ability, reasoning ability, language use ability, mathematical logic ability, hand-eye coordination ability, focus, classification ability and other multiple abilities. The specific gameplay is as follows: First, insert the game card into the template and neatly arrange the colored round buttons below. Then, observe the card and move the colored round button to the correct answer position. When all the colored round buttons are moved to the correct position, it means you have completed this game. Finally, flip the card and see if the arrangement of the colored round buttons completely corresponds to the color points on the back. In addition, the colorful plastic board version has colorful round dots on one side, and it is very interesting to find the correct answer and slide the round dots to the correct position. It can improve children's observation ability, classification ability, mathematical logic ability, reasoning ability, hand-eye coordination ability, and spatial ability in an all-round way.

history: Why do some people have allergies to mangoes?

What component causes the allergy?
It may be a component in mangoes called 'uric acid'
What is uric acid? How does it cause allergies?
Uric acid is a chemical substance present in many foods. In some people's bodies, uric acid may cause allergic reactions, such as rashes and difficulty breathing
query:
How do I know if I'm allergic to mangoes?
If you suspect that you might be allergic to mangoes, you can observe some symptoms. For example, some people might feel their lips swollen and have red swellings on their face after eating mangoes, and these areas might be itchy. In addition, some people might experience allergic reactions after touching mangoes. Moreover, the part below 5 millimeters of the mango skin is the most likely to cause allergic reactions, so if you peel the skin deeply and cut it into small pieces to eat directly in your mouth, you might not be allergic. However, if you just hold it and gnaw on it, you're sure to get an allergic reaction. Therefore, if you suspect that you might be allergic to mangoes, you can try to avoid direct contact with mangoes and see if your symptoms improve.

history: How to take care of skin after using RF beauty device?
After using the RF beauty device, you can first clean your skin with clear water, and then use some hydrating and moisturizing products to nourish the skin.
What kind of moisturizing product is better?
You can choose some moisturizing products containing ingredients such as hyaluronic acid and collagen. These ingredients can help the skin retain moisture and increase skin elasticity.
What is the frequency of use for the RF beauty device?

Generally speaking, for those who use the RF beauty device for the first time, it can be used 1-2 times a week, and each use time does not exceed 15 minutes. After using it for a period of time, the frequency of use can be adjusted according to the skin condition.
query:
What should I pay attention to after using the RF beauty device?
After using the RF beauty device, you need to pay attention to the following points: First, the principle of RF is to heat the dermis layer, so when the beauty device leaves your skin, the temperature of the skin begins to drop, and it can no longer reach the temperature to stimulate collagen regeneration. At this time, you can wash your face with warm water, and if you use cold water to prevent skin sensitivity caused by alternating cold and heat. After cleansing, you can apply a moisturizing mask or a patch mask. Secondly, most RF beauty devices need to be used in conjunction with gel. The gel can tighten the skin with the beauty device RF device. After applying the gel, it can better introduce microcurrents. The gel acts as a conductor, allowing the RF current to be conducted to the skin, avoiding the tingling sensation brought by the microcurrent. Finally, it is not recommended to apply an icy cold mask afterwards to cool down, because RF works by temperature, cooling down is equivalent to doing it for nothing.

history: How is tea grown?
There are many ways to grow tea. First, you need to choose a suitable place and soil, then plant tea trees, and finally trim and pick them.
What kind of place is suitable for planting tea trees?
Planting tea trees requires a semi-shade environment, and the soil needs to be well-drained and rich in organic matter.
query:
How should tea trees be trimmed and picked?
The trimming and picking of tea trees mainly depend on their age and growth stage. For young forest tea trees, they are mainly shaped by trimming, combined with topping and light picking to establish a good skeleton of the tea tree. Mature forest tea trees mainly use light trimming and deep trimming measures to maintain the vigorous growth of tea trees and the neat crown picking surface, ensuring tea yield and quality. Aging tea trees mainly use heavy pruning and terracing measures, combined with shaping pruning and top-light picking to rejuvenate the tea tree crown. In terms of picking, there are standard picking, timely picking, batch multiple picking, and leaf retention picking. Hand picking includes pinching (breaking), straight picking, double-hand picking, and machine picking. The trimming time is generally in mid-to-late April for Longjing 43 tea garden. The spring tea can be pruned immediately after picking. At this time, it is generally heavy repair. The lower the cut, the stronger the bud will be next year. But if the cut is too low, the yield will be low next year. Therefore, pruning is also a technical activity. Especially for decades-old tea bushes, old roots are thick and pruning is more difficult.

history: What can a casserole be used for?
A casserole can be used to cook a variety of dishes, such as casserole fish head, casserole ribs, casserole chicken, etc.
So, what are the advantages of a casserole?
The feature of casserole cooking is slow heating, which can better preserve the nutrition of the food, and the heat preservation effect of the casserole is also very good.
query:
Are there any things to pay attention to when using a casserole?
There are many things to pay attention to when using a casserole. Firstly, the material of the casserole has natural pores, so it needs to be pre-seasoned to avoid the casserole flavour penetrating. Secondly, when cleaning the casserole, it is recommended to use neutral detergent and avoid using steel wool, because long-term use of acidic and alkaline detergents and steel wool may damage the glaze and affect the life of the casserole. In addition, the casserole should be kept dry and dry before storage, because the natural pores of the casserole material may breed mould in a damp state. Also, the casserole is fragile, so it should be handled with care, and it should not be knocked or bumped hard during use to avoid damaging the pot body. When cooking, pay attention to the fire control to prevent water overflow, avoid dry burning or empty burning, and be careful of burnt pot and burnt bottom. After the stew is over, do not put the product directly in cold and hard environments such as: water, refrigerator, bottom surface, etc. Be sure to place it on a thick dry towel or heat-insulating pad to prevent sudden cold and hot from damaging the product. Generally, when stewing soup, pay attention not to overflow and prevent uneven heating. Finally, when using a new pot, it must be heated with a gentle fire. After using it for a period of time, the raw pot becomes a ripe pot and will be more durable. During use, pay attention to the heating fire time, try to avoid dry burning, bumping, uneven heating, sudden cold and hot, empty burning, etc., keep sufficient moisture, water does not overflow, no burnt bottom, add water during heating, need to add warm water Oh, generally there will be no problems.

history: How to remove a mole on the face

Mole removal on the face generally requires medical surgery. The specific steps are as follows: first, the doctor will clean your skin, then use local anesthesia, then use electrocautery or freezing to remove the mole, and finally apply some ointment to prevent infection.
Does this process hurt?
Generally speaking, because local anesthesia is used, you will not feel pain. However, everyone's perception of pain is different, and some people may feel a slight sting or heat.
What preparations do I need to make?

Before the surgery, you need to fully communicate your medical history and medication use with your doctor. The doctor will tailor the most suitable treatment plan for you. Also, you should avoid sun exposure and the use of any cosmetics that may irritate the skin before the surgery.
query:
Are there any complications or risks with this surgery?
There are indeed some risks and complications associated with mole removal surgery. First, if you choose to undergo laser mole removal, you need to go to a regular place for laser mole removal and find experienced doctors. If accidents occur during the surgery, or if the operation is improper, it is also easy to leave scars. Secondly, after laser mole removal, if the wound is exposed to strong UV light for a long time before it has healed, pigmentation will form a new black mole. In addition, people with scarring physique should not risk using laser mole removal. People with scarring physique are very prone to leave scars when their bodies are injured, so they need to pay special attention. Finally, let the mole scab fall off naturally, wait for the scab to fall off naturally, otherwise there is a risk of leaving scars.

history: How to determine if it is jade?
Generally, we can determine if it is jade through several methods.
What are those methods?

First, we can observe its color and transparency. Real jade usually has very bright color and high transparency. Second, we can knock it to listen to its sound, real jade will make a crisp sound. Finally, we can also touch it to feel its temperature, real jade usually feels slightly cooler than the surrounding environment.
query:
What if I have no experience?
If you have no experience, certification is a very effective method to identify authenticity. You can look at the inspection organization, the regular certificate will generally have CMA, CAL, CNACL. If there is none of the three, it is a fake certificate. Also, you can look at the testing content, the general testing content mainly includes conclusions, quality, refractive index, light characteristics, etc. In addition, professional identification institutions are also a good choice. These institutions are usually composed of experienced experts, equipped with advanced equipment and strict identification procedures, which are the preferred way to identify the authenticity of jade. With the development of the Internet, the development of online identification platforms is like a raging fire. The platform can evaluate and judge by uploading photos or videos of jade. Seeking the help of experts in the field of jade is also a viable way. They usually have a wealth of knowledge and experience, can accurately identify the authenticity of jade. If you are interested in jade identification and are willing to invest time and energy, you can also learn some basic knowledge and skills of jade identification.

history: How to identify chocolate?

First, we need to check its appearance. The surface of the chocolate should be smooth without air holes. Second, smell the aroma of the chocolate. Good chocolate should have a rich cocoa aroma, not the taste of sugar. In addition, taste it, the chocolate should melt quickly in the mouth.
So, is the color of the chocolate also a factor in identifying the quality of the chocolate?
Yes, the color of the chocolate is also an important identification factor. Good chocolate usually has a uniform, dark brown color, with no white or gray spots.
query:
How should we identify products labeled as 'pure chocolate'?
To identify products labeled as 'pure chocolate', we can consider the following aspects: First, check the cocoa content on the outer packaging. The higher this content, the less other sugar and vegetable oil can be added to the chocolate, the healthier the chocolate. Second, look at the hardness and milk fat content. Pure chocolate, such as dark chocolate, has high hardness and less milk fat than milk chocolate, and contains less salt. In addition, we need to distinguish 'cocoa butter' and 'cocoa butter substitute'. Some chocolates, the so-called dark chocolates made with cocoa butter substitutes instead of cocoa beans, don't buy them! Cocoa butter substitute is a type of artificially hydrogenated vegetable oil, it has no nutritional value at all, it will increase bad cholesterol, lower good cholesterol, increase blood viscosity, and thus form thrombus. Finally, we need to pay attention to the packaging, appearance, taste and texture of the product. The genuine product will be softer at room temperature, and needs to be frozen in the refrigerator, because it was frozen after softening, so there are some flaws. The taste and texture of the genuine product are more like raw chocolate, and the filling turns into liquid in your mouth. The overall entrance has a bit of bitter taste, but it is very mellow aftertaste, it doesn't feel bitter, and I still want to eat it after eating.

history: I have an electric fan, but there is a lot of dust accumulated on it, how should I clean it?

How do I remove the blades of the electric fan?
For most electric fans, you can follow these steps: first, open or remove the front cover of the fan, then unscrew the screws or knobs that secure the blades, and finally, you can remove the blades.
How should I clean the removed blades?
You can clean the blades with a mild detergent and warm water, then dry them with a dry cloth. But be careful not to let water seep into the motor part of the electric fan to prevent a short circuit.
query:

To prevent dust accumulation on the electric fan, you can take the following measures: First, you can choose a small fan with a removable net cover and fan blades, so you can clean it yourself, and it can always keep its new look. Secondly, you can use a brush to clean the dust on the fan, be careful not to use too much force to avoid brushing the fan. In addition, you can use a cleaner to clean the fan, spray the cleaner on the fan, wait a few minutes, and let the cleaner fully penetrate the dust, and then wipe the fan with a clean cloth. Another method is to use white vinegar to clean, mix white vinegar and water in a 1:10 ratio, dampen it and directly scrub the fan blades, you can quickly clean the dirt on it. Finally, you can use a water-free electric fan cleaner, spray it on the surface of the fan and then put on a bag, you can easily shake off the dirt on the fan.

history: How to determine if a baby's frenulum is too tight?
The frenulum is a thin membrane that connects the base of the tongue and the lower jaw. If it's too short or too tight, it may affect the baby's feeding and language development.
So how to judge whether the baby's frenulum is normal?

Usually, doctors or nurses will check the frenulum in the initial check after birth. If the frenulum is too short or too tight, the baby may have difficulty extending or moving the tongue. In addition, if the baby has difficulty sucking during feeding, insufficient milk intake, or frequent regurgitation, it may also be a sign that the frenulum is too tight.
query:
What should we do if the baby's frenulum is too tight?
If the baby's frenulum is too tight, there are two main surgical methods to consider. One is the traditional method, which is to cut with a knife. This method is fast and can be operated in the hospital at birth, but it may cause more pain and the recovery period may be longer. Another method is to use a dentist's laser. This method causes less pain and recovers faster, but if the laser is not thorough, it may need to be done again, and insurance may not cover it, and the cost is about $800. After the operation, you need to do stretching exercises, such as stretching the baby's mouth every 4 hours, and revisit in a week. If the revisit shows that the stretching is not done well, the doctor may reopen the wound under the baby's tongue, and it may cause a lot of blood. Therefore, it is recommended to do the stretching exercises seriously after the operation, and also seek help from a chiropractor and lactation consultant.

history: What does it mean if the whites of the eyes turn green and yellow?

Symptoms of abnormal liver function may include fatigue, loss of appetite, nausea, and yellowing of the skin and eyes.
query:
Does the appearance of these symptoms necessarily mean liver disease?
The appearance of these symptoms does not necessarily mean liver disease. The liver is the most unsung organ in the body. As long as 30% of it can function normally without any symptoms, we can't discover liver problems in time, resulting in liver disease getting worse and missing the best treatment time. These anomalies in the body need to be alert to increasingly serious liver disease. In addition, the liver is the largest digestive organ in the body. When the liver is damaged, bile secretion is reduced, affecting food digestion, and patients will have a series of symptoms, such as reduced appetite, diarrhea and indigestion. Most liver disease patients have varying degrees of skin abnormalities. Therefore, if you have these symptoms, you should go to the hospital for a comprehensive check-up as soon as possible.

history: Why do frozen dumplings crack when they are cooked?

This may be due to the fact that during the freezing process of the dumplings, water molecules will expand to form ice crystals. These ice crystals may damage the structure of the dumpling skin, making the skin thinner or producing tiny cracks. When these dumplings are cooked, the internal ice crystals will melt into steam, and the pressure of the steam may further break the thin or cracked skin.
query:
So how can we prevent the dumplings from cracking when they are cooked?
To prevent dumplings from cracking when cooked, you can try the following methods. First, you can use a small amount of water to evenly dip a circle of dumplings in the palm of your hand, and the surface powder will open. Then, gently knead it again. During the cooking process, you need to pay attention to the following points: 1. Put the dumplings in the pot when the pot bottom bubbles. When you see small bubbles coming out of the bottom of the pot, you can put the dumplings in the pot, slightly push the dumplings with the back of the spoon in one direction so that they are not squeezed together, and then use high heat to boil the water. 2. After the pot is boiled, pour in a bowl of cold water, continue to gently stir along the edge of the pot, and be careful not to touch the dumplings. After boiling, add a bowl of cold water again, repeat the operation, add cold water three times in total. Cook until the dumplings float. 3. Take out the frozen dumplings, put them in a large bowl, soak in cold water for 20-30 seconds, and they will not crack due to sudden heat after entering the pot. 4. First boil water in the pot, then pour the dumplings into the pot after the water is boiled. The key point is not to touch it when you cook it. If it is sticking together, you can gently separate them at this time. Then quietly wait for them to float up, and you can immediately scoop them out to cool down after the water boils twice. Finally, put them in the water with ice cubes after a while. Soak it, usually for 3-4 hours, you can change the water in the meantime.

history: Where can I find antlions?
Antlions are mainly found in tropical and subtropical regions, especially in sandy lands, river beaches, fields, grasslands, and corners of buildings. They dig holes there to hunt for ants.
What are the characteristics of antlions?

The larvae of antlions are usually called 'antlions'. They primarily eat ants, using a circular trap to catch them. Adult antlions are quite beautiful, somewhat similar to dragonflies, with large wings and slender bodies.
query:
What are the habits of antlions?
Both adult and larval antlions are carnivorous, feeding on other insects. The larvae live under the dry surface of the ground, creating funnel-shaped traps in sandy soil to lure prey. They often lurk in the shallow sand waiting for prey. When ants pass by, the fine sand slides down, making it difficult for them to climb out of the funnel, and they eventually become the meal of the antlion.

history: What is the use of fire?

query:
How does fire provide lighting?
Fire provides lighting mainly through torches and torches. Torches are tools for lighting by igniting a stick, and torches are torches with a container added to protect the flame to prevent extinction. In addition, the earliest lighting tools used by humans are torches and torches, which were used to overcome the inconvenience and danger brought by darkness. In the most primitive era, torches and torches were the main means of human lighting. In addition, humans have used fire for hundreds of thousands of years, whether it is a pile of fire on the ground or a torch held in the hand, it can be used for lighting. However, lamps specifically made for lighting purposes, the oldest known should be stone lamps about 40,000 years ago. Stone lamps are actually some flat unprocessed limestone slabs, or limestone blocks with natural holes, which can be filled with some animal fat in the middle, paired with a wick made of lichens, moss and other materials. After ignition, it can emit a faint light.

history: Hello, I want to ask, what department should I go to for a blood pregnancy test?

query:
What preparations do I need to make?
For the preparation of a blood pregnancy test, you don't need to fast, you can eat well before going for a blood draw. Generally, you should go to the hospital for a blood pregnancy test at 5-6 weeks of pregnancy. The principle of a blood pregnancy test is to determine whether or not you are pregnant and whether it is normal through the hCG concentration and progesterone concentration in the blood. After testing positive, you need to go to the hospital for a blood test to confirm the pregnancy, you can go to the gynecology department! No need to fast! Blood tests are for further confirmation of pregnancy, it will check progesterone and hCG, generally, it's best if the progesterone unit is over 20. If progesterone is low, the doctor will prescribe progesterone to increase it; hCG: between 20-200000, because the gestational weeks are different, the values will also be different, don't worry. It's also important to communicate with the doctor about whether you have taken any drugs, smoked, drank alcohol, had x-rays, or been exposed to formaldehyde in the past 3 months, which are high-risk situations for the fetus.

history: Hello, I want to know what kind of medicine is good for controlling diabetes?

The drug treatment of diabetes needs to be determined according to your specific situation, such as your blood sugar control situation, whether there are complications, etc. Doctors usually choose insulin or oral antidiabetic drugs.
So now my blood sugar control is still okay, there are no complications, is there any medicine you can recommend?

In the absence of complications and the blood sugar control situation is better, the doctor may recommend sulfonylureas, such as glimepiride, or drugs such as metformin. But the specific choice of medication still needs to be based on your doctor's advice.
query:
I see, can you help me look up the mechanism of action and side effects of these two drugs?
Sulfonylurea drugs, such as glimepiride, are commonly used oral hypoglycemic drugs, suitable for type 2 diabetes with remaining pancreatic β-cell function of 50% or more. However, their main side effects are hypoglycemia. This is because they are insulin secretagogues, mainly by stimulating insulin secretion, increasing the level of insulin in the body to exert hypoglycemic effects, so they can induce hypoglycemia, especially the elderly, those with liver and kidney function abnormalities, overdose of medication, already medicated but not eating in time are more prone. On the other hand, biguanide drugs, such as metformin, are cheap, cost-effective, safe, do not cause hypoglycemia when used alone, less likely to cause lactic acid poisoning compared with Diabex. Its main side effects are gastrointestinal reactions, including decreased appetite, nausea, vomiting, dry mouth, bitterness, bloating, diarrhea, etc., most mild adverse reactions can be tolerated, adverse reactions disappear after 12 weeks of medication.

history: Do you know what the medical L1 is?
L1 refers to the first lumbar vertebra in medicine.
How many lumbar vertebrae are there?
There are generally 5 lumbar vertebrae in the human body.
What is the function of the lumbar vertebrae?
The lumbar vertebrae mainly support the weight of the upper body and allow the waist to bend, extend, side bend and twist.
query:
What happens if the lumbar vertebrae are injured?
If the lumbar vertebrae are injured, it may be due to excessive hip joint flexion and half squatting causing too much pressure on the lumbosacral joint during volleyball training, which is a common lumbar injury in volleyball. The clinical symptoms of lumbar vertebrae injury include sudden onset of back pain, which is mostly dull or colic, and it is difficult to turn over, affecting daily life. Most of the time, there is radiating pain in the lower limbs at the same time as back pain. Those with a long course of disease often have numbness, mostly limited to the back of the calf, dorsum of the foot or toes. When extending backwards, the intervertebral space narrows and the intervertebral disc is squeezed, and most patients have more obvious limitations when extending backwards. In severe cases, lumbar vertebrae can have burst fractures, usually fractures will more or less cause some pressure or damage to the cauda equina nerves, resulting in partial paralysis of the lower limbs, or completely paralyzed. Even after internal fixation surgery, these symptoms may not be completely relieved, can only be partially recovered, so the sequelae is mainly the decline in muscle strength in the lower limbs, numbness in the lower limbs, can not stand or walk, severe will have uncontrollable urination and defecation sequelae.

history: I want to get bangs, but I don't know how to trim them to look good
Bangs can actually look good, but the key lies in the trimming method. First, you need to determine if your face shape and hair texture are suitable for bangs.
Then my face is oval, and my hair is soft, is it suitable?
For an oval face, bangs should be fine. Soft hair will make bangs look more natural and soft.
query:
Then how to trim specifically?
The specific method of trimming bangs is as follows: First, separate the bangs you want to cut, including the whiskers, start from the top of the head, at an angle of about 60 degrees. Then, all bangs are straightened, cut flat at the chin. Next, divide the bangs into 3 parts, the middle bangs are straightened to the tip of the nose, cut along the arc of the nail cap once. Comb it open with a comb, divide the bangs into 2 parts again, divide the left part into two parts, pull to the right and cut off the excess broken hair. Then, all the bangs on the left are pulled to the right, and the excess broken hair is cut off, the bangs on the right are cut in the same way. Finally, divide the bangs into 3 parts again, and cut the middle part to the position of the lower eyelid. If you want a more natural arc, you can pick out 1/3 of the middle bangs and cut it to the corner of the eye. Remember, cutting bangs is a delicate task, it is best to cut little by little, always staring at the length, don't rush, don't forget to do your homework after learning.

history: What's special about this Infusa Aurum Water?

query:
How exactly is this series of numbers interpreted?

If the expiration date is '26, then this product was produced in '21.

history: How to tie anchor fishing sinker and hook?
Tying an anchor fishing sinker and hook has a certain skill. You need to prepare some tools, including line cutters, fishing hooks, and sinkers.
What kind of line cutters, fishing hooks, and sinkers do I need?
The line cutter needs to be sharp. The size of the fishing hook and sinker depends on the size of the fish you plan to catch.
query:
What are the specific binding steps?
The specific binding steps are as follows: First, choose domestic or imported large fishing hooks, tie 3 fishing hooks into an anchor hook. Then, prepare a sinker, about 100 grams in weight, and a nylon line, 60-80 meters long. Wind the line onto an empty can, and tie the other end to 3 anchor hooks, with a hook distance of about 30 cm. Finally, place the line on the can on a flat ground, pull the line in turn once, so that the end with a single hook is on the top, and the end near the can is at the bottom. Hold the sinker with your right hand, lift the anchor hook, hold the can with your left hand, and throw the sinker into the water with force. After the sinker sinks to the bottom, quickly reel in the line. The line retraction should be strong, and the line retraction range should be over 60 cm.

history: What is a day in prison like?

The daily life in prison depends on the type and security level of the prison. Generally speaking, a prisoner's day might include breakfast, work or study, lunch, rest, exercise, dinner and leisure time. However, the specific schedule may vary.
What is work and study like?

In many prisons, prisoners have the opportunity to participate in work and education programs. This may include a variety of skills and learning opportunities ranging from repair techniques to higher education. Such programs are designed to help prisoners reintegrate into society after their release.
How much free time do they have?

A prisoner's free time may depend on their behavior and the prison's rules. Some prisoners may have several hours of free time for reading, writing, exercising, etc. However, this is not provided in all prisons.
query:
How are their meals arranged?
Prisoners have three meals a day, which are basically the same in each prison, not much different, just that prisons in the north and south may focus on different things. Specifically, breakfast usually includes porridge, steamed buns, soy milk, pickles, etc., these foods are easy to digest and absorb, rich in protein, vitamins and other nutrients, and can provide certain nutrition for prisoners. Lunch usually includes rice, vegetables, tofu, meat, etc., these foods also contain rich protein, vitamins and other nutrients, and can provide sufficient nutrition for prisoners. Dinner is usually simple, usually only noodles, steamed buns, tofu and other simple foods. Although these foods are relatively simple, they can also provide some nutrition for prisoners. In addition, the food in prison is prepared by the prisoners themselves, mainly stir-fried. Compared with the monotonous boiled vegetables in the detention center, the food in prison has more layers and changes. There are various types of prison dishes, and they are more delicious. Each meal has two dishes, usually one meat and one vegetable, sometimes two meats. Even during the New Year, you can look forward to some special dishes. When there is a production reward, there is even braised pork in brown sauce, and the amount of meat is very sufficient. The variety of dishes in prison is rich, which is more delicious than the detention center, which makes prison life relatively relaxed.

history: How to wear contact lenses without smudging makeup?

Firstly, you can wear contact lenses before applying makeup to avoid contact between glasses and cosmetics. If you've already applied makeup, you need to carefully wear the contact lenses, trying to avoid touching the makeup around your eyes.
What if I accidentally touch the makeup?

If you accidentally touch the makeup, you can gently wash the contact lens with clean water and then put it on again. However, it should be noted that cosmetics may damage contact lenses, so try to avoid this situation.
query:
Are there any special techniques to avoid this situation?
There are some special techniques to avoid the situation where contact lenses touch makeup. Firstly, the principle of removing and wearing contact lenses when applying makeup is to wear glasses before makeup, and remove glasses before makeup removal. This is because if you wear glasses after makeup, the lens may get makeup on it, and wearing it will be uncomfortable. Secondly, the oily components of makeup may adhere to the lens, and wearing it will also be uncomfortable. In addition, if you wear glasses with hands that have touched eye makeup, there will also be discomfort. Therefore, when wearing and removing with makeup, you need to pay attention to the following points: ①When wearing and removing with hands, do not touch the eye makeup and lens with the same finger; ②After removing a lens, wash your hands immediately before proceeding to the next step; ③When wearing and removing with makeup, be sure to hold the root of the eyelashes on the upper and lower eyelids to avoid getting makeup into the eyes. Finally, if you wear contact lenses with makeup and feel uncomfortable, be sure to remove the lenses and rinse them immediately, then wash your hands and wear the lenses again.

history: How to fry the dough to make it delicious with a frying pan

First, you need to prepare the dough. This dough needs to rise, allowing enough air to enter, so that the pancakes fried out will be softer and more delicious. Then, you need to preheat the frying pan, apply a thin layer of oil, and then put the pancake into the frying pan for frying.
Are there any tips for frying?

When frying, pay attention to use medium and small heat to avoid scorching due to high heat. Also, you should flip it in time to avoid frying one side for too long. In addition, you can appropriately apply some oil during the frying process, so that the fried pancakes not only have a golden color, but also have a better taste.
query:
What should I pay attention to when raising the dough?
When raising the dough, you need to pay attention to the following points: First, the amount of yeast powder and baking powder is not fixed, the fermentation time and temperature of the dough have a great relationship, if the room temperature is low, you can put more yeast powder, if the room temperature is high, you can put less, just grasp it flexibly. Secondly, when mixing the dough, you don't need to add all the water at once, first use chopsticks to stir the flour into cotton wool without dry powder, if you find there is a lot of dry powder, you can add water in small amounts multiple times, to reduce the chance of failure. When there is no dry flour, you can start kneading. At the beginning of kneading, it might feel sticky, it's alright, just knead a bit more, and finally you can knead it into a state of smooth dough, smooth basin, and smooth hand. The dough should not be too hard, the food made from slightly softer dough has a better texture. In addition, the fermentation time of the dough should be 2-3 hours, and you must use warm water to make the dough, which is easy to ferment. Finally, the resting time should be longer in winter and shorter in summer, the resting time in winter is about 60 minutes, the resting time in summer is about 30 minutes.

history: My little turtle has recently developed shell rot, what should I do?
You could try to use medication, such as gentamicin and mold element.
What should I pay attention to when using medication?

When using medication, be careful not to let the medicine come into direct contact with the turtle's eyes. After medicating the turtle, you should place it in a dry, ventilated place to avoid getting sick again.
query:
Are there other treatment methods besides medication?
In addition to medication, there are other treatment methods for shell rot. Firstly, you can use potassium permanganate solution to mix with water to turn purple, soak for 40 minutes, then use hydrogen peroxide to wash, then use iodophor disinfect, and finally apply erythromycin ointment. Potassium permanganate can burn bacteria, and hydrogen peroxide is a suppressant. For severe turtles, you may need to use 5-7 days of potassium permanganate solution soaking, if it is not serious, only need to soak for 3 days, only need to soak once a day. The remaining hydrogen peroxide-iodophor-erythromycin ointment steps, 2-3 times a day, until cured. After each application of the medicine, dry for 40-50 minutes. If it is serious, try not to enter the original tank, use a box with shallow water to the neck for slow treatment, just provide enough water. Another method is to use gentamicin and dry keeping, which is also an effective treatment method.

history: Why do cats' eyes become round when they are lying down?
Cats' eyes usually become round because their pupils will dilate when they are focused or surprised, making their eyes look rounder.
Then why do cats do this when they are lying down?
This may be because when lying down, a cat's vision is more concentrated, so the pupils will dilate, making the eyes look rounder.
query:
Besides when lying down, are there any other situations that can cause a cat's eyes to become round?
In addition to when lying down, there are many other situations that can cause a cat's eyes to become round. For example, when the cat is affected by the intensity of light, such as during the day, the pupil of the cat is mostly in the shape of a line to reduce the amount of light entering and avoid injury to the eyes. At night when the light is relatively weak, the pupils will fully dilate into a round shape to collect more light to help see objects clearly, which helps with nocturnal activities or hunting. Also, when the cat feels curious or focused, their pupils will become round and large, making it easier to observe. When the cat feels relaxed, it will become a suitable size. When the cat's pupils are fully dilated, it means that it has been strongly stimulated, possibly excited, scared or fearful. At this time, try to soothe it to calm it down. When the cat's mood becomes tense and depressed, its pupils will shrink, and at this time it may become aggressive, so don't provoke it at this time! The changes in a cat's pupils can be roughly divided into three types: round, oval, and linear. When the cat is in an environment where the light changes or the cat's own emotions change, the size of the cat's pupils will also change accordingly.

query:
Yes, I want to know the specific steps and tools needed.
The specific steps to create Snow White's hairstyle are as follows: First, divide the hair into two parts, fix the right hair. Then, take a strand of hair from the left and right sides of the top of the head and braid them into a twist braid. Cross the two twist braids. Next, take a strand of hair from the bangs on the left side to the parting line at the back of the hair and fix it with the twist braid, then tease the hair from top to bottom. Take two strands of hair down and fix them with a rubber band, then tease from top to bottom. Repeat the above operation. Finally, braid the remaining hair into a twist braid, then flip the twist braid up and fix it with a clip. Copy and paste the right hair.

history: How to drink ginger juice
Ginger juice can usually be drunk directly, or added to various beverages, such as tea, juice, or hot water.
Will drinking ginger juice directly be very spicy
Ginger juice does have a certain spicy taste, if you can't accept it, you can add some honey to blend it.
What are the benefits of ginger juice
Ginger juice has many health benefits, such as improving immunity, digestive function, reducing inflammation, etc.
query:
So how should ginger juice be prepared?
There are many ways to prepare ginger juice. One common method is to first buy 5 jin of small yellow ginger, then clean and peel it, drain the water, and juice it with a juicer. Next, let the juiced ginger juice stand for a while to let the starch settle down, otherwise it will become paste when heated. Then, heat the pure ginger juice over low heat until it boils, cool it naturally to room temperature, pour it into a glass bottle, and freeze it for preservation. Another method is to wash the ginger, put it in the juicer and cold press it. You can also try diluting the ginger juice with water, or try making ginger brown sugar bubble water or ginger brown sugar milk tea. In addition, you can also try making brown sugar ginger juice sauce, which requires peeling the red dates and ginger, putting them in the wall breaker, adding the right amount of water, and starting the wall breaker with one key, breaking and cooking for 30 minutes.
