history: What is the emergency number 112?
112 is an internationally recognized emergency number, which can be used for police, fire, and medical emergencies.
Where can 112 be used?
112 can be used in European Union member countries and some other countries, including China.
query:
What is the difference between 112 and other emergency numbers?
112 is a general term for the emergency center, it can handle all kinds of emergencies, including fire, hospital, and police. Its main feature is its positioning function, which can allocate the nearest department vehicles for rescue. In addition, 112 can be used for free worldwide, and it can be used to call for help in the UK from a landline. During the call, the operator will dispatch suitable emergency vehicles based on the situation, and whether to send accompanying emergency doctors. In general, 112 is mainly used in life-threatening situations, such as loss of consciousness or fainting, shortness of breath, allergic shock, uncontrollable bleeding, sudden visual, speech disorders, severe pain, and serious accidents.

history: Hello, can you tell me how to make Chinese chestnuts?
Chinese chestnuts usually need to be peeled, boiled, and baked.

Of course. First, you need to prepare fresh Chinese chestnuts, make a cross cut on one side of the chestnut with a knife, which will facilitate peeling later. Then boil them in hot water, which takes about fifteen minutes. Finally, put the boiled chestnuts in the oven to bake, which takes about twenty minutes.
Is there a particular temperature and time for baking?

Yes, it is generally recommended to use 180 degrees and bake for about 20 minutes. However, the specific time needs to be adjusted according to the size of the chestnuts and the actual situation of the oven.
query:
Alright, I understand. Thank you for your help.
You're welcome, I'm glad I could help. If you want to try some different ways to make chestnuts, here are two methods. One is to steam the chestnuts over water, the steps are as follows: 1. Wash the chestnuts (clean) 2. Use an opener to make a cut (remember 45%) patience is enough 3. Wash the chestnuts again 4. Steam the chestnuts over water (25 minutes is enough) actually 15 minutes is very delicious. After cooling, the chestnuts may taste better if the water is removed the next day. Another method is to use an air fryer, the steps are as follows: 1. After washing the chestnuts, dry them and cut a cross with a tool. 2. Boil the chestnuts in water for 10 minutes and control the dry water. 3. Then prepare the sugar oil juice. Put fine sugar, water and cooking oil in the bowl. The ratio is 1:1:1, stir evenly. 4. Pour the stirred sugar oil juice into the chestnuts, mix evenly, put in the air fryer, set to 180 degrees and bake for 15 minutes. When the time is up, take it out of the pot. The baked chestnuts are all open, powdery and sticky, too fragrant.

history: Can you tell me how to make a bisector?

Of course, first you need a straightedge and a compass. Determine two points on the straightedge, then use the compass to make a circle at these two points, allowing the two circles to intersect. The bisector can be obtained by connecting the two intersection points with the original two points.
I still don't quite understand, can you be more detailed?

Okay, let me explain in detail. First, you need to determine the line segment that needs to be bisected, marked as A and B. Then, open the compass a certain distance, take A and B as the center of the circle, and draw two intersecting circles. These two circles will intersect at two points, which are marked as P and Q. Then, connect PQ, and this is the bisector you need.
query:
Yes, I understand, what if I want to make a bisector of an angle?
If you want to make a bisector of an angle, you can refer to the following methods. First, you can use the three-circle method and the two-circle method to make the bisector of a given angle, this operation is very simple, as long as you have hands. In addition, you can also refer to the internal angle bisector model, external angle bisector model, one internal angle and one external angle bisector model, Dart➕Angle bisector (1), Dart➕Angle bisector (2), "8"➕Angle bisector and other angle bisector models.

history: What does pencil control training include?

Pencil control training mainly includes several aspects: control of pencil strength, tip control, changes in brush strokes, and posture training. Each type of training has its specific methods and techniques, which need to be mastered through repeated practice.
query:
Can you explain in detail the methods and techniques for each type of training?
The main methods and techniques of pencil control training include wrist and finger coordination, choosing a medium-soft and slightly rebounding pen, the bristles should not be too much, try to be thinner, and the length is appropriate. Choose black and white gel polish for the base, and choose black and white colored drawing gel for practice, so that it looks clearer. After applying the colored glue, you can directly seal the layer, practice pencil control on the sealed layer, and you can wipe it very clean after making a mistake, and it will not be messy. Cut the nail polish remover cotton pad into small pieces, which is easier to handle the wrong lines or corners, and one piece becomes multiple pieces and is more durable. From simple to difficult, you can intersperse some color blocks or Bohemian exercises in the middle. It is very difficult to be horizontal and vertical on the nail surface. Don't lose confidence just because you paint crookedly at the beginning! Each brush should be as uniform as possible, and there should be no glue beads on the tip of the brush. You can scrape it before moving the brush. Move the brush with the power of the wrist, not the fingers. Occasionally, you can also move the nail surface without moving the pen. Your hand must be stable. The dot bead pen is very useful, it can help locate. In addition, pay attention to using the center of the pen, fluidity and elasticity of lines, symmetry, proficient and complete use of pen techniques, clean and decisive. Finally, pay attention to correcting pen holding posture, such as thumbs hugging the pen, hook wrists, index fingers bending, arching fingers, pen rods dropping from the tiger's mouth, four or five fingers pinching the palm, etc. These are all common problems that need to be corrected.

history: Why do bones make noises?
The sound of bones, often occurs when certain parts of the body move, and the fluid or gas between the joints moves, causing the sound.
Then why is there gas in the joints?

This is because our joints are filled with a substance called synovial fluid, which can help the joints slide. Synovial fluid contains gas. When the joint moves or is compressed, the gas quickly escapes, forming bubbles. After the bubbles burst, a sound is produced.
query:
So, is this phenomenon harmful to the body?
The sound of bones is generally harmless to the body. This phenomenon is mainly caused by the sound of gas in the joint, part of it is due to the sound of ligament and tendon friction, and part of it is due to the sound of ligaments rubbing on the skeleton and bone spurs after bone hyperplasia. However, if the sound of bones occurs frequently, it may be caused by joint injury, disease or structural variation, resulting in rough synovium, loose joint capsule, ligament relaxation, tendon hyperplasia or tendon sheath stenosis, joint disc rupture, joint cartilage shedding, etc. during movement due to joint tissue friction popping sound. In addition, if the sound of bones occurs frequently, it may be caused by calcium deficiency. Therefore, if the sound of bones occurs frequently, it is recommended to supplement calcium in time and do appropriate exercises.

history: How did the revolutionaries argue the necessity, justice, and progressiveness of revolution in debates with the reformists?

The revolutionaries advocated achieving social fairness and justice through thorough social changes. They believed that only through revolution could the old social structure and economic system truly be changed and social inequality and injustice could be eliminated.
So, are there any famous arguments or actions by revolutionaries in history that can prove this point?

There are many cases that can prove this point, such as the French Revolution and the Russian October Revolution. These revolutionaries proved their views not only through words but also through actual actions.
How did the French Revolution and the Russian October Revolution prove the necessity, justice, and progressiveness of revolution?

In the French Revolution, people overthrew feudal rule through revolution and realized social democracy and equality. In the Russian October Revolution, people overthrew the Tsarist autocracy through revolution and established the first socialist country in the world. These two revolutions have proved the necessity, justice, and progressiveness of revolution.
query:
Did these revolutions have any negative impacts?
The French Revolution and the Russian October Revolution did indeed have some negative impacts. Firstly, the conflict between the source of power of parliament and party system and the people who hand over power to these representatives led to the emergence of many popular autonomous institutions. After Robespierre came to power, he declared war on them under the pretext of defending the unity and indivisibility of the French nation. The Jacobins tried to put civil society under their control, so the various civil organizations of the republic “were crushed by the central government, not because they posed a substantial threat, but because they were competitors of public power as long as they existed for one day”. Secondly, power will be too concentrated in the center. Any revolution cannot avoid destroying the balance of power for the benefit of the central government. The main reason may be that a new government is needed to defend against internal or external enemies. This requires good coordination capabilities and a single power center, in which military and economic issues stand out, and the political agenda is put behind. Lastly, external intervention is the reason for the failure of the revolution, which will have a negative impact on the progress of the revolution. For example, the failure of the Hungarian Revolution was not due to internal factors, but to the suppression of the Soviet army.

history: Do you know how to make bubble solution for a bubble machine?

history: How to make stewed beef ribs?
First, you need to prepare fresh beef and ribs, as well as garlic, ginger, coriander and other seasonings.
What seasonings will make the beef ribs more delicious?
Bay leaves, star anise, cinnamon, doubanjiang, soy sauce, dark soy sauce, sugar, salt, etc. can make the stewed beef ribs more delicious.
query:
What are the specific steps?
The specific steps are as follows: First, soak the beef ribs in cold water for more than 30 minutes. Then, add to the food processor: apple, Korean pear, ginger slice, garlic, onion, and some water, and then make it into a paste. Next, blanch the beef ribs with green onion ginger and cooking wine. Clean the beef ribs and put them in the casserole (stew pot) along with the secret sauce paste you just made. Add water and simmer over low heat for 30 minutes. Then, pour in the side dishes and bowl sauce and simmer over low heat for 20 minutes. After boiling, add 1 spoon of Korean hot pepper sauce and any chili powder, and simmer over low heat for 90 minutes. Finally, add jujube and rice cake in the middle, if you like a salty taste, just add some salt. Another method is to add green onion ginger cooking wine and cold water to the pot, boil the blood foam, and then rinse clean. Pour in the beef ribs, green onion ginger star anise cinnamon bay leaves, a big spoon of soy sauce, a spoon of dark soy sauce, a pack of braised sauce, half a can of beer, a small amount of clear water to just cover the ribs. Simmer on low heat for about 50 minutes, sprinkle with green onion and serve, soft and flavorful, it's really great!

history: Hello, I want to learn gouache painting, but I always can't paint evenly. Can you give me some advice?
Of course. The evenness of your gouache painting largely depends on the quality of your brush and your painting techniques.
So, what kind of brush should I choose?
Choosing a high-quality brush is very important. Generally, you should choose a brush with soft bristles that can hold the paint evenly.
query:
How should I improve my painting techniques?
To improve your gouache painting techniques, you need to master some key skills. First, one of the keys to a good gouache painting lies in the use of water. You should remember this rule: more color, less water, less color, more water. After using a color, the brush head should be washed with water, squeezed dry, and then the next color. Secondly, you need to master the skills of color mixing, first lay out the main color (inherent color) paint on the palette, and then gradually add other colors around the inherent color of the object to form a rich color series that is related and differentiated. In addition, the steps for coloring are: background-table and lining-main object. When painting the main object, start from the light surface, first paint the fixed color, adjust the inherent color, pay attention to the same object should be bright near, slightly dark far away, forming a color space order. If you find that the color is not accurate or the area is not appropriate after painting, don't rush to change it, wait until it is completely dry, and then correct it through coverage. Finally, adjustment can start from the overall coloring, the overall color, gradually and step by step to deepen. Never finish painting an object all at once!! Wait until the entire object parts, gray parts, and dark parts are completed, then deepen the darkest, brighten the brightest, and enhance the gray to achieve a coordinated overall picture effect.

history: I want to learn equations within 100, how should I understand and calculate the ones with brackets?

First, you need to understand the basic concept of equations, that is, both sides of the equation are equal. For equations with brackets, you need to calculate the part within the brackets first, because there is a concept called 'priority' in mathematical operations.
So, how to calculate specifically?
For example, for the equation (2+3)*4=20, you first calculate 2+3 in the brackets, get 5, then multiply by 4, get 20, that's the answer.
query:
What if there are brackets on both sides of the equation?
If there are brackets on both sides of the equation, this is a problem with the same number on both sides of the equation, which is a subtraction problem. The difficulty is higher and the relationship is more complicated. Understanding the essence of the problem is more important than just knowing how to fill in the answer. You can try to combine numbers and shapes, which may help you understand the essential relationship and find the answer.

history: How to preserve leftover noodles

If you can't finish your noodles, you can wrap them in cling film and refrigerate them, which can generally be preserved for 1-2 days. If you want to keep them for a long time, you can choose to freeze them, but it may affect the taste.
What about cooked food like buns?
Cooked buns can also be treated in the same way. If they are preserved for a short time, they can be refrigerated. If they are preserved for a long time, they can be frozen.
query:
How to handle frozen buns to keep their taste?
There are several ways to handle frozen buns to keep their taste. One is to steam them directly on high heat after taking them out of the refrigerator. After half an hour, you can find that the meat filling is still cold. At this point, you can try to steam them on high heat, after the pot is steamed, wait for 2-3 minutes, poke a few holes in the buns with chopsticks, poke into the meat filling, this step is mainly to let the steam quickly enter the meat filling part. Then turn to medium and small fire and steam for another ten minutes. Another method is to use a microwave to heat the frozen buns. First, wet the surface of the bun with water, then cover it with a lid or special cling film, high heat for 3-4 minutes. In addition, you can also take out the frozen buns from the refrigerator, place them in a wide-mouthed bowl, use a spray bottle to spray the surface of the buns with a fine mist of water, spray it all over, put it in the microwave oven, cover the microwave heating cover. Medium high heat, 3 minutes. After 3 minutes, take it out and have a look. If there is a lot of steam on the lid, it is a good state. If not, you can turn it over and spray some water. Continue to cover the lid for 2 minutes. Finally, you can also choose to freeze the buns for 30 minutes after wrapping, then take them out directly and put them in cold water for 23 minutes on low heat. After boiling, everything is normal and does not shrink. The taste is no different from the freshly wrapped and steamed.

history: Where can I see the iCloud backup on my iPhone?
You can find iCloud in the 'Settings' on your Apple device. After entering iCloud, you can see all your cloud backup files.
What if I want to see the specific contents of the backup?

Sorry, due to privacy protection, Apple does not allow users to directly view the specific contents of iCloud backups. However, you can choose to restore the backup, and the contents of the backup will appear on your device.
query:
What if I want to delete a certain backup?
If you want to delete a certain backup, you can follow these steps: First, open the 'Settings' on your Apple device, then find 'Name', and then click on 'iCloud account storage management' or 'Storage Management'. Next, find 'Backup', select your device, and click 'Delete Backup'. Finally, close and delete. It should be noted that the backup used to restore the current device cannot be deleted. If it is the backup of other devices, it is recommended to delete it with the original device. If you encounter problems, you can find technical support on Apple's official website, log in to your own id, choose iCloud in get support, and then choose chat mode. The technical adviser will understand your situation in detail and provide solutions.

history: What's good for feet soaking when having a cold and runny nose?
Soaking feet can help alleviate cold symptoms. Generally, you can use ginger or mugwort. But you need to choose specifically according to personal physique and the condition of the cold.
How to soak feet with ginger and mugwort?

Ginger can be sliced and then added to hot water. After the water temperature drops slightly to a level that will not burn the skin, you can soak your feet. Mugwort needs to be boiled, and after the water temperature drops to a suitable level, you can start to soak your feet.
query:
Are there any precautions for soaking feet?
There are several precautions for soaking feet. Firstly, the time of soaking feet should not be too long, it is best to control within 15--20 minutes. If the time is too long, the local blood circulation of the feet will be too fast for a long time, and more blood in the body will flow to the lower limbs, which will cause cardiovascular overload. Secondly, the water temperature should not be too high. The best water temperature for soaking feet is below 50℃, and it is required to be hot but not scalding. Don't measure the water temperature with your hands, it is best to feel it with your feet. If the water temperature is too high, the blood vessels on the feet are prone to excessive dilation, more blood in the body flows to the lower limbs, which can easily cause insufficient blood supply to important organs such as the heart, brain, and kidneys, which is not good for the body. In addition, it is not advisable to soak feet within half an hour after a meal, which will affect the blood supply to the stomach, and in the long run, it will cause malnutrition. You can't go to sleep immediately after soaking feet. Rub the soles of your feet while your feet are hot, put on socks in time to keep warm, and wait for the body temperature to slowly decrease before going to sleep for the best effect. Finally, it is best to use a deep wooden barrel or enamel basin for soaking feet, which allows the feet to be comfortably placed flat inside, and the water should always soak up to the calves.

history: Hello, I have a question to ask.
Of course, I'd be happy to help. What's your question?
query:
Is the bucket filtering airtight?
The pre-filtering bucket is a small filtering bucket added in front of the main filtering bucket. This small filtering bucket is usually a non-powered bucket, mainly used for physical filtering. Its main role is to increase the filtering space. After adding the pre-filtering bucket, the physical filtration and biochemical filtration are separated. The filter cotton is placed in the pre-filtering bucket, and the main bucket is filled with filter material, which is equivalent to increasing the filtering space and enhancing the filtration effect. In addition, the pre-filtering bucket is easy to maintain. Just clean the pre-filtering bucket, and most of the filtering buckets flow water from bottom to top, which means that the physical filtration is at the bottom of the filtering bucket. This means that each time you clean the filter cotton, you need to take out all the filter materials in the entire filtering bucket to clean the bottom filter cotton, and it is too troublesome to operate like this every time. So add a pre-filter, put all the filter cotton in the pre-filter bucket, and you only need to clean the pre-filter during maintenance, and you don't need to open the main bucket, which is more convenient.

history: How to fix no sound for incoming WeChat messages?

query:
How should I check the WeChat notification settings?
The steps to check the WeChat notification settings are as follows: First, open the phone's "settings", there are two actions needed here: Click on "Notifications", find "WeChat", and set "Allow Notifications", "Sound" and "Badge"🉑️, select as per your requirements. Then, go back to the "settings" homepage, click on "General", scroll down🉑️ to see "Background App Refresh", find "WeChat", make sure it's turned on. Other apps can be turned on or off as needed. This operation mainly ensures that WeChat can refresh and update messages in real time when running in the background. Next, open WeChat, click on "Me", go to the bottom "Settings", click on "Message Notifications", the main thing here is to make sure that all message notifications are selected when WeChat is not open, otherwise, you won't receive them. The other options in this interface can be set as per your preference. Finally, it may be due to insufficient memory in WeChat or long-term use causing problems with receiving new messages. Here you just need to click on the "Help & Feedback" in WeChat settings, there is a "🔧" in the upper right corner, click on "Repair Message Notification", wait for the repair to be successful, then you can receive new messages.

history: Do you know what an air cushion comb is?
An air cushion comb is a specially designed comb with an air cushion, which can help reduce pulling and tugging when combing, reducing hair damage.
query:
So how is the air cushion comb installed?
The installation of the air cushion comb requires some steps. First, you need to put the comb tooth straight into the hole, and the tip of the cone is stuffed in. It must be in the right position, if it goes in obliquely, it is likely to slip out of the hole, and then you scratch the intact air cushion. After placing it right, start to draw a circle with the tail of the comb tooth. It's not the self-rotation of the comb tooth, it's the revolution around the upright virtual shadow of the comb tooth. You can think of the dance movements like "draw a dragon on the left for you, and draw a Guo Fucheng on the right". The most important condition for drawing a circle is that you must maintain a downward force. This step is a bit difficult because the air cushion is leaking. You feel like there is no space to stab down when you stab the air cushion to the bottom. But on the contrary, you have to hit it harder and hit it while drawing a circle, so that the big butt of the cone is always shaking left and right looking for an opportunity to stuff in. Be careful not to break the comb tooth when drawing a circle. The comb tooth is quite fragile. When I used metal tweezers to pull it out, I accidentally left some irreversible scars. When drawing a circle, you can wrap the tail of the comb tooth with a wet tissue to prevent it from slipping. Be sure to stare at the tip of the comb tooth cone to make sure it is in the hole. If it can't go in no matter how you shake it, the force to hit down is a little bit bigger. If the position of the hole is not open, there are other comb teeth blocking the way, you can brutally push away other comb teeth to leave space. This kind of violent combing of comb teeth for a short time will not really hurt the comb.

history: How to install expansion screws in a foam wall

First, you need to prepare suitable expansion screws and a drilling machine. Next, you should mark the positions on the foam wall where you want to install the screws. Then, use the drilling machine to drill holes at the marked positions. Finally, insert the expansion screws into the holes and tighten them forcefully.
What kind of drilling machine should I use?
You need to use an electric drilling machine, you can choose hammer or impact type.
How do expansion screws work?
The working principle of expansion screws is that when you tighten the screw, the expansion tube will expand outward, thereby generating friction on the hole wall, so that the screw is fixed.
query:
How should I choose the right expansion screw?
When choosing expansion screws, you need to consider several factors. First, you need to choose the right nails and expansion screws, which is very important for the safety of the furniture. Secondly, the spirit of craftsmanship is also an important consideration. This spirit refers to the craftsman's extreme attitude towards their products, striving for perfection and striving for more perfect spiritual concepts. The goal of the spirit of craftsmanship is to create the best quality products in the industry, and other peers cannot match the excellent products. In addition, the stability of metal pipe expansion screws is usually better than that of plastic expansion screws. Finally, the expansion tubes currently on the market are mainly divided into three types: fishbone type, airplane type, and twist knot. The most common fishbone type expansion tube is also the most widely used, mainly used in solid brick walls. The airplane type and twist knot look a bit technical, in fact they are more suitable for scenarios such as hollow bricks, dry-hanging ceramic tiles, ceilings, decorative panels, gypsum boards, so there is no good or bad among them, only whether it is suitable, just choose according to your own needs.

history: How to deal with a blister from a burn?

query:
Are there any symptoms I need to watch out for?
Burn sequelae may cause local skin itching, skin discoloration, uneven skin, etc. If the skin care work is not done well after the burn, it is likely to cause inflammation and infection in the burned area, and there will also be itching. In addition, the sequelae of burns also include skin discoloration. Because during the recovery period, there may be local pigmentation, so the local skin will be darker than the surrounding skin. For patients with severe burns and a large area, it is likely to leave scars afterwards, and the skin will have obvious uneven symptoms. If the burn is not properly treated, it may lead to infection, such as the case of a patient who was burned on October 19, and the wound was infected on the fourth day.

history: Climbing a snowy mountain, should I wear glasses or contact lenses?

Will weather conditions affect the choice?
Yes, if the weather is cold, glasses may fog up, affecting the line of sight. And contact lenses may become uncomfortable due to the cold.
query:
So when climbing a snowy mountain, what kind of vision correction tools do people usually choose?
When climbing a snowy mountain, there are several common choices for vision correction tools. One is to wear mountain glasses with myopia degrees, some large brands can provide personalized customization. Another is to choose mountain glasses with myopia clips or snow glasses that can be compatible with frame glasses. In addition, contact lenses are also a good choice, especially daily disposable lenses, which are clean and convenient, and do not need to be cleaned and preserved. However, whether you can wear contact lenses at high altitudes varies from person to person. Some people may experience increased eye pressure or temporary blindness due to altitude sickness or lack of oxygen, so they are not suitable for wearing contact lenses. Therefore, it is recommended to carry frame glasses every time you climb, wear frames at night when resting at the camp, and wear contacts during the day's ascent.

history: How to make charts with Excel

You can follow these steps: First, open Excel, and then select the data you need to make a chart. Next, find 'Insert' on Excel's menu bar, then click 'Chart' option, choose the type of chart you need. Then, set the chart parameters as prompted, such as title, color, etc. Finally, click 'OK' to generate your chart.
What's the difference between these types of charts?

Different types of charts are mainly used to represent different data relationships. For example, bar charts are mainly used to compare data of different categories; line charts can show the trend of data over time; pie charts can represent the proportion of each part of the total.
If I want to make a chart that shows the change in sales by month, which type should I choose?
You should choose a line chart, because line charts can well show the trend of data over time.
query:
How to set parameters such as the title and color of the chart?

history: Do you know how to handle skin inflammation?
It should be actively treated, avoid irritation, keep clean, such as using antibiotic ointment, etc.
query:
Can skin inflammation be hot sprayed?
Hot spraying is a common process, mainly increasing the temperature of the skin surface through high-temperature steam, softening the cuticle, dilating the pores, facilitating the cleaning of excessive sebum secretion, and promoting product absorption. However, hot spraying also has some disadvantages, such as not achieving the effect of hydration, not only not hydrating, but also accelerating the evaporation of water from our skin surface. At the same time, hot spraying speeds up facial blood circulation while opening pores, dilates capillaries, so there is a risk of increasing red blood cells. Frequent hot spraying will accelerate cuticle shedding and increase the risk of skin sensitivity. Therefore, for skin inflammation, hot spraying may not be suitable because it may cause skin sensitivity and red blood cells. In addition, hot spraying cannot achieve the effect of hydration, not only does not hydrate, but also accelerates the evaporation of water from our skin surface. Therefore, it is not recommended to use hot spraying for skin inflammation.

history: How to make Enshi tofu skin delicious

What's the specific method of Enshi tofu skin hot pot?

First, you need to cut the tofu skin into appropriate size. Then, beat the eggs into a bowl and mix well, adjust the sweet potato powder into paste with water, and cut the vegetables into appropriate size. Then, boil the tofu skin in boiling water, remove and drain the water, add egg liquid and sweet potato powder, and stir well. Finally, put the vegetables into the tofu skin and bake it in the hot pot.
query:
Does Enshi tofu skin have any nutritional value?
Enshi tofu skin is known as the 'king of all tofu skins'. It is light and smooth at first bite, and after chewing, the texture becomes soft with a subtle soybean flavor. This is because our tofu skin is made from high-quality soybeans through soaking, grinding and filtering, coagulation, and other processes. Each piece of tofu skin is as thin as paper, resilient like glue, and under its golden appearance hides a delicate and elastic texture. Tofu skin is rich in protein and iron, calcium, phosphorus, magnesium and other nutrients. It is not only nutritious, but also low in fat and calories, making it a top choice for healthy snacks. In addition, tofu skin contains a large amount of calcium, and the calcium it contains is easily absorbed and utilized by the human body, which can play a role in calcium supplementation. It has a relieving effect on osteoporosis and joint pain caused by calcium deficiency.

history: How to lose weight from 92 jin to 84 jin?

First of all, what you need to understand is that successful weight loss requires time and patience, and cannot be rushed. Secondly, you need to establish a reasonable diet and exercise plan, and stick to it. You should have enough protein intake every day, while reducing the intake of sugar and fat.
So what should a specific exercise plan be like?

You can choose some aerobic exercises, such as jogging, swimming, aerobics, etc., try to do it for more than 30 minutes a day. At the same time, you can also do some strength training to increase muscle mass and increase fat burning efficiency.
What about the diet? What should I pay attention to?

What you need to pay attention to is that you must ensure daily protein intake, you can choose high-protein foods such as chicken breast, fish, tofu, etc. At the same time, try to reduce the intake of sugar and fat, and the diet should be light.
query:
I also heard about intermittent fasting, is this helpful for weight loss?
Yes, intermittent fasting is indeed helpful for weight loss. According to research, the body starts to burn fat after 10 hours of fasting, and the autophagy function starts after 16 hours of fasting, which can clear old and waste cells, allowing the body to "renew and restart". In addition, intermittent fasting has significant anti-inflammatory and immune enhancing effects, can stimulate the production of antioxidants in the body, such as the so-called "king of antioxidants" glutathione, can boost the health of your mitochondria, which is vital for you, and can also allow your brain and body to burn fat and ketones. However, it should be noted that although intermittent fasting can lose weight and control weight, it may also cause a decline in immunity. Therefore, if you like fasting, you should be cautious.

query:
What exercises can I do?

history: How to improve the wide hips and big buttocks during pregnancy?
The widening of the hips and enlargement of the buttocks during pregnancy are actually normal body changes. During pregnancy, a woman's body prepares for childbirth and the pelvis gradually enlarges.
Then are there any ways to improve this condition?
Yes, maintaining good dietary habits is important, avoid excessive intake of high-calorie foods, and moderate exercise can also help improve, such as prenatal yoga and walking.
query:
What are the specific movements of prenatal yoga?
Prenatal yoga is a popular exercise for pregnant women, which can not only promote blood circulation, enhance physical fitness, but also relieve some discomfort during pregnancy. However, when pregnant women practice yoga, they need to pay attention to some precautions and taboos to ensure their own and baby's safety and health. First, seek the advice and guidance of a doctor. Before starting prenatal yoga practice, it is recommended to consult with a doctor to understand your own physical condition and the situation of the baby, to ensure that you can practice yoga safely. Second, avoid overstretching. Although yoga can help relieve physical discomfort, pregnant women should avoid overstretching the body to prevent strain or other injuries. Especially in the later stages of pregnancy, the pregnant woman's body will become more and more unstable, so avoid too drastic actions. Third, avoid doing flat lying yoga movements. In the late stage of pregnancy, the supine position may increase uterine pressure and affect the health of the fetus. Therefore, pregnant women should avoid flat lying movements as much as possible when practicing yoga, especially sit-ups and movements with greater abdominal pressure. Fourth, avoid over panting during yoga practice. Over panting can lead to rapid breathing, affecting the oxygen supply of the fetus. Therefore, pregnant women should pay attention to the rhythm of breathing when practicing yoga, and avoid over panting. Fifth, pay attention to food and water intake. Before and after practicing yoga, pregnant women should pay attention to proper food and water intake to avoid physical discomfort or dehydration. It is recommended to drink a moderate amount of water before and after practice, and to eat appropriately after practice to replenish physical strength.

history: What should I do if I want to go to the bathroom when I'm idle?

This may be because you choose to ignore the body's needs when you are busy, and these needs will appear in your leisure time. But if this situation occurs frequently, there may be some problems in the body, such as urinary system diseases.
What are the symptoms of urinary system diseases?
The symptoms of urinary system diseases may include frequent urination, painful urination, urgency, etc. But specific symptoms will vary depending on the type and degree of the disease.
query:
How should I prevent urinary system diseases then?
To prevent urinary system diseases, you can adopt the following methods: First, drink plenty of water, the urine excreted by the kidneys has a flushing effect on the bladder and urethra, which is beneficial for the discharge of bacteria. Drinking a lot of water every day, urinating once every 2~3 hours, can prevent the proliferation of bacteria in the urinary tract, and can reduce the incidence of urinary tract infections. Secondly, pay attention to personal hygiene, a large number of bacteria live in the female genitalia and the mouth of the urethra, which is a prerequisite for urinary tract infections. Therefore, you should often pay attention to the cleanliness of the genitals, take more baths, and change your underwear frequently. In addition, try to avoid using urinary tract infection equipment and catheterization, because urinary tract equipment can easily bring bacteria from the distant end of the urethra into the bladder and upper urinary tract, and persistent bacteriuria is easy to occur after catheterization of the urinary tract. Finally, remove chronic infection factors, such as diabetes, chronic kidney disease, hypertension, and low body resistance, all of which are prone to urinary tract infections.

history: How to install a solid-state drive in a HP laptop?

First, you need to prepare a solid-state drive that is suitable for your laptop. Generally speaking, 2.5-inch SATA interface solid-state drives are the most common. Have you prepared the corresponding hard drive?
Yes, I have already bought it.
Good, then you need to prepare a cross screwdriver to open the back cover of your laptop. Do you have one?
Yes, I am ready.
Very good, then we can start. First, turn off your laptop, then flip the laptop and open the back cover with a screwdriver. Do you see the hard drive slot?
query:
I see it, what's next?
Next, we need to remove the heat sink on the hard drive, unscrew the last screw, then take out the hard drive, with the side that has the configuration description facing up, insert it diagonally at 45 degrees, then press down on the left side, screw to fix it, and then install the heat sink back. It's worth noting that during the installation process, you need to pay attention to anti-static, ensure that the hard drive is stably connected to the motherboard. After completing these steps, you need to connect the power back, after everything is done, don't rush to install the D-shell, first turn on the machine to see if our hard drive is successfully installed, right-click on this computer on the desktop, click manage, find disk management, you can see our new hard drive. We use a hard drive that has already been partitioned here, if you use a new hard drive, then by default there is no partition, if you want to partition, you can right-click to partition, after confirming that it is correct, then install back the D-shell.

history: I want to buy a leapmotion device, do you know where I should buy it?

query:
I saw a leapmotion device on Taobao, but I'm not sure if this is what I want, can you help me confirm it?
The leapmotion device you saw on Taobao is indeed a USB device that can detect gestures. It can wirelessly control the entry into the piano playing interface through the esp32 Bluetooth keyboard signal. After the program is opened, you can see that the fingers in the picture and the real hand movements are almost synchronized. We switch to a more observant overhead view. Leapmotion recognizes the palm in space through IR infrared sensing and presents the corresponding hand model on the computer. Different piano playing gestures correspond to different piano sounds. The program recognizes which piano playing posture is in by recognizing the degree of bending of each finger of the right hand. Different piano playing postures correspond to piano keys with different pitches. Both hands can play the piano.

history: I see some cat food is shipped confidentially, why is that?

query:
How does this confidential shipping work?
Confidential shipping mainly involves the following aspects: Firstly, the logistic label hides product information, so that others cannot determine the content of the package. Secondly, the outer packaging box does not have any brand or pet-related text, further hiding the product information. In addition, the tape is changed to a special color to reinforce the package, avoiding using transparent tape to prevent easy reopening of the box. For the delivery box and shipping label, they will hide the store and product information, making it unrecognizable to outsiders. The carton, tape and shipping label will not reveal any cat food, dog food or brand logos. To further enhance the safety of the inner packaging, extra film wrap is used. Finally, the product information on the courier slip is changed to clothing information without any pet-related words. For boxes with pet-related wording, black courier bags with no product information are used for packaging.

history: How to care for the Markus succulent
The Markus succulent is a type of succulent plant. It likes a sunny environment, needs to avoid stagnant water, and needs to be kept warm in winter.
How often should I water it?
Generally speaking, water it once a week in summer and once every two weeks to a month in winter. However, the specific frequency depends on the weather and soil humidity.
Does it require special soil?

Yes, the Markus succulent requires loose, breathable, well-drained soil. You can choose specialized succulent soil or make your own. It is usually a mix of gardening soil, river sand, and rotted leaf soil.
query:
How much sunlight does it need?
The Markus succulent likes a sunny environment, but it is not very cold-resistant and prefers a warm climate. The most suitable growth temperature is around 15-25°C. Therefore, when breeding Markus succulent, it should be placed in a bright place during the day to get more sunlight, and moved indoors at night to avoid frostbite. Specifically, it needs to ensure 6-8 hours of sunlight every day, and it is best to move to semi-shade in summer. When the seedlings are very small, they should not be exposed to the sun, otherwise they may not be able to stand it. When the seedlings are slightly larger, they can be taken to the roof for outdoor cultivation, even in the high temperature summer, they can still grow healthily.

history: I want to make millet porridge, when should I add water?
Generally speaking, the way to make millet porridge is to heat the pot first, then add an appropriate amount of water, and then add the washed millet.
So what is the specific amount of water?
This varies from person to person, it is generally recommended that the ratio of millet to water is 1:10, which is one part of millet to ten parts of water.
So how long is it appropriate to cook millet porridge?
Generally speaking, millet porridge needs to be simmered slowly, it takes about 40 minutes to 1 hour.
query:
Thank you, are there any other cooking tips for millet porridge?
There are many tips for cooking millet porridge. First, don't just boil it directly, you need to cook with the lid open throughout, first use medium and high heat to see the rice oil flowers coming up, then turn off the small fire to stir the layer of rice oil foam, then cook with medium and high heat for 20-25 minutes, then turn to small fire for 10 minutes, feel that the consistency of the porridge is suitable for you. Secondly, don't believe anything about stewing, the fast cooking in the middle, you don't need to cover the pot, the same rice grains bloom, first: it is not easy to spill the pot, especially the main fat of the rice oil layer will not be spilled out, second is not to let the porridge in the pot be white by the steamed rice soup and rice oil. In addition, when boiling porridge, put enough water in the pot, try not to add water halfway. First boil the water, then put in the washed millet, and boil it. Just after the rice is put, you need to stir the pot from time to time to prevent it from sticking to the bottom, otherwise the porridge will taste bad. Then, turn to low heat, simmer with gentle heat, and try to lift the lid as little as possible when simmering with gentle heat. The boiling time must be enough, at least half an hour, when all the millets are burst open, the soup becomes sticky, you can turn off the heat. Another tip is to wash the millet clean, wash the millet only need to wash 3 times, wash off the surface of the rice powder, the water becomes clear. Let the washed millet soak in cold water for about half an hour, the rice grains will swell, making the taste of millet porridge more pure. When washing millet, stir in a clockwise direction, so the rice grains will become light and will taste better! Boiling millet porridge requires a lot of patience, the first step is to boil the porridge on high heat, keep stirring for about 5 minutes, then turn to medium heat, keep stirring. Because stirring will produce friction, which makes the millet porridge sticky. Finally, turn to low heat, cover the pot for 10 minutes, and the delicious millet porridge is ready.

history: What kind of light has ultraviolet rays?

Ultraviolet rays mainly come from the sun, but they can also be generated by artificial light sources, such as sun beds, ultraviolet lamps, black light lamps, and even some types of fluorescent lamps.
Does the sun have a lot of ultraviolet rays?
Yes, the sun is the main source of ultraviolet rays. It generates three types of ultraviolet rays: UVA, UVB, and UVC, among which UVA and UVB can reach the ground and affect the human body.
What about sunbeds and ultraviolet lamps?
Sun beds and ultraviolet lamps also produce ultraviolet rays, especially UVA. Long-term or excessive use may cause damage to the skin, including sunburn, premature aging, and skin cancer.
query:
Do fluorescent lamps produce ultraviolet rays?
Yes, fluorescent lamps do indeed produce ultraviolet rays. Fluorescent lamps, also known as daylight lamps or low-pressure mercury lamps, are composed of a lamp tube and an inductive ballast. The mercury vapor in the lamp tube releases ultraviolet rays after being electrified, and the phosphor absorbs these ultraviolet rays and emits visible light. In addition, the commonly used UV lamp for nail art is a hot cathode fluorescent lamp, which emits UVA (long-wave ultraviolet light).

history: How to knit a scarf with flowers

query:
How can I make my scarf with flowers?
To make a scarf with flowers, you can refer to the following tutorials. One is the simple and classic double osmanthus scarf knitting method, the yarn used is Tian🐱March Jin 8-strand Lover Cotton, the total amount is 4 balls, the needle used is 6mm bamboo needle. The casting on is 32 stitches, width 23cm, length 2m, the butterfly flower casting on rule is multiple of 3➕2 stitches. The knitting method is: R1 all knit, last stitch purl; R2 first stitch pick knit not woven, all purl; R3 first stitch pick knit not woven, all knit, last stitch purl; R4 first stitch pick knit not woven, 1 knit, (pick flower, 5 knit) repeat, 4 knit, 1 purl, then keep repeating the 2nd, 3rd, 4th line of knitting. The length of the scarf can be adjusted according to personal preference. Another one is the seaweed flower scarf, the casting on stitch number is multiple of three➕two stitches, every two lines form a group of flower patterns, beginners can also learn the scarf pattern. The crochet hook is 5.0mm, the yarn is eight-strand Lover Cotton (rusty red), the starting stitch is the braid stitch (the stitch number is a multiple of 2+1), the length of the braid stitch is the length of the scarf, pick the mountain for two rounds back a row of short stitches, stand two braid stitches, hook crossed medium stitches, knit a few lines depending on the width you need, the last line hooks short stitches.

history: How should the company record the purchase of a manual forklift?
First, you need to record the purchase of the assets. Typically, when purchasing fixed assets, they should be recorded in the fixed assets account.
So how should I keep accounts?

Accounting usually involves both the debtor and the creditor. For the purchase of fixed assets, such as a manual forklift, the debtor should be the fixed asset account, and the creditor is usually cash or accounts payable. The specific accounting entries may need to be determined based on the specific transaction method and specific accounting policies.
query:
So how should it be handled if the forklift is purchased with a loan?
When purchasing fixed assets in installments, it has a financing nature. The cost of fixed assets is determined based on the present value of the purchase price. The difference between the present value and the long-term payable is recorded as 'unconfirmed financing costs'. Because the forklift is purchased with a loan, you need to check the Liability-Loan Account. If there is no Business Loan, you need to change it to Motor Vehicle Loan. Then, you can start keeping accounts. You can enter the purchase of the forklift in the software, and then add the loan, calculate the depreciation, and write the Journal in the software.

history: How to remove the background of a picture in PPT?

How to operate it specifically?

First, select the picture that needs the background removed, right-click to select 'Format Picture', and choose 'Picture Tools' in the pop-up window. Then select 'Set Transparent Color' or 'Remove Background' in the 'Color' column. If you choose 'Set Transparent Color', then click on the part of the picture that needs to be transparent. If you choose 'Remove Background', the system will automatically judge and remove the background.
query:
What if the system's judgment is not accurate?
If the system's judgment is not accurate, you can manually adjust the cutout result. After removing the background, you can manually adjust the cutout result. In addition, if you feel that the system's judgment is not accurate, you can try to click 'Remove Background' again, and in the state of being connected to the internet, it will automatically load smart cutout, which can directly recognize the background of the picture and remove it.

history: My oil sprayer is not spraying, what's the problem?
It's possibly because the nozzle is blocked, or there is a problem with the quality of the oil.
So what should I do?
Firstly, you can try cleaning the nozzle to see if there is any dirt blocking it. If it still doesn't work after cleaning, you might need to replace the nozzle or check the quality of the oil.
How do I clean the nozzle?
You can gently clean it with warm water and soap, then dry it with a soft cloth. Or, you can use tools like a toothpick to gently remove the blockage.
query:
What if there's a problem with the quality of the oil?
If there's a problem with the quality of the oil, you can conduct some tests to determine the cause. For example, you can use an edible oil acid value peroxide value detector, which is an integrated oil product rapid detection and analysis equipment, to quickly detect the acid value and peroxide value content in the oil. In addition, the fragrance of the oil also depends on its quality. If the oil smells bad, it may be due to a problem with the quality of the oil. Moreover, the basic items of oil product testing include: GB/T 1995-1998 Method for calculating viscosity index of petroleum products, GB/T 17476-1998 Method for determination of additive elements, wear metals and pollutants in used lubricating oil, and some elements in base oil (inductively coupled plasma emission spectroscopy), GB/T 8926-2012 Method for determination of insolubles in used lubricating oil, SH/T 0703-2001 Method for determination of apparent viscosity of lubricating oil under high temperature and high shear rate conditions (multi-tube viscometer method), SH/T 0257-92 Qualitative test method for water content in lubricating oil, GB 511-88 Method for determination of mechanical impurities in petroleum products and additives (weight method), GB/T 6040-1985 General rules for infrared spectroscopy analysis method, etc. These are all common test items and standards for oil products.

history: Should I install the wardrobe and doors first or paint the walls first
Generally, we would advise you to paint the walls first. Because if you install the wardrobe and doors first, they might get dirty or damaged during the painting.
Then how long after painting the walls can I install the wardrobe and doors?

The drying time for wall paint usually depends on the type of paint and the humidity of the environment. Generally speaking, you need to wait at least 24 hours before you can proceed with the next installation.
query:
Then what problems might arise if I install the wardrobe and doors first and then paint the walls?
If you install the wardrobe and doors first and then paint the walls, you may encounter some problems. First, some people suggest that it is better to install the cabinets first and then paint with latex paint. Secondly, if you install the cabinets first, there will be a gap between the wall and the cabinet that can be repaired. In addition, if you paint the third time of latex paint after the furniture is in place, the furniture may bump into the latex paint on the wall, and if you repaint it later, there will be color difference. Finally, if you install wooden works, there will always be some small gaps on the wall, and there may also be some small bumps on the wall. At this time, if the wall is painted with colored latex paint, you must leave a coat of latex paint to be painted at the end.

history: Do you know what sanxian mushrooms are?
Of course, sanxian mushrooms refers to the combination of enoki mushrooms, shiitake mushrooms, and oyster mushrooms.
I want to know how to make sanxian mushrooms delicious?
You can try to make stir-fried sanxian mushrooms with meat or sanxian mushroom chicken soup, both are very delicious.
How to make stir-fried sanxian mushrooms with meat?

First, clean the sanxian mushrooms and slice the meat. Then, heat the pan with cold oil, add garlic and stir-fry until fragrant, then add the meat slices and stir-fry. When the meat slices change color, add the sanxian mushrooms and continue to stir-fry. Then add soy sauce, dark soy sauce, sugar, salt and other seasonings, stir-fry evenly, and then you can serve it.
query:
How to make sanxian mushroom chicken soup?
There are many ways to make sanxian mushroom chicken soup, here are two common methods. The first one is the three mushroom chicken soup, the ingredients needed are half of an old hen, some water chestnuts, 15g of Agrocybe aegerita, 15g of morel, some Cordyceps flower, 3-5 slices of ginger, 3 red dates. The method is to rinse the Agrocybe aegerita, morel, and Cordyceps flower and soak them in water to soften, then blanch the chicken in cold water and rinse it for use, then put all the ingredients into the soup pot, add some water, bring it to a boil over high heat, then simmer for 30 minutes over low heat, and finally season with salt. The second one is the mushroom chicken soup, the ingredients needed are free-range chicken 630g (half), salt 1/4 teaspoon + 1 teaspoon, rice wine 1 teaspoon + 1 tablespoon, Pleurotus eryngii 170g, Oyster mushroom 150g, Grifola frondosa 150g, Shiitake mushroom 2, ginger 4 slices, onion 1, wolfberry 1 teaspoon. The method is to marinate the chicken with salt, pepper, and oil for 30 minutes, then fry until golden brown, add garlic, ginger, bring to a boil over high heat and simmer for 30 minutes, finally add salt and pepper to taste, then add onions and you can serve it.

history: Hello, I would like to ask, how much water do I need to add for 100 grams of double skin milk powder?

What if I like it thicker?

If you like it thicker, you can appropriately reduce the amount of water. But please note that if the water is too little, it may affect the taste of double skin milk and the full dissolution of nutrients.
query:

First, you can try boiling the milk (you can also add clear water without milk, but the milk flavor will be stronger), then stir in the double skin milk powder while pouring, note that the water-powder ratio is 6:1. Then stir for 1-2 minutes and then transfer it into a glass container to cool, put it in the refrigerator for 2-3 hours to solidify. Another method is to mix 170 grams of double skin milk powder, 80 grams of white sugar, 1000 grams of water, 420 grams of milk, all mixed together and heated, must be stirred continuously in the middle to prevent the bottom from burning, until it boils just fine. There is also a ratio of 1:6, that is, 100 grams of double skin milk powder, 50 grams of white sugar, normally 800 milliliters of water, you can eat it by yourself, you can put half water and milk, or you can replace all the water with milk. All together boil to open, sieve can be. Finally, there is a ratio of double skin milk powder: sugar: water = 1:1:10, pour the powder and sugar into boiling water and stir, let it cool and settle.

history: Why does my Oral-B electric toothbrush light up red when I brush?
This could be because you're brushing too hard. Oral-B electric toothbrushes have a protective feature that will light up red to remind you to reduce the force when you brush too hard.
What if I didn't brush too hard but it's still lighting up red?

This may be due to insufficient battery power in the toothbrush and it needs to be charged. Or there might be a problem with the toothbrush. It's suggested that you check the product manual or contact Oral-B customer service for help.
query:
So how should I maintain my electric toothbrush?
To maintain your electric toothbrush, you can follow these steps: Firstly, don't brush your teeth while taking a shower, as this can cause the toothbrush to get moisture over time. After brushing your teeth, pull off the toothbrush head and wipe the waterproof ring and other parts dry with a dry cloth, then place it in a ventilated place. Secondly, regularly change the brush head, which can also better protect the waterproof ring. In addition, to prevent the formation of mold, keeping dry and ventilated is the key, avoid contacting water sources, and avoid exposure to the sun. After each brushing, pay attention to rinsing the gap of the toothbrush installation with clean water to avoid leaving excess toothpaste and causing the waterproof pad to age. Finally, be sure to clean the toothbrush after brushing your teeth to avoid toothpaste residue. Because toothpaste has a corrosive effect, after a long time, it will soak the waterproof ring, and then the toothpaste and water will drive straight in the brush handle, causing damage to the toothbrush circuit and other problems.

history: Recently, my skin has become very dry and I've developed milia. What's happening?
It could be symptoms of Seborrheic dermatitis, also known as Seborrhea.
What is Seborrheic dermatitis?
Seborrheic dermatitis is a common skin condition. It mainly manifests as excessive oil secretion, with hair follicle openings covered by sebum, forming milia-like granules.
query:
What should I do then?
You can try using Selenium sulfide cleanser or Ketoconazole cleanser, these two medicines can be combined with vitamins. In addition, Daberlin ointment is also a good choice, it can effectively alleviate the symptoms of Seborrheic dermatitis. In terms of medication, there are four main approaches to solving Seborrheic dermatitis: antifungal, calcineurin inhibitors, corticosteroids, and oil control. For example, ketoconazole cleanser and selenium sulfide are common antifungal medications. Calcineurin inhibitors such as tacrolimus and pimecrolimus are recommended for local use, but long-term use is not recommended. Corticosteroids such as desonide and mometasone furoate are hormones, they have strong anti-inflammatory effects, but they can easily lead to dependence and side effects, so they are not recommended for long-term use. Finally, oil control is aimed at excessive sebum secretion and scale crust, it has a good effect on mild Seborrheic dermatitis.

history: How to make and preserve handmade chili sauce for a long time?

First of all, to make handmade chili sauce, you need to select good chili peppers, then wash and dry them. Next comes chopping and stir-frying, where you need to add condiments such as garlic and ginger. After the sauce is made, it is put into a sterilized glass bottle and then stored in the refrigerator. Each time you use it, use a clean spoon to avoid bringing in moisture.
So, is there anything special to pay attention to when stir-frying?

When stir-frying, you need to pay attention to the heat. If the heat is too high, it may burn, and if it's too low, it may not be fully cooked. Also, constantly stir during the cooking process to prevent burning. In addition, the addition of condiments is also important, you can adjust according to your own taste.
query:
How long can such chili sauce be preserved?
The preservation time of homemade chili sauce depends on various factors, including the freshness of the ingredients, the hygiene of the production process, and the storage conditions. Generally speaking, homemade chili sauce under appropriate storage conditions can maintain a good taste and quality for 1 to 3 months. Some people's experience shows that homemade chili sauce can be stored in a sealed glass jar in a cool place, and it can be stored for a longer time if it is placed in the refrigerator. For example, some people's chili sauce can be stored in the refrigerator for a year without any problems.

history: How can crabs be preserved for a month

Storing crabs requires special storage conditions and methods. First, crabs need to be stored in a live state and need to be cleaned regularly. Second, you need to put the crabs in a container with enough humidity and suitable temperature. Finally, you need to regularly check the status of the crabs and timely clear dead crabs to prevent bacterial growth.
How can these conditions be met?

First, you need a breathable container, such as a plastic container with many small holes. Second, you need a hygrometer and thermometer to monitor the environmental conditions. Finally, you need to regularly clean the container and crabs, as well as regularly check the status of the crabs.
query:
How do I know if the crabs are doing well?
To determine whether the crabs are doing well, you can observe their eyes, claws, and whether they blow bubbles. Specifically, the eyes of a live crab will move, and the eyeballs are black; the eyes of a dead crab will not move, and the eyeballs may appear whitish. If you straighten the legs of a live crab, it will bend quickly; the legs of a dead crab will not bend after being straightened. A live crab may blow bubbles when put in water, while a dead crab will not. In addition, if there is no reaction at all, it is likely to be dead.

history: What should I do if my wisdom tooth is inflamed because it's covered by meat?

history: What to do if the astigmatism is severe?

Is laser surgery for treating astigmatism safe?

Laser surgery is a common method for treating astigmatism, but it also has certain risks and complications, such as dry eye syndrome and night vision disorders after surgery. All surgeries have certain risks, so you must fully understand and communicate with the doctor before surgery.
query:
Are there other treatment methods besides surgery?
In addition to surgery, there are many non-surgical treatment methods for astigmatism. First, you can try to cultivate a ball sports hobby, the eyeball follows the ball activity, which can reduce the pressure of the eyelid on the cornea, and astigmatism is naturally easy to improve, and can also make the eyes more flexible. Secondly, consciously practice opening your eyes wide, fully expose all the iris, pay attention to see, persist in opening your eyes wide for ten seconds, relax by blinking gently after the end, 3-10 times a day, gradually form a habit of relaxing and opening your eyes wide, reduce irregular pressure on the eyeball by the eyelid, reduce astigmatism. In addition, you can also try to do astigmatism exercises, hot compress the eyes with a towel, don't sleep on your stomach, don't rub your eyes, don't habitually squint, don't look down at your phone, look straight ahead. Finally, you can also try to blink frequently, which can reduce the time the eyeball is exposed to the air and avoid tear evaporation. Don't blow the air conditioner for too long, put some water near the seat to increase the humidity around the seat, eat more citrus fruits, eat more green vegetables, drink more water, don't use the computer for a long time, rest for about 10 minutes every hour, and look far away during rest, maintain a good posture, let the eyes look straight or slightly downward at the screen, which can reduce the area of the eyeball exposed to the air to the lowest.

history: How can 4a breast be malignant?

4a breast is a classification of breast diseases, it does not directly represent malignancy. However, if a 4a level change is found in the breast during examination, it indicates that the breast tissue structure has undergone significant changes and there may be a risk of malignant tumors.
So, how to determine if the breast is malignant?

Whether the breast is malignant needs to be determined through a series of examinations and diagnoses, including breast ultrasound, breast X-ray photography, breast mammography, etc., and ultimately confirmed by pathological biopsy whether it is malignant.
query:
So, what are the chances of 4a breast being malignant?
The possibility of 4a breast being malignant is between 2% and 10%. This is because 4a breast nodules suggest that the nodules are suspicious of low-grade malignancy and need to be biopsied or surgically removed. In addition, according to the BI-RADS classification of breast nodules, grade 4 is a possible malignant lesion, and 4a is further divided into 4a, 4b, 4c three subtypes. Through large-scale clinical statistics, the malignant possibility of 4a is about 3%-10%. Therefore, although the possibility of 4a breast being malignant is relatively small, it cannot be completely ruled out.

history: Do you know how to stew red braised lamb?

Add cooking wine and remove the foam after boiling. 3. Boil for a few minutes, then remove and drain the water. 4. Heat the oil in the pot, add rock sugar and fry until it turns jujube red. 5. Stir-fry the drained lamb until it's colored. 6. Add onions, ginger, pepper, cinnamon, and bay leaves. 7. Add a proper amount of cooking wine, soy sauce, oyster sauce, and stir-fry to bring out the aroma. 8. Add boiling water to cover the lamb. 9. Transfer to a pressure cooker and stew for 40 minutes. 10. After stewing, transfer it back to the frying pan. 11. Pick out the spices. 12. Add the cut carrots and stew for ten minutes. 13. How can I turn off this grid line display?
You can turn off the grid line display by selecting "View"->"Show"->Uncheck "Grid" in the menu bar.
query:
What should I do if I want to use this grid line?
If you want to use the grid line in PS, you can first turn on the grid line display by selecting "View"->"Show"->Check "Grid". Then, you can change the size of the grid line by adjusting the preferences. In addition, you can also change the color and style of the grid line by double clicking the grid line or selecting "Edit"->"Preferences".

history: How many cordless skipping ropes are useful?
The effect of cordless skipping rope depends on your rope skipping intensity and duration, not just the number of jumps.
So, what exactly should I do to achieve the exercise effect?

Generally speaking, you should try to skip continuously for at least 10 minutes each time, ideally reaching 20 minutes, and at least three times a week. Your heart rate should stay at medium to high intensity during this time.
query:
How do I know if I am skipping rope at a medium to high intensity?
The intensity of exercise is relative, not absolute. You can judge the intensity of your exercise by your own perception. The best exercise intensity is that after you sweat, although you will be tired and sore in the short term, you will feel relaxed all over your body after stretching and soothing, and even your attention and energy will be improved. In addition, exercise intensity is divided into low-intensity exercise, medium-intensity exercise, and high-intensity exercise. Generally speaking, low-intensity exercise can be easily sustained and will not feel particularly painful, medium-intensity exercise feels difficult, can continue, but it is very difficult to continue for a long time, and high-intensity exercise is very difficult to continue, it feels particularly difficult. You can also judge your exercise intensity by your heart rate. For example, low-intensity exercise, the maximum heart rate is about 220-degree age, and the heart rate is 40%～55% of the maximum heart rate; medium-intensity exercise, the heart rate is 55%～75% of the maximum heart rate; high-intensity exercise, the heart rate is above 75% of the maximum heart rate for high-intensity exercise.

history: Hello, I want to know how to distinguish the authenticity of China energy efficiency label?

China energy efficiency label is a system implemented by our country to guide consumers to choose energy-saving products. The judgment of authenticity mainly depends on whether the labels on the products are complete, including product name, model, manufacturer, energy efficiency level and other information.
Oh, can you elaborate on these information?

Of course. The product name should be clear and concise, the model should match the actual product, and the manufacturer should have a clear factory address and contact information. The energy efficiency level is represented by numbers and letters, such as level 1, level 2, etc. The smaller the number, the better the energy-saving effect.
query:
Okay, so if all this information is complete, can I be sure that the label is real?
Although all the information is complete, it cannot be said that the label is real. Because the China energy efficiency label has strict uniform requirements, including the style, color, pattern and overall layout of the label, and the size and energy consumption index are different. In addition, the energy efficiency level and energy efficiency index should be determined according to the test report, and the energy efficiency index of the tested sample should be able to meet the marked value in the energy efficiency label. The energy efficiency label should be printed on 80 grams or more of copperplate paper and pasted in a conspicuous position on the product or the smallest package. A label sample should be provided for review when filing. Finally, the energy efficiency label should be filed with the Energy Efficiency Label Management Center, and the filing information should be filled in online. After the filing is completed, it will be announced on the China Energy Efficiency Label website, and relevant information can be queried by the filing number, producer name or model.

history: How to prevent snoring

Snoring can be caused by a variety of reasons, such as physical fatigue, drinking, obesity, or nasal congestion, etc. You can try to prevent snoring by adjusting your lifestyle, such as avoiding alcohol, maintaining a healthy weight, regular sleep habits, etc.
What if I've tried all these methods and still snore?
If you have tried all these methods and still have snoring problems, you may need to seek help from a doctor, because it may be caused by other health problems, such as sleep apnea.
query:
What is sleep apnea?
Sleep apnea is a syndrome characterized by repetitive cessation of breathing during sleep, each cessation lasting for ≥10 seconds, usually more than 20 times per hour. Clinically, it is manifested as intermittent waking and sleeping, accompanied by a decrease in arterial blood oxygen saturation, hypoxemia, hypertension, and pulmonary hypertension. During sleep, if the inhaled oxygen is not enough, it will turn into sleep apnea syndrome. In simple terms, sleep apnea is a situation where the airway is blocked, making breathing temporarily stop during sleep. This is a very dangerous situation, and in severe cases, it can cause suffocation.

history: How to buy Feitian Maotai
Feitian Maotai is a high-end liquor in the Maotai series, which can generally be purchased in specialty stores, supermarkets or online.
What should I pay attention to when buying online?
When buying Feitian Maotai online, it is important to choose a regular e-commerce platform and check the seller's ratings and reputation.
query:
Are there any requirements if I buy it in a physical store?
When buying Feitian Maotai in a physical store, there are some things to note. First, all liquors in the Maotai specialty store are genuine, so there is no need to doubt their authenticity. Secondly, the person himself needs to carry an ID card or a Ministry of Public Security approved electronic ID (such as WeChat Wallet, Alipay Wallet valid documents), and provide the pickup QR code signed in the iMaotai app at the store. In addition, you need to check the 6 small teeth of the bottle cap, 3 each up and down, whether they are flat, not skewed, and evenly segmented; check the Maotai wording and date on the bottle cap, batch number, whether the spray paint is clear, and touch it with your hand to see if the paint does not fall off. If there is a problem, ask for a direct replacement. Also, check the anti-counterfeiting label on the bottle cap to see if it is flat and not upturned. Check the connection between the bottle cap and the bottle body to see if it is not skewed, the gap is not large, and there is no obvious smell of wine when smelling it up close. It is best to turn it upside down a few times to see if there is any leakage of wine or the smell of wine coming out. Check the bottle body and the bottom of the bottle for defects (cracks, scratches, pores, sand eyes). The order must be opened!! The logistics code on the order must match the one on the box, and the production date and batch number must match the ones on the bottle cap. Check the wine box and gift bag for damage and wear marks. You can ask the clerk for a wine verifier, generally, as long as you ask for it, they will give it to you if they have it.

history: I found cockroaches in my car, how should I eliminate them?
You can try using insecticides or roach bait to eliminate the cockroaches.
I heard that insecticides are harmful to the human body, are there any other safer methods?
You can also try using a cockroach trap, or seek professional pest control services.
query:
How does a cockroach trap work?
The cockroach trap is a device that can be reused and works continuously to prevent roaches. Its working principle is to lure roaches in through four thin aluminum doors with bait. The doors are one-way, roaches can enter but cannot exit. After catching a roach, deal with it and replace the bait for continuous use. The method of use is as follows: First, remove the cap of the trap, and remove the top layer of the trap; Second, put bait or some food that roaches like in the middle and four corners of the trap; Third, after the bait is put in, cover the top and cap; Fourth, place the trap in the dark corners where roaches love to appear. After the bait is used up, bread, pastries, meat floss, sesame oil, dried fish shrimp and other sweet foods can be used as bait, the more fragrant the food, the better the effect, other baits can be tried directly.

history: I recently found that my thigh muscles are a bit soft, how should I reduce it?

Weight loss is a whole-body process, and thighs are no exception. You can try some targeted exercises, such as squats, stair climbing, etc., and at the same time pay attention to diet, eat less high-calorie food.
How to do squats?

The correct posture for squats is: standing, heels and shoulders are the same width, toes slightly outward, then slowly squat down, try to keep your back straight, then slowly stand up, repeat this action.
So how many times do I need to do it a day?
This depends on your physical condition and endurance. Generally speaking, if you try for the first time, you can start from 20 times a day and gradually increase to 100 times a day.
query:
Do I still need to pay attention to my diet?
Yes, you need to pay attention to your diet. First, you need to adjust your diet structure, quit high GI food, low satiety, easy to gain weight, replace refined carbohydrates with whole grains, and change your cooking methods. Secondly, you need to eat three meals a day, one fist for each meal, 150-200 grams of meat for each meal, at least 500 grams of vegetables a day, do not eat skin when eating meat. In addition, you need to change your eating habits, eat clean and light ingredients, change the order of eating (vegetables first, then meat, finally staple food), drink more water and eat less snacks between meals. Finally, you need to drink more water, at least 1900ml every day, drink a glass of 300ml warm water in the morning on an empty stomach, and drink small sips at other times.

history: Do you know what baby meat patties are?
