query:
So, how can you make baby meat patties soft and delicious?
To make baby meat patties soft and delicious, first you need to prepare the following ingredients: 150g pork, an appropriate amount of cabbage, an appropriate amount of carrots, an appropriate amount of green onions. Then, you need to prepare some seasonings, including a little salt, half a spoon of oyster sauce, a spoon of starch about 15g. Next, chop the pork and add carrot granules, cabbage shreds, green onions, a little salt, half a spoon of oyster sauce, a spoon of starch, stir and mix, stir in one direction. Finally, brush the non-stick pan with oil, low heat, put the round meat paste into the pan, fry until golden on both sides. During the process of making meat patties, you can also add a little mushroom powder or shrimp skin powder seasoning, big baby can put normally. The roughness of the ingredients is adjusted according to the baby's chewing ability, vegetables can be replaced with the baby's favorite. After frying to shape, you can add some water to simmer for 3 minutes, the pancakes that can't be finished should be sealed well, eat as soon as possible.

history: How to memorize the past tense of irregular verbs in English?

The past tense and past participle forms of irregular verbs have no fixed rules and need to be mastered through memorization. However, some methods may help you, such as: category memorization, song memorization, card memorization, etc.
Can you explain these memory methods in detail?

Of course, category memorization refers to categorizing irregular verbs according to their variant forms and memorizing the same type of verbs together. The song memorization method refers to compiling irregular verbs into songs and using the melody and rhythm of the songs to help memorize. The card memorization method refers to writing each irregular verb on a card and reviewing it repeatedly. These methods can enhance memory.
query:
All of these sound very useful, could you tell me some common irregular verbs and their past tense?
The common past tense and past participle of irregular verbs for primary and junior high school students based on Shanghai textbooks are summarized in the table. There are three forms: ABA style (the original form of the verb is the same as the past participle), ABB style (the past tense is the same as the past participle), ABC style (the original form of the verb, the past tense, and the past participle are all different). For example, 'bought', 'thought', 'met', 'went' are commonly encountered words, which also determine the direction of this text. In the writing of Sword Three, the past tense is generally used. You can refer to the most complete change table of common irregular verbs, which is a necessary reference for listening and reading inferences in the four or six levels.

history: How to activate medical insurance credit payment

query:

You can return to the main page of WeChat, then find the newly applied electronic medical insurance card, click in, it will ask you to set a password. In addition, if you have not established a file in the system of the hospital, you also can't bind the social security card. You can follow the public account of the hospital, enter the public account dialog box, click on medical services, find "Personal Center", click "Add Patient", and then "Online Filing" appears. After the filing is completed, binding the social security card will not report an error. Finally, if you are using the National Medical Insurance Service Platform to generate an electronic medical insurance card, you can download the Hubei Smart Medical Insurance APP to authorize Gongji Medical Insurance. If you encounter a binding failure, you can directly call the Wuhan Medical Insurance Center, the staff will operate in the background, and you can re-authorize it.

history: What's the difference between BCAA and creatine?
That's a great question. Simply put, BCAA (Branched-Chain Amino Acids) mainly help to prevent muscle breakdown, while creatine helps to enhance muscle strength and size.
So, how do they work?

BCAA is composed of three essential amino acids, they can be metabolized directly in the muscles to provide energy, reduce fatigue, and promote protein synthesis. Creatine, on the other hand, is a substance stored in muscles that can quickly produce energy, especially beneficial for high-intensity workouts.
query:
So, which one should I choose to supplement?
Whether to choose creatine or BCAA depends on your specific needs and goals. Creatine can increase the energy storage of muscle cells, improve muscle strength and endurance, and help you achieve your training goals more quickly. However, excessive intake of creatine may burden the liver and kidneys. On the other hand, BCAA is an amino acid complex that contains three essential amino acids, namely leucine, isoleucine, and valine. BCAA can help muscle repair and recovery, and also improve muscle endurance and strength. For fitness enthusiasts, BCAA is one of the very important nutrients. Therefore, you need to choose according to your own needs and goals, and strictly follow the instructions and professional advice to avoid damaging your body.

history: How to read the guitar tablature?
The tablature is the standard notation for guitar. Each line represents a string of the guitar, and the numbers on the lines represent the frets of the guitar.
So, how do they correspond specifically?
From bottom to top, they correspond to the six strings E, B, G, D, A, E respectively, and the numbers represent the frets on the corresponding strings. For example, 3 means to press the third fret.
query:
What do the x and o on the tablature represent?
In the guitar tablature, the 'x' represents the plucking string, that is, the string that the right hand needs to pluck. And the 'o' represents the open string, that is, the right hand plucks the string when the left hand does not press the string.

history: What does the weight gain of a pregnant woman include?
The weight gain of a pregnant woman during pregnancy mainly includes the weight of the fetus, amniotic fluid, placenta, and the weight gain of the mother's breasts, uterus, blood, etc.
query:
So, how much does the fetus usually weigh?
According to relevant knowledge, the weight of the fetus will increase with the progress of pregnancy. For example, at the thirteenth week of pregnancy, the average length of the fetus is 7.4 cm, and the average weight is 23 grams. By the fourteenth week, the average length of the fetus is 8.7 cm, and the average weight is 43 grams. By the fifteenth week, the average length of the fetus is 10.1 cm, and the average weight is 70 grams. By the sixteenth week, the average length of the fetus is 11.6 cm, and the average weight is 100 grams. In addition, according to the data at 28 weeks of pregnancy, the median weight of the fetus is 70%, which is better to be born between 30-50%.

history: I want to know how wage tax deduction is calculated
Generally, wage tax deduction is calculated based on your annual salary. Your annual salary minus the tax-free threshold, and the remaining amount is the part you need to pay tax.
So how much is the tax-free threshold?
The tax-free threshold may vary depending on your location and your specific situation. Usually, you can inquire about the specific tax-free threshold from your local tax bureau.
Then how do I know how much tax I need to pay?

You can use the tax rate table provided by the tax bureau to calculate the tax you need to pay. Each tax rate tier corresponds to a tax rate, you just need to find the tier where your annual salary is, and then calculate the tax you need to pay according to the corresponding tax rate.
query:
I'm still not quite clear, can you explain in detail?
First, you need to understand the concept of pre-tax income and post-tax income. Currently, the salary given by the company when we apply for a job is pre-tax income, and the post-tax income is your actual salary. Post-tax income = pre-tax income - five social insurance and one housing fund contribution - personal tax. Secondly, you need to understand the contribution ratio of five social insurance and one housing fund, which is 17.5%, including endowment insurance: 8%, medical insurance: 2%, unemployment insurance: 0.5%, housing fund 7%, maternity insurance and work injury insurance do not need to be paid. In addition, you need to understand the contribution base of the company's five social insurance and one housing fund, which is usually based on base salary + performance + bonus + commission. Finally, you need to understand the personal tax payment situation, the previous personal tax was deducted based on monthly income, and taxes were deducted if it exceeded 5000. Now it is deducted based on cumulative income, and taxes are required if the cumulative income exceeds 60,000 for the whole year. But you still have to pay tax every month, not wait until the end of the year to pay tax, normal monthly income exceeding 5000 basically still have to deduct tax every month, if the whole year income is less than 60,000 (mid-term resignation, not working, etc.), you can apply for a tax refund after this year.

query:

Employee relationship management is not just about managing the labor relations between the company and the employees. The first part is the labor relations between employees and the company, which includes labor relations management and performance management, involving employee entry and exit interviews, handling of welfare benefits and other procedures, file management, employee complaints, labor disputes, personnel disputes, etc. The second part is the relationship between employees and the company. query:

After curling your bangs, you can choose different methods to finish. If you want a natural style, you can stand all the bangs together, the curling iron clamps near the root of the hair (the plate faces forward, the curling iron goes back), turn the curling iron back while leading it forward and upward, and then arrange naturally by hand. If you want a curlier style, you can pick up one side of the bangs, the curling iron clamps the hair vertically at the level of the eyebrows, after turning the curling iron inwards 180°, pull in the opposite direction until the end of the hair, then arrange naturally by hand (spray setting spray if you want to keep it longer). If you want to keep your bangs in the best condition every day, you can wash and put on makeup directly after curling the bangs in the morning, then remove the rod to ensure a beautiful effect.

history: What causes cardiovascular narrowing?

Cardiovascular narrowing is usually caused by a variety of factors, including aging, hypertension, high cholesterol, diabetes, smoking, etc. These factors can lead to arteriosclerosis, which in turn can cause cardiovascular narrowing.
Can you explain in detail how aging and hypertension cause cardiovascular narrowing?

As we age, our blood vessels naturally become hardened and narrowed. Hypertension accelerates this process because it puts extra pressure on the walls of the blood vessels, making them more susceptible to damage, which in turn can lead to cardiovascular narrowing.
query:
How do high cholesterol and diabetes cause cardiovascular narrowing?
High cholesterol and diabetes can both cause cardiovascular narrowing. For patients with high blood sugar and high blood pressure, if the control of blood sugar and blood pressure is not ideal, arteriosclerosis occurs, which can easily cause narrowing of the vascular lumen. In addition, high cholesterol is also an unhealthy lifestyle factor, which can also contribute to vascular narrowing.

query:
I see, is there anything else I need to pay attention to?

Second, enter the needle from the middle position of the two needles. In addition, the rule of two needles down and two needles up, do not knit wrong. Also, the non-addition and non-subtraction after the addition of needles will slightly enlarge, so the number of needles should not be too much. Finally, novice babies must buckle the mark on the first needle, otherwise it is easy to hook wrong. When sewing, the thread head must be left longer, in case it is not enough, the connection will be more troublesome, and it will affect the beauty.

history: I've been feeling some discomfort in my heart recently, I'm afraid it might be coronary heart disease.
What specific symptoms do you have?
Sometimes I have chest pain, and I have some difficulty breathing.
Coronary heart disease may indeed be manifested as chest pain, difficulty breathing, and other symptoms, but it could also be other reasons, you should go to the hospital for a detailed check-up.
What tests should I do?
You can have an electrocardiogram, a blood test, and an echocardiogram.
query:
How do these tests rule out coronary heart disease?
These tests can help us preliminarily judge the possibility of coronary heart disease, but they cannot completely rule out coronary heart disease. For example, an electrocardiogram can intuitively see if there are arrhythmias, myocardial ischemia, and other changes, but it cannot directly observe whether the coronary artery is narrow. Similarly, echocardiography can check the structure and function of the heart, but it cannot see the condition of the coronary arteries, so it cannot directly detect coronary heart disease. If you highly suspect coronary heart disease, you can consider performing coronary CTA or coronary angiography, which can directly observe whether the coronary artery is narrow, and can perform therapeutic interventional operations during the operation, such as stent implantation and balloon dilation.

history: What to do if the degree of two glasses is quite different?

Then how should I solve this problem?

First of all, you need to have regular eye examinations to ensure that your glasses are matched with your visual acuity. If the degrees are indeed quite different, you may need to consider using bifocal glasses or contact lenses. But the specific situation still needs to be consulted with a professional ophthalmologist.
query:
What are bifocal glasses?
Bifocal glasses are a type of glasses that can be used for both far and near vision. They were invented by Benjamin Franklin, who took a pair of his glasses for seeing far and a pair for reading, then simply and violently cut them in half, and put half of each back on the glasses. The top half is for seeing far, and the bottom half is for reading. This is how bifocal glasses were born. In addition, bifocal glasses are also known as bifocal lenses, where the top is for nearsightedness and the bottom is for farsightedness.

history: How to adjust the coffee grinder

The adjustment of the coffee grinder needs to consider the freshness of the beans, the coarseness of the grinding, and the taste you want to achieve. Generally speaking, there are adjustment knobs on the grinder, you can adjust the coarseness according to your needs.
How should I know what coarseness is right for me?

This needs to be obtained through practice. Generally speaking, espresso requires finer powder, drip coffee requires medium coarse powder, and cold brew coffee requires coarser powder. You can try according to this standard first, and then make minor adjustments according to the taste.
query:
How should I adjust if I use fresh beans?
If you use fresh beans, you can adjust the grinder according to the following steps: First, you need to clean the residual powder in the grinder channel, because the coffee powder left in the grinder channel overnight will affect the flavor and extraction parameters due to long exposure to air. Then, weigh 18 grams of coffee powder, then put the coffee powder into our coffee handle and take a look at its extraction state. The golden cup extraction ratio of most Italian blend coffee beans is 1:2, which means 18g of coffee powder extracts 36g of concentrate, and the time is controlled at about 25-30 seconds. If the coffee machine extracts too quickly, it will result in insufficient extraction, acidic taste, short aftertaste, and insufficient aroma. So in the case of fixed powder quantity, we need to adjust the grinding degree finer; similarly, if the same coffee powder flow rate is too slow, we can also adjust the grinding degree coarser, basically within the golden cup interval. Finally, when we adjust the scale of the grinder, we need to ask for adjustment, we can only adjust one small grid at a time.

history: How to wean a child from night feeding?
First, you need to understand that the key to weaning night milk is to gradually reduce the child's night milk volume, and then gradually adjust his schedule.
Then how to gradually reduce the child's night milk volume?
You can reduce a little milk volume each time, for example, originally feed 180 ml, you can reduce to 150 ml, and then reduce to 120 ml, and so on, until completely no longer feed night milk.
query:
How should I adjust his schedule?
To adjust the child's schedule, you can follow these steps: First, record the child's sleep time for a week, including the time to go to bed at night and the time to get up in the morning. Second, set the expected schedule, but this time must be reasonable. Then, set the start time, take the earliest sleep time and wake-up time of this week's schedule, and perform 3 days of stable schedule. If the schedule is stable, you can skip it. Next, check the impact of the environment on sleep. Finally, advance the wake-up time by 30 minutes every 1-2 days, you must wake up, this is the time to correct the biological clock. Then move the whole day's schedule forward accordingly. The time to wake up every morning and the time to wake up from the last nap must be awakened according to the plan, so the schedule can be adjusted continuously. Remember not to adjust too quickly, otherwise it is easy to wake up after falling asleep at night, and then go to bed later.

history: How many calories should I consume every day?
This mainly depends on your age, gender, body shape, level of physical activity, etc. On average, adult men need about 2500 kcal, and adult women need about 2000 kcal.
What if I want to lose weight?

If you want to lose weight, you may need to reduce your calorie intake. Usually, reducing by 500 kcal a day can make you lose 0.5kg per week. However, this also depends on your weight and level of physical activity.
query:
How do I calculate my daily calorie intake?
You can use some tools or apps to help you calculate your daily calorie intake. For example, there is a magic app that can help you calculate your daily calorie intake. In addition, you can also calculate your basal metabolism and daily required intake. The formula for female basal metabolism is 661+9.6✖️weight (kg)+1.72✖️height (cm)—4.7✖️age (years). The formula for male basal metabolism is 67+13.73✖️weight (kg)+5✖️height (cm)—6.9✖️age (years). Then, the daily required intake is equal to the basal metabolic rate multiplied by the exercise coefficient. For example, if you rarely or do not exercise at all, the exercise factor is 1.2; if you occasionally exercise about 1-3 times a week, the exercise factor is 1.3; if you have a habit of continuous exercise, about 3-6 times a week, the exercise factor is 1.5; if you exercise 6-7 times a week or have a large workload, the exercise factor is 1.7; if your work or life requires a lot of labor to consume energy, the exercise factor is 1.9. Finally, you can download some sports fat loss related apps, such as keep, mint, etc., enter your height, weight, fat loss target, etc., and the system will calculate the daily required calories for each person.

history: How to cook fork-tailed fish?
There are many ways to cook it. You can stew, stir-fry, or steam it. Which method do you want to know about?
I want to know how to steam fork-tailed fish.

The method of steaming fork-tailed fish is relatively simple. First, you need to prepare fresh fork-tailed fish and clean it. Then, put the fish on a plate, sprinkle with an appropriate amount of salt, scallions, ginger, and cooking wine. Then, put the plate in the steamer and steam over high heat for about 15 minutes. Finally, take out the fish, sprinkle with scallion, pour hot oil on it and it's ready.
query:
What about the method of stewing fork-tailed fish?
The method of stewing fork-tailed fish is as follows: First, remove the internal organs of the fish, then cut three fingers wide from the abdomen to the fish spine, but do not cut off. Next, put dry ginger, star anise, and bay leaf into a spice bag, soak together with Huang Jing, Angelica, Yu Zhu, Shiitake, Cordyceps flower in water for 1 hour. Then, put the soaked ingredients and fish together in a pressure cooker, add soaked water, beer (or cooking wine), a little vinegar, and stew for 30 minutes after the pressure cooker is steamed. Finally, transfer all the ingredients in the pressure cooker to a soup pot, add table salt, and continue to stew over high heat. When the soup is salty and moderate, it is ready to serve.

history: Why do some people attract cats

So, how do cats distinguish human smells and sounds?
Cats have a strong sense of smell and hearing. They can distinguish human smells through their sense of smell, and distinguish human sounds through their hearing.
query:
So, how do cats' sense of smell and hearing work?
Cats have excellent sensory abilities, including vision, hearing, and sense of smell. Among them, their hearing is particularly sensitive, they can hear high and low frequency sounds, and their ears can rotate independently to help them locate the sound source. Cats can usually hear sounds that humans cannot hear, making them very sensitive when hunting and looking for potential threats. In addition, cats' sense of smell is also very sensitive, they have a large number of olfactory receptors located inside the nose, which allows them to identify the smell of food, objects, other animals and cats, as well as the chemical information in the environment.

Why is water not allowed to be brought into concerts
There are several main reasons why water is not allowed to be brought into concerts. First, in order to prevent potential terrorist dangerous behaviors, some concerts prohibit audiences from bringing bottled water into the venue to prevent audiences from hiding dangerous liquids in the bottle, or to avoid audiences getting excited and hitting people with water bottles during the concert. Second, large concerts usually conduct bag checks to make sure no water is brought in, to prevent accidental injury accidents. In addition, under the stage of a brick theater is a layer of machinery. If water seeps into the equipment layer from the floor cracks, it may damage the mechanical equipment and even cause mechanical failures, resulting in serious consequences. Finally, the stage usually has a professional floor, which is expensive and not waterproof. If water seeps in, the repair cost is very high.

query:
So what are the specific care steps?
The specific care steps for Gloxinia are as follows: First, Gloxinia is a semi-sunny plant, avoid direct sunlight. During the winter seedling period, ensure adequate light to promote seedling growth. But in the summer, you need to properly shade, avoid direct light, and maintain scattered light. When blooming, appropriately extending the shading time can prolong the flowering period. Second, the leaves of Gloxinia are full of fine fluff, you should avoid the leaves and stems when watering, otherwise if they get wet, it is easy to cause leaf rot. When watering, it is advisable to use the immersion siphon method. Absorbing water from the bottom up can avoid getting the leaves wet and protect the leaves. In addition, prefer fertile and slightly acidic sandy soil, you can evenly mix some coarse sand and decomposed fertilizer in some garden soil. Gloxinia is native to Brazil and is not cold-resistant. The suitable growth temperature is 20 to 25°C. When the winter temperature drops to about 5°C, Gloxinia will be dormant, and when the summer temperature exceeds 30°C, the plant will be semi-dormant. Before blooming, you need to apply nitrogen fertilizer once a week, and after the flower buds form, you need to increase the application of phosphorus fertilizer. During the fertilization process, you should also pay attention not to get the leaves, you can spray some clean water appropriately after fertilizing, clean the leaves, but pay attention to the residual water, it should be dealt with as soon as possible to avoid corrosion. Finally, the flowers cannot be directly exposed to the sun, the leaves cannot touch water, water when the leaves are wilting, and after the flowers have just finished blooming, trim the old leaves at the bottom, and new flower buds will grow next month.

history: What to do with facial swelling after a burn?

The swelling after a burn may be due to the body fluid filling the injured area, which is the body's natural protective response. In this case, you need to keep the wound clean, avoid contact with irritants, and use cold compresses to help reduce swelling.
Is there anything to pay attention to when applying a cold compress?

Yes, when applying a cold compress, be careful not to place frozen items directly on the skin to prevent frostbite. You can wrap the frozen items in cloth or tissue paper, apply it for 15-20 minutes each time, and apply it every 2-3 hours.
query:
Are there any other methods to help reduce swelling besides cold compress?
In addition to cold compresses, there are other methods to help reduce swelling. First, you can try using burn oil, which is a mixture of various essential oils, including lavender essential oil, myrrh essential oil, oregano essential oil, and frankincense essential oil. These essential oils have anti-inflammatory and analgesic effects, which can help reduce swelling and relieve pain. Secondly, you can also try using an oxygen injection machine to spray essential oil, which can make the essential oil more evenly distributed and avoid using too much.

history: What is the currency of Germany?
The currency of Germany is the Euro.
When did the Euro start to be used?
The Euro began to be used in 1999, but it was not until 2002 that it was circulated in all Eurozone countries.
query:
So, what currency did Germany use before the Euro?
Before the Euro was used in Germany, the currency used was the Mark. Whether it was Germany II, Weimar, Germany III, West Germany, East Germany or after reunification, the currency was always called the Mark. The Mark introduced today is the last set of West Germany, the only set after the reunification of the two Germanys, and the last set of Mark circulating banknotes in German history. The West German Mark used for as long as 30 years in the 1960 edition was issued on October 1, 1990 (3 days before the reunification of the two Germanys, but the East German had already introduced the West German Mark). The German Mark was the currency in circulation in Germany before the Euro was used in 2002. It was first issued in West Germany after World War II in 1948 and became the currency of the Federal Republic of Germany after the reunification of East and West Germany. This coin is a currency Mark issued in 1983, manufactured by Karlsruhe, now worth 0.51 Euros. The Mark was the legal currency of Germany before the Euro was used in 2002, first issued in Germany under Allied occupation in 1948 to replace the original Imperial Mark, and subsequently served as the legal currency of the Federal Republic of Germany until it was replaced by the Euro in 1999.

history: Is a resizable ring better or a non-resizable one?

This depends on individual needs and actual situations. The size of a resizable ring can be adjusted, which is more flexible and suitable for people whose finger size often changes. A non-resizable ring is more stable, but may no longer fit if the finger size changes.
Will a resizable ring be more prone to deformation?

Yes, a resizable ring, due to its design, is relatively soft in material and may deform if not handled carefully. But as long as it is worn and stored carefully, it should maintain its shape under normal circumstances.
query:
So if my finger size doesn't change often, is it better to choose a non-resizable ring?
If your finger size doesn't change often, then choosing a non-resizable ring would be more suitable for you. Because a non-resizable ring is more stable, it won't deform easily, and it won't need to be adjusted frequently, which is more convenient. In addition, if your finger size doesn't change often, then choosing a non-resizable ring can also save you some money, because resizable rings usually cost more than non-resizable ones.

history: I heard about a method called breast nodule ablation needle, what is it for?

Breast nodule ablation needle is a new minimally invasive treatment method, which uses high-frequency current through a specially made ablation needle, directly acting on the lesion, causing the protein in the lesion to denature and coagulate, and the lesion tissue to necrotize and fall off, thereby achieving the treatment purpose.
What are the advantages of this method?

The advantages of the breast nodule ablation needle are mainly minimally invasive, mild pain, and quick recovery. Moreover, it can avoid the pain and complications brought by traditional surgery, reducing the physical and psychological burden of patients.
query:
So, how much does the breast nodule ablation needle cost?
The cost of the breast nodule ablation needle varies depending on the number of nodules and the hospital. For example, some patients have undergone ablation at the China-Japan Friendship Hospital in Beijing, and the cost is about 18,000 yuan. After insurance, the amount to be paid is about 7,000 yuan. Another patient had seven nodules ablated, and the total cost was nearly 20,000 yuan, and the amount to be paid after insurance was 7,900 yuan.

history: How to make mutton hot pot at home?
First, you need to prepare fresh mutton, vegetables, hot pot base, and your favorite other ingredients.
What are the specific steps?

First, put the hot pot base into the pot to stir-fry, then add water, after boiling, add the cut mutton to cook. Then put your favorite vegetables and ingredients into the pot, boil them together until they are cooked.
How long does it take to cook?
Usually, mutton needs to be boiled for 15-20 minutes to be fully cooked, the cooking time for vegetables and ingredients depends on the type of vegetables and ingredients you choose.
query:
Are there any special cooking tips?
There are some special cooking tips for mutton hot pot. First, the mutton needs to be soaked in cold water to remove the blood water, and it needs to be cleaned thoroughly. Secondly, blanching must be done twice. In addition, when making mutton, remember not to use star anise. Another secret is that when fresh mutton is quickly cooled on ice, the meat fibers will shrink. When it is boiled again, the fibers will expand, and the mutton will be more tender than normal cooking. Finally, you can try to first blanch the mutton with green onions and ginger, and skim off the foam; then add the mutton and radish to a pressure cooker and stew for 30 minutes; finally, melt the hot pot base on low heat, add green onions, ginger, garlic, chili, cinnamon, star anise and stir-fry, then add the stewed mutton.

history: What does business approval date mean

Business approval date refers to the date when the relevant government departments review the registration information of the company during registration and believe that it complies with the provisions of laws and regulations, and agree to the company's registration date.
query:
So what's the difference between business approval date and business establishment date?
The establishment date is when the business was approved to be established and the business license was issued. While the approval date is the date when the latest legal change registration application of the enterprise was approved. Therefore, for newly opened businesses, the establishment date and approval date are the same. But if a change registration is made later, the approval date will be later than the establishment date.

history: How to distinguish colors in the table
You can set rules in the conditional format of Excel, apply different colors to cells that meet specific conditions, to achieve color differentiation.
How to operate specifically?

First, you need to select the cells you want to color. Then, find 'conditional format' in Excel's home menu, click on it and select 'create new rule'. Next, in the newly popped-up dialog box, you can set your rules, for example, if the value of the cell is greater than 50, then set its background color to green. Finally click OK to complete the rule setting.
What if I want to set multiple rules?

You can repeat the above steps to set multiple rules for the same range of cells. When a cell meets multiple rules, Excel will apply the format according to the order of the rules, and the format of the rules applied first will be overwritten by the rules applied later.
query:
What if I want to set the cells that meet a certain condition to a specific color, such as red?
If you want to set the cells that meet a certain condition to a specific color, such as red, you can follow these steps: First, select the cell or cell area that needs to be set with a background color. Then, find the 'font' and 'fill' areas in the 'start' tab. In the 'fill' area, choose the required background color, which can be theme color, standard color or custom color. Finally, click on the selected background color to apply it to the selected cell or cell area.

history: What kind of crystal should I wear for the five elements like fire and wood?

query:

Aquamarine is a gemstone, not a crystal. Its main component is a silicate containing beryllium and aluminum, which is light blue. Aquamarine can be divided into 9 grades from high to low quality: light blue in stone form, deep blue in stone form, semi-transparent light blue, shiny light blue, semi-transparent sky blue, semi-transparent water blue, shiny cat's eye, transparent water blue, pure water blue. If the color is pure and bright, and there are no flaws inside, it is of high quality. Aquamarine symbolizes calmness, bravery, and intelligence, and is known as the "stone of love". Wearing aquamarine can enhance self-confidence, relieve stress, and make people feel relaxed. In ancient times, people found that aquamarine is like a pool of clear water, blue as the ocean, perfectly combining appearance and inner quality, hence the name "aquamarine". Aquamarine can help to calm the mind and clarify thoughts, enhance personal communication skills, strengthen personal confidence, and moisturize the skin. It's recommended to wear the aquamarine on the left hand according to the principle of 'enter from the left and exit from the right'. As a tip, you can wear it with rose quartz or clear quartz to increase their complementary effects. Aquamarine can help relieve fatigue, massage the skin, and improve people's spirits. history: What does a sugar factory do?
A sugar factory is a place that processes and produces sugar, and the main raw materials are sugarcane or beet.
So what is the main production process of a sugar factory?
The main production process of a sugar factory includes washing, peeling, slicing, extraction, concentration, crystallization, centrifugation, and drying.
query:
Oh, how is the sugar produced by the sugar factory classified?
The sugar produced by the sugar factory can be classified into several types. Firstly, brown sugar and muscovado sugar are both made from sugarcane, with the same processing steps, but muscovado sugar takes longer to boil than brown sugar. Secondly, brown granulated sugar and raw sugar are both made from sugarcane or beet, but brown granulated sugar is a by-product of one-step production of white granulated sugar, while raw sugar is rough sugar, which is the raw material for further processing in the sugar refining process, and cannot be directly consumed. White granulated sugar and soft white sugar are both made from sugarcane or beet, but white granulated sugar is the direct raw material, while soft white sugar contains invert syrup, usually spray in about 2.5% invert syrup, so the reducing sugar in soft white sugar is higher than in white granulated sugar. Rock sugar and cube sugar are both made from white granulated sugar, but rock sugar is a recrystallization of granulated sugar, while cube sugar is made by moisturizing, pressing molding, drying, cooling, and packaging white granulated sugar.

history: How is it determined who serves in table tennis?

In table tennis matches, the right to serve is usually determined before the start of the match by the match referee through methods such as coin tossing. The party winning the coin toss can choose to serve first or choose the ground. Then, each side serves twice in a row, followed by the other side serving twice in a row, and so on.
So can you freely choose the way to serve during the match?

You can't choose the way to serve at will in the match, the service in table tennis has rules. For example, the ball must touch the ground before being hit during the serve, you can't obstruct the ball during the serve, and so on.
query:
What happens if the serving rules are violated?
If the serving rules are violated, the referee will take corresponding measures. For example, if the referee doubts the correctness of a serve action of the server, and neither he nor the deputy referee can be sure that the serve action is not illegal, the referee can warn the server without scoring when this phenomenon first appears in a match. But if the correctness of the player's serving action is questioned again, whether for the same reason or not, the referee will no longer warn and score a point. Whether it is the first time or at any time, as long as the server clearly does not serve according to the legal serve, he will be judged to lose a point, without warning. In addition, if the athlete deliberately affects the opponent, delays the match time, deliberately damages the equipment, offends the audience, insults the referee, etc., the on-site referee will first show the yellow card, warning the athlete. After the athlete receives a warning, if he commits the same offense again, he will be shown both a yellow card and a red card, and the opponent will be judged to score one point. The second time he commits the same offense, the referee can judge the opponent to score two points, and also show both a yellow and red card. If the athlete behaves improperly again after that, the referee on duty can report to the referee-in-chief and cancel the athlete's qualification to compete.

The marinade includes 2 spoons of light soy sauce, 1 spoon of dark soy sauce, 1 spoon of starch, and 1 gram of baking soda. The sauce includes 1 spoon of light soy sauce, 1 spoon of oyster sauce, 1 spoon of starch, and 20 ml of water. The steps are as follows: First, marinate the beef for 10 minutes; then, slice the garlic and soak it in water for 10 minutes then dry it; next, fry the garlic slices in cold oil until golden and set aside; then, fry the beef in the oil used to fry the garlic until the surface is slightly charred; after pouring out the excess oil, add half of the garlic slices and the sauce and stir-fry; finally, after the sauce becomes thick, remove from the pan and sprinkle with the remaining garlic slices. In addition, you can also try making beef noodles. The ingredients needed are beef and eggs. The procedure is to first choose fresh beef, cut into thin slices, add soy sauce, oyster sauce, starch water, and black pepper to season, mix well, then pour on peanut oil; then, break 4 eggs, add 3 spoons of starch water, salt, mix well; prepare a simple sauce with soy sauce, oyster sauce, starch water, and pepper; then, heat the pan with cold oil, first stir-fry the beef, stir-fry until there is still a little pink, then pour into the egg liquid; then, heat the pan with oil, pour in the egg liquid, when you see the white edge, gently push it to one side, fry until 7-8 mature, then turn off the heat, use the remaining heat of the pan to solidify the egg liquid, sprinkle with green onions and serve, then boil the just prepared sauce, pour it on the scrambled egg beef, and it's done!

query:

If calcium supplements are needed, the best times are before bed (1 hour after dinner), 1 hour after meals, and after sunbathing. history: I want to know what is the normal tire pressure for a Toyota Corolla?

Generally, the normal tire pressure for a Toyota Corolla should be between 32-35PSI. This value may vary depending on the model and tire specifications. It is recommended that you set your tire pressure according to the recommendations in the vehicle manual.
query:
What will be the impact if the tire pressure is too high or too low?
If the tire pressure is too high, it may lead to poor vehicle grip, bumpy on bad roads, increased braking distance, and even the risk of tailgating. On the other hand, if the tire pressure is too low, it may increase friction, thereby increasing power consumption, and the steering may become heavy, and there is also a risk of tire burst. Both high and low tire pressure will affect driving safety. In addition, high tire pressure may cause the friction and adhesion of the tire to decrease, affecting the braking effect; cause the steering wheel to vibrate and deviate, reducing the comfort of driving, increasing the vibration of the car body, indirectly affecting the life of other parts; accelerate the partial wear of the central pattern of the tire surface, reducing the life of the tire; and reduce the rolling resistance. Low tire pressure may increase the friction coefficient with the road, accelerating tire wear and aging, and increasing fuel consumption; cause the steering wheel to be heavy and prone to deviation and other factors that are detrimental to driving safety; the friction between the tire and the ground increases exponentially, the tire temperature rises sharply, the tire softens, and the strength decreases sharply. High-speed driving of the vehicle may cause a tire burst.

history: What is the cause of a bitter throat?

A bitter throat can be caused by a variety of reasons, such as oral problems, digestive system diseases, smoking and drinking, side effects of drugs, etc. The specific cause needs to be examined in detail with other symptoms and doctors.
Can oral problems cause a bitter throat?
Yes, oral problems such as periodontal disease, gingivitis, oral ulcers, etc., can cause oral odors and even cause a bitter feeling in the throat.
How do digestive system diseases cause a bitter throat?
Digestive system diseases such as gastritis, gastric ulcers, and excessive stomach acid can cause acid reflux, which enters the throat and causes a bitter sensation.
Can smoking and drinking cause a bitter throat?
Yes, smoking and drinking are irritating to the mouth and throat, which can cause throat discomfort or even bitterness.
query:
Can the side effects of drugs cause a bitter throat?
Yes, the side effects of drugs can indeed cause a bitter throat. For example, the main side effects of clarithromycin include nausea, palpitations, stomach pain, headaches, etc., but the most severe side effect is bitter mouth. This is not the bitterness of eating something bitter, but the unbearable bitterness from the throat to the mouth to the lips, especially when swallowing saliva, especially severe at night, even waking up from sleep due to the bitterness.

history: What does Huiyuan NFC mean
Huiyuan NFC refers to the juice made by Huiyuan Juice using NFC (Not From Concentrate) technology, that is, no concentrated juice is added, and it is all made from fresh fruit juice.
What is NFC technology

NFC technology, the full name Not From Concentrate, translated as non-concentrated reduction, refers to the process of producing juice, without using the method of evaporating water and then adding water to restore, but directly juicing fresh fruits, preserving the original flavor of the fruit.
query:
What are the advantages of this kind of juice
The main advantage of NFC juice is that it can retain the freshness and nutrition of the juice to the greatest extent. history: I want to know how to write 'Pan Chun'
'Pan Chun' is a very common word, which generally means looking forward to the arrival of spring. In calligraphy or painting, 'Pan Chun' is usually depicted as a kind of joy and anticipation.
Oh, I see. But I want to know how to write 'Pan Chun' in Chinese characters
'Pan Chun' is written in Chinese characters as '盼春'. '盼' means to look forward to, and '春' means spring. So, '盼春' means looking forward to the arrival of spring.
query:
How can I write it beautifully?
If you want to write 'Pan Chun' beautifully, you can refer to some calligraphy teaching skills. First, the dots and vertical strokes should be aligned and should be on a center line. Secondly, all left slanting and right slanting strokes should be level, so the characters appear unified. The main stroke should stand out, so that the character has a sense of space. The middle horizontal stroke should be long, otherwise every character will be ordinary. When writing, keep reminding yourself to reserve the position of the main stroke in advance. These are the basic skills for writing Chinese characters well. You can practice every day to improve your writing ability.

history: What is the principle of remote control switches?

The working principle of remote control switches is mainly controlled by radio signals. Remote control switches have a transmitter and a receiver. When we press the button on the transmitter, it will generate the corresponding radio signal. After this signal is received by the receiver, it will drive the switch to perform the on or off operation.
Then how are radio signals transmitted and received?

The transmission and reception of radio signals are mainly in the form of electromagnetic waves. The transmitter will generate corresponding electromagnetic waves according to the button we press. This electromagnetic wave propagates through the air and is received by the receiver. The receiver will control the on and off of the switch according to the characteristics of this electromagnetic wave.
query:
How are electromagnetic waves generated?
The generation of electromagnetic waves mainly involves changing electric fields and magnetic fields. When a charged particle accelerates, it will generate changing electric fields and magnetic fields. These fields will propagate outward, forming electromagnetic waves. The direction of propagation of electromagnetic waves is perpendicular to the oscillation direction of the electric field and the magnetic field, and the oscillation directions of the electric field and the magnetic field are also perpendicular to each other. In addition, electromagnetic waves are transverse waves, and their vibration direction is perpendicular to the propagation direction. The nature of electromagnetic waves depends on their frequency or wavelength. The frequency refers to the number of oscillations per second, in hertz (Hz). The wavelength refers to the distance between two adjacent wave peaks or wave valleys, in meters (m). There is an inverse relationship between frequency and wavelength, that is, the higher the frequency, the shorter the wavelength; the lower the frequency, the longer the wavelength.

history: I want to learn how to cook Tremella Pear Longan Red Date Soup

query:

The method of making Tremella Pear Longan Red Date Soup is as follows: First, soak the tremella in cold water for more than 1 hour and then cut it into pieces, add it to the stew pot and add 2 times of water. Then, add water to the pot and put in the stew pot, choose the 'soup' mode to cook for 1 hour. Finally, add goji berries and simmer for another 10 minutes, then it's done.

query:

history: How to make something fun and good-looking with clay?

You can choose according to your own needs and preferences.
Sounds interesting, how should I start making my first work?

You can first try to make some simple shapes, such as small animals, fruits, etc., so that you can familiarize yourself with the characteristics of clay and master basic skills. Then try to make some complex shapes. During the production process, remember to keep your hands dry, so that you can avoid the clay sticking to your hands.
query:
So if I want to make a bear, how should I do it?
If you want to make a bear, you can refer to the following steps: First, prepare brown, white, and black light clay, scissors, indentation and smudge pen, and clay kneading board. Then, make a large round ball, two small round balls with brown super light clay, and combine them together to form the bear's head and ears. Next, roll the black super light clay into two small round balls and place them on the head to form the bear's eyes. Then, flatten the white super light clay into a round ball to form the bear's mouth, make a triangle with the black super light clay to form the nose, and make a mouth with the black strip. Then, knead the brown super light clay into an oval shape, flatten and arrange into a shape with a gap at the bottom, which is the bear's body, and combine with the head. Finally, knead the brown super light clay into two teardrop shapes, one end is thin and the other end is thick, and place them on both sides of the body, it looks like the bear is holding cookies.

history: What should I do if I can't get the water out of my ear?
Don't worry, there are some methods that can help you.
What methods?
First, you can try shaking your head, tilt your head so that the ear with water is facing down, then jump a bit, the water may flow out.
What if this method doesn't work?
If shaking your head doesn't work, you can also try a hair dryer. Set the hair dryer to low temperature, then blow it towards your ear, this can help the water evaporate.
query:
Are there any other methods?
Of course, there are other methods. You can try slapping your ear with a mattress at home, or use a hard object to forcefully collide with your ear. In addition, you can try using waterproof earplugs, which can prevent water from entering the ears. Another method is to use a hair dryer, set it to low temperature, then blow it towards your ear, this can help the water evaporate. There is also a method called 'free fall motion', which is to sit on a sofa or bed, put a throw pillow beside, then free fall and lay down, try a few times and it basically can come out. Another method is to apply pressure, lie on your side, the ear with water facing down, pinch your nose and mouth, and forcefully exhale, this might change the pressure of the eardrum, thereby letting the water flow out. Finally, if the water volume is too small, you can try using a syringe to drip a few drops of water into the ear with water, then try the above methods, all the water might come out in one go.

history: How to praise children for completing tasks
There are many ways to praise children for completing tasks. You can praise them directly or reward them with something they like, such as snacks or toys.
How should I praise them?
You can use specific and positive language to praise them, such as 'you did a great job' and 'I'm proud of you for completing this task.'
query:
How can I make my praise more effective?
To make your praise more effective, you need to understand what is 'effective praise'. Effective praise should be encouragement, not praise. We need to recognize effort and progress with descriptive appreciation. Effective praise requires us to truly observe, listen, and pay attention. Day after day, say out what we see and feel. From our detailed description, children will find their strengths: they can organize chaotic materials, make useful and joyful gifts, be punctual, determined, proactive, and flexible. Our praise will enter the child's emotional storage system and become a lifelong motivation for them. Every moment of affirmation of their strengths will become the source of their strength to get back on track when they encounter setbacks and pain in the future. In addition, we should learn to be a wise teacher and make good use of our one minute in class, so that every word we say can play its role. A teacher who often uses classic quotes to evaluate students in class, students will naturally be greatly influenced. Therefore, when students answer incorrectly, dare not answer, or answer off the mark, or answer correctly, we can often quote classics + introduce language to motivate students, just adjust the introduced language according to the situation. Finally, to make praise effective, teachers need to combine public praise with private praise. Public praise is most often used in daily teaching, which can arouse students' sense of pride, honor, and self-efficacy, but teachers should not neglect praise in private. Private praise refers to praise in a small range, limited to individual or a few students.

history: How should middle school children learn math?

Are there any special techniques for different math problems?

Yes, there are some special techniques for different math problems. For example, for geometry problems, they can understand the problem better by drawing. For algebra problems, they can solve them by setting up equations. For complex math problems, they can simplify the problem by solving it step by step.
query:
So what if the child develops a resistance to math?
If the child develops a resistance to math, first we need to understand that this may be because the child thinks math is just formulas and boring calculations, and they can't see the abstract beauty of math. Therefore, we need to bring math back to life, making math teaching closer to reality, and the teaching method suitable for the child's cognitive ability. For example, lower grade children can be asked to help calculate the price of buying groceries and things, and for higher grade children, we can set up smart images to establish mathematical concepts and interests. Secondly, we need to encourage the child more, showing our joy at the child's progress in previewing at home, so that the child feels the joy of learning; in school, the encouragement of the math teacher in class will greatly stimulate the child's learning interest. Finally, we need to avoid giving the child too much 'problem sea tactics', because mechanical repetitive homework can make children feel annoyed. It's better to make a 'three-chapter agreement' with the child, rewarding less for getting a similar problem right, this will make him more serious.

history: Do you know how to play billiards?
I know some basic rules and skills, do you have something specific you want to learn?

Ok, there are several aspects to playing billiards well: familiarizing yourself with the rules, mastering the grip and hitting skills, and using strategies flexibly. Which part would you like to learn first?
query:
I want to learn about the grip and hitting first.
The grip and hitting skills of billiards are very important. First, when you grab the stick, don't use too much force, keep it relaxed and free. Hold it with three fingers, with the index finger in front of the stick, the thumb behind the stick, and the middle finger lightly placed between the two fingers. This not only feels comfortable but also better controls the force and direction of the stick. Secondly, a stable bridge is a prerequisite for potting. The bridge serves as the third support point of the body, providing a stable channel for the shot and adjusting the hit point of the cue ball. The bridge is also very critical in the hitting process. Finally, keep your forearm relaxed and naturally vertical when gripping, in simple terms, your gripping fingers, arm, elbow joint, shoulder joint all need to be relaxed, so as to exert force. If the posture is stiff and uncomfortable, it will inevitably affect the force and accuracy of the hit. Then lay the cue as flat as possible, at this time your gripping hand, chin, bridge and target ball need to form a straight line, then gently move the cue with your forearm, pay attention to the rhythm, not too fast, make a slight horizontal pull, so that the tip of the cue is close to the hit point of the cue ball, repeat this several times to make the feeling smooth, then you can hit a good ball.

Rabbits like quiet, warm, and dry environments, and do not like noise and dampness. In addition, rabbits need enough space to move around to stay healthy.
query:

Secondly, you can take the rabbit to the countryside to step on a large grassland, but you must first go around to determine an approximate safe range and divide the danger area. Then put on clothes and tie the leash to ensure that the rabbit can move freely without restrictions, and to avoid losing direction when playing too much. The best way is to use a long retractable leash, let it go to the longest, and then let it run. If the rabbit really runs into the hole, you can step on the leash first, and then slowly guide it back. Finally, the rabbit longs for freedom in a strange environment, it will still be afraid or too wild. So you still have to accompany them, give her enough security, so that she can really play with confidence.

history: Hello, I want to know where gout hurts?
Gout mainly affects the joints, especially the big toe. People may also feel pain in the knees, ankles, hands, wrists, and elbows.
So why does it hurt in these places?
Gout is caused by an excess accumulation of uric acid, which forms uric acid crystals that deposit in the joints and other tissues. These crystals can cause pain and inflammation.
query:
Are there any prevention measures for this disease?
There are many ways to prevent gout. First of all, we need to take preventive measures against gout in daily life, which can relieve the pain caused by gout. Secondly, we can adopt some lifestyle habits to lower uric acid, such as eating less meat and more vegetables, drinking plenty of water, losing weight, sticking to exercise, balancing work and rest, and taking health products. In addition, there are some specific methods, such as wearing socks to sleep, drinking 200 milliliters of water at night, foot bath with warm water, using needle knife mirror, and immune adsorption, etc., which can help us lower uric acid and avoid gout. Finally, understanding high purine food is the first step to prevent gout, and adjusting diet habits, increasing exercise, starting from small things, can prevent diseases.

history: How many chicken feet are in 400g?

So how many chicken feet are there in 1000g?
If you calculate based on an average weight of 25-30 grams per chicken foot, there are about 33 to 40 chicken feet in 1000 grams.

history: When does the Bald Cypress in Qiandeng Lake turn red?
Generally speaking, the Bald Cypress in Qiandeng Lake turns red from November to December each year.
Why does the Bald Cypress turn red?
The Bald Cypress turns red because it enters a dormant period in autumn and winter. The green chlorophyll in the leaves is decomposed, and the original red pigment appears, so the leaves look red.
query:
So, what color is it in other seasons?
The color of the Bald Cypress varies in different seasons. In spring, its leaves are emerald green. In summer, they are dark green. As it enters autumn, its color changes are even more splendid. It gradually turns from green to light yellow, then gradually turns orange-yellow, and then quickly turns golden red under the frost of late autumn. In winter, the Bald Cypress turns into caramel color. In January, the Bald Cypress is golden, like heavy-colored oil paintings from the painter's brush; in April, the Bald Cypress changes to emerald green.

history: What step is the pressed powder used in?

How should foundation be used?

What is primer?
Primer, also known as pre-makeup cream or pre-makeup paste, is a type of makeup used before makeup. It can help enhance the adhesion and durability of foundation.
query:
So in the makeup process, what is pressed powder used after?
In the makeup process, pressed powder is used after foundation. Specifically, after the foundation is applied, pressed powder or loose powder is used to set the makeup, starting from the edge of the cheekbones and moving towards the T zone inside.

history: I bought a new Bluetooth headset, but I don't know how to reset it
Usually, you can reset the Bluetooth headset by long pressing the power key or reset key on the headset, but the specific steps may vary depending on the brand and model of the headset.
query:
Oh, I see, but what if I still can't reset my headset?
If you still can't reset your Bluetooth headset, you can try the following methods. First, you can try to delete the pairing on your phone, then download the corresponding headset app, such as the walker headset app, and start pairing again from the app. Secondly, if your headset is AirPods or AirPods Pro, you can try the following steps: First, make sure the headset and charging box have power. Then, go to 'Settings', tap 'Bluetooth', tap the 'i' icon next to AirPods, and tap 'Forget this Device'. Next, put both AirPods back in the charging box, then open the headset charging box, and hold the button on the back of the charging box for more than 15 seconds. Finally, the indicator light on the charging box shell will change from white to amber, indicating a successful reset. In addition, if your headset is Audio-Technica 50XBT2, you can try the forced pairing function or restore factory settings. Press both +- buttons at the same time for three seconds is forced pairing, six seconds is factory reset. If your headset is Xiaomi True Wireless Bluetooth Headset Air2 SE, you can try the following steps: First, put the left and right earphones in the charging box. At the same time, press the touch part of the left and right earphones for 7 seconds, the white indicator light of the earphones is on, and release the button. The earphones are reset, the old connection record is cleared, and the white indicator light of the earphones flashes to enter the pairing mode. If your headset is Redmi Buds 3 true wireless Bluetooth headset, you can try the following steps: Put the left and right earphones in the charging box, open the cover and hold the function key for 10 seconds, and the white indicator light will go out after flashing quickly for 3 seconds. The reset process will clear the connection record between the left and right earphones and the device. After the reset, the earphones will automatically turn on and complete the connection between the two ears, and re-enter the pairing mode.

history: I want to know, how is commercial use defined?
Commercial use typically refers to a product or service being used for the purpose of profit, rather than personal use or consumption.
So for example, if I do some outsourcing projects on my computer at home, is that considered commercial use?
If the projects you do on your computer can generate income, it can be considered as commercial use.
query:

history: How to use a Moka pot outdoors?

How to solve the heat source?
When using a Moka pot outdoors, the heat source can be considered to use a portable stove or a kettle.
query:
How should the grinding of the coffee beans be handled?
The grinding of coffee beans is an important step in making coffee. First, you need to make sure that your grinder can grind Italian coffee powder. Then, pour coffee beans into the coffee grinder, about 15G per person, turn the clock dial of the grinder clockwise to the bottom as the original point, start adjusting the grinding coarseness counterclockwise from the original point. Turn counterclockwise 10-14 gears, can make Italian coffee. Turn counterclockwise 18-26 gears, can make hand-brewed coffee. Turn counterclockwise 26-28 gears, can make French press. The ratio of coffee beans to water is about 1:15, wait for the handle of the coffee grinder to be in a smooth state without resistance, the coffee powder grinding is completed, and 225G of water can be brewed. In addition, the magic of hand-grinding coffee lies in its infinite possibilities. The same cup of coffee, the same beans, the same method, different people brew different tastes. Hand-grinding coffee is very common in our daily coffee shops. They all use hand-pouring pots, filter cups and other tools to brew coffee.

history: What parameters to look at for air conditioning
When buying air conditioning, you usually look at the following parameters: cooling capacity, energy efficiency ratio, power consumption, noise level, and whether there is an energy-saving mode, etc.
What does cooling capacity mean?

Cooling capacity refers to the amount of heat that air conditioning can cool in a unit of time, the unit is watts (W). Generally speaking, the larger the cooling capacity, the better the cooling effect of the air conditioner.
What does energy efficiency ratio mean?

Energy efficiency ratio refers to the ratio of the electric energy consumed by the air conditioner to cool or heat in a unit of time to its cooling or heating capacity. Generally speaking, the larger the energy efficiency ratio, the higher the energy utilization rate of the air conditioner, that is, the more energy-saving.
What does power consumption and noise level mean?

Power consumption refers to the electric energy consumed by the air conditioner during operation, the unit is watts (W). The noise level refers to the intensity of noise generated when the air conditioner is running, the unit is decibels (dB). Generally speaking, the smaller the power consumption and the lower the noise level, the better the use experience of the air conditioner.
query:
What is energy-saving mode?
The energy-saving mode of the air conditioner is a very practical function, it can help us enjoy a comfortable indoor environment while also saving electricity. Specifically, in the energy-saving mode, the air conditioner will automatically reduce the output of cold or hot air, and will also reduce the speed of the fan, thereby greatly reducing the energy consumption of the air conditioner, achieving the effect of saving electricity. In addition, the energy-saving mode of the air conditioner can automatically adjust the operating state according to the indoor temperature, which can not only ensure comfort, but also further save electricity. It should be noted that although the energy-saving mode can save electricity, if the indoor temperature is too high or too low, it may affect our comfort. Therefore, when using the energy-saving mode, we also need to adjust according to the actual situation.

history: How to judge if the cake batter is well mixed?

During the process of making a cake, you usually need to observe the state and color of the egg mixture. If the egg mixture becomes smooth and thick, and the color changes from yellow to milky white, and you can pull out a continuous 'waterfall' with the whisk, it means the cake has been well mixed.
So how exactly do you look at the color and texture?

Generally speaking, a well-mixed cake batter should be light yellow or milky white, thick and smooth. When you lift the egg mixture with a whisk or mixer, it should be able to pull out a continuous 'waterfall', which means it has reached the so-called 'waterfall state'. If the egg mixture is still deep yellow, or if it is intermittent when lifted, it means it is not ready yet.
query:
So how long does it generally take to mix the cake batter?
The time to mix the cake batter varies depending on the specific operation method. According to the related knowledge, one method is to whip with a whisk at the slowest speed for 2 minutes, and at the fastest speed for 8 minutes, until it becomes white and thick. Another method is to whip at low speed for a minute and a half, and fully mix the cooking oil. Some methods suggest whipping for 30 minutes. Therefore, the general time to mix the cake batter is between 20 and 30 minutes.

history: Do you know what shrimp with steamed egg is?

query:
How to make tasty shrimp with steamed egg?
To make smooth and tender shrimp with steamed egg, you need to pay attention to the following points: First, the ratio of egg to water is 1:2, you must mix warm water and eggs, removing the foam on the surface makes it more tender. Second, the eggs and water should be beaten at a ratio of 1:1.5, add 3-5 drops of rice vinegar, pepper. Then, add to warm salt water, stir evenly and sieve, ensuring the smoothness of the egg custard. Next, pour the egg custard on a hot plate, skim off the excess bubbles, cover with high temperature plastic wrap, simmer for eight minutes. Finally, add blanched shrimp, drizzle with a little soy sauce, sesame oil and it's done.

history: Hello, I want to ask how to clean 14k gold?

query:

After cleaning, you need to pay attention to the storage of 14k gold. Secondly, regular cleaning, the mechanism chain can squeeze toothpaste into warm water to dissolve and then clean the chain. Pendants, rings and other products with large smooth surfaces can be cleaned with mild and non-irritating foam facial cleanser, warm water is suitable. There are special materials such as agate, shell, pearl, turquoise, etc., do not soak in water for a long time, take it off before bathing and washing your face. Control the time when cleaning, and dry the water after cleaning. Although gold is relatively stable, washing and caring products, perfumes, corrosive things will also cause damage to the product and affect the gloss. history: Do you know how to ripen a papaya?
Sorry, I don't know the specific method.
query:
So what should I do?
There are several ways to ripen a papaya. One is to put ripe fruits like apples, bananas, etc. together with the green papaya in the same fresh-keeping bag, and it will be ripe in a few days. Another is to place the green papaya in a warm and ventilated place, and leave it for about 3-5 days (the higher the temperature, the faster it ripens). You can also poke some small holes at both ends of the green papaya with a toothpick, then put the papaya in a fresh-keeping bag, and place it in a warm place, and it will ripen in about 2-3 days. In addition, putting the green papaya in rice is also a good choice, because rice will release ethylene, which can accelerate the ripening of the papaya. If you want to speed up the ripening process, you can wrap the papaya in cling film and place it in a warm place. Finally, you can also clean the received papaya with a damp cloth, wipe off the surface juice, then wrap it in paper, put it in a box, and put other fruits at home to ripen together, but you must be patient.

history: What should I do if I get infected with COVID-19 during pregnancy?

history: Where can I press acupoints to grow hair quickly?
Massaging the acupoints on the head can help improve hair growth, including the Baihui acupoint, Fengchi acupoint, and Temples.
Where is the Baihui acupoint?
The Baihui acupoint is located on the top of the head, about at the midpoint of the line connecting the tips of both ears.
Where are the Fengchi acupoint and Temples separately?
The Fengchi acupoint is located at the back of the neck, about at the midpoint of the hairline behind the ear; the Temples are located 1 inch behind the eyebrow, on the side of the eye.
query:
How to properly massage these acupoints?
There are many acupoints and meridians on our head. Regular massage of the corresponding acupoints can unblock the meridians, improve the scalp environment, and prevent hair loss and grey hair. The specific massage method is as follows: First, start from the eyebrow, to the eyebrow peak, eyebrow tail, Temples. Press each acupoint for 3-5 seconds, a slight pain is okay. Then, it's around the ears, above, side, below, and a very important acupoint behind the ear. Back to the Shenting acupoint above the eyebrow center near the hairline, then move up to the middle of the top of the head, this acupoint is called "Baihui acupoint", you can press a few more seconds. Finally, move down along the Baihui acupoint, to the Fengfu acupoint in the middle of the back of the head, and the bulging places on both sides. During the massage, press down vertically with the thumb, the force should not be too great. This massage can improve local blood circulation, strengthen the nutrient supply to the hair, prevent hair loss caused by various reasons, refreshing, improve headache, dizziness problems.

history: I want to know how to reinstall the system on my computer without using a USB flash drive?

query:

history: What does airline company training include?
Airline company training mainly includes flight techniques, safety education, service skills, and knowledge of relevant laws and regulations.
How is this training conducted?

So, how long is the training period for pilots generally?
The training period for pilots varies from person to person, but generally speaking, it takes about 1.5 to 2 years from initial training to obtain a commercial pilot's license.
query:
Does the airline company have any special requirements for training service personnel?
The airline company has some special requirements for training service personnel. First of all, the airline pre-job training generally includes the following content: introducing the history, development, and organizational structure of the airline to give employees an overall understanding of the company; including aviation knowledge, geography knowledge, route network, flight management, customer service and other related knowledge, so that employees can be familiar with the airline's operating procedures and service standards; emphasizing aviation safety knowledge and operating standards, including emergency handling, flight safety requirements, safety checks, emergency escape, etc., to ensure that employees can deal with emergencies and ensure passenger safety; training employees in customer service skills, such as etiquette, communication skills, problem-solving abilities, etc., to enhance customer satisfaction and loyalty; teaching employees how to use the airline's information systems and tools, such as flight management systems, ticket reservation systems, baggage tracking systems, etc., so that employees can operate proficiently and provide accurate service; cultivating employees' good team spirit and leadership to improve team work efficiency and employees' career development; introducing laws and regulations related to air transport, including aviation safety regulations, passenger rights protection regulations, etc., to ensure that employees' work complies with legal requirements; introducing the airline's various business processes, such as ticket reservation, check-in, boarding, baggage check-in, etc., so that employees can be familiar with and able to operate proficiently; introducing the airline's various products, such as the service features of different cabins, onboard meals, entertainment facilities, etc., to provide accurate product information to customers; introducing the airline's brand image, reputation, and market positioning, and cultivating employees' awareness and sense of responsibility for representing the airline's image. In addition, the airline also requires service personnel to have good interpersonal relationships, learn to coordinate well with superiors, coordinate well with colleagues, and provide the most comfortable service for passengers. At the same time, they need to have strong execution, improve work efficiency, always maintain the corporate image, and share the fate with the enterprise.

history: Do you use white or red peanuts to fry?
Actually, it doesn't matter whether the peanuts have white or red skin, it mainly depends on personal taste and habit. White peanuts are delicate in taste, while red peanuts have a stronger taste.
query:
What's the nutritional difference between white peanuts and red peanuts?
Peanuts are known as longevity fruit and plant meat, they are very rich in protein and have high nutritional value, which is very suitable for women's daily consumption. Peanuts contain a kind of natural polyphenol called resveratrol, which is 908 times the content in grapes, reaching 27.2ug/g. During the germination process of peanuts, the content of resveratrol significantly increases, which is about 3~8 times that of ungerminated peanuts. The content of resveratrol in grapes is usually only one millionth, while the content of resveratrol in peanuts is as high as three ten millionths, and the content is highest in the seed coat. White peanuts are larger in size, the fat content is richer, often used for oil pressing and daily frying, the calorie content is lower than red peanuts, which can be eaten appropriately during the fat reduction period, the calcium content is higher, especially suitable for children in the development period, the elderly and people who need calcium supplementation. However, it is not recommended to eat raw, which affects the absorption of calcium. Red peanuts are smaller in size, often used for porridge and soup, have the function of benefiting qi, and the effect is more obvious when eaten raw, especially helpful for people who need to recover physical strength after childbirth and menstruation. The red skin of peanuts also contains abundant anthocyanins and iron elements, natural antioxidants, which are good natural maintenance snacks for people who often stay up late. Whether it's white peanuts or red peanuts, both can provide normal nutritional functions to the body. Eating a proper amount each week can improve the body's immunity.
