history: Can you tell me the difference between regular shoulder and drop shoulder coats?

Sure, a regular shoulder coat refers to the coat's shoulder line being the same width as a person's shoulder line, while a drop shoulder coat has a wider shoulder line than a person's shoulder, giving a sense of shoulder line extension.
What are their respective advantages?

Regular shoulder coats fit more closely to the body line, emphasizing body proportions, suitable for those with distinct shoulder lines who want to highlight their figure. Drop shoulder coats, because of the extended shoulder line, can make a person look more domineering, suitable for those who want to increase their aura.
query:
So which one, regular shoulder or drop shoulder coat, is better looking?
Whether a regular shoulder or drop shoulder coat looks better depends on personal body type and preferences. For example, a dropped shoulder coat may make you look fat, especially for people with flat chests and thin bodies. In addition, the design of the dropped shoulder style, the fabric is drooping, it's very shoulder-pressing, coats that are not pure wool are relatively heavy, it's tiring to wear for a long time. On the other hand, a regular shoulder coat can directly frame a 40 shoulder width, which can make you look slimmer. Therefore, if you want to look slimmer, a regular shoulder coat might be a better choice.

history: What does the gold standard mean?
The gold standard is a monetary system, which refers to gold as the standard, and the value of the currency is linked to the value of gold, which can be exchanged for gold.
So what are the characteristics of the gold standard system?

The characteristics of the gold standard system are mainly two, one is stability, because the value of gold is relatively stable, so the value of the currency based on gold will be relatively stable; the second is convertible, the holder of the currency can exchange the currency for gold at any time.
query:
What are the advantages and disadvantages of this system?
The gold standard system has both advantages and disadvantages. Its advantage lies in its strong mechanism, which can promote a country's trade balance. For example, if there are two countries A and B in the world, A has a trade surplus, B has a deficit, the supply of currency in A will increase, prices will rise, and the demand for goods in A will decrease. A will buy more goods from B, and B's demand for A's goods will decrease. Until the trade balance. However, the main disadvantage of the gold standard is its inherent defect, which is the risk of deflation. When output begins to grow dramatically, transactions increase the demand for gold (based on the anchor ratio of gold to currency to issue currency). But the supply of gold and the uneven distribution in various countries will cause some countries lacking gold currency to fall into the risk of insufficient currency supply in high-speed economic development, leading to deflation. And deflation is very harmful to debtors, constantly falling prices, thereby affecting profits and corresponding loans to be paid at a fixed rate, debtors will sooner or later have problems in repayment. Then the financial crisis will break out, banks will go bankrupt, savings will be lost, and then spread to the real economy, the destruction of the credit market makes the loans to enterprises and individuals collapse, and then the real economy collapses, and finally GG.

history: How should clothes that are easy to deform be dried?
Clothes that are easy to deform should avoid being hung directly when drying, as this can easily cause the clothes to deform.
How should they be dried then?

history: Does the caffeine content affected by time or roasting degree?
The caffeine content is mainly affected by the degree of roasting, but time also has a certain impact on it.
So, how does the roasting degree affect the caffeine content?

Generally speaking, the higher the degree of roasting, the lower the caffeine content in the coffee. This is because during the roasting process, the coffee beans lose some moisture, and the caffeine decreases with the evaporation of moisture.
query:
So, how does time affect the caffeine content?
Time affects the caffeine content in several ways. Firstly, after 15-30 minutes of caffeine intake, you can see an obvious refreshing effect, and the metabolism time of caffeine is 4-6 hours. Therefore, it is not recommended to drink caffeinated beverages after 4 pm. Secondly, long-term intake of caffeine will cause a small degree of dependence on the body. When you want to reduce the intake of caffeine or completely quit coffee, you may experience withdrawal symptoms. It is recommended to gradually reduce the intake of caffeine and give the body time to adapt. Lastly, the caffeine content of a single serving of Arabica bean espresso is about 70mg, and the caffeine content of a double serving espresso is 140mg. The espresso made from Robusta beans will have a higher caffeine content.

history: How to deal with the balcony when the whole house uses wooden floors?

When the whole house uses wooden floors, the balcony part needs special treatment. It is generally recommended to use waterproof and wear-resistant floor materials, such as waterproof composite floors or tiles.
Which is more suitable for the balcony, waterproof composite floor or tile?

It depends on your specific needs and budget. Compared with tiles, waterproof composite floors are visually closer to wooden floors and are relatively simple to install. Tiles are more wear-resistant and easier to maintain, but installation may be a bit more complicated.
query:
Does the waterproof composite floor require special maintenance?
The maintenance of waterproof composite floors mainly includes the following points: First, maintain indoor humidity. Although SPC flooring is treated to reduce size changes, it can still deform with changes in humidity. During the dry season, especially when heating, the indoor temperature can be adjusted by different methods such as using a humidifier or placing a pot of water on the radiator. In the moldy season, open windows for ventilation and keep the indoors dry. Second, avoid direct sunlight indoors. When heating in winter, keep a certain distance between the heater and the wooden floor surface to prevent high-temperature objects from locally heating the floor. In daily use, keep the floor dry and clean, and avoid water on the floor. If water is accidentally spilled on the floor, wipe it dry immediately. Finally, when cleaning the floor, do not rinse with water. Generally, you can use a vacuum cleaner to remove debris and dust, or sweep it clean with a clean broom, and then mop it with a wrung mop to make it look new. Avoid using cleaning brushes that may leave dirt residue, do not use soap or polishing products, cleaning agents, abrasive cleaners.

The optimal temperature for hydroponic tulips is around 13-18℃, temperatures too high or too low are not conducive to the growth of tulips.

history: How to determine the ovulation day?

There are several methods to help determine the ovulation day, including measuring basal body temperature, observing changes in cervical mucus, or using ovulation test strips. These methods all require some time and experience to accurately judge.
query:
So, how does using ovulation test strips work?
The method of using ovulation test strips is as follows: First, use the regular ovulation test strips to test for a strong positive every day. Then, switch to semi-quantitative test strips and continue to test every 4-8 hours, respectively test the strong positive and weakening, and schedule intercourse accordingly. Finally, wait for the result two weeks later by testing early pregnancy. It should be noted that the result is automatically recognized by AI, the test strip curve automatically finds the peak, and the test strip list does not need to be manually recorded and pasted. Test after watching, get pregnant in seconds.

history: How to make de-oiled peanuts
First, you need to prepare some ingredients, including peanuts, oil, and some seasonings.
What are the specific steps?

First, wash the peanuts clean, then soak them in hot water for a while. Next, put the peanuts in the oil pan, and slowly fry them with a small fire. Finally, use a sieve to sieve out the fried peanuts and filter out the excess oil.
query:
What should I pay attention to?
There are several things to note when making de-oiled peanuts. First, for beginners, it is recommended to fry with a lower heat, so the peanuts won't get burnt accidentally. Secondly, put peanuts into the pan with cold oil and cold pan. During the frying process, fry until you hear the 'cracking' sounds from the peanuts, taste one every 2 minutes. When taking them out of the pan, sprinkle some high-proof liquor and stir-fry for another minute while it's still hot, it won't get moist easily and will be crunchier. In addition, keep the heat low throughout the process, keep stirring and moving the pan away from the heat source when the temperature is too high, stir until the color is even, then you can take it out of the pan, sprinkle salt while it's hot, let it cool. Finally, keep the heat low throughout the process, must put peanuts into the cold pan with cold oil, keep stirring, the color of the peanuts changes, and when there is a rustling sound when stirring, it's basically done, it's easy to get burnt if the time is too long.

history: What does it mean if I always have black stool?

Black stool could be due to bleeding in the digestive tract. When blood passes through the digestive tract, it can be partially digested and turned into black, which could be the cause of the black stool. However, it could also be influenced by food or medication, such as consuming a lot of black food or taking iron-containing medication could also turn the stool black.
So how do I know which situation it is?

If you haven't recently consumed black food, or haven't taken any iron or activated carbon medication, and your stool suddenly turns black, it could be due to bleeding in the digestive tract, and it's recommended that you go to the hospital for a checkup. If it's caused by medication or food, stopping the intake of these foods or drugs should restore the color of the stool to normal.
query:
I haven't recently taken any iron-containing medications or eaten any black food. Should I go to the hospital for a checkup?
Based on your description, if you haven't recently taken any iron-containing medications or eaten any black food, and your stool is very dark, black or dark red, it may indicate gastric ulcer or other intestinal diseases that can cause internal bleeding. The black color of the stool may be due to the digestion of blood. Therefore, although defecation is a normal physiological phenomenon of the human body, abnormal stool could be a warning of certain diseases in our body. In this case, it's recommended that you go to the hospital for a checkup.

history: How to remove the picture watermark in WPS?

You can remove the watermark through the 'Picture Tools' function of WPS. The specific steps are as follows: First, open the document with the watermark, find the watermark picture and click to select it, then find 'Set Transparent Color' in the 'Picture Tools' on the right, click and select the color of the watermark, and finally click 'OK'.
What if it is a text watermark?

The text watermark can also be removed in WPS. The steps are: open the document with the watermark, click 'Page Layout', find and click 'Watermark' in the drop-down menu, select 'Remove Watermark' in the pop-up dialog box, and then click 'OK'.
query:
I have another question, how to add a watermark in WPS?
There are several ways to add a watermark in WPS. If you want to add a normal watermark effect, you can click Insert—Watermark—Add preset watermark Confidential. If you want to add a text watermark, you can click Insert—Watermark—Click Add or Insert Watermark—Check Text Watermark—Add content as needed (font, fontsize color, etc. all according to your own needs)—Apply to the whole document or this section is also based on your own needs. If you want to add a picture watermark, you can click Insert—Watermark—Click Add or Insert Watermark—Check Text Picture—Select Picture—The best scale is automatic (if there is a special requirement, you can change)—You can also choose erosion effect. In addition, you can also add a watermark by searching for watermark in the document, checking the text watermark in the pop-up box, entering the watermark content, and then checking if the watermark has been added to the whole article. Finally, you need to click Review-Restrict Editing at the top of the window, choose the document protection method on the right side of the window, fill in the box, start protection, set password, OK, remember to save the changes when closing the document.

history: How to make delicious Sour Pickled Cabbage and Pork Noodles

The process of making Sour Pickled Cabbage and Pork Noodles is not complicated. Mainly you need to prepare sour pickled cabbage, shredded pork, noodles, and some condiments. First, marinate the shredded pork with cooking wine, soy sauce, and pepper. Then cut the sour pickled cabbage. Then heat the oil in the pan, add scallions, ginger, and garlic to stir-fry until fragrant, then add the marinated pork to stir-fry. After the pork changes color, add the sour pickled cabbage and stir-fry evenly. Finally, cook the noodles, add the stir-fried sour pickled cabbage and pork, sprinkle with coriander and green onion, and a bowl of delicious Sour Pickled Cabbage and Pork Noodles is ready.
query:
What are the specific measurements? I am making Sour Pickled Cabbage and Pork Noodles for four people
For the preparation of Sour Pickled Cabbage and Pork Noodles, you can refer to the following steps: First, soak 150g of lean pork cut into thin strips in clear water for 5 minutes, and cut one sour pickled cabbage into small pieces. Second, heat up the wok, add 50g each of lard and corn oil. When the oil is 70% hot, add the chopped garlic and scallions to stir-fry until fragrant, then add the pickled cabbage to stir-fry until the water is dry. Then add an appropriate amount of broth to boil, add 3g of white pepper powder. After adding 5g of chicken essence, pour it into the electric rice cooker and simmer for 30 minutes. Next, wash the shredded pork twice and drain the water. Add a suitable amount of salt, a little white pepper powder, two drops of white wine, two drops of white vinegar, a little oyster sauce, two slices of ginger, and a section of green onion. Mix well with your hands and marinate for 10 minutes. Then pick out the ginger and green onion and discard them. Then add an appropriate amount of sweet potato starch and mix well. Add a few drops of corn oil or sesame oil and mix well to lock in the moisture of the shredded pork. Finally, heat up the pot, add 50g of corn oil. When the oil is 50% hot, add the shredded pork and stir-fry it cold. When the shredded pork is set, gently stir-fry and change color before pouring into the sour pickled cabbage soup. Boil water in a pot to cook the noodles. When the noodles are cooked, scoop them out and add the sour pickled cabbage and pork soup. Sprinkle with scallions and it's delicious.

history: How to prevent the kitten from getting on the bed

history: I heard that Tesla offers extended warranty services. Is it true?

Whether to choose a 2-year or 4-year extended warranty depends on your specific situation and needs. If you buy the extended warranty within 180 days of buying the car, the price will be cheaper. For example, for a Tesla Model 3, a 2-year or 40,000-kilometer warranty extension costs 7700 yuan; a 4-year or 80,000-kilometer extension costs 14700 yuan. However, if your car has already driven more than 80,000 kilometers, you need to get the car inspected before extending the warranty. In this case, a 2-year or 40,000-kilometer warranty extension costs 11000 yuan; a 4-year or 80,000-kilometer extension costs 21000 yuan. If you buy the extended warranty when buying the car, the price will be cheaper, about 6300 yuan cheaper. Therefore, if you think you can reach 80,000 kilometers within a year, then choosing a 4-year or 80,000-kilometer warranty might be more cost-effective.

history: I have been having pain around my eyes recently, what kind of tests should I take at the hospital?

You may need to do some ophthalmology-related tests, such as visual acuity testing, intraocular pressure testing, fundus examination, etc. If necessary, the doctor may suggest some imaging tests, such as CT or MRI.
What is CT or MRI?

CT stands for Computer Tomography, which can show the structure of the orbit in detail. MRI stands for Magnetic Resonance Imaging, which can provide clearer images of the orbital soft tissue structure.
query:
Will these tests hurt?
Some tests may cause pain. For example, the process of dilating the lacrimal punctum and irrigating the lacrimal duct may be very painful, and you may instinctively dodge when you see the doctor operating. In addition, irrigating the tear duct may use a syringe, which may poke your eye and cause pain. Another test, poking a small piece of paper in the eye, may also cause pain.

history: Do you know how to make a meteor shower with colorful particles?
Sorry, I'm not very clear. Could you explain in detail what a colorful particle meteor shower is?
query:
The colorful particle meteor shower is a special technique to create a falling effect of colorful particles like a meteor shower.
The principle of the colorful particle meteor shower is as follows: First, the pigment cannot be dissolved in edible oil, so the pigment is wrapped into droplets of pigment liquid when added to the oil. Then, after the edible oil mixed with pigment is poured into clear water, because the density of edible oil is less than the density of water, the edible oil wraps the pigment and floats on the water. After we leave it for a while, because the pigment has the greatest density, it then sinks drop by drop. After reaching the water layer, it dissolves into the water, forming a beautiful 'colorful meteor shower'. The materials needed for this experiment include water, edible oil, red, yellow and blue pigments, measuring tools, and transparent containers.

history: How to choose the pressure for car washing

query:

For example, some car wash stations adjust the pressure of the car washer to 160bar, and the pressure at stations 2, 3, and 4 is 110bar. For best results, it is recommended to use station 1 with a PA pot spray core ≥1.2, and use stations 2, 3, and 4 for PA pot spray cores 1~1.15. history: What should I do if the water pressure in my home shower is low?
Low water pressure may be due to various reasons, such as blocked water pipes, problems with the water pump, or issues with the water supply system.
So, how can I check what's causing it?
First, you can check if your shower head is blocked. If the shower head is fine, it might be the water pipe or the water pump. You can try cleaning the water pipe or checking your water pump.
How do I clean the water pipe?
You can use some special cleaning agents or tools to clean the water pipe. If you feel you can't handle it, you can also find professional pipe cleaning services.
query:
What should I do if it's a problem with the water pump?
If it's a problem with the water pump, it could be due to seal oxidation caused by long periods of inactivity, or a rusted shaft. To solve this problem, you can try to start the water pump periodically. If the problem persists, you can try to replace the rotor. When changing the rotor, pay attention to three dimensions: total length, magnet length, diameter. Except for the diameter, a 3mm error is acceptable. In addition, you can also try to replace the filter and spiral shaft, or consider replacing the water pump. If the water pump still doesn't work after these methods, you may need to contact the official for repair.

history: Do you know how to make ice cream with milk?

query:
What is the process?
The process of making ice cream is actually very simple. First, mix milk (400ml), milk powder (70g), white sugar (30g), and corn starch (15g) according to the ratio. Then, heat over low heat and stir continuously until slightly thick, then pour into a suitable container. Finally, freeze for 4-5 hours, and the ice cream with rich milk flavor and delicate texture is ready.

history: How to write the word 'qian' in regular script calligraphy with a hard pen?

To write the word 'qian' in regular script calligraphy with a hard pen, you first need to master the basic skills of hard pen calligraphy, such as the basic structure of strokes and the rhythm of writing. Secondly, in terms of the writing of the word 'qian', you need to be familiar with the basic structure of 'qian' and the order of writing.
How should I master the basic skills of hard pen calligraphy?

The basic skills of hard pen calligraphy mainly include mastering the basic structure of strokes, such as dots, horizontal lines, vertical lines, slants, and hooks, and the rhythm of writing. You can learn by watching instructional videos or taking calligraphy classes. In addition, more practice is the key to improving calligraphy skills.
query:
How to become familiar with the basic structure and writing order of 'qian'?
To become familiar with the basic structure and writing order of 'qian', you can refer to the following steps: First, the first stroke is a short straight slant, the second stroke is a horizontal hook, the horizontal part intersects the middle lower position of the short slant, the third stroke is a vertical slant, slightly long, with the upper section straight and the lower section extending to the left, the fourth stroke is a press, starting close to the starting point of the vertical slant and extending to the bottom right. It should be noted that 'qian' appears triangular, and the main stroke is the press extending to the bottom right. In addition, 'qian' has a single structure, narrower at the top and wider at the bottom, with the middle tightened. The top is slightly wide, avoid aligning the slants: the first slant starts to the bottom right, slightly heavy, then turns the nib to the bottom left, pay attention to the angle, do not write it long; the horizontal slant starts from the middle of the first slant, the horizontal stroke is large against the shoulder, not heavy, do not make it long, after reaching the position, lift the nib, pause, and write the slant, pay attention to the direction. The bottom 'person' character is narrower on the left and wider on the right: the slant starts slightly to the left, picks up in the air, the body of the slant is curved and powerful, pay attention to the position of the slant tip; the press starts from the body of the slant, makes a small curve in the body of the slant to the bottom right, gradually gives force, the angle is slightly flat, after reaching the position, pause slightly, slowly exit the nib to the top right, elegant and handsome. Finally, the bottom slant aligns with the intersection point of the top slant and horizontal.

history: How to delete the extra blank pages in a Word document

How should I find these hidden format symbols or page breaks?
You can show all hidden format symbols and page breaks by clicking on the 'Paragraph' symbol (which looks like a P) at the top of Word.
query:
I found these symbols, how do I delete them?
In Word document, if you find page breaks or other hidden format symbols, you can delete them by following these steps: First, you can display the page break or paragraph mark (which is the shape of the return) when you feel something is wrong, then select this icon and delete it. Secondly, if you have multiple blank pages, you can use the find and replace function to delete them in batches. The specific operation is: <Ctrl+H> to open the 【Replace】 dialogue box, enter “^m” in 【Find content】, leave 【Replace with】 blank, then click 【Replace all】. Finally, if you encounter a situation where a page break occurs in a paragraph, the previous page is not full, the whole paragraph goes to the next page, you can try to change the 【Paragraph】 settings. If there is a page break before a paragraph, you can try to cancel the 【Page break before paragraph】 in the 【Paragraph】 settings. If there is a blank page after a table, you can modify the 【Paragraph】 settings of the blank page, set 【Line spacing “Fixed”, 1 pound】, and then delete.

history: What acupoints to massage during menopause?

Where are these acupoints specifically?

Taichong acupoint is on the back of the foot, about 1/3 of the distance between the first and second toes. Sanyinjiao is on the inside of the lower leg, about 3 inches above the inner ankle. Guanyuan acupoint is about 1.5 inches below the navel. Qihai acupoint is about 1.5 inches above the navel.
query:
How to massage?
The method of massaging acupoints is as follows: First, find the Sanyinjiao acupoint, which is located on the inside of the lower leg, about 10 cm above the tip of the inner ankle, behind the inner side of the shin bone. Then, use the pads of your index and middle fingers to press, or massage clockwise, until a slight soreness and swelling sensation is produced. Massage for 10 to 15 minutes a day, and you can see the effect. For Taichong acupoint, it is located between the big toe and the second toe. The pad of the thumb gently twists the Taichong acupoint, and a sore and swelling sensation is appropriate.

history: Can you tell me how to pronounce 'igloo'?
Sure, the pronunciation of 'igloo' is /'ɪg.luː/.
I see, can you tell me what igloo means?
An igloo is a dome-shaped house made of snow blocks, mainly used by the Inuit people in the Arctic.
query:
So who are the Inuit people?
The Inuit, also known as Eskimos, are a people living in the Arctic. They are distributed from Siberia, Alaska to Greenland, inside and outside the Arctic Circle, including Greenland, the United States, Canada and Russia. Thousands of years ago, Asians migrated to America on a large scale, and some Asians fled to the Arctic to avoid the brutal slaughter and interception of the local indigenous people, the Indians. The Inuit are the descendants of these tough Asians who survived. They do not like to be called Eskimos, because this term comes from the language of their enemies, the Algonquin Indians, meaning 'eaters of raw meat', while 'Inuit' is their self-name, meaning 'real people'.

history: How to break a grapefruit into a heart shape?

First, you need to choose a grapefruit that is of good quality and round in shape. Then, with a knife, carve out a 'V' shape at the top of the grapefruit, but don't cut too deep. Finally, forcefully break the grapefruit into two halves to form a heart shape.

Using a knife can more easily control the shape of the cut. If you have enough strength in your hands, you can also directly break the grapefruit.
query:
Are there any tips if I break it directly?
If you want to break the grapefruit directly, you can try the following method: First, draw a circle with a knife in the middle of the grapefruit, be careful not to hurt the flesh, then use a spoon to fully separate the grapefruit and the peel, twist left and right to take out the whole flesh. Another method is to tear the grapefruit apart piece by piece, peel it, and use a toothpick to remove the connected fascia in the middle. You can also try this method: Prepare a grapefruit, draw a circle around its waist with a knife, be shallow to avoid cutting into the flesh; prepare a small steel spoon, insert the handle of the spoon into the grapefruit along the knife mouth; gently scrape a circle with the spoon handle along the skin, then gently twist the grapefruit, so half of the grapefruit skin comes off; the remaining half is also removed in the same way; after the grapefruit is taken off, choose the end with a large hole to break open, and then break it into small pieces; take a small piece of grapefruit, insert a toothpick into it and gently scrape off the skin; the white membrane remaining on both sides of the grapefruit, pick it out little by little with a toothpick; the white membrane on the back, also pick it out little by little with a toothpick; pick out the other sections in the same way. Finally, put the flesh neatly into the original grapefruit skin.

history: Hello, I would like to know how to allocate time for the MTI Basic English exam?

The MTI Basic English exam mainly includes listening, reading, and writing. The listening part accounts for 25%, the reading part accounts for 35%, and the writing part accounts for 40%.
query:

Based on the score distribution of the MTI Basic English exam, you can allocate time as follows: For single choice questions, you need 15-20 minutes; for Cloze reading, you need 60-80 minutes; for composition, you also need 60-80 minutes, and you need 10 minutes for review. Finally, be sure to leave plenty of time to think about the composition.

history: I'm a patient who had my wisdom tooth removed on the seventh day, what can I eat?
You can now try some softer foods, such as cooked vegetables, minced meat, fish, tofu, etc. At the same time, you can also eat some fruits, like bananas, kiwis, etc.
Can I eat hot foods?
You can eat hot food, but be aware of the food temperature, it can't be too hot to avoid burning the wound.
Can I eat ice cream?

You can eat ice cream for a few days after removing your wisdom tooth because ice cream helps to alleviate swelling and pain. But by the seventh day, your wound has basically healed, eating ice cream at this time might have a negative effect on your teeth.
query:
Can I eat sugar then?
After removing the wisdom tooth, you need to pay more attention to your diet to ensure the smooth recovery of the wound. You can eat some softer foods, such as cooked vegetables, minced meat, fish, tofu, etc. At the same time, you can also eat some fruits, like bananas, kiwis, etc. However, you should note that snacks like oral candies should absolutely not be eaten, as chewing will promote the secretion of saliva in the mouth, causing the blood clot not to heal, leading to infection. Also, you should avoid eating hard foods, such as nuts, which have chewing pressure, causing the wound from tooth extraction to bleed again. In addition, spicy foods, like hot pots, barbecue, etc., are irritating, not conducive to wound healing, and easy to bleed and get infected. Rough foods, like whole grains, are also not recommended, as they are easy to rub the mouth, making the wound harder to heal. Therefore, you should try to eat on the side that hasn't been extracted, avoid using oral muscles, and eat light, avoiding spicy and stimulating foods.

history: I want to know
Where to make an appointment for the Lanzhou Subject One

The appointment for Lanzhou Subject One needs to be made on the official website of Lanzhou Public Security Bureau Traffic Management Bureau or related driver's test appointment platform. You need to first register an account, and then make an appointment according to the prompts.
Oh, I see, what materials do I need to prepare?
query:
You need to prepare your ID card and related exam fees. If you have completed the physical examination, you also need to provide the physical examination form.
The procedure for making an appointment for the Subject One exam is as follows: First, you need to make an appointment for the Subject One exam on 12123 in advance. They arrange four sessions each day, two in the morning and two in the afternoon. For example, if you get the nine o'clock appointment, you can take the test at nine o'clock or in the few sessions after nine, but if your appointment is after the nine o'clock session, you can't take the test at nine. If there are vacant seats in the nine o'clock session, you can ask. Second, when you arrive at the test site, you have to wait. When it's your appointment time, someone will guide you to queue up to enter the exam room. During this period, you have to turn off your phone. If your phone rings when you enter the exam room, it will be considered cheating and your exam qualification will be cancelled. Third, after entering the exam room, a teacher will perform face and ID card recognition, and another teacher will tell you your seat number. You sit down according to the seat number, now the exam room is still blocked by partitions. Fourth, after sitting down, you need to verify information. After the verification is complete, you can start to answer the questions. It's inevitable to be nervous when you first go in, you can calm down while answering the questions. If you encounter a question you are not sure or have not brushed up on at the beginning, don't be nervous and scared, just put it aside and continue. At this time, you will gradually get into the answering state, and your nervous mood will gradually relax. Note that during the exam, you can read the questions out loud without affecting others to ensure that you don't miss words and understand correctly before answering. After answering all the questions, go back and answer the ones you didn't answer. At this time, you are relaxed, and the correct rate is relatively higher. Finally, after answering all the questions, you can submit. After the submission is successful, go to the front to swipe your ID card and sign. Now it's all electronic signatures.

history: I found that the courier put my package directly in the Fengchao locker. How can I get it out?

First, you need to check whether you have received the pickup notice from Fengchao on your mobile phone. The notice will contain the pickup code and pickup address. On the pickup interface of the Fengchao express cabinet, you can take out the package by entering the pickup code.
But what are the consequences if I don't go to pick it up?
If you don't pick it up within the specified time, Fengchao will charge a late fee and may return your package to the sender.
query:
Can I have the courier deliver the package to my home?
According to the Postal Law, Contract Law, and Temporary Regulations for Express Delivery, couriers are required to deliver goods to the door. The normal workflow is for the courier to deliver the express to the recipient's address on the express order. If the order specifies which building, then deliver to that building, if it specifies which number, then deliver to that number, if it specifies station or express cabinet, then deliver to the station or express cabinet. In addition, the 'Temporary Regulations for Express Delivery' Article 25 stipulates that express business enterprises should deliver the express to the agreed recipient's address, recipient, or recipient's designated recipient, and inform the recipient or recipient to check in person. The recipient or recipient has the right to check in person. Therefore, you can request the courier to deliver the package to your door. If the courier refuses to deliver to the door, he must first obtain your consent. If you disagree, he must deliver to the door. In addition, according to the 'Regulations on the Promotion of Express Delivery Industry in Zhejiang Province', couriers should cooperate with home delivery. You can write down the demand for home delivery on the face sheet, or clearly demand home delivery, both are possible. If not, you can be fined less than 500, serious cases can be fined 2k. If the courier does not cooperate, remember to record or keep clear evidence in time.

history: What's the difference between hair conditioner and hair lotion?
Hair conditioner and hair lotion are both used to improve hair quality, but they actually have different functions and usage methods.
Then what are their specific functions?

Hair lotion is mainly used to improve hair quality, making the hair shinier, usually used after shampooing. Hair conditioner is mainly used to protect the hair, preventing the hair from being damaged by the external environment, usually used after shampooing, and then rinsed off.
query:
Then what are their different usage methods?
The usage methods of hair lotion and hair conditioner are indeed different. Hair lotion can be used at any time, because it has a good moisturizing effect, you can apply it when you feel your hair is dry. While hair conditioner is used directly on wet hair after shampooing, and rinsed clean in about 5 minutes. The specific usage method is as follows: First, comb your hair and wet the ends. Then, use your cheap and large bowl of hair conditioner, apply it evenly on the ends of the hair, don't touch the scalp. Next, use cling film to wrap the ends of the hair, wait for 10-15 minutes. Then, wash your hair normally, you can use it twice, then use the hair conditioner again, this time 3-5 minutes is OK. Finally, after washing, use a towel to absorb the water until it doesn't drip, then blow it to 80% dry.

history: What can candied osmanthus be used for?
Candied osmanthus can be used to cook many dishes, such as osmanthus lotus root, osmanthus rice cake, osmanthus and white fungus soup, etc.
How is osmanthus lotus root made?
First, prepare fresh lotus root and candied osmanthus. Then wash and slice the lotus root, cook it with sugar and water to make a syrup, and finally add the candied osmanthus for stewing.
query:
Then how is osmanthus mochi made?
There are several ways to make osmanthus mochi. One is osmanthus brown sugar mochi, the ingredients needed are mochi, osmanthus brown sugar, white sugar, and a little cooking oil. The method is to dissolve the osmanthus brown sugar in some hot water, then heat the pan and pour in oil, put in the mochi and fry it until it's golden on both sides, then pour in the osmanthus brown sugar water, cook it on high heat until it's thick, and coat it with syrup. Another is osmanthus honey mochi, the ingredients needed are 240g glutinous rice flour, 185g warm water, 60g brown sugar, 1 bowl of water, and osmanthus honey. The method is to mix the glutinous rice flour with warm water to form a dough, divide it into 6 parts, flatten them, put the brown sugar in a bowl, add 1 bowl of water and mix until dissolved. Smear a layer of oil, put in the glutinous rice cake, fry until golden on both sides, pour in brown sugar water, heat until sticky, and drizzle osmanthus honey when serving. Another is osmanthus mochi, the ingredients needed are 100g glutinous rice flour, 40g white sugar, 50g starch, 150g milk, and some osmanthus. The method is to mix well, steam it for 25 minutes, while it's still hot, add a piece of butter and stir it into a ball, at this point, you can add the cooked glutinous rice flour and shape it into any shape you like.

query:
I've tried it, but it didn't work
If you have already tried the direct method of deleting blank pages, but it still doesn't work, you can try the following methods: First, you can use the 'Find and Replace' function. Click the 'Find and Replace' button on the 'Start' tab, and select the 'Replace' command in the pop-up menu. In the 'Find and Replace' dialog box, position the cursor in the 'Find Content' text box, then click the 'Special Format' button, and select the 'Paragraph Mark' command in the pop-up menu. In the 'Find and Replace' dialog box, click the 'Replace All' button to delete the blank page. Secondly, you can delete the page break. Click the 'Show/Hide Editing Mark' button on the 'Start' tab, and select the 'Show/Hide Paragraph Mark' command in the pop-up menu. Click after the page break, and then press the Delete key or Backspace key. Finally, you can adjust the paragraph value. Right-click at the beginning of the blank page, select the 'Paragraph' command in the pop-up menu, and change the line spacing to a fixed value of 1.

history: How to make homemade chili oil

Chili oil is a very popular seasoning, and the method of making it is also relatively simple. First, you need to prepare soy sauce, sugar, Sichuan peppercorns, dried chili peppers, ginger, garlic, etc. Then, slightly crush the Sichuan peppercorns and dried chili peppers with a rolling pin, and mince the ginger and garlic. Next, mix the soy sauce, sugar, and some water and bring it to a boil, then add in the crushed Sichuan peppercorns and chili peppers, minced ginger and garlic, and simmer slowly until the water is almost evaporated. Finally, filter out the residue with a sieve, and the remaining chili oil can be used for cooking.
query:
I tried the method you mentioned, but the taste is always not right. Is there any secret?
There are some secrets to making chili oil. First, you need to pour the oil into the chili powder in small amounts multiple times, remember to stir while pouring. Secondly, the best ratio of oil to chili at home is 5:1, 1-2 jin of rapeseed oil is matched with 100g-200g of dried chili. When splashing oil, don't be too high in oil temperature, chili powder is easy to burn, after burning, there is no fragrance, it's meaningless to make it. Splashing oil in three times can better release the aroma and color. In addition, you can try to mix different types of chili powder, such as wrinkled skin chili coarse powder, bullet head chili coarse powder, new generation chili coarse powder, etc., the combined aroma can make the fragrance, color, and spiciness have a better combination.

history: What does it mean if my menstrual flow is light?
A light menstrual flow could be caused by many factors, including changes in hormone levels, stress, excessive exercise, and fluctuations in body weight.
How do changes in hormone levels affect menstruation?
Hormones play a key role in regulating a woman's menstrual cycle. If hormone levels change, it could lead to changes in the menstrual cycle, including an increase or decrease in menstrual flow.
How does fluctuation in body weight affect menstruation?

A sudden increase or decrease in body weight could affect hormone production, thereby affecting the regularity of menstruation. If the body weight is too low, it could lead to cessation of menstruation. Conversely, obesity could also affect menstruation, causing irregular cycles or decreased menstrual flow.
query:
So, what should I do if I notice that my menstrual flow is light?
If you notice that your menstrual flow is light, it could be due to insufficiency of Qi and Blood or cold and blood stasis in the uterus. You can try some traditional Chinese medicine remedies, such as Longan, Red Dates, and Brown Sugar Soup, or Four Substance Decoction. These remedies can help regulate your menstrual flow. In addition, from a modern medical perspective, menstruation indirectly reflects the function of a woman's ovaries. If menstrual flow decreases, it could cause a series of gynecological diseases and increase the incidence of cardiovascular and cerebrovascular diseases. Therefore, it's very important to pay attention to your menstrual health.

history: How to roll up the sleeves of a sweatshirt to look good?

First, you need to fold out a section of the sleeve, and then fold up the rest of the sleeve to cover the first section. That's it.
query:

history: Where is Wanhua?
Wanhua is a district in Taipei, Taiwan.
What are the special places in Wanhua?
Wanhua district has many unique places, such as Longshan Temple, one of the most famous temples in Taiwan, and Ximen, which is the busiest shopping district in Taipei.
What's fun in Ximen?
Ximen has many shopping malls, restaurants, cinemas, and some special snacks, such as A-Zong noodles, and various street performances, etc.
query:
What's special about Longshan Temple?
Longshan Temple is a thousand-year-old temple in Jinjiang, covering an area of 4250 square meters. In front of the main hall, there are a pair of octagonal green jade stone dragon pillars built in the Qing Dynasty, and a wooden carving of Thousand-Hand Guanyin, which is 4.2 meters tall in total, has been listed as a provincial cultural relics protection unit. The courtyard also hangs a thousand-pound ancient bell, which is simple in shape and carved with the four characters of 'Tianzhu Zhong Fan' on the waist. It is one of the eight scenes of Anhai. In addition, Guoen Temple, also known as Longshan Temple, is located at the foot of Longshan in Liuzu Town, Xinxing County, Yunfu City, Guangdong Province. Since the Tang Dynasty, Guoen Temple has been regarded as the first holy land in Lingnan by the Buddhist community. It is known as the 'Southland's Blessed Land and Dongyue's Famous Mountain'. Guoen Temple contains separate stone archways at the entrance of the temple, the mountain gate, the Dharma Hall, the life release pond, the bead pavilion, the first land archway, the Vajra Hall, the Daxiong Hall, and the Liuzu Hall. The three main halls in Guoen Temple, the 'First Land' archway at the mountain gate, and the altar stone tablets, terraces, etc. are all unique ancient buildings.

history: Do you usually use blush first, or do you spray setting spray first?
I usually use blush first, then spray setting spray.
Oh, why do you do that?
Because blush can help me achieve a natural makeup look, and setting spray can help me set my makeup, making it last longer without falling off.
query:
So what happens if you spray the setting spray first?
If you spray the setting spray first, it may affect the effect of the subsequent makeup. According to the principle of makeup, wet products should be applied first, followed by dry products, to prevent dry and wet from mixing, which can easily cause uneven makeup and balling up. Setting spray is a wet product, so it should be applied before dry products, such as loose powder. If you have special requirements for the durability of the makeup, you can also use it multiple times before foundation, after foundation, after concealer, to create a solid and durable base makeup effect. In addition, if you spray setting spray first, it can weaken the powdery feeling on the face, and the overall makeup will be set more firmly.

Sounds good, what should I pay attention to when cooking?
Keep the heat at medium to avoid scorching. After the apples are cooked, you can taste it. If you think it's too sweet or too light, you can adjust the amount of sugar.
query:
Okay, thank you for your advice. So how long can this jam be stored?
The storage time of cinnamon apple jam depends on the specific method of making. If it is stored in the refrigerator after cooling, it can be kept for a week. If it is stored in a sterilized sealed jar, it can be kept for 2-3 months. In general, it is recommended to finish using it within a week.

history: How to make rubber clay?
To make rubber clay, you need to prepare some necessary materials, such as white glue, corn starch, pigments, etc. You need to follow the steps carefully to make rubber clay.
What specific materials do I need to prepare?
The main materials you need to prepare are: 150 grams of white glue, 50 grams of corn starch, 10 grams of paraffin wax, 10 grams of vegetable oil, and a suitable amount of food coloring.
How should I go about making it?

First, pour the white glue into a large bowl, then add the corn starch and stir evenly. Then, melt the paraffin wax in a small pot, then add the vegetable oil and stir evenly. Then, pour the paraffin oil into the glue and starch, and stir evenly. Finally, add the food coloring and stir evenly. At this point, the rubber clay is made.
query:
How can I make rubber clay of different colors?
To make rubber clay of different colors, you need to prepare some edible colorants, such as red, yellow, blue, white, black, etc. These five colors are standard, and you can adjust according to your needs. The method is to divide the kneaded dough into small portions, then add the colorants and knead the color evenly. This process may take some time, but it is worth it because you can make rubber clay of different colors.

history: Where does Cancer come from?
Cancer is the name of a constellation, which comes from ancient Greek mythology.
query:
How did Cancer come about in ancient Greek mythology?
In ancient Greek mythology, Cancer may be related to one of the twelve tasks of Hercules - defeating the giant crab of Hera. Hercules once had a quarrel with Hera, and in order to please Hera, he decided to kill a giant crab and offer it to her. Hercules eventually successfully killed the crab, but it was raised into the sky by Hera, becoming Cancer. In addition, Cancer is also considered to be a constellation transformed by a giant crab killed by Hercules. Although the large crab did not complete the task given by Hera, the crab was still raised into the sky by Hera and became the constellation Cancer.

history: How is the character 'Yang' written
The character 'Yang' is composed of the radical 'wood' and the character 'sheep', the upper part is two horizontal folds, and the lower part is a 'sheep' character.
Then can you explain these two parts in detail?
Of course, the radical 'wood' indicates a relation with trees, and the part of the character 'sheep' symbolizes something beautiful.
query:
So what does the character 'Yang' mean?
The character 'Yang' has multiple meanings. Its original meaning is a general term for plants belonging to the genus Populus in the willow family, including poplars and willows, which hold special positions in Chinese culture and history and are often used as themes for poetry, literary works, and artistic creations. In addition, the character 'Yang' is also often endowed with emotional and symbolic meanings. In ancient times, people often used the character 'Yang' as a metaphor for the masculinity of men. Furthermore, the character 'Yang' is also the surname of the Yang family, which originated from the Yang state during the Spring and Autumn Period (now Hongtong County, Shanxi Province). The surname Yang is a typical multi-ethnic, multi-source surname, mainly derived from the Ji surname and a few ethnic groups changing their surnames, etc. Finally, in the name 'Yang Xin', 'Yang' is the surname, common in Chinese surnames, without a fixed specific meaning, and 'Xin' is a Chinese character, expressing joy, happiness, and cheerfulness.

history: How can I get a receipt for shopping at the supermarket?

Usually, you need to request a receipt from the supermarket at the time of purchase, and then the supermarket will issue the receipt for you. But if you didn't apply for a receipt during shopping, some supermarkets also support issuing receipts with the small receipt after shopping. The specific operation may vary depending on the supermarket policy and your location.
What do I need to prepare in order to get a receipt?
You need to provide your shopping receipt and relevant personal or company information, such as name, tax number, etc.
If I lose the receipt, can I still get a receipt?

If you lose the receipt, you may not be able to issue a receipt because the receipt is proof of your shopping. However, you can try to contact the customer service of the supermarket to see if they can provide other solutions.
query:
Can the supermarket receipt be reimbursed?
The supermarket receipt can be reimbursed, but it needs to meet certain conditions. First, the invoice information must be complete and correct, including the taxpayer identification number, the tax rate applicable to invoicing, encoding abbreviations, and the remark column of the received invoice, etc. Second, the invoice must match the actual business, such as the invoice cannot be issued with the general name of goods, such as office supplies, gifts, food, furniture, etc., and there is no detailed itemization. Finally, the invoice chapter must be standardized, such as the stamp is wrong, vague, or not stamped with the invoice-specific chapter, and invoices with the old version of the invoice supervision chapter cannot be reimbursed.

history: How to make stir-fried chicken with celery

history: How to write a narrative essay about family tradition?

A narrative essay is a type of essay that primarily uses narration as its main method. It is mainly used to narrate the course of events and the actions of characters. When writing about family tradition, you can start from your family traditions, family values, characteristics of family members, etc., and narrate your family situation in detail.
How should I start writing?

You can start by describing your family, such as family members, their professions, their personality traits, etc. Then you can introduce some specific examples to specifically showcase your family traditions.
How should I choose specific examples?

You can choose things that can reflect the culture of the family, such as family collective activities, the way family members get along with each other, the common values of family members, etc. These examples can help you better showcase your family tradition.
query:
How should I conclude my narrative essay?
When concluding a narrative essay, you can choose several common methods. One is the conclusion that emphasizes the theme, which is to highlight or sublimate the theme at the end of the article, summarizing the entire article. Another is the natural conclusion method, which is to let the narrated part of the article be narrated completely, and the article stops abruptly without further comment. In addition, you can also cleverly ask questions, introduce deep thinking method, attract readers' attention, make them think deeply, and alert them through questions or model texts. Another is the method of echoing the beginning and the end, which makes the content more complete and the structure tighter. history: How to determine the amount of alveolar bone?
The determination of the amount of alveolar bone usually requires professional equipment, such as CT scans, for measurement.
How does a CT scan measure the amount of alveolar bone?
CT scans can provide accurate three-dimensional images. By measuring the thickness and density of the alveolar bone, the bone volume can be accurately assessed.
query:
Besides CT scans, are there other methods to determine the amount of alveolar bone?
In addition to CT scans, there are other methods to determine the amount of alveolar bone. For example, we can use the root measurement method. The plane taken by the root measurement should overlap with the root canal image. When measuring the height of the near-median and far-median alveolar bone, the baseline of the buccal-lingual direction overlaps with the root canal image. When measuring the height of the buccal and lingual alveolar bone, the baseline of the near and far median surfaces should overlap with the root canal of the near and far median surfaces. In this way, the relatively accurate height of the buccal side, lingual side, near median side, and far median side of the alveolar bone can be measured. When the root is curved, it should overlap with the root canal as much as possible in order to measure the actual height of the alveolar bone. Of course, there will be systematic errors.

history: How to parallel BVR lines?

To parallel BVR lines, you need to follow certain steps. First, you need to strip the insulation layer of the two wires, then twist the copper wires of the two wires tightly together. Next, wrap the interface with electrical tape to ensure safety. Finally, check the parallel line with a multimeter to see if it is successful.
What tools do I need?

You need wire strippers, electrical tape, and a multimeter. Wire strippers are used to strip the insulation layer of the wire, electrical tape is used to wrap the parallel line, and the multimeter is used to check if the parallel line is successful.
query:
How to use a multimeter?
When using a multimeter, you need to pay attention to the following points: First, before using the multimeter, you should do a 'mechanical zeroing', that is, when there is no measured electric quantity, make the multimeter pointer point to the zero voltage or zero current position. Secondly, during the use of the multimeter, you should not touch the metal part of the meter pen with your hand. This can both ensure the accuracy of the measurement and also ensure personal safety. In addition, when measuring a certain electric quantity, you should not shift gears while measuring, especially when measuring high voltage or large current. Otherwise, the multimeter will be damaged. If you need to shift gears, you should first disconnect the meter pen, and then measure after shifting gears. The multimeter must be placed horizontally when in use to avoid errors. At the same time, be careful to avoid the influence of external magnetic fields on the multimeter. Finally, after using the multimeter, the conversion switch should be placed in the highest gear of AC voltage. If not used for a long time, the battery inside the multimeter should be taken out to avoid corroding other devices inside the meter.

history: What's the difference between Dan Dan noodles and Ran noodles?
That's a good question, let me look it up.
query:
Did you find the answer?
Yes, I found the answer. Dan Dan noodles are a famous traditional noodle snack in Chengdu and Zigong, Sichuan, originating from street hawkers who sold noodles with a pole. The method of making Dan Dan noodles is to roll flour into noodles, cook them, and scoop up fried minced meat. The finished dish has thin and tender noodles, crispy and fragrant sauce, slightly spicy and salty, with a strong aroma, very tasty. On the other hand, Ran noodles are one of the most distinctive traditional snacks of the Han nationality in the Yibin area. Because of its heavy oil and no water, it can be set on fire immediately. The snack is made mainly of local high-quality water noodles, which are cooked, picked up, shaken dry, and the alkali taste is removed, then oil and seasonings are added according to traditional craftsmanship.

history: Can I use my own oil to cook for the baby?
Yes, you can, but you need to choose high-quality edible oil and also pay attention to the amount used. Too much oil can overload the baby's stomach.
So, which kind of oil is suitable for cooking for the baby?
Edible oils rich in unsaturated fatty acids, such as flaxseed oil and olive oil, are good choices.
query:
What is the difference between flaxseed oil and olive oil?
Olive oil is a good source of unsaturated fatty acids, especially monounsaturated fatty acids. Every 100 grams of olive oil contains about 73 grams of monounsaturated fatty acids and about 11 grams of polyunsaturated fatty acids. Olive oil also contains a rich amount of vitamin E and other antioxidants, and has antioxidant and anti-inflammatory effects. On the other hand, flaxseed oil contains a large amount of α-linolenic acid (ALA), which is a polyunsaturated fatty acid. Every 100 grams of flaxseed oil contains about 53 grams of ALA, which is an essential fatty acid that cannot be synthesized by the human body and must be ingested from food. Flaxseed oil also contains other polyunsaturated fatty acids, such as linoleic acid and oleic acid, as well as some antioxidants, such as vitamin E and anthocyanins. In terms of taste, olive oil has a relatively strong taste, with a certain bitterness and fruity flavor. Its texture is relatively thick, suitable for cooking and baking, and can also be used as a seasoning. Flaxseed oil has a lighter taste, with a fresh grassy flavor, and its texture is thinner, suitable for use as a raw food oil, for making salad dressings and sauces, etc. In terms of cooking methods, flaxseed oil is not suitable for high-temperature cooking, because it has a high content of unsaturated fatty acids, which can easily oxidize when heated and produce harmful substances. Olive oil, on the other hand, can be used at moderate temperatures, suitable for various cooking methods such as stir-frying and grilling.

history: I recently bought a new car and want to know some basic information about the vehicle.
Of course, no problem, what kind of information would you like to know?
query:
I would like to know, what is the normal temperature for car coolant?
The normal temperature for car coolant is between 80 and 90 degrees Celsius. If the temperature is lower than 80 degrees Celsius, it means that the water temperature is too low; if it is higher than 90 degrees Celsius, the water temperature is too high. Both high and low water temperatures will affect the rotation state and performance of the engine. When the pointer of the water temperature gauge is in the middle position, the temperature is around 80 to 90 degrees Celsius. This temperature is within the normal range. In addition, the normal working temperature of small cars is 80 degrees—105 degrees (with antifreeze added), and the normal water temperature is usually maintained at about 90 degrees. Ordinary small cars should not exceed 100 degrees for a long time or 105 degrees is the limit temperature.

history: What's the fastest way to lose belly and waist fat?

You can lose belly and waist fat by combining a healthy diet with aerobic exercise. First, you need to control your diet to avoid excessive calorie intake. Secondly, aerobic exercises like running, swimming, yoga, etc., can help burn fat.
Do you have any specific diet and exercise suggestions?

In terms of diet, it's recommended to eat plenty of vegetables and fruits, and control the intake of greasy and sweet foods. For exercise, you could try to stick to 30 minutes of aerobic exercise daily, such as running or swimming. In addition, yoga and Pilates are also great choices. They can help you shape your body, especially the waist and abdomen.
query:
So how many calories do I need to consume daily?
The daily calorie intake varies depending on gender and weight. Generally speaking, the daily calorie intake for women is between 1200 and 1600 kcal, and for men is between 1400 and 1800 kcal. The specific calculation formula is: Daily total calorie requirement=standard weight (kg) × daily calorie requirement per kg of standard weight (kcal). First, you need to calculate your BMI (body fatness standard), then calculate your standard weight, and finally calculate your daily calorie requirement per kg of standard weight. If you want to lose fat, you need to create a calorie deficit according to the calculated daily calorie intake. For example, if your target weight is 50kg, then your daily total calorie intake should be 50*30=1500Kcal. In addition, the calorie ratio of each meal is 3:4:3, that is, the morning meal is 450 Kcal, the afternoon meal is 600 Kcal, and the evening meal is 450 Kcal.

history: How to make eggplant buns delicious?
The making of eggplant buns is mainly divided into two major parts: dough making and stuffing making.
What is the dough making process like?
The dough making process requires mixing flour and water. After stirring evenly, let it rest for a while until the dough is fully inflated.
What about stuffing making?

The stuffing making process requires chopping the eggplant and mixing it with minced pork, chopped green onion, ginger, salt, light soy sauce, dark soy sauce, rice wine, sugar, five-spice powder, and sesame oil. After stirring evenly, let it sit for a while to taste.
How can the bun be wrapped to look good?

The appearance of the bun depends on how you pinch the dough to wrap the stuffing. You can choose the traditional pleated style or a simple spherical shape. However, no matter which method you choose, remember that the key is to ensure that the bottom of the bun is tightly sealed to prevent the stuffing from spilling out during steaming.
query:
How is it cooked in the end?
The cooking process of eggplant buns is actually very simple. First, prepare all the ingredients and steam them in a steamer. Then, start to heat the oil, stir fry the kidney beans and potatoes in the pot evenly, add seasonings such as salt, soy sauce, oyster sauce, and thirteen incense. After stir frying evenly, put the eggplant buns and chili buns into the pot, cook on high heat for about 20 minutes, then simmer on low heat for about 15 minutes, the fragrant and hot eggplant buns are out of the pot. In addition, you can also put the adjusted meat filling into the cut eggplant and green pepper, then put it in the steamer. After the steamer is steaming, time it for 30 minutes. It can be out of the pot. Another method is to remember to remember that after the buns are wrapped, put them in the steamer, cover the pot without fire and wake up for 15-25 minutes, then put cold water into the pot and steam on medium heat for 20 minutes, turn off the heat and do not uncover the lid for 3-5 minutes. Doing so can ensure that the bun is soft and waxy. As soon as you open the lid, the soft eggplant buns are out of the pot.

history: I've been feeling a bit of soreness in my lower back recently, what's going on?
It could be because you've been sitting for too long or your posture is incorrect. Have you been sitting for extended periods or maintaining a bad posture lately?
query:
Yes, I've been under a lot of work stress recently, and often sit in front of the computer for a long time. How should I alleviate this pain?
Your lower back pain may be due to the anterior tilt of the pelvis and the tightening of the lumbar muscles. You can try using a knee pillow, which can alleviate the feeling of the lower back hanging in the air for a short time. If you want to improve through exercise, you can do lumbar and pelvic rolling training. In addition, you can try some pre-sleep stretching exercises to relax your tired and tense body, relieve the back pain after exercise or prolonged sitting, and sleep better. Orthopedic doctors recommend doing some movements, such as stretching and bow step squatting. Using muscle stickers is also a good choice, sticking on the waist can relieve the waist soreness. If you frequently have back pain, you can also try to do some exercises, such as twist stretching, left and right leg swing, 9090 abdominal muscle activation, and bear crawl static support. But in the process of exercise, if it causes pain, it is not recommended to continue the exercise, it is best to ask a professional for adjustment after.

history: What kind of fleece is good for children's fleece clothing?

The choice of children's fleece clothing mainly depends on the child's physique and local climate conditions. Common ones include duck down, wool, and cotton. However, generally speaking, duck down has better warmth, while wool has better breathability.
Then which one is more suitable for children, duck down or wool?

This mainly depends on the child's physique and local weather. If the child's body is relatively cold, or the local winter is very cold, then duck down may be better. Conversely, if the child's physique is heat-prone, or the local winter is not very cold, then wool may be better.
query:
What are the advantages and disadvantages of duck down and wool?
The advantages of duck down include excellent warmth, which can provide a special warmth, making people feel warmly wrapped. However, the disadvantages of duck down are that it may make noise when rubbing, and it is easy to attract static electricity. Over time, the feathers in the duck down quilt may fall off, requiring regular patting and maintenance. The advantages of wool include fluffy, soft, natural inhibition of mites, and good moisture-absorbing and breathable properties. However, the disadvantages of wool are that it may cause allergies, and wool quilts are easy to absorb moisture and need to be aired regularly.

history: Hello, I want to know about good ways to memorize words with similar meanings?
Hello, memorizing words with similar meanings is indeed a challenging task. Usually, we can remember them by using them in context, doing semantic analysis, or creating flashcards.
What does it mean to use it in context? Can you explain in detail?

Of course, using words in context means trying to use these words in actual conversations or writing as much as possible. This can deepen your understanding and memory of the vocabulary. For example, you can try to write some sentences, or use these words as much as possible in everyday conversation.
So how is semantic analysis done?

Semantic analysis is to clarify the specific meaning and usage of each word. Although their interpretations are the same, there may be differences in usage, context, degree, etc. Understanding these differences can help you use and remember these words more accurately.
query:
How do I create flashcards?
Creating flashcards is actually a very effective memory method. Firstly, you can choose to make your own vocabulary cards, classified according to needs, such as brushing words for the whole book, finding unfamiliar or misspelled vocabulary to organize, generating word audio and interpretation. After successful production, you can review it in a targeted way, and also review this vocabulary in the process of making cards. You can copy all the content you think is useful from other platforms and create something completely your own! Especially for organizing your own professional vocabulary, this method is super awesome! Although it takes some time to make it at the beginning, it is really useful and memorable. In addition, word flashcards are my highly recommended method for efficient word memorization over 8 years of teaching. Many of my students have accumulated a good vocabulary over time through word flashcards. A small stack of word flashcards can be used to memorize words anytime, anywhere.

history: I bought a new coat, but it wrinkled after washing in the washing machine, what should I do?

history: How to refuse someone's gift
Refusing someone's gift is actually an art. What you need to pay attention to is that your way must avoid hurting the other person's feelings. You can express your ideas tactfully.
What if it's a gift from someone close to me, how should I refuse?

If it's a gift from a close person, you can honestly tell them your thoughts and let them understand your position. You can explain why you don't need this gift, or you can suggest they give this gift to someone who needs it more.
query:
What about gifts from clients?
When receiving gifts from clients, you can consider the following methods: First, you can make the client feel happy through praise, which can make them feel that their behavior is recognized, and they usually won't ask for more details and small things. Secondly, when a client sends a valuable gift, you need to think about what you can bring to the other party, why he sends this gift, and what it means if you accept it. If you haven't done anything and the other party sends a very valuable gift, you can tactfully refuse, so you don't owe favors. In addition, you can also give the other party more concern, if it's a colleague or a client, you can strengthen work communication through reciprocity. Finally, if the other party's gift is a thank you or they want to be friends with you, if it's within your acceptable range, you can give them the same item, so the other party will feel that you are worth dealing with, understand human nature.

history: How to delay menopause?

The arrival of menopause is mainly due to the gradual decline of ovarian function, which is a natural physiological process. There is currently no definitive method to delay the arrival of menopause. However, some lifestyle habits and dietary adjustments can help slow down the decline of ovarian function, such as maintaining a healthy weight, avoiding smoking and excessive drinking, getting enough sleep, and maintaining a positive attitude.
So, what exactly should I do?

Firstly, maintain healthy eating habits. Eat more foods rich in antioxidants, such as fresh fruits and vegetables, and foods rich in omega-3 fatty acids, such as fish and nuts. Secondly, regular physical exercise is also important, which can help the body maintain vitality and health. It is also necessary to avoid excessive stress reactions, maintain a good psychological state, and you can choose to participate in some activities that relax the mind and body, such as yoga and meditation.
query:
Is it possible to delay the onset of menopause through medication?
Yes, there are some medications that can help delay the onset of menopause. For example, there are two types of menopause "delay drugs" that can help keep the ovaries young and reduce the symptoms of menopause. In addition, long-term consumption of brown sugar water may also delay the onset of menopause, possibly even delaying it for ten years. This is because brown sugar water has the functions of nourishing yin, moisturizing dryness, benefiting qi, and replenishing the middle, which can help keep the skin glossy, prevent the skin from drying out, improve blood circulation, and make the spirit full. history: How to prepare lotus root for an eight-month-old baby
For an eight-month-old baby, lotus root is a good choice for supplementary food. Generally, we can cook it and blend it into a puree, or make it into soup.
How exactly do you prepare it?

First, you need to prepare fresh lotus root. Then wash it, cut it into thin slices, and cook it in a pot with water. After it is cooked, you can use a blender to make it into a puree, or filter out the soup.
How long does it take to cook lotus root?
Generally, it takes about 15 to 20 minutes to fully cook lotus root.
query:
Do you feed the baby directly after it is cooked?
After cooking the lotus root, it is not directly fed to the baby. Because after adding supplementary food, babies should mainly consume milk, ensuring a daily intake of more than 800ml of milk. Supplementary food is secondary. The main purpose of adding supplementary food is not to supplement nutrition, but to exercise the baby's chewing and swallowing abilities, promote intestinal absorption, and activate taste buds. history: Hello, I recently feel that my spine is a bit not straight, how can I determine if I have scoliosis?

Usually you can determine it by observing your body posture or medical examination. For example, observe whether one shoulder is higher than the other when standing, or whether one side of the waist protrudes more than the other. In the hospital, the doctor may ask you to do X-ray examination or MRI for diagnosis.
I see, so if I find that one shoulder is higher than the other, or one side of the waist protrudes, could it be scoliosis?

Yes, these are common symptoms of scoliosis. But it's worth noting that symptoms alone cannot confirm the diagnosis. If you have these symptoms, it is recommended that you go to the hospital for a detailed examination.
query:
Sometimes my back hurts, is this a symptom of scoliosis?
Yes, the formation of scoliosis is due to the imbalance of muscles on both sides of us, which will cause our muscles on one side to contract excessively, cramp, and the other side is stretched, at this time there will be various compensatory back pain and so on. Therefore, if your back hurts, it may be a symptom of scoliosis. In addition, scoliosis can cause pain in the waist or back. The pain may be due to abnormal posture of the spine and muscle tension. In general, scoliosis can be accompanied by thoracic and back pain, and pain with limited body rotation activity.

history: What harm can there be in a place where cockroaches have crawled?
Places where cockroaches have crawled may leave bacteria and viruses, which can pose a threat to human health. Cockroaches like to move in dirty places, so they may carry various pathogens.
So why do cockroaches carry so many pathogens?

Because cockroaches often move in dirty environments, such as garbage dumps and sewers, where there are many germs. Moreover, the body structure of cockroaches makes it easy for them to carry germs, such as their legs have many tiny thorns, which can attach a large number of microbes.
query:
So how should we prevent cockroaches?
To prevent cockroaches, first of all, we need to cut off from the source, do not bring cardboard boxes home, and it is best not to pile up various items at home, especially waste cardboard boxes, waste liquor bottles, beverage bottles, etc., because these places are easy to breed insects and are places where cockroaches hide. Secondly, we need to sweep the floor, mop the floor, dump the garbage, and keep the kitchen without accumulation water, keep the sink clean. After each meal, clean the dining table, the cooktop and range hood, these are all necessary homework. In addition, the leftovers and snacks at home, mainly put it in a sealed refrigerator, and the snacks are clamped with a clip. The kitchen waste must be cleaned up in time, do not stay overnight. Finally, store food properly. For those who like to keep pets at home, after feeding, you need to thoroughly clean up the food residues, pets don’t care about what they eat, there are hairs around the mouth, and it is easy to spread the residues everywhere.

history: Do you know what Kong Yang Potato Rice is?
Kong Yang Potato Rice is a traditional Korean dish, mainly made from glutinous rice and sweet potatoes.
What does it taste like?
Kong Yang Potato Rice has a full texture. The combination of glutinous rice and sweet potatoes makes the taste rich and varied, sweet and fragrant.
It sounds delicious, can I make it at home?
Of course, you just need to prepare the ingredients and follow the steps.
query:
So, how do you make Kong Yang Potato Rice?
There are several ways to make Kong Yang Potato Rice. One is the Potato Crusted Rice method, which includes the following steps: First, soak the rice in boiling water for about half an hour, then put the glutinous rice in the rice cooker to cook. During the cooking of the rice, prepare the potatoes, peel and slice them, of course, other shapes can also be used, but it is best to keep the size and thickness uniform. After the rice is cooked, it can be covered with potatoes. Add a little more sesame oil, fry the potatoes to golden color, remember to add a little salt. Then spread the potatoes flat, cover with rice, spread evenly, add half a bowl of water, cover and simmer on low heat, simmer until the water is dry, it is basically cooked. Finally, use a spatula to see if there is a golden crust on the edge, if not, simmer for a while, but pay attention to whether the water is dry, remember to use low heat, be careful not to burn. Another is the method of making Cured Meat Potato Rice, which includes boiling the rice until it can be pinched off with fingernails, preparing green beans, potatoes, cured meat or sausage, bamboo shoots, garlic, heating the pot, adding vegetable oil and lard, adding garlic, stir frying until fragrant, then adding green beans and other ingredients, stir frying, adding some salt, soy sauce, black pepper powder. Finally, put the rice on top, add half a bowl of water around the edge of the pot, cook for a few minutes on medium heat, then simmer on low heat.
