history: I've been worried lately and I want to know about the early symptoms of anal cancer.
Early symptoms of anal cancer may include rectal bleeding, constipation, difficulty defecating, and abdominal pain.
query:
Is there a sense of pain in the early stages of anal cancer?
In the early stages of anal cancer, patients may experience difficulty defecating and changes in defecation habits, accompanied by abdominal bloating and intermittent abdominal pain. These symptoms will not ease on their own. In addition, patients may experience abdominal distension and abdominal pain due to intestinal obstruction. The occurrence rate of abdominal pain is higher than that of abdominal distension. The pain is mostly in the middle and lower abdomen, and the degree varies, mostly as dull or bloating pain. In the later stages of colorectal cancer, the tumor can cause pain due to blocking the intestine, or pain can occur due to intestinal dysfunction, generally the pain will occur in the lower abdomen, with a feeling of anal prolapse.

history: How to wear high heels for travel

When wearing high heels for travel, you need to consider the travel location and the type of activity. Generally speaking, if it involves long periods of walking or complex terrains, it is not recommended to wear high heels. If you must wear them, you can choose wedge or chunky styles, and you should also pay attention to the shoe size and comfort.
query:
So how do you wear them and walk correctly?
The correct way to walk in high heels includes several key points. First, you need to tense the arch of your foot to control the angle between the front sole of the shoe and the ground. When it is basically the same as flat shoes, you can keep your knees straight and walk naturally. The strength of tensing the arch of your foot needs to be adjusted according to the height of the heel. If you tense too much, the front of your foot will touch the ground first. If not enough, the transition from the heel to the front of the foot when landing is not smooth. When tensed just right, walking is as smooth as with flat shoes. Secondly, ankle control is particularly important, stabilize the ankle to stabilize the foot and confidently take each step. In addition, high heels will change the slope of our feet, so when you step out, you don't need to hook your toes, just lightly tense them. When landing, straighten your knees but don't lock them. Finally, the main point is to straighten your leg when you stride out, and the heel should touch the ground first.

history: I want to measure the size of my window by myself, how should I do it?

Do I need to measure the inside or outside of the window frame?
If you want to install an interior window, you should measure the inside of the window frame. If you want to install an exterior window, you should measure the outside of the window frame.
query:

When measuring windows, you need to consider the following factors: First, you need to determine the type of window, such as floor-to-ceiling glass or long floating windows in living rooms, balconies, etc. Secondly, you need to consider the series of the window, such as fabric curtains, dream curtains, vertical curtains, etc. In addition, you need to consider the window opening position and direction, as well as the height of the handle. Furthermore, you need to measure not only the width and height of the window, but also the width of the window sill, which is the width of the original window profile. Finally, you need to ask the customer about the window sill reservation, notice of old window removal, treatment of thermal insulation layer and subframe, measure the height of the window sill, measure the size of the opening, and draw a design plan for doors and windows.

history: What is rickets?
Rickets is a disease caused by vitamin D, calcium, and phosphorus metabolism disorders, leading to abnormal growth and development of bones.
At what age is rickets common?
Rickets is common in infants, young children and adolescents.
What are the symptoms of rickets?
The symptoms of rickets include short stature, bone deformities, such as bent legs, protruding chest, etc. There may also be muscle weakness and decreased resistance.
query:
Are there any special symptoms of rickets in adolescents?
In adolescents, the symptoms of rickets may include sweating a lot, being irritable, having restless sleep at night, and waking up frequently. As the disease progresses, they may gradually show changes in the skeleton such as softening of the skull, square skull, chicken chest, X-shaped legs or O-shaped legs.

history: Hello, I have a question.
Of course, no problem, what would you like to know?
query:
What does it mean when the stool is thin and not shaped?
When the stool is thin and not shaped, it usually indicates that the spleen is deficient. This is because the spleen is responsible for metabolizing dampness. If the spleen is deficient, the function of metabolizing dampness will be poor, and water cannot be well absorbed, but can only be excreted through the stool, so the stool will be very thin. This situation is called 'stool sugar' in traditional Chinese medicine, which is one of the typical symptoms of spleen deficiency. In addition, if the stool is not shaped for a week in a row, it is recommended to go to the hospital for a check-up.

history: How to protect the bright surface of gold

history: How to inlay an irregular gemstone

The pedestal is usually made of gold, silver or other precious metals.

The main differences lie in color, texture, and price. Gold pedestals are brightly colored, silver pedestals are soft in color, and other precious metal pedestals vary according to the specific materials.
How to ensure the gemstone won't fall out?
Inlaying gemstones requires professional tools and techniques, such as claw setting and bezel setting, which can effectively fix the gemstones.
query:
What is claw setting and bezel setting?
Claw setting and bezel setting are two common inlaying techniques. Claw setting is a method of inlaying by using metal claws to buckle the gemstone firmly on the bracket. Its advantage is that it can highlight the gemstone's shine and is easy to clean, but the disadvantage is that the claw part is easy to hook on hair or fabric. On the other hand, bezel setting is the part below the waist of the gemstone sealed in the metal bracket. Its advantage is that it can fix the gemstone more firmly and will not hook on clothes and hair, but the disadvantage is that the exposed size of the gemstone is reduced.

history: How to remedy the black triangle of the lower teeth?

Which four countries were in charge of Berlin?
After the end of World War II, Germany and Berlin were divided into four occupation zones by the United States, Britain, France, and the Soviet Union. history: What should parents do when their child is prone to temper tantrums?
First of all, we need to understand that children may throw tantrums as a way to express dissatisfaction, seek attention, or attempt to control the situation.
So what should we as parents do?
Parents need to respond calmly, not to lose their temper with the child. At the same time, they should guide the child to express emotions in a more appropriate way.
How specifically should we guide the child?

You can teach the child to identify and express their emotions, for example, they can say they are very angry now, instead of shouting and screaming. At the same time, parents can also set clear rules and boundaries, letting the child know what behavior is not accepted.
query:
What should I do if my child throws a tantrum in public?
When your child throws a tantrum in public, first, you need to tell the child the rules before going out, such as telling him where you are going today, who you will meet, not to make noise, etc., to let the child prepare in advance. Then, when the child starts to cry, you need to lower your voice and communicate with him calmly, giving him face in public. When the child makes unreasonable demands, do not be held hostage by his emotions and demands. Tell him directly that even if he cries, he will not meet his rude demands, and because of such crying, the chance to come out next time will be less. After the child has calmed down, ask the reason for the child's crying and try to solve the problem with him. If the tantrum occurs on the street or in stores and other public places, the only solution is to drag him away from the scene as soon as possible. If the dragging fails, ensure the child's safety and ignore him until he eases, then praise him in time.

You can also use large stretch film to have a dust-proof protective effect, and the transparent texture is also quite aesthetic. Customers who do not want to unpack the painting immediately can keep it for a while. Hand roll film is used to fix the foam corner guard strips, which can be easily removed. In addition, the innermost layer of oil painting packaging is usually pearl cotton, which prevents the painting from sticking to the packaging; then wrap several layers with bubble pads to prevent bumps, and the gaps on all sides should be filled with foam; customize a wooden box that fits the size of the work (slightly larger than the size of the work); make opening marks, handle with care, and other safety tips on the outer wooden box. history: Hello, I have a question and need help.

I have two stainless steel bowls stuck together, how can I open them?

I've tried, but it's still unsuccessful.
I'm sorry to hear that. You could also try lightly tapping the edge of the bowls with a rubber mallet, but be careful not to use too much force to avoid damaging the bowls.
query:
I don't have a rubber mallet, is there another way?
If you don't have a rubber mallet, you can try other methods. One method is to pour boiling water into the bowl and wait for 3 minutes, then use scissors or small iron pieces to gently pry open the bowl. If this method doesn't work, you can try another method, prepare a steamer and add water, then place the bowl upside down in the steamer and boil it together with the water, at this time the bowl will naturally fall off. Another method is to wait until the food bowl cools down, at this time a pressure difference has formed inside and outside, you just need to heat the internal air.

history: Is there any lines in the subject two test field?
Yes, there are lines in the subject two test field, these lines are mainly used to mark lanes and parking spaces.
Then, what are the colors of these lines?
Usually, the colors of these lines are white.
Do these lines affect the test?
Yes, they do. These lines are used to help you judge the position and direction of the vehicle. If you don't operate according to these lines, you may be deducted points.
query:
So, how should I accurately judge the position of the line?
To accurately judge the position of the line, you can refer to the following methods. Firstly, for the distance between the body and the sideline, the new rule of the driving test is: 'Deduct 10 points for more than 30 cm and less than 50 cm, and fail directly if the distance is more than 50 cm.' Therefore, you need to pay attention to the distance between the body and the sideline. Secondly, you can adjust the position of the body according to the following rules: 'Can be adjusted multiple times', 'The speed should be slowed down', 'Adjust in small increments', 'Move towards the side in advance'. In addition, you can try more reference objects, such as the rearview mirror, to help you judge the position of the line. Finally, you can use two methods to judge whether the body is just 30 cm away from the right side: one is to sit in the car and look at the wiper height point at the front of the car, when the height point intersects with the right sideline, the body is 30 cm away from the right side; the other is to look at the right rearview mirror, when the body is about one finger wide from the right line in the right rearview mirror, it also indicates that the body is 30 cm away from the right side.

history: What do you think of college students' fitness tests?

I think the college students' fitness test is a very important link. It can help college students check their own physical condition, and also remind college students to pay attention to physical health and exercise appropriately.
query:
So do you think the college students' fitness test scores should be included in the graduation evaluation?
According to the 'National Physical Health Standards' issued by the Ministry of Education, at the time of graduation, if a student's 'fitness test' total score is less than 50 points, he or she will be considered as a dropout; in the previous year, if a student's 'fitness test' score reaches the school's requirements, he or she can participate in the merit and award evaluation. Therefore, the college students' fitness test scores should be included in the graduation evaluation. The 'fitness test' total score at the time of graduation consists of the total score of the 'fitness test' in the fourth school year and the average score of the 'fitness test' in the first three school years, each accounting for 50%. For five-year program students and extended graduates, they only participate in the 'standard' test in the fourth school year, and the score is evaluated by the sum of 50% of the total score in the fourth school year and the average score of the total score in other school years.

history: What causes a lymph node to close?

The closing of a lymph node is generally due to damage or blockage of the lymphatic vessels. The lymphatic vessels are part of the lymphatic system, responsible for transporting lymph fluid. The lymph fluid contains a large number of white blood cells, which are essential for the normal operation of the immune system. When the lymphatic vessels are damaged or blocked, the lymph fluid cannot flow normally, causing the lymph nodes to close.
So, what are the symptoms of a closed lymph node?
The symptoms of a closed lymph node may include swelling, pain, skin discoloration, or infection. These symptoms can occur in the injured area, and may also affect the entire lymphatic system.
query:
How should a closed lymph node be treated?
The treatment of a closed lymph node can be achieved through the following methods: First, pay attention to diet, reduce the intake of fried and sweet foods, and stay up less. Second, use aloe gel to scrape the cheeks, which can help blood circulation and lymphatic detoxification. In addition, external application of honeysuckle, wild chrysanthemum, forsythia, and dandelion can also help. Moreover, the effect of silver needle is particularly good, and it can be tried. Finally, daily prevention measures include early to bed and early to rise, regular life, ensuring sufficient sleep; drink more water, eat less high-fat food, eat more fresh vegetables and fruits; do not over-clean the skin, because over-cleaning will stimulate cells to secrete more oil, forming a vicious circle; when applying maintenance products every day, gently massage the entire face to help the circulation of blood and lymph under the skin, thereby achieving the effect of removing accumulated toxins.

history: How do I know when I'm ovulating?

Ovulation typically refers to a period of time within a woman's menstrual cycle when her ovaries release a mature egg. There are some noticeable physical signals of ovulation, such as a slight increase in basal body temperature, mild breast pain, mild abdominal pain, and changes in vaginal discharge.
So how can I accurately know when I'm ovulating?

Usually, you can judge by observing your body signals, such as changes in basal body temperature, ovulation pain, breast pain, etc. In addition, you can also use ovulation test strips, which can determine whether you are ovulating by detecting the concentration of progesterone in your urine. You can also use some mobile apps to record your menstrual cycle, and they will predict your ovulation period based on your records.
query:
How to use ovulation test strips?
The main steps to use ovulation test strips are as follows: First, take the mid-segment urine with a clean, dry urine cup. Then, immerse the end of the ovulation test strip with an arrow mark line into the urine, making sure not to exceed the MAX mark line, otherwise the result is invalid. After about 5-8 seconds, when you see the red climbing in the display area, take it out and let it color for 10 minutes. Then, you can gently scan the test strip with the pregnancy orange app to check the real-time intelligent reading results and analysis. Finally, open the curve page to view the LH hormone change curve based on the intelligent ovulation test strip. Please note that the test should be conducted between 10 a.m. and 10 p.m., and morning urine should not be used. To avoid missing the peak of the ovulation test strip, you should test at the frequency suggested by the app. Two hours before the test, you should reduce water intake, as diluted urine can lead to an inability to detect the LH peak. Once a weak positive result is detected, start testing every 4 hours, and the pregnancy orange app will automatically analyze and determine the peak. After the intelligent ovulation test strip is photographed and entered into the app, there is no need to save it, just discard it.

history: What values increase during pregnancy
During pregnancy, some physiological indicators in the body will change, usually increased are progesterone, estrogen, prolactin, etc.
What is progesterone
Progesterone is an important hormone that plays a role in protecting the fetus and maintaining pregnancy in women.
What is the function of estrogen?
Estrogen is mainly responsible for regulating a woman's menstrual cycle and helps maintain progesterone levels during pregnancy.
query:
What is prolactin?
Prolactin is a polypeptide protein hormone secreted by the pituitary gland, mainly responsible for promoting the development of the R room and the secretion of milk. It acts on lactating cells to produce milk. In addition, prolactin also has three characteristics: the more frequent the milk is sucked, the more prolactin in the body, the more milk is stored, the less prolactin. Therefore, if a mother wants to increase the amount of milk, she must suck frequently and feed frequently; if she is weaning, the time interval for milk discharge should be extended. The frequency of sucking milk at night is about 3-4 hours. Also, the secretion of prolactin at night is ten times that of the day. Night milk discharge will increase the amount of prolactin. If you sleep all night, mothers with more milk may get mastitis due to engorgement, and mothers with less milk will have less prolactin and the amount of milk will significantly decrease. Prolactin, also known as lactogenic hormone, is a protein hormone. The secretion of prolactin is affected by estrogen, progesterone, and chorionic gonadotropin.

history: I heard that doctors wipe vernix in the delivery room, how is this handled?

What should be paid attention to during the process of wiping the vernix?
During the process, the doctor needs to be very careful to avoid causing damage to the baby's skin. Moreover, vernix can help protect the baby's skin, so it does not need to be wiped off completely.
query:
So, do parents need to wipe the vernix for the baby at home?
Parents do not need to wipe the vernix for the baby at home. Because the vernix is not easy to remove completely at once, parents should try several times, and should not forcibly remove it, so as not to hurt the baby's scalp. If the vernix is thick, it may cause discomfort to the baby's head, or even dermatitis. Therefore, it is recommended to use some tools, such as silicone brushes, which are soft and will not hurt the baby's scalp.

history: How to take traditional Chinese medicine?

The methods of taking traditional Chinese medicine generally include oral administration, external application, fumigation and washing, etc. Oral administration is further divided into tea brewing, decoction, and boiling drinking.
What is the difference between tea brewing and decoction?

Tea brewing is generally to soak the Chinese medicine in boiling water and drink it. This method is suitable for some moderately mild medicinal materials. Decoction is to decoct the Chinese medicine and filter out the medicinal residue, only drink the medicine juice, which is suitable for some more intense medicinal materials.
query:
What does boiling drinking mean?
Boiling drinking is a common method of taking traditional Chinese medicine. Generally speaking, each packet of medicine is one dose, and each dose of medicine is boiled twice. The water volume is 2-3 cm above the medicine surface, about a knuckle. Before boiling the medicine, first soak the medicinal materials in cold water for half an hour, then boil the soaked medicinal materials with high heat, then turn to low heat and cook for another 25-30 minutes to finish the first boil. Immediately filter out the medicine juice, add clear water in the medicine residue to cook the second time, the water volume is still 2-3 cm above the medicine surface. After boiling with high heat, turn to low heat and cook for 20-25 minutes. In addition, boiling Chinese medicine is different from boiling tea, you can't directly add water to boil, many Chinese medicinal materials are relatively dry, if you directly add water to boil, it is difficult to fully release its medicinal effects.

history: How to use a camera in the snow?

When using a camera in the snow, first of all, you need to protect your camera from the cold and damp environment. Secondly, due to the strong reflection of the snow, it may affect the metering, so you may need to adjust the exposure compensation. Also, the pure white color of the snow may cause the camera's automatic white balance to be inaccurate, so you may need to manually set the white balance.
How to protect the camera from the cold and damp environment?

You can use a waterproof and dustproof camera bag or a dehumidification box to store the camera, and try to avoid using the camera for a long time in extremely cold environments. After use, it is best to put the camera in a sealed plastic bag and then put it back into a warm environment, which can prevent thermal shock.
How to adjust exposure compensation?

If your camera has an exposure compensation function, it can usually be adjusted by pressing the exposure compensation button and rotating the control wheel at the same time. Due to the strong reflection of the snow, you may need to increase the exposure compensation to make the snow look brighter. The specific compensation value may need to be adjusted according to the actual situation.
query:
So, how to manually set the white balance?
White balance is a very important setting for both photo shooting and video recording. It can help us restore the white objects in reality to the correct white. In the camera, white balance is provided, and it's one of the most important controls for shooting color. The color temperature in the camera is opposite to the actual color temperature of the light source, which is the working principle of white balance, which compensates by using the corresponding complementary color. There are many modes of white balance, including K mode, scene mode, custom mode, and AWB mode. K mode allows you to manually adjust the color temperature. If you want to be more accurate, you can customize the white balance, which requires you to find a white object and show it to the camera, telling it that the color temperature of this object has become this color in this environment. At this time, the camera will use this white object as a reference to correct the color of the object. In addition, you can also enter the camera menu, choose daylight, shadow, cloudy, etc. according to the shooting environment, or manually set the white balance K value, adjusting the white balance can correct the color of the picture. The higher the K value, the warmer the picture, the lower the K value, the colder the picture.

history: How to play a drum kit?

Drumsticks are a kind of percussion instrument, the main skills involved are grip, strike, roll, and so on. First, you need to correctly hold the drumsticks, and then learn the basic striking techniques and rhythms.
How should I hold the drumsticks?

There are many ways to hold drumsticks, common ones are traditional grip and matched grip. The traditional grip is to put the drumstick between the fingers and the palm, while the matched grip is to put the drumstick between the fingers and the wrist. You can choose according to your comfort.
query:
Then how should I practice striking?
Striking is an important skill in playing the drum kit. First, you need to relax your hands, which is the foundation of striking. Secondly, the movement trajectory of the drumstick should follow the direction of the wrist's force, not the horizontal up and down movement. In terms of specific striking methods, you can try the following: the thumb and index finger hold the drumstick, and the last three fingers are relaxed on the drumstick to control the rebound and exert force. At the same time, the wrist drives the up and down strike. When we are expressing emotions, we may need the forearm to exert force to achieve a better effect. In addition, you can try the following points: the back of the hand is up, the drumstick is perpendicular to the ground after lifting up, the striking point is concentrated as much as possible, and when the left and right hands strike, they go straight up and down, and the track does not bend. These are all effective striking techniques, you can try them in practice.

history: How can I quickly reduce swelling after crying my eyes out?

Swelling around the eyes after crying is mainly because the gelatinous part of the tears contains proteins, which cause the tissues around the eyes to absorb water and swell. In this case, you can use a cold ice pack, or a caffeine-containing cold eye cream can also have a swelling effect.
What's the difference between a cold ice pack and a caffeine-containing cold eye cream?

A cold ice pack can constrict blood vessels and reduce the temperature of the surrounding tissues, thereby reducing the leakage of liquid and achieving the effect of reducing swelling. Whereas, caffeine in cold eye cream can stimulate blood circulation, helping to eliminate excess water around the eyes, and caffeine has astringent effects, which can tighten the skin around the eyes and reduce eye puffiness.
query:
Are there any other methods to reduce swelling besides these two?
In addition to using a cold ice pack and caffeine-containing cold eye cream, there are other methods to reduce swelling. For example, you can try to eat something to fill your stomach, then make a cup of pure bitter coffee to reduce swelling. In addition, massaging your eyelids with the other end of a makeup brush, while applying some essential oil to prevent pulling on the eyelids, can also achieve a good effect.

history: How to write a class analysis after the midterm exam

What specific content should be included?

Generally speaking, the class analysis report should include the following points: First, the overall examination situation of the class, including average score, highest score, lowest score and the distribution of score segments; Second, the examination situation of each subject, which can analyze which subjects are well-examined and which subjects are not well-examined; Third, the analysis of individual students, especially the analysis of students with excellent performance and poor performance; Fourth, the reflection on teaching work, thinking about how to improve teaching methods to improve students' learning effect.
query:
So how should I write it? Is there a template I can refer to?
You can refer to the following template to write the class analysis report: First, the class overview, including the number of students, gender ratio, and your teaching responsibilities. Then, analyze the class's prominent strengths and weaknesses, such as class style, class collective construction, class cadres, etc. Next, analyze the class performance situation, including the total score situation of this result, the situation of average score excellence rate, the situation of progress and regression, the situation of students in each score segment, the stability of students' results, etc. Find out the problems, such as which subjects in the class have made progress, the reasons for progress; which subjects have regressed, possible reasons; the way to improve the scores of weak subjects in the class; how each type of student can improve and stabilize their own results; the analysis of the overall regression of the group; although they have worked very hard, the score has not improved the analysis; daily performance analysis, etc. Finally, propose countermeasures according to the problem, targeted to find out countermeasures according to the problem, propose the next class management methods and measures, stimulate students' interest in learning, cultivate students' learning habits.

history: Do you know how to prune a six-fold benefit?

The six-fold benefit pruning is mainly carried out in spring, generally it is necessary to cut off the yellow and pest-infested branches and leaves in winter, and also pay attention to avoid injuring the new buds during the pruning process.
So how exactly do you prune it?

First, you have to clean up the dead leaves and pest-infested branches and leaves of the six-fold benefit, then start pruning from the bottom and pay attention to the angle during pruning. Generally, the cut should be tilted at 45 degrees to facilitate plant growth.
query:
Do I need to take special care after this pruning?
After pruning, you need to take some special care. First, you need to change the pot, remember to change to a larger size, not too large. Overturn the hand to remove the pot, don't pull it out, the root system of the six-fold benefit is very fine. Secondly, watering is also very important, normally this temperature (30 degrees in Guangdong) must water once a day. Water thoroughly. When it's just started in winter, water it according to the condition, if it looks a bit soft, water it. In addition, fertilization is also necessary, phosphorus and potassium fertilizer (dihydrogen phosphate or Duo Duo 2) is mainly used, fertilize once with a general fertilizer after pruning, and then continue to use phosphorus and potassium fertilizer. Finally, pruning is also very important, don't think about the waterfall-like six-fold benefit, let's just watch it explode haha. Prune promptly after flowering, be willing to, basically a circular range with the edge of the pot. If it hangs down, it won't be enough to explode, and the top is easy to bald.

history: How to use a mechanical keyboard keycap puller?

The mechanical keyboard keycap puller is mainly used for removing and installing keycaps. First, you need to clamp the two claws of the puller on both sides of the keycap, then gently pull up, and the keycap can be pulled out.
query:
What else do I need to pay attention to?
When using a mechanical keyboard keycap puller, you need to pay attention to the following points: First, use the puller to align the buckle in the middle of the shaft in the up and down direction, then gently press the buckle up and down on the shaft, so you can easily pull it out. Secondly, one side of the puller needs to be pulled out a bit, press the axis to be pulled out as much as possible to expose a gap, then tilt the pulled out end of the puller into the gap, just pull it out a little bit and it will succeed. In addition, you can switch the back switch to the middle of B/G before operating, so that it will not light up when you are messing around. Finally, when pulling the keycap, align the keycap in the left and right direction, pull it up vertically to remove it. When pulling the shaft, align the puller in the up and down direction with the buckle in the middle of the shaft, pull it up vertically to remove it, after pulling it out, press the side key to push out the shaft.

history: I found my legs are a bit bent, what should I do?

query:

Firstly, you can try foot pressure distribution standing training, elastic rope calf lateral strengthening, thigh adduction/rotation muscle strengthening, and thigh posterior lateral muscle group stretching. These actions can be done 3 times a week, and combined with other strengthening training and massage relaxation, you can achieve results in a shorter time. Secondly, you can try to pad arch insoles in your shoes, which can improve the force point of the arch, making it more comfortable to walk, and can also improve foot pronation, arch collapse and other problems. Lastly, you can try pressing your knees with both feet crossed, standing on tiptoe with your legs together, and turning your palm to stretch your calf with your feet together. These actions can help improve your leg shape.

history: What is ankylosing spondylitis?
Ankylosing spondylitis is a chronic inflammatory joint disease, mainly affecting the spine and pelvic joints.
What are the symptoms of ankylosing spondylitis?
The typical symptoms of ankylosing spondylitis include chronic low back pain and stiffness, especially noticeable in the morning or after maintaining the same posture for a long time.
What causes ankylosing spondylitis?
The exact cause of ankylosing spondylitis is still unclear, but it is thought to be related to factors such as genetics, environment, and immune response.
Can ankylosing spondylitis be cured?

Ankylosing spondylitis cannot be completely cured at present, but symptoms can be effectively relieved, disease progression can be controlled, and quality of life can be improved through medication and physical therapy.
query:
What are the treatment methods for ankylosing spondylitis?
The treatment methods for ankylosing spondylitis mainly include controlling inflammation, alleviating symptoms, preventing the rigidity and deformity of the spine and hip joints, maintaining the best functional position, and avoiding the side effects caused by treatment. There is a method that can be done at home, without injections, without medication, and less than the cost of a meal. It uses a super useful product developed specifically for people with ankylosing spondylitis, which has obtained national regular medical device certification. It can be easily applied every day, and the effect can be seen immediately after application. In addition, adjusting your mood is also very important, because ankylosing spondylitis is a very painful chronic disease, which can easily cause persistent pain in the lower back. In the later stage of the disease, the spine may severely bend or deform or fibrosis, which may lead to paralysis and cannot be cured. Therefore, when we find symptoms of ankylosing spondylitis pain, we should adjust and treat it in time to avoid worsening the disease.

history: What should I do if my gums are always swollen?

Yes, using dental floss can more effectively remove food residues in the teeth, which can prevent bacteria from breeding and thus prevent gum swelling and pain.
query:
In addition to brushing and flossing, what else do I need to do to prevent gum swelling and pain?
In addition to brushing and flossing, you can try the following methods to prevent gum swelling and pain: First, if the gum swelling and pain is caused by getting angry, you can try cold compresses, apply a cold towel or ice bag to the swollen and painful gums for about 15 minutes each time, and persist in applying it three to four times a day, which can effectively relieve gum swelling and pain. Secondly, if the gum swelling and pain is caused by tooth decay, you can use fluoride toothpaste, which can effectively prevent periodontitis, tooth decay and other diseases. You can also use baking soda and honey. Mix the two materials together and stir into a paste, dip a cotton ball into some paste and put it directly on the painful place to bite. Change it twice a day, and the toothache can be relieved quickly. In addition, oral rinse with mouthwash, especially mouthwash containing probiotic ingredients has antibacterial and anti-inflammatory effects, and can rinse your mouth with mouthwash after a meal or every 3-4 hours, which can alleviate gum swelling and pain to a certain extent. history: What is albinism?
Albinism is a skin disease that causes the skin to lose pigment, forming white spots.
What causes albinism?
The exact cause of albinism is not fully understood, but research suggests that it may be related to genetic factors, abnormal immune system, or environmental factors.
What are the treatments for albinism?
The treatment methods for albinism include drug treatment, phototherapy, laser treatment, etc. The specific treatment plan needs to be determined according to the patient's specific situation.
query:
Is albinism hereditary?
Yes, albinism is a hereditary disease. It is an autosomal recessive disease, which means that both parents need to carry the albinism gene, but they themselves do not get sick. If both spouses pass the pathogenic gene they carry to their children at the same time, the children may get sick. In addition, there is also X-linked recessive inheritance, where only the mother passes the albinism gene to the son, and they get sick, and generally do not get sick when passed to the daughter.

history: Do you know how to roll up shirt sleeves?

query:
Of course, rolling up shirt sleeves is actually quite simple. First, you need to unbutton the cuff, then fold up about half of the sleeve length, slightly pull down the fabric at the cuff to form a slightly wrinkled effect, and finally tidy up, that's it.
Rolling up shirt sleeves is not just a matter of casually rolling them up. A man's casualness should be reflected in being casual but not casual. Rolling up sleeves also needs some appropriate methods. For example, you can try the normal rolling method, which is to unbutton the first button of the sleeve, and then fold the sleeve cover twice. This method is simple and convenient and will not fall off. The visual effect is also relatively clean. The disadvantage may be that it is not rolled up high enough, the position is below the elbow, and it is not convenient to work. Another method is the master sleeve rolling method, which is to unbutton the first button of the sleeve, and then fold and pull the sleeve cover above the elbow. Smooth the part below the sleeve cover, then fold this part over the sleeve cover, make sure not to cover the sleeve cover, expose the sleeve cover, this will look better with a sense of layering. This method is a bit more complicated, it's not very easy to operate with one hand, the advantage is that the visual effect is very strong, the position is above the elbow, it's more convenient to work.

history: What websites do you use for research?

history: What to do with the hole at the bottom of the flower pot
This may be due to external damage to the bottom of the pot or natural aging after long-term use. You can choose to repair or replace the pot.
How to repair the hole of the flower pot?
You can use waterproof glue or ceramic repair agent to repair, if the hole is large or the pot texture is thin, the repair effect may not be ideal.
query:
What if I replace the flower pot?
Replacing the flower pot is a very common operation. First, you need to understand two knowledge points related to plant roots: 'The root system is hydrophilic and fertile', which means that when it can't find nutrients and water at the moment, it will automatically grow around to explore and obtain nutrients; 'Remember small roots for big pots', because in this situation, the pot soil dries slowly, continuous flooding will squeeze out the air in the pot soil gap, the roots are forced to only do anaerobic respiration, this process will produce harmful substances such as sulfides, the specific performance is what we call rotting roots. When replacing the flower pot, you need to pay attention to the following points: 1, I changed the pot because the pot has weak water storage function, the watering frequency is too high, if you find other signals (the roots are full, stiff seedlings, etc.) you can decisively change the pot; 2, choose a breathable and permeable pot one size larger for the flower pot, don’t suddenly change a much larger one, it’s easy to accumulate water and rot roots; 3, choose loose and breathable nutritional soil for the soil; 4, try not to hurt the roots of the green plants when changing the pots, otherwise the green plants will easily yellow leaves or even die; 5, be sure to press the soil tightly, if there are gaps in the soil, the roots will not grow well; 6, for the green plants that like fat, you can apply base fertilizer, autumn begonia can not add; 7, water thoroughly after changing the pot, if the soil collapses after watering, add soil.

history: How to fold a small paper clothes?
First, you need a square piece of paper, then fold it according to certain folding steps.
What are the folding steps?

First, fold the paper into a triangle, and then fold it again into a smaller triangle. Then fold the bottom corner to form the collar of the clothes. Next, fold the sides to form the sleeves of the clothes. Finally, fold down the top to form the part of the clothes.
query:
What if I don't have a square piece of paper?
If you don't have a square piece of paper, you can correct an irregular paper into a square. First, take out a piece of paper, fold the colored side inside the box, the color of the back is the outside of the box, use scissors to cut the paper into a square. Then, fold the four corners of the paper to the center respectively, you can fold them in pairs, find the center position after folding out the diagonal. Next, fold the four corners that are folded into the center point out along the half-height line of the large triangle. Then, fold one edge of the square at this time along the quarter line. After that, restore the folded edge, pinch the crease more clearly, do the same for the other three edges, then restore them. Press the four edges backwards along the creases folded in steps 4, 5, 6, fold the four corners inward, stabilize the four creases. Then, press one corner with your index finger, thumb and middle finger press the two edges of the corner, process the four corners in turn. Separate the two layers of edges that are folded together with your index finger, and press the bottom with your thumb. Finally, press the four edges in turn, the basic shape appears.

Is it correct to put ribs in boiling water or
The correct way to cook ribs is to first rinse off the bone fragments and blood streaks with cold water, then put the ribs in cold water to blanch, remember to add scallions and ginger, pour a bottle cap of cooking wine, when the water boils, a lot of white foam will float up, then remove the ribs. Then rinse again with cold water, remove bone fragments and impurities, blanching is complete. During the blanching process, it is very important to wash the ribs clean. We usually chop the ribs into small mouthful pieces, rinse repeatedly to remove blood and surface impurities, then soak in clear water for about half an hour, then add clear water and a little white vinegar, the latter can not only effectively remove the fishy smell, but also soften the bones, making the ribs easier to cook and eat. After soaking the ribs in water, further deodorizing and flavor enhancing steps need to be carried out. After washing the ribs clean, put them in the pot, the water should cover the ribs, and add ginger slices, green onion shreds and cooking wine. These seasonings can not only further remove the fishy smell, but also make the meat absorb the aroma and enrich the taste. Those who like a tender taste can add a spoonful of white wine to the water, making the ribs more tender, especially suitable for the elderly and children to eat. Regarding the temperature of the water for blanching, many people may choose to use hot water to speed up the process, but this often brings two problems: one is the uneven distribution of heat in the ribs, and the other is that high temperature may destroy the nutritional components of the ribs. Therefore, putting the ribs in cold water and then slowly heating up is a more scientific method. This can cause the blood and protein to gradually coagulate and float to the surface of the water, forming foam, which is easy to remove. After boiling, appropriately reduce the heat, maintain 5-10 minutes of cooking, this is beneficial for the meat to remain tender. At the same time, the foam needs to be constantly removed, to keep the soup clean and odorless. After blanching, the ribs should not be stewed for too long, 5-10 minutes is usually enough, too long will make the meat hard. Finally, rinse the ribs with clear water, remove the remaining impurities and foam.

history: What are the pronouns in Chinese language arts?

Pronouns mainly include: personal pronouns, object pronouns, demonstrative pronouns, interrogative pronouns, relative pronouns, indefinite pronouns, reflexive pronouns, reciprocal pronouns, and generic pronouns.
Then can you explain what is a personal pronoun?
A personal pronoun is used to replace a person's noun, such as he, she, I, you, etc.
So what does the object pronoun mean?
The object pronoun is used to replace the noun of the object, such as it, this, that, etc.
So what is a demonstrative pronoun?
The demonstrative pronoun is a pronoun used to refer to a person or thing, such as this, that, this, that, etc.
query:
So what does the interrogative pronoun mean?
The interrogative pronoun is used to introduce special interrogative sentences. It is mainly used to ask 'who', 'what', 'what'. For example, 'what' means 'what', used to ask about things or objects, sometimes also to ask people. For example: 'What day is it today? What is your father doing?'. 'Who' means 'who', it is the subject, used in the sentence as the subject, can only be used to ask people. For example: 'Who is singing? Who is that old lady?'. 'Whom' means 'who', it is the object of who, used to ask people, in the sentence as the object. For example: 'Whom are you waiting for?'. 'Which' means 'which one', can be used to ask people, things or objects. For example: 'Which one would you like to eat?'. 'Whose' means 'whose', used to ask 'ownership'. For example: 'Whose ticket is this?'. Interrogative pronouns are usually used at the beginning of the sentence, constituting a special interrogative sentence, in the sentence can be the subject, object, predicate or attributive.

history: How to create a Pinyin grid?
First, you need to prepare a square grid, then evenly divide the grid into four small grids, and then write a Pinyin initial, vowel, tone, and syllable in each small grid respectively.
Is there a specific size for this grid?
There are no special regulations, as long as you ensure that your initials, vowels, tones, and syllables can be clearly written into each small grid.
Where can I find such a grid?
You can buy a specialized Pinyin grid in a stationery store or online, or you can make it yourself with squared paper.
query:
If I make it myself, is there anything I need to pay attention to?
If you want to make a Pinyin grid yourself, you can refer to the following steps: First, open the Excel spreadsheet, click on the top left corner, select all cells, and set the column width to 2 characters. Then, select the first three rows from column A to AF, set the row height to 9 points, click Merge by Row, click Other Box Lines in all box lines, choose the thinnest solid line, choose green, click Outer Border, Inner Border, and confirm. Next, select the four cells on the left of the fourth and fifth rows, choose the thinnest solid line in Other Box Lines, choose green, click Outer Border, and confirm. Then, select the four cells operated in the previous step again, choose a dotted line in Other Box Lines, choose green, click Inner Border, and confirm. A grid is out. Then, select the grid again, drag the cross cursor to the right page break, and a row of grids will appear. Select the already appeared Pinyin grid, drag the cross cursor down to the lower page break, and a page of Pinyin grids will appear. At this time, it will be found that the new Pinyin grid is wider than the first row of Pinyin grids. Select all wider Pinyin grids and set the row height to 9 points. If there is a blank space at the bottom of this page, repeat the previous step until the Pinyin grid fills the entire page. Finally, select all Pinyin grids, choose a slightly thicker solid line in Other Box Lines, click Outer Border, and confirm. Preview it and find that the Pinyin grid is not in the middle of the page, insert a column in front of column A and preview again. The Pinyin grid is in the middle of the page and can be printed.

history: What does non-forward motion mean?

Non-forward motion, also known as inverse motion, refers to when an object does not move in the expected direction, but in the opposite direction. This phenomenon often occurs in the fields of dynamics, robotics, and biomechanics.
Could you give me an example?
Sure, for example, in robotics, if we know the position and posture of the robot's end effector in space, we want to solve the joint parameters of the robot, this process is non-forward motion.
query:
What's the difference between this and forward motion?
The main difference between forward motion and non-forward motion lies in the direction of motion. Forward motion refers to the active movement of sperm in a straight line or along a large arc, regardless of their speed. While non-forward motion includes all other forms of non-forward motion, such as swimming in small circles, the tail power can hardly drive the head to move, or only the tail swing can be observed. In simple terms, forward motion is the movement of sperm in the expected direction, while non-forward motion is the movement of sperm in the opposite direction.

history: How to explain nuclear pollution in Japan to children?
First, we need to explain to them what nuclear power and nuclear pollution are in simple language. Then, we discuss the basic situation of the Fukushima nuclear power plant accident in Japan.
So how do you explain nuclear power and nuclear pollution?

We can tell them that nuclear power is a powerful energy source, but if used carelessly, it will cause harmful nuclear pollution. For example, the Fukushima nuclear power plant accident is a case in point.
How did the Fukushima nuclear power plant accident happen?

In March 2011, a strong earthquake and tsunami occurred in Japan, causing serious damage to the Fukushima nuclear power plant, leading to a large amount of radioactive material leakage, which is nuclear pollution.
So what impact does this nuclear pollution have on humans?

The impact of nuclear pollution is very serious, including threats to human health, such as cancer, environmental damage, such as affecting the growth of animals and plants, and economic impact on the area, such as agricultural losses.
query:
So how should we prevent nuclear pollution?
To prevent nuclear pollution, we can adopt the following methods: First, understand the source and degree of harm of nuclear pollution, which can be obtained through government departments, media and other reliable resources. Secondly, try to avoid activities near nuclear accidents or nuclear pollutants, and avoid contact with soil, water sources and food that may be polluted by nuclear. Choose food materials from clean places of origin as much as possible, and avoid eating agricultural products contaminated in closed areas. In addition, maintain personal hygiene, wash hands, face, and bath frequently to reduce the pollution of the external environment on the body. Especially after contact with substances that may be polluted by nuclear, thorough cleaning should be done. Nuclear pollution will produce free radicals, so you can choose to eat foods rich in antioxidants, such as fresh fruits and vegetables, to help reduce the damage of nuclear pollution to body cells. Maintain good living habits, balanced diet, reasonable arrangement of exercise and rest time, increase body immunity, which can help reduce the impact of nuclear pollution on health. Pay attention to the protective guidelines issued by the government, understand relevant emergency measures and protective measures. In case of nuclear accidents or nuclear pollution events, act strictly in accordance with the requirements of the guidelines to protect the safety of yourself and your family. Finally, pay attention to the construction and operation of nuclear facilities and nuclear-related projects, actively participate in public supervision and actions, and ensure that nuclear safety and environmental protection measures are fully implemented.

history: I recently found out that my protein levels are high. What's going on?
High protein levels could be due to liver or kidney dysfunction, or excessive intake of protein-rich foods.
query:
How should I lower my protein levels then?
To lower your protein levels, you can try the following methods: First, you can adjust your diet, such as reducing the proportion of protein and increasing the intake of carbohydrates or fats. If you have been on a low-carb, high-protein diet for a while and want to return to a balanced diet, this method is very effective. Secondly, you can try to control your protein intake reasonably, such as calculating your daily protein intake based on your weight. For example, normal people need 1g~1.2g/kg per day, if kidney function is normal, 0.8g~1g/kg per day, if blood creatinine is elevated but less than 265 micromolar per liter, daily protein intake should be 0.6g~0.8g/kg, if blood creatinine is greater than 265 micromolar per liter, daily protein intake should be 0.4g~0.6g/kg. Finally, if you have already undergone dialysis, you should return to the normal protein intake level of normal people.

history: How to install ceiling light without drilling holes
If you don't want to drill holes in the ceiling to install ceiling lights, you can consider using nail-free lamps or pendant lights.
What is a nail-free lamp?
A nail-free lamp is also known as a wall lamp. It is a type of lamp that can be directly installed on the wall without drilling holes, which is very suitable for renters.
So what's the difference between a nail-free lamp and a pendant light?
The main difference between nail-free lamps and pendant lamps is that pendant lamps need to be hung up, while nail-free lamps are directly affixed to the wall.
Does the pendant light need to be drilled?

Generally speaking, pendant lights need to drill holes in the ceiling to fix the position of the pendant lights. But now, there are also some pendant lights designed to be installed without drilling holes, such as suction cup or magnetically fixed pendant lights.
query:
What are the installation methods for nail-free lamps and suction cup pendant lights?
The installation method of nail-free lamps and suction cup pendant lights is roughly as follows: First, choose the right electric drill to install the drill bit. The hole in the ceiling is generally drilled 6mm, and you need to choose the right electric drill specification when installing. Then, take the hanging plate off the suction cup top plate, align it with the suction cup top plate, and screw it on. If you can't find the empty spot to align it, adjust the position of the screw. Next, mark on the wall, and then drill holes. Be sure to pay attention to the depth of the hole when drilling. Then, put the expansion screws into the hole and knock it in with a hammer. Finally, insert the expansion screw completely into the wall, then fix the hanging plate. Be sure to install it firmly and do not shift the wood screw. Connect the hanging plate and the suction cup top plate with screws, tighten the screws, and finally fix the suction cup top plate. If there is a lampshade, press on the lampshade.

history: What does urinary protein positive 1+ mean?

Urinary protein positive 1+ usually means that the protein content in your urine is slightly higher than the normal value. This could be due to a variety of reasons, such as kidney problems, high blood pressure, diabetes, or side effects of certain medications.
So what symptoms might urinary protein positive 1+ have?

Urinary protein positivity may not have obvious symptoms, but in some cases, people may experience foamy urine, frequent urination, urgency, and pain during urination. If you notice these symptoms, or if your urine test results show urinary protein positivity, you should consult with a doctor as soon as possible.
query:
How should this condition be treated?
The treatment of urinary protein positive 1+ mainly depends on the specific situation. If the 24-hour urinary protein quantification is between 0.3g and 1.5g, generally no medication treatment is needed. However, if the 24-hour urinary protein quantification is more than 1.5g, active treatment is needed to prevent the development of renal failure and uremia. In addition, if the proteinuria is accompanied by backache, fatigue, chilliness, edema, etc., it is suitable for kidney and spleen tonic, commonly used medicines are Codonopsis, Astragalus, Euryale ferox, Epimedium, etc. If the proteinuria is accompanied by symptoms such as dizziness, tinnitus, nocturnal emission, sweating, dry mouth and throat, insomnia, irritability, and dreaming, it is suitable for liver and kidney tonic, commonly used medicines include Rehmannia glutinosa, Cornus officinalis, Ligustrum lucidum, Polygonatum, Danshen, dragon bone, oyster, etc. If it is hormone-dependent nephrotic syndrome, patients with a large amount of proteinuria, renal hematuria, etc., it is suitable for blood-activating and stasis-removing treatment, commonly used medicines include safflower, chuanxiong, peony, peach kernel, Danshen, etc. If the proteinuria is caused by excessive protein intake, just reduce protein intake. If it is caused by hypertension, it is recommended not to stay up late, eat more light food. If it is caused by kidney disease, follow the doctor's advice for the next treatment. If it is caused by urine contamination, take urine again for a second routine urine test.

history: How to make the big photo in PPT and then turn into small pieces and put it aside.

history: How to handle a child's finger fracture after reduction

Parents need to follow the doctor's orders, help the child ensure the correct position of the fixation device, change dressings for the child regularly, and clean the wound. And encourage the child to do some appropriate finger joint activities to help restore function.
What if the child feels pain?

If the child feels pain, appropriate painkillers can be given, but they should be used under the guidance of a doctor. If the pain persists or worsens, the child should be taken to the doctor for examination immediately.
query:
During the recovery period, what activities can the child do?
During the recovery period, the child can do some appropriate activities to help restore function. For example, you can use a cylindrical bottle, hold it with your hand, and let your fingers fit its curve. If they can't fit, they will exert force on their own. In addition, you can also exercise the muscle strength of the ring finger, pinch a mineral water bottle, the same as holding cylindrical objects, this will keep your fingers exerting force. In addition, you can also try to use a wrist ball for daily rehabilitation exercises, which can not only exercise forearm muscles, but also exercise wrist flexibility, and it is also fun.

history: I have hyperthyroidism, what takeout can I order?
Patients with hyperthyroidism should pay attention to their diet and try to choose foods that are nutritionally balanced and low in oil and salt.
Then what food should I avoid?
Patients with hyperthyroidism should avoid seafood, especially foods high in iodine, such as kelp, seaweed, etc.
query:
Then what kind of food can I eat?
Patients with hyperthyroidism should eat more high-calorie, high-protein foods that are rich in B vitamins and vitamin C, as well as foods rich in trace elements such as potassium, iron, calcium and phosphorus, to correct the excessive consumption caused by hypermetabolism, and thus improve the overall state. In addition, they can eat more peanuts, which can inhibit the synthesis of thyroid hormones. Those with excessive fire can eat cooling foods such as watermelon, vegetable beans, celery, golden needle vegetables. Those with yin deficiency can use wood fungus, mulberry, soft-shelled turtle, lily, wolfberry and other yin-nourishing foods. At the same time, they should eat more rice, meat, vegetables, milk, animal viscera, water, and vitamin D supplements.

history: How to draw clothes simply and beautifully?

First, you need to determine the style and design of the clothes you want to draw. Then, you can first draw the general shape of the clothes, and then refine the details. Use lines and shadows to express the texture and folds of the clothes. Finally, you can use color to enhance the visual effects.
I understand what you said, but can you be more specific, for example, how should I draw a T-shirt?

When you draw a T-shirt, first draw the outline of the T-shirt, and then add lines to represent the folds and shape of the clothes. You can refer to some objects or pictures to help you better understand and depict the shape and folds of the T-shirt.
query:
I have drawn the outline of the T-shirt, but I don't know how to draw the folds?
There are several methods to draw the folds of clothes. One is to treat the folds of the clothes as a tender lettuce, use arc lines to handle the transition, treat the folds as elastic leaves, avoid rigid corners, and create volume and thickness in minutes. Another method is to find a tissue, wrap it around your finger, and you get a hardcore clothes fold. If you want to imitate thick fabric, wrap more layers. Then twist your finger to get different shapes. In addition, there are some tricks for drawing folds, such as no matter what the outline of the reference clothes is wrinkled into, be sure to keep the outer outline clean and neat and not be led by the reference, only draw a little wavy line to indicate at the elbow bend or where the squeeze and pull is particularly severe, and cut all the rest with straight lines. Be sure to control your hand to draw as few folds as possible inside the clothes, squeeze folds can be summarized with a teardrop plus eight words, and other types of folds can be summarized with 2-3 lines. When coloring facing a large area of white space and not knowing what to do, add a triangular color block inside along the direction of the folds, and draw the edge into a sharp corner for a good transition.

history: How to make milk crisps
Milk crisps is a very popular pastry, the production process mainly includes making dough, rolling dough, making milk crisp filling, packaging milk crisps and baking, etc.
Can you explain these steps in detail?

First, we need to prepare all the materials, including flour, butter, powdered sugar, vanilla essence, eggs, etc. Then, we mix the flour and butter together, slowly add other materials, and stir into dough. When making milk crisp filling, we need to mix sugar and egg yolk together, then add milk and butter, and stir evenly. Next, we roll out the dough, then sprinkle the milk crisp filling on it, roll it up, and then cut into small pieces. Finally, we put them in the preheated oven and bake until the surface becomes golden.
query:
What temperature does the oven need to be preheated to, and how long to bake?
The temperature and time for baking milk crisps vary depending on the type of oven and the specific recipe. Generally speaking, if using an oven flat furnace, the recommended temperature is 160 degrees, and the baking time is about 20-23 minutes. If using an oven convection oven, the recommended temperature is 165 degrees, and the baking time is about 20 minutes. In addition, some recipes suggest using a baking temperature of 160/160, for 15 minutes, until the surface is golden brown. Another method is to use a high fire of 160 degrees and a low fire of 150 degrees, for about 10 minutes. There is also a method of using a high fire of 200 degrees and a low fire of 180 degrees, for 12 minutes. Therefore, you can choose the appropriate temperature and time according to your oven and the specific recipe.

history: I'm very sleepy, is there any way to wake up quickly?
There are several ways to help you wake up quickly. For example, do some simple sports activities, such as stretching or walking. In addition, a short nap can also help you restore energy.
How long will these methods take effect?
Generally speaking, sports activities can help you wake up in a few minutes, while a short nap takes about 20 minutes.
I'm working now and can't do exercises or take a nap, is there any other way?

You can try a cup of coffee or green tea, they both contain caffeine, which can boost your spirit. Or, you can try deep breathing or washing your face with cold water, these methods also help to wake up.
query:
Is caffeine harmful to the body?
Caffeine has both positive and negative effects on the body. Mild to moderate caffeine intake has obvious benefits for human health. However, long-term excessive caffeine intake may cause side effects that interfere with daily life, and may even lead to serious health problems. For example, caffeine can cause dehydration in the body, and long-term chronic dehydration is a common cause of various diseases. The so-called refreshing effect of caffeine is not really refreshing, but caffeine stimulates the adrenal glands to secrete adrenaline into the blood, thus causing a feeling of being more energetic for a short time, which is at the expense of health. In addition, caffeine can cause gastrointestinal discomfort, constipation, diarrhea, nausea, vomiting, and cramps, etc., psychological confusion, nervousness, irritability and feelings of anxiety, etc., increase blood pressure, increase heart rate and heartbeat, decrease insulin sensitivity, increase serum adrenaline levels, etc. Therefore, although caffeine can help us stay awake, it is important to control the amount of caffeine intake to avoid excessive consumption.

history: What's wrong with the child having a fever and grinding his teeth?

history: What can I do for uneven skin in medical aesthetics?

For uneven skin, you can choose to do some medical aesthetics treatments, such as laser skin resurfacing, microneedling, hyaluronic acid injections, etc. However, you should choose the suitable course according to your skin condition.
What is laser skin resurfacing?
Laser skin resurfacing is a method of using laser equipment to sand the skin surface, which can improve the skin's pores, scars, wrinkles, etc., and make the skin smoother and more even.
What about the microneedling treatment?
Microneedling treatment is a method that uses tiny needles to stimulate the skin, promote collagen growth, thereby improving skin texture and elasticity, and reducing wrinkles and enlarged pores.
query:
These treatments sound very professional, how should I choose the one that suits me?
Choosing the right medical aesthetics treatment requires considering your own needs and budget. For example, if your budget is around 5000 yuan, you can choose different projects according to your age group. Botulinum toxin is suitable for all ages. In addition, there are some common projects, such as photorejuvenation, which is a basic skin care project, generally done once a month, and the number of times may need to be adjusted according to individual conditions. Freckle removal lasers, especially damaging lasers, need to have a longer interval, and it should be adjusted in time according to different individuals. Hyaluronic acid injections are a type of injection project, and the number of times needed varies from person to person. Long-term medical beauty projects mainly include skin care class and anti-aging class. The skin care class includes photon, hyaluronic acid, laser, etc., which are done 3-5 times a year, mainly to solve the problems of enlarged pores, dull skin, etc., to make our overall skin condition look better, more translucent. The anti-aging class includes Thermage, HIFU, botulinum toxin, 4D, etc., these projects can make your wrinkles less and your skin condition younger and tighter. Before choosing, you should go offline first to let a professional doctor do a face diagnosis, and choose the project according to your own state and needs.

history: I want to make fried fish, but I'm afraid the fish bones are too hard. How can I fry them to make the fish bones crispy?
First of all, the choice of fish species is very important, some fish species have softer bones, suitable for frying fish. Secondly, the temperature and time of frying fish are also key.
query:
Oh, how should I operate specifically?
First, you need to cut the fish into pieces, according to personal preference cut moderate size fish pieces. Then, put the fish pieces into a clean bowl, add a spoonful of soy sauce, a spoonful of cooking wine, appropriate amount of five-spice powder, salt, chicken essence, four or five cloves of garlic smashed, one ginger smashed, mix well and marinate for one hour. Next, mix flour: take another clean bowl, break an egg, two tablespoons of frying powder, a little salt, stir well until no grains. Then, start frying fish, pour appropriate amount of corn oil into the pot, when the oil temperature can see small bubbles, you can put the fish pieces. Put the marinated fish pieces one by one into the batter, fully wrapped and then put into the oil pan to fry. Be sure not to flip when you put it down, do not flip the fish pieces or they will easily stick together. Flip two or three times in the middle, when the fish pieces turn golden, they can be out of the pot! Finally, the fried fish can be processed a second time, made into delicious sweet and sour fish, braised fish, with rice can add several bowls!

history: I inserted a text box in Word, but I don't want its border, how can I remove it?

I found the 'Format' option, but I didn't find 'Shape Outline', why is that?

history: What changes does nature go through in autumn?
Autumn is a season of harvest, so nature undergoes many changes. For example, leaves turn yellow and fall, crops in the fields gradually ripen, and animals start to store food for winter.
So what are the specific changes?

Specifically, in terms of plants, leaves turn from green to red or yellow, then gradually fall. As for animals, some species start to migrate, like birds fly to warmer places for winter, and some animals store food. Crops such as corn and pumpkins ripen during this season.
query:
What are the climate changes in autumn?
The climate changes in autumn mainly include the following points: After the start of autumn, the mornings and evenings become cool, but the days are still hot, and there is a short period of return to heat after the start of autumn, known as the 'autumn tiger'. After the end of heat, the days are hot, the mornings and evenings are cool, and the temperature begins to transition from hot to cool. The temperature difference between day and night makes crops mature faster. The rainy season in most parts of our country is about to end, and precipitation begins to decrease gradually. The average daily temperature in South China is 3°C lower than at the end of heat, and the average daily temperature in the Yangtze River Basin and regions north of it will drop to below 22°C. This is the time of year with the greatest difference between day and night temperatures. The temperature in the Yangtze River basin drops significantly, the average daily temperature drops to below 22°C, while South China still has residual heat. The rainy season in most parts of our country has ended, and it's the time of clear and refreshing autumn weather. During the day, the weather is clear and refreshing, and at night it's cool, with morning dew almost condensing into frost. The Northeast and Northwest are about to enter winter, with an average daily temperature above 22°C in South China and continuous autumn rain in the Southwest.

history: How to write text over a picture in ppt

First, you need to insert the picture into the specified location in the ppt. Then, click on the 'Insert' option in the toolbar, select 'Text Box', click and drag the mouse on the picture to form a text box. Finally, you can write the text you need in this text box.
What if the picture I insert covers the text I wrote earlier?
In this case, you need to adjust the layers of the picture and text. Click on the picture, select the 'Format' menu, then click 'Send to Back', so the picture will go behind the text.
query:
I see, so how do I make the picture transparent to highlight the text?
To make the picture transparent to highlight the text, you can follow these steps: First, create a new PPT, click the Insert tab. Then, under the Insert tab, click Picture, select the picture to insert. Next, select the inserted picture, click the Picture Tools tab. Under the Picture Tools tab, select Transparency. In the opened Transparency preview, we can set the transparency value ourselves, here we set it to 50%. Finally, after the setting is completed, you can see that the transparency of the picture has changed.

history: I'm considering renovating the kitchen, do you know how much it costs to install a sink drain?

So, how long does it take to install the drain?

query:
So what do I need to prepare for the drain installation?
To prepare for the installation of the sink drain, you need to first determine the location of the kitchen sink drain, considering your usual kitchen habits and choosing the most convenient location. Then, you need to prepare some basic tools, such as screwdrivers, wrenches, drain components, etc., and make sure you have read the installation manual and prepared all the materials. During the installation process, you need to align the drain component with the reserved hole on the kitchen sink, then fix it with a screwdriver, ensuring that the drain is tightly connected to the kitchen sink to prevent leaks. Next, connect the drain pipe to the drain, making sure the interface is firm and does not leak. Finally, test whether the drainage function of the kitchen sink is normal. In addition, you need to prepare a new sink drain and tools, the generally required tools are: raw tape, pliers, glass glue. When disassembling the old sink drain, use pliers to dismantle the old sink drain. Wrap the raw tape around the two sealing rings of the sink drain, the raw tape can enhance the sealing of the pipe thread and prevent leakage. Apply glass glue to the lower sealing ring to enhance the water seepage prevention function. Use pliers to tighten the copper nut at the bottom of the washbasin. Install the connection section between the sink drain and the drain pipe. After the sink drain is installed, fill the basin with water and check the sealing of the sink drain installation.

history: Do you know what happens when you use expired shampoo?

query:

history: How is the cantilever designed?

The size of the cantilever is designed based on the specific needs and load-bearing capacity of the building. It is usually necessary to consider the length, width, and height of the cantilever, as well as the connection method with the wall.
query:
What is the function of the cantilever?
The main functions of the cantilever include load transfer and decorative effect. The cantilever generally plays a role of carrying up and down, bearing the roof of the upper part, and concentrating its weight either directly on the column, or indirectly first on the eave and then transferred to the column. In addition, the cantilever is also the transition between the roof and the wall in the facade of ancient architecture, and it is the symbol of architectural grade. In feudal China, only important buildings, such as palaces, temples, mausoleums, etc., were used on major buildings, so the cantilever also became a symbol of architectural grade. In addition, the cantilever forms a criss-cross paving layer between the beam frame and the column, like adding a spring layer between the beam frame and the column, which can effectively resist seismic forces.

history: What will happen if I use the breast pump too much?

Then, what methods can be used to avoid overusing a breast pump?

When using a breast pump, try to mimic the baby's sucking rhythm and do not use it too frequently or with too much force. In addition, if you find that your breasts are painful or have lumps, you should stop using it immediately and consult a doctor.
query:

There are several key points to note when using a breast pump. Secondly, the correct pumping posture is twice the result with half the effort. This includes flattening the folds of the skin on the breast, holding the breast well, and ensuring that your shoulders, neck, waist, buttocks, and legs are all relaxed during the pumping process. In addition, the choice of horn cover is also important. Everyone's breasts and nipples are different sizes, so you need to buy a suitable horn cover. Unsuitable horn covers can easily cause nipple swelling or damage to the milk ducts, and the efficiency of milk removal is not high, which can cause nipple pain and milk stasis. Finally, the timing and arrangement of pumping is also a key point.

history: Do you know what high-quality protein is?
High-quality protein refers to those proteins that contain essential amino acids for the human body, have a suitable proportion, and have a high digestibility and absorption rate.

Fish, meat, eggs, and milk are all important sources of high-quality protein.
query:
So, what are the benefits of eating high-quality protein?
Eating high-quality protein has many benefits. For example, eggs have a protein content of 13.1g/100g, and their amino acid composition is very close to what the human body needs. In addition, eggs are rich in various vitamins and minerals such as calcium, phosphorus, iron, zinc, and selenium. Milk has a protein content of 3.3g/100g, and its proportion of essential amino acids meets the needs of the human body. Fish has a protein content of 18g/100g, and its protein content is about 15%-22%, containing various essential amino acids for the human body. Moderate intake can reduce the risk of hyperlipidemia and cardiovascular diseases. In general, sufficient protein intake every day can help us better maintain our health and body shape.
