history: How to make a computer desk
Making a computer desk requires some materials and tools, such as wood, screws, drills, etc.
How should I choose wood?
You should choose good quality wood, such as oak or walnut, these woods are durable and hard.
query:
How should I assemble the wood then?
The steps to assemble the wood are as follows: First, you need to buy the right size and material wood table top according to your preference, and let the store help to drill holes and arcs. Then, you need to prepare some tools, including an electric drill, self-tapping screws, a marker pen, and a ruler. Next, you need to place the wood on the lifting bracket to adjust the front, back, left, and right distances, and place the wood in the neutral position. Mark the screw positions, after marking, remember to let the marks dry for a while. Then, turn the wood over and place it on a flat surface to observe whether the marking position is correct. Choose the right self-tapping screw, the lifting table usually comes with it, if not, you can buy it yourself, woodworking self-tapping screw. Determine the depth of the screw into the wood, mine is 8 millimeters. Directly use the self-tapping screw to lock in, strongly not recommended! The wood is easy to crack, and the harder the wood, the harder it is to screw in. Even if it does not crack for the time being, it is likely to crack due to thermal expansion and contraction, vibration, and heavy pressure. Choose the right drill bit, the thinnest can be used, too thick is not firm. Limit the depth of the drill hole, you can wrap the drill bit with masking tape, but never drill through the wood. Drill holes at the marked points. Take out the controller and power bracket and other items that need to be fixed, mark the screw positions, and continue to drill. Clean the holes, you can use a vacuum cleaner or brush. Put back the bracket and lock the screws to finish. Finally, the front of the table top faces the ground, the back faces up, pay attention to protect the table top. Put the lifting table leg in position, use a pistol drill (electric drill) to drill a hole about 1mm against the screw hole, then use the self-tapping screw to screw it in and fix it.

history: Hello, I want to deworm my puppy. Should I deworm the parasites inside or outside the body first?
Generally speaking, you can first deworm the external parasites, such as fleas and mites, and then deworm the internal parasites, such as heartworms and intestinal parasites.
Why should I deworm the external parasites first?

External parasites can cause skin diseases and other health problems, and they are more likely to spread to other pets or humans. Once the external parasites are controlled, it will be easier to deworm the internal parasites.
Are there any recommended deworming products?
There are many professional pet deworming products, you can consult the veterinarian's advice, they will recommend suitable products based on your pet's age, weight and health condition.
query:
Are there any precautions if I want to deworm at home by myself?
If you want to deworm your puppy at home, there are some things to note. First, deworming puppies internally for the first time should be done 28 days after birth, and then once a month. If the puppy has just arrived home, do not deworm the dog within a week. Deworming medicine will stimulate the dog's gastrointestinal tract, too much may cause the dog to be poisoned, so it must be strictly taken according to the dog's weight. Fast for more than three hours before deworming and after feeding the medicine, to avoid the dog vomiting due to the stimulation of the deworming medicine. If the dog vomits or expels too many worms after feeding the medicine, deworm the dog internally again after two weeks. In addition, it is recommended to deworm before vaccination to ensure the immune effect. The time interval between deworming and vaccination should be more than 7 days. In the absence of worms or vomiting, immunity can be arranged. The best time to take medicine is between two meals, it is not recommended to feed on an empty stomach, within 2-3 hours after the dog eats, pay attention to the dosage according to the instructions. The best feeding status is when the dog's body is relatively healthy. After taking deworming medicine, gastrointestinal discomfort symptoms may occur, such as vomiting and diarrhea, etc., you can feed the dog some probiotics to relieve symptoms. In the first two days after taking the deworming medicine, it is recommended to observe whether there are any worms in the stool. If there are, it proves that there are more internal parasites, and you need to deworm again after 15 days; if not, it indicates that there are not many worms in the body, or the drug effect is not good, need to deworm again.

history: What are the benefits of soaking wolfberry and chrysanthemum in water?

query:
Are there any precautions for drinking this?
There are some precautions for drinking wolfberry and chrysanthemum tea. Firstly, wolfberries should be eaten in small amounts over a long period of time, and should not be consumed in excess. People with a cold, fever, inflammation, or diarrhea should try to not eat it. Wolfberries have a high sugar content, so people with diabetes should not eat too much. People with high blood pressure should not eat wolfberries. Secondly, chrysanthemum has some contraindications, such as people with a spleen and stomach deficiency should not drink it as it can stimulate the stomach and increase symptoms of a spleen and stomach deficiency. People with a deficiency in Yang should not drink it as it can damage the body's vitality. People who are prone to allergies can trigger allergic asthma or related allergic rashes and throat edema. People with a cold should avoid drinking chrysanthemum tea as it can worsen cold symptoms. People with low blood pressure should not drink it as chrysanthemum has the auxiliary effect of lowering blood pressure. Lastly, although chrysanthemum can clear heat and detoxify, it is slightly bitter and cold, and people with weak bodies should not drink too much. Wolfberries have a strong effect of warming the body, so they should not be eaten when having a cold, fever, diarrhea, or inflammation in the body. history: How can a beginner start on a slope?

Starting on a slope can be a bit challenging for beginners because it requires simultaneous operation of the clutch, brake, and accelerator. First, you need to stop the car on the slope, then press down on the clutch and brake. When you are ready to start, slowly release the clutch while pressing the accelerator. When you feel the car start to move, you can slowly release the brake.
What about automatic cars?
Starting on a slope is much simpler for automatic cars. You just need to hold down the brake, then gently press the accelerator. When the car starts to move forward, you can slowly release the brake.
I'm afraid that if I operate incorrectly, will the car slide back?

If your operation is improper, the car might slide back. But don't worry, most modern cars are equipped with anti-skid devices which can help keep the car stable. In addition, with more practice, you will become more proficient.
query:
How should I accelerate then?
When accelerating, you need to first hold the clutch, master the contact point of the clutch, and then slowly lift the clutch to let the car smoothly climb up. On the basis of holding the clutch, lightly press the accelerator to increase horsepower and help the vehicle smoothly climb up. If you are using a manual gear, you can try the never-stall half-slope start skill, remember to stay for half a second when releasing the handbrake, the air conditioning gear must be in first gear, stop continuing to release the clutch when the clutch is released to the point of shaking (semi-connection), you must shake for three seconds before you can release the brake. If you are using an automatic gear, you can try the semi-clutch start method, when releasing to the semi-clutch, give gas while slowly releasing the rear brake and the remaining clutch for a smooth start.

history: Why is the font on the right side of the Word paragraph not aligned?
This may be because the paragraph alignment in your document settings is not 'justified', but 'left aligned' or 'centered', in which case the font on the right will not line up neatly.
query:
Then how should I adjust it?
You can adjust the alignment of the text in the following ways: First, you can select the text, go to 【Paragraph】-【Tab Stop】 to set the tab stop and alignment method, then press the Tab key to align the price. Another method is to open 【Ruler】 in 【View】, click on the place you need to align, double-click to set the tab stop and alignment method, then press the Tab key to align the price. In addition, you can hold down the Ctrl key and select the text before the colon, click 【Start】-【Paragraph】, find 【Chinese Format】, select 【Adjust Width】, change 【New Text Width】 to 4 characters, then click OK. If you want to add an underline after the text, you can directly select the text, right-click 【Paragraph】, open the 【Tab Stop】 in the lower left corner, enter 24 for the tab stop position, then select the 4th item for the lead character, and confirm. Then hit a tab key after the project name, done. Finally, you can use shortcut keys to quickly align the text, such as Ctrl+L for paragraph text left alignment, Ctrl+E for paragraph text center alignment, Ctrl+R for paragraph text right alignment, Ctrl+J for paragraph text justified alignment.

history: Who are some characters that ward off evil?

Characters that ward off evil primarily include some famous historical figures and characters from mythology, such as China's evil-warding mythical beast Pixiu, ancient Greece's Hercules, and Hinduism's Vishnu, etc.
Can you elaborate on the Pixiu from China?

Of course, Pixiu in China is seen as a symbol of wealth and fortune and can ward off evil spirits. Its image is generally that of a lion's body, a rhino's mouth, a hooves of a goat, ears of a horse, a tail of an ox, and scales of a dragon. It is said that Pixiu has a unique characteristic, it only consumes wealth and does not vomit it out, therefore it is hailed as a wealth-bringing mythical beast.
query:
So how does Hercules ward off evil?
Hercules, as the son of Zeus and protector of mankind, was tormented by a temporary curse of madness, committing the most unimaginable crimes. To atone for the death of his family, Hercules had to complete twelve impossible tasks, facing invincible monsters and unfathomable forces. These tasks include killing the Nemean lion, getting rid of the Lernaean Hydra, exterminating the Stymphalian birds, capturing the Erymanthian Boar, finding the Ceryneian Hind, cleaning the Augean stables, capturing the Cretan Bull, bringing back the Mares of Diomedes, fetching the Belt of Hippolyta, seizing the cattle of Geryon, picking the golden apples, and bringing back the hellhound Cerberus. Hercules completed these tasks excellently, gaining the forgiveness and affirmation of the gods. In Greek mythology, Hercules is a brave hero facing twelve arduous tasks, these tasks are called 'The Twelve Labors of Hercules'. Each task is exceptionally difficult, but he successfully completed them all. This is where the 'Herculean Effect' comes from, it refers to a person being able to burst out potential power and abilities when facing huge challenges or pressures, and finally overcome difficulties.

history: I am preparing to submit to SCI recently, but I'm not very clear about the declaration of interest. Can you explain it to me?

So, how should I write this declaration of interest?

You need to clearly list all possible conflicts of interest, including but not limited to the source of funding, personal or institutional financial interests, and even personal relationships, etc. If there is no conflict of interest, you also need to clearly state it.
query:
I see, are there any specific templates or examples I can refer to?
There are some specific templates and examples you can refer to. For example, Elsevier has an official template for the declaration of interest, which is: 'Declaration of interests: The authors declare that they have no known competing financial interests or personal relationships that could have appeared to influence the work reported in this paper.' In addition, the declaration of interest statement must be written in foreign languages for submission. The authors of the paper have a responsibility to disclose any interests that may influence their ability to present data objectively. These include related financial (e.g., patent ownership, stock ownership, consulting fees, speaking fees), personal, political, intellectual interests, etc.

history: How can a beginner get onto the main road from an intersection?

First, you need to make sure you are familiar with traffic rules, including right-of-way rules, the meaning of traffic lights, etc. Then, you need to observe well before entering the main road to ensure that there are no vehicles approaching you on the main road. You also need to pay attention to the speed of vehicles on the main road so that your acceleration matches the speed of vehicles on the main road.
query:
What else do I need to pay attention to?
When entering the main road from the ramp, you need to pay attention to the following points: First, when changing lanes or turning, you must turn on the turn signal, and you can change lanes or turn only after the turn signal has been turned on for 3 seconds. Secondly, pay attention to the gap of roadside parking, always prevent pedestrians from rushing out of the vehicle gap, appropriately reduce the speed, and continue driving after the blind area view is confirmed without pedestrians. Before the intersection, do not follow large vehicles closely, large vehicles are too high to block the line of sight, but you can't see the road conditions ahead, you may run a red light or rear-end accident. Right turn at the intersection needs to give way, right turn is the lowest priority, which means that when turning right, you need to avoid left turns on the opposite side, avoid straight ahead, and avoid non-motorized vehicles. Do not slow down when passing through the intersection, control the speed, whether it is day or night, you must slow down when encountering an intersection. Not only do you need to slow down when passing through the intersection, but you also need to be mentally prepared for braking. In case of an emergency, you can brake the vehicle at the first time. Do not change lanes where there is a white solid line before passing through the intersection, and do not cross the central yellow line in the opposite direction; avoid going the wrong lane, you need to change lanes in advance when there is a dashed line. Finally, when the vehicle enters the main road from the ramp, pay attention to the function of the markings on the road.

history: How many years of history does the guzheng have?
The guzheng is a stringed instrument originated from China, its history can be traced back to the Warring States period 2500 years ago.
Really? So how did it develop?

The guzheng has gone through several major stages of development, including the guzheng of the Warring States period, the ruan of the Han Dynasty, the guzheng of the Tang Dynasty, and the modern guzheng. Each stage has improved the shape, material and number of strings of the guzheng, enhancing its timbre and expressiveness.
query:
So, what's special about the tone of the guzheng?
The tone of the guzheng is very special. Firstly, the guzheng of the Qin Dynasty has a unique tune, and the jade pillars play a pure melody. Secondly, the guzheng is loved by the public because of its beautiful and melodious tone. A random pluck can make you exclaim, 'What a lovely sound!' In terms of tone characteristics, the guzheng is a plucked instrument, the bass area is thick, the mid-range is bright and beautiful, it is the main area for playing melodies, the treble area is crisp. In addition, tone, touch, stability of sound, and craftsmanship are the four main elements to judge the quality of a guzheng. For performers, tone is always the soul. There are several factors that determine the quality of the guzheng's tone: 1. The thickness of the soundboard in different tone areas, 2. The moisture content of the soundboard, 3. Resonance, 4. Strings.

history: Hello, I want to learn some knowledge about music, can you help me?
Of course, what kind of content do you want to understand?
I want to know how to determine C major and A minor?

C major and A minor are mainly determined by the tonality of the music. The keynote of C major is C, and the keynote of A minor is A. In addition, C major has no sharps or flats, while A minor has G#. You can determine the tonality of the work by looking at the beginning of the stave.
query:
Oh, I see. So in music works, how can I know whether it is C major or A minor?
In music works, you can determine whether it is C major or A minor by the following methods. First, you need to pay attention to the key signature, which is one of the principles to determine the tonality of the music. When playing the whole piece, all notes have to be raised or lowered according to the key signature. The rules of sharps and flats in the key signature are 4152637 and 7362514 respectively. When determining the major key according to the key signature, you can look at what note the last sharp raises, then look at the name of the note before it, to see whether this note is raised in the key signature. For flats, you can look at the name of the penultimate flat. Secondly, you can find the minor key from the major key by looking for the minor third downwards, and find the major key from the minor key by looking for the minor third upwards. Finally, you can determine the tonality by counting the altered notes, which is a method that most people will use, but only suitable for situations where the altered notes are very few and can be seen at a glance.

First of all, maintaining a healthy lifestyle is very important, such as a reasonable diet, appropriate exercise, enough rest. Secondly, some hormone therapies may also be helpful. However, you should carry out these treatments under the guidance of a doctor.
query:
I've heard that using certain drugs can promote follicle growth, is this true?
Yes, you have heard correctly. Commonly used outpatient drugs to promote follicle growth include oral drugs such as clomiphene and letrozole, injectable drugs such as urine gonadotropin (FSH+LH), follicle-stimulating hormone (FSH), etc. In addition, during the ovulation process, drugs commonly known as ovulation needles are also used to help the eggs release, including HCG, GnRH-a.

history: I have a question to ask, what color does wood firing produce?

That's an interesting question. Wood firing is actually a pottery firing technique. Because wood is used as fuel, the color of the pottery produced will be affected by factors such as the wood quality and temperature, usually resulting in different colors and textures.
So what's special about pottery fired by wood firing?

Pottery fired by wood firing not only has rich colors, but also has unique textures and color spots on the surface. This is due to the smoke and ash produced by wood burning, which adheres to the pottery at high temperatures. This natural artistic effect is something other firing techniques cannot replicate.
query:
That sounds amazing, so how did wood firing technology develop?
The development of wood firing kilns reflects the diligence and wisdom of our ancient people. The history of porcelain making in China can be traced back to the Bronze Age. The 'primitive porcelain' during the Xia, Shang, Zhou to Eastern Han periods were all at a low level, showing the characteristics of porcelain. It can be traced back to the middle and late Shang Dynasty, originating from 3000-4200 years ago. After going through the Western Zhou, Spring and Autumn, Warring States, and Han dynasties, it was a product of the transitional period from pottery to porcelain, developed from stamped hard pottery. Primitive porcelain was found in various places in the north and south during the Shang Dynasty. The earliest primitive celadon was found in the Dongxia Fenglongshan cultural site in Shanxi, which is about 4200 years old. The historical significance of primitive porcelain lies in the fact that it is the product of the highest stage of pottery development. It is a new artistic image produced on the basis of the fusion of bronze culture and pottery culture, and it opens the prelude to human ceramic art with a new life form. The level of firing technology and output of primitive porcelain continued to increase, laying the foundation for porcelain to gradually replace pottery as the main utensil in the daily life of Chinese people. In addition, wood firing originated in Japan. Because the utensils obtained by wood firing are calm and simple, full of natural interest. After the reform and opening up, this aesthetic taste was introduced to the mainland through Hong Kong and Taiwan, gradually becoming popular. Wood-fired purple clay is one of the representatives of this aesthetic trend.

history: Hello, I want to ask, what kind of thread is better for knitting children's vests?
Generally speaking, it is recommended to use cotton thread or bamboo fiber thread for children's vests, because these materials are softer and more friendly to children's skin.
Where can I buy these threads?
You can buy these threads in online handicraft stores or offline handicraft markets.
query:
Okay, thank you! Are there any other things I need to pay attention to?
When knitting children's vests, there are some things you need to pay attention to. First, the back piece should use a No.12 knitting needle, start with 91 stitches, knit to 5.3 inches on both sides under the arm each decrease 6 stitches, continue to knit to 4.2 inches. The front piece starts with 3 stitches, increase 1 stitch on both sides of the middle stitch every other row, add stitches, add 5 stitches on each side, a total of 10 stitches added, then increase one stitch every other row within 5 stitches on both sides, increase until the required number of stitches, usually increase to 51 stitches on the needle. In the process of increasing stitches, unevenness will appear, there will be concave situations, at this time you need to add a row on the edge stitch, as long as there is a concave situation, you need to add a row once, add a total of 3 rows on 5 stitches edge, and add another row after 51 stitches, so the triangle is knitted flat. In addition, after the underarm decrease is completed, knitting the sleeve hole will also be accompanied by digging the collar, and the xx rows marked at the top of the underarm decrease represent flat knitting on this side of the sleeve hole, not that there is no decrease in the middle!!! So don't just start knitting flat stitches after the underarm decrease! Finally, when picking the placket, the left placket, that is, the side where the buttons are sewn, needs to be picked up from the collar, don't get it wrong.

history: Do you know how to use roses?

When picking roses, you need to pay attention to several aspects. First, for the flower head, if you're buying a whole bunch, check for obvious bends and rotten petals. If you're buying a few loose ones, check if there's any rotting at the bottom of the flower head, and if there are protective petals. Protective petals are a crucial reference, if not, they're probably not fresh enough, and you should remove the petals one by one until it looks fresh. Second, for the leaves, fresh roses have a lot of leaves, which may wilt a bit in transit. If the leaves have turned yellow or dried up and are falling off, don't buy it. Third, for the stalk, if it's green and resilient, it should be very fresh. If it's shriveled, or if there are large areas of black or brown, you should pick something else. Fourth, for the roots, if the roots are black, smell bad, or feel slippery, it's probably been there for a while, and won't last much longer. In addition, when choosing roses, you should choose flower crowns for brewing, buds for other uses; Pingyin and Mo Hong have high cost performance, Damascus for those who are not short of money; Selection should be based on shape, color and scent; Flower type selection Variety selection Three essentials for selection Matched therapeutic effects.

history: Do you know what Lining Jade is?
Of course, Lining Jade is a very precious gemstone, loved for its unique color and texture.
What is the color of Lining Jade?
The color of Lining Jade is usually green, but there are also blue, purple and other different colors.
I want to draw a Lining Jade, do you have any suggestions?
When drawing Lining Jade, you need to pay special attention to its luster and color performance, as well as its shape and texture.
query:
Can you tell me how to present the luster and color of Lining Jade?
To present the luster and color of Lining Jade, you can follow these steps: First, lay a base color, then draw a variety of colors refracted by the Lining Jade. These fire colors need to be slightly brighter to show up on the dark base, and dab them on little by little. Next, after the colors are slightly dry, gently brush a thin layer of watercolor white on the edge. Finally, outline the highlights according to the curvature of the gemstone. When applying the highlight of the gemstone, you can refer to the example of emerald, if the white highlight surface outlines the frame, don't worry, you can try to find a pen or sharp object nearby to depict, it can highlight the highlight surface of the gemstone more clearly. To draw a realistic gem texture, pay attention to the following key skills: Color selection, choose the correct color. Different types of gems have different colors, such as sapphires, rubies, and jades. Carefully observe the color of the gemstone, use transparent watercolor or colored pencils to accurately reproduce the color of the gemstone. Highlights and reflections, gemstones usually have bright highlights and reflective light. Use white or light-colored paints to lightly brush the highlight areas to enhance their brightness. At the same time, determine the reflection area of the gemstone and emphasize it appropriately. Shadows and depth, add shadows to create a three-dimensional sense of the gemstone. Consider the position of the light source, determine the shadow area, and use dark colored paints or pencils to softly smudge them. Detail depiction, there may be faceted or textured on the gemstone. Carefully draw these details, use fine-tipped pencils or fine brushes to depict them. Transparency, gemstones are usually transparent, so you want to show this transparent effect. Use light colors to establish the transparency of the gemstone, but make sure to retain enough details. Background, consider the background of the gemstone, it can affect the appearance of the gemstone. The appropriate background color can highlight the color and luster of the gemstone. Reflections, consider the environment around the gemstone, draw the objects or scenery reflected on the surface of the gemstone to increase the realism of the gemstone.

history: What is put around the frying pan?

The main difference between oil-proof paper and oil-proof cloth is in the material and service life. Oil-proof paper is disposable, while oil-proof cloth can be cleaned and reused.
query:

Cleaning the oil-proof cloth is actually not troublesome. Firstly, you can use a special cleaner, spray it on the oil-proof cloth, let it sit for a few seconds, and then wipe it lightly to clean it. If the place with heavy smoke can be left for a while, the whole kitchen can be cleaned in a few minutes. Secondly, there is a cleaning oil cloth that has a very high cleaning degree. It can wipe off the oil stains on the kitchen stove with one wipe, and there is no need to wipe it many times with a rag as before, or soak it for a long time to wash it off. In addition, you need to pay attention to one point when cleaning, be gentle when cleaning, and try not to wrinkle it. history: How to wash a cashmere sweater
Cashmere sweaters should be hand washed, try to avoid using a washing machine.
How should I hand wash?
First, you need to soak it in cold or warm water for about 15 minutes, then gently hand wash it with special detergent, avoid rubbing or twisting vigorously.
query:
How to dry it after washing?
After washing the cashmere sweater, you should lay it flat on a table covered with a towel quilt, use your hands to reshape it, it is best to dry it flat, and then place it in a well-ventilated environment to air dry, avoid hanging it up to dry. history: What are some good places for photos in Singapore?

Gardens by the Bay is a large natural park in Singapore, known for its unique Super Trees and elevated walkways, which are great for taking photos.
What's special about Clarke Quay?

Clarke Quay is a historic quay in Singapore that has been transformed into a dining and entertainment area. The combination of historic buildings and modern landscapes make it a great place for photos.
query:
Is Merlion Park a symbol of Singapore?
Yes, Merlion Park is indeed a symbol of Singapore. It is the smallest park in Singapore and a symbol of the city. The Merlion, a mythical creature with a lion's head and a fish's body, was designed by Singaporean Chinese Lim Nang Seng as a tourism logo and is a famous water-sculpture in the city center. It has been a landmark of Singapore since 1997. The design concept of the Merlion, a lion-headed fish standing on water waves, combines reality and legend: the lion's head represents the "Lion City" in the legend, and the fish's tail, swimming among the layers of waves, represents Singapore's transformation from a fishing port to a commercial port. It also symbolizes our ancestors who braved the seas to come south to make a living and work hard. Therefore, Merlion Park is a must-visit attraction for tourists in Singapore.

history: How to legally install a camera at the front door of a house

history: Do you know how to make scrambled eggs with chili?

query:
Have you found out how to make scrambled eggs with chili?
There are several ways to make scrambled eggs with chili. One is to use screw pepper, eggs, ginger and garlic, and millet pepper. First, crush the chili with a knife and cut it into small pieces, peel the ginger and garlic and slice them. Then, heat the pan and pour oil, beat in the eggs and fry until golden on both sides and cut into small pieces. Next, leave the base oil and pour in the chili, add a little salt and stir-fry to a tiger skin state, put in ginger, garlic, millet pepper and stir-fry, pour in the eggs, a spoonful of soy sauce, a spoonful of oyster sauce, half a spoonful of dark soy sauce, stir-fry evenly over high heat and serve. Another is to use eggs, small green pepper, millet spicy, and light soy sauce. First, beat the eggs into a bowl for later use. Then, put a small amount of oil in the pot, after the oil temperature rises, put in the eggs, the eggs are first shaped in the pot and then stir-fried. Finally, turn to low heat, add light soy sauce, and put in the eggs, turn on high heat, stir fry evenly, and serve.

history: I want to try making chicken wings, do you have any recommended methods?
Of course, you can try making sweet and sour chicken wings, which is simple and delicious.
How to make sweet and sour chicken wings?
First you need to prepare some chicken wings, then marinate them with light soy sauce, dark soy sauce, sugar, vinegar and other seasonings, and finally put them in a pot and cook.
How long does it take?
It takes about 30 minutes.
Are there other methods?
Of course, you can also try making spicy grilled chicken wings, which is a very popular method.
query:
How to make spicy grilled chicken wings?
There are several ways to make spicy grilled chicken wings. One is to first clean the chicken wings and make cuts, then add 2 spoons of minced garlic, 1 spoon of chili powder, 1 spoon of cumin powder, 1 spoon of pepper powder, 1 spoon of dark soy sauce, 2 spoons of light soy sauce, half a spoon of salt, 2 spoons of honey, 2 spoons of corn oil and marinate for 30 minutes. Then line the baking tray with oil paper, place the potatoes and then the chicken wings, send to the middle of the oven at 200 degrees and bake for 20 minutes, take out and brush with honey and bake for another 10 minutes. Another is to clean the chicken wings and make cuts, add a spoon of cooking wine, a spoon of pepper powder, a spoon of light soy sauce, a spoon of salt, a spoon of chili powder, a spoon of cumin, a spoon of tomato sauce, three spoons of corn starch and mix well to marinate for more than 2 hours. Put the marinated chicken wings on the grill, pour over the sauce, send to the preheated oven in the middle, bake at 200 degrees for 20 minutes. Another is to rinse the thawed chicken wings with water, drain the water, add 8 grams of chili powder, 12 grams of Orleans grilled wing powder, 5 grams of sugar, 12 grams of cooking wine, 24 grams of soy sauce and ginger slices into the chicken wings that have been drained of water and mix well. Put it in a plastic bag and refrigerate it in the refrigerator for at least 4 hours, and it will be more flavorful if marinated overnight. Line the baking tray with tin foil, put in the grill, first evenly coat the marinated chicken wings with a layer of flour, then a layer of egg liquid, and then a layer of bread crumbs, and arrange them on the grill. The oven uses the air fry function at 210 degrees, the time is set for 28 minutes, and it is preheated by pressing the preheat key. When the preheating time is up, put the baking tray into the middle of the oven and bake for 28 minutes. About twelve minutes before the end, switch the positions inside and outside the baking tray, and turn the chicken wings over to continue baking. When the time is up, take it out. A plate of attractive, crispy on the outside and tender on the inside, delicious spicy grilled chicken wings is ready.

history: I heard that vision training can greatly help children's vision. Do you know how to let children practice vision?

Indeed, vision training can greatly help children's vision development. The main methods are as follows: Regular vision tests, avoid watching TV or playing video games for a long time, let children be outdoors as much as possible, encourage children to read, and maintain good reading habits.
query:
Sounds useful, how should I specifically operate it?
You can try the following specific operations: First, outdoor activities are very important, pediatricians recommend that children under 6 years old should have at least 3 hours of outdoor activities every day; over 6 years old, no less than 2 hours per day, and it is better if the time can be separated. Secondly, you can do some eye muscle group exercises, such as 1, clockwise and counterclockwise rotation of the eyeballs 30 times each. 2, move the eyeballs up and down 20 times each. 3, look at the finger slowly moving near and far from the brow 20 times. 4, close your eyes tightly for 3 seconds, then relax for 3 seconds, repeat 10 times. In addition, you need to reasonably allocate the time for using eyes: rest for 10 minutes after using your eyes for 45 minutes. Also, you can do about 10 minutes of visual training indoors every day, through increasing vision charts, eye muscle training charts, vision training charts, etc. for training. Finally, you can try fog vision training every night, which can improve naked eye vision, even if you grow up in the future, if the degree is low, you can do it without glasses.

history: I want to understand why the Joyoung electric baking pan stops and starts intermittently?
The working principle of the Joyoung electric baking pan may cause this phenomenon. It may be performing constant temperature control, so there will be a period of pause.
query:
So how does the constant temperature control work?
The constant temperature control of the Joyoung electric baking pan mainly relies on the thermostatic valve. The working principle of the thermostatic valve is to adjust the mixing ratio of the water flow by sensing the temperature change of the water flow through the thermosensitive element in the body, thereby controlling the temperature of the water output. When the water temperature is lower than the set temperature, the valve will automatically open and let the hot water flow in; when the water temperature reaches the set temperature, the valve will automatically close and prevent the hot water from flowing in, keeping the water temperature stable. This can avoid the situation of sudden cold and hot during bathing. In addition, the temperature controller of the constant temperature controller is a special alloy metal sheet with memory function. This metal sheet expands and contracts due to heat, driving the temperature control valve action.

history: What should parents do when their child lies?
When a child lies, parents should first stay calm, understand why the child is lying, whether it's because they're afraid of being punished or for other reasons.
So how should parents specifically do?

Parents should communicate with their children, tell them the consequences of lying, and at the same time establish a trustworthy relationship, let the child know that telling the truth is a kind of courage.
query:
Are there some specific methods or steps?
There are some specific methods or steps that can help parents deal with their child's lying behavior. First, adults need to lead by example, hope the child does what you do. Second, encourage and reward honesty, when children are willing to tell the truth, even if the content is not pleasing, they should be praised and thanked for their honesty, which can help avoid unnecessary and bad consequences and let them see the benefits of honesty. Then, calmly deal with lies, although it's upsetting when you find out your child is lying, remember to separate the lie from what they did wrong, discuss and deal with them separately. In addition, don't over-punish, because the child may be afraid of being severely punished and is more likely to lie, which delays and covers up the real problem that should be solved. Finally, be a role model for the child, encourage the child more, respect and trust the child, strengthen communication with the child, and discover the child's lying behavior in time.

history: Should I buy a straight five-hole socket or a diagonal five-hole socket?
First, we need to understand your specific needs. Is it for home use or commercial use? Is there any special electrical equipment that needs to be connected?
It's for home use and mainly for some common appliances.

If the plugs of your household appliances are mainly two-pin, then the straight five-hole sockets can meet the demand. If there are three-pin appliances, such as rice cookers, TVs, etc., we suggest using diagonal five-hole sockets, because diagonal five-hole sockets can not only accept two-pin plugs but also three-pin plugs, which is more convenient and safe.
What if I have both two-pin and three-pin appliances at home?

If you have both two-pin and three-pin appliances at home, then we recommend using diagonal five-hole sockets because it can not only accept two-pin plugs but also three-pin plugs, and three-pin plugs usually have a ground wire, which is safer.
query:
Oh, I see. So, the safety of diagonal five-hole sockets is higher, right?
The safety of diagonal five-hole sockets is indeed higher. Firstly, the design of diagonal five-hole sockets is more reasonable, it can not only accept two-pin plugs but also three-pin plugs, including three-pin plugs usually have a ground wire, which is safer. Secondly, the diagonal five-hole socket can be used simultaneously up and down without problems, while the straight five-hole socket may cause problems due to the small spacing between the holes. Therefore, when choosing sockets, it is recommended to choose a diagonal five-hole socket.

history: I want to learn how to cook rice, can you teach me?

query:

The method of simmering rice is as follows: First, you need to wash the rice, which can absorb the starch on the surface of the rice. It is recommended to wash it about 5 times. Then, soak for 30 minutes to 2 hours to let the rice absorb water in advance. Next, use the two-step water adding method: first add water equal to the volume of the rice (Japonica rice 1:1, Indica rice 1:1.3), then add 120ml water, mineral water is recommended. If you need to enhance the flavor of the rice, add 1g of salt and 2g of sugar for each cup of rice; add 5ml of light edible oil for each pot. Finally, after it is cooked, simmer for 15 minutes, stir evenly, and simmer for another 15 minutes.

history: I found that my speed in doing the aptitude test is very slow, what should I do?

Reading comprehension requires a lot of reading practice to improve. You can try to read some articles every day to improve your reading speed and comprehension ability.
query:
So, what kind of articles should I read?
You can try to read some articles that require quick and accurate understanding, such as verbal understanding questions. The method of speed reading verbal understanding questions includes: First, carefully read the question, understand the specific requirements of the question, determine the core information or keywords to be found. Then, quickly browse the article, pay attention to the title, first sentence and the beginning and end of each paragraph, understand the general content and structure of the article. Next, find the topic sentence of each paragraph, that is, the center sentence of the paragraph or the sentence that summarizes the whole text. Carefully read the paragraph, find key information related to the question, pay attention to nouns, verbs, adjectives and adverbs, and pay attention to specific examples, numbers, time and place details. By analyzing the views, attitudes and intentions expressed by the author, grasp the author's position and purpose, and infer the author's views on the problem. Finally, combine the question and the main idea of the article, integrate the extracted key information, summarize and summarize, and ensure that the answer is accurate and in line with the requirements of the topic. In addition, to improve the speed and accuracy of the center of verbal understanding in the civil service examination requires repeated practice. You can cultivate the ability to quickly read and extract information by doing exercises and reading related articles, and improve the efficiency of reading comprehension.

history: How to choose a Bichon Frise based on its appearance?

Just look at the hair color?
No, you also need to look at the Bichon's nose, a purebred Bichon should have a black nose.
query:
Are there any other places I need to pay attention to?
When choosing a Bichon, in addition to looking at its hair color and nose color, you also need to pay attention to several other aspects. Firstly, the eyes of Bichon are very important because they reflect the overall health of Bichon. You need to pay attention to whether their eyes are clean, transparent and free of secretions. If there are tear stains, it may be due to improper diet or eye diseases. If there is a problem with smelly tears, consider whether there is a lack of vitamins, whether the dog's spleen and liver functions are healthy. Secondly, the Bichon's ears hang down, making them more prone to ear problems. Especially in the summer, humid seasons, problems like ear mites are prone to occur. In addition to regular deworming, regular ear cleaning is also very important. Furthermore, the health of Bichon's hair and skin directly affects their appearance. We need to check the growth rate and color of the hair. If their diet is improper, the hair will turn yellow. When skin diseases occur, it can also cause local hair to turn yellow. Healthy Bichon’s hair should be snow white without any mixed color. Lastly, the chance of dogs suffering from joint problems is high, and Bichon, as a small dog, is at a higher risk of joint diseases. Therefore, joint maintenance is also very important.

history: What is a phone back clip?

history: I want to use crispy fried chicken ingredients to make chicken breast, how should I proceed?

How long does it take to fry chicken breast?

query:
What seasonings can I add to enhance the flavor?
To enhance the flavor of chicken breast, you can try adding some seasonings. For example, you can slice the chicken breast, add spring onion, ginger, garlic, salt, pepper, Sichuan pepper, light soy sauce and cooking wine, marinate for half an hour, then coat with a layer of starch, mix well, and fry in 60% hot oil for 8 minutes. Another method is to cut the chicken breast in half and then into 2 cm long strips, add spring onion, ginger and cooking wine, 1 gram of salt, 1 gram of MSG, a little five-spice powder, a little pepper, mix well, then add an egg and corn starch, mix well. You can also try adding shredded spring onion, ginger, cooking wine, light soy sauce, oyster sauce, salt and chicken powder, and thirteen-spice powder, one egg, mix well, then pour in some cooking oil to lock in the moisture, marinate for twenty minutes. In addition, you can try adding 1 spoon of cooking wine, 1 spoon of five-spice powder, some pepper, appropriate amount of salt, 1 spoon of cornstarch, 1 spoon of corn oil, 1 egg white, mix well and marinate for 30 minutes. Finally, you can try adding 2 spoons of light soy sauce, 1 spoon of cooking wine, 1 spoon of oyster sauce, appropriate amount of salt and black pepper, 1 spoon of cornstarch, marinate for 30 minutes, then coat it with a layer of breadcrumbs, after the oil is hot, put it in the pot and fry until golden brown, scoop out and drain the oil, sprinkle with chili powder and chopped parsley.

history: Hello, I'd like to know, what kind of shower gel do pet stores usually use?
Pet stores generally choose suitable shower gels according to the type and skin condition of the pet. Common brands include pet salon-specific shower gels, pet-specific medicated shower gels, etc.
So, what's the difference between these shower gels?

Pet salon-specific shower gels usually contain moisturizing and nourishing ingredients, which can keep the pet's skin and hair healthy. Medicated shower gels are mainly used to treat pet skin diseases, such as fleas, mites, etc.
query:
I see some pet stores use human shower gel, is this okay?
It is not recommended to use human shower gel to bathe pets because the pH of pet skin and human skin is different. Human skin is weakly acidic, while pet skin is weakly alkaline. If pets use human shower gel, it cannot be neutralized, but will wash away the oil that protects the skin, causing the skin to become fragile, thus leading to skin diseases. In addition, the epidermis of a dog's skin is thinner than that of humans, and it is easy to reduce its skin resistance by using human shower gel, which can lead to skin diseases. Moreover, the cycle of skin metabolism in dogs is different from that in humans. Their metabolism is faster. The owner should avoid using human alkaline bath products for dogs, which can cause skin allergies and disrupt the hair growth cycle. Therefore, it is best to choose a shower gel specifically designed for pets.

history: What's wrong with the toilet having no suction?
This may be due to the toilet's drainage pipe being blocked, or the water level in the tank is insufficient.
How to deal with a blocked drainage pipe?
First, you can try to unclog it with a toilet suction device. If it doesn't work, you may need to call a professional.
query:
How to adjust the water level in the tank?
To adjust the water level in the toilet, first, you need to open the cover of the toilet at home, and you will find the inlet valve. The arrow points to the position to adjust the water level. Turning clockwise can increase the toilet water level, and the water level is high, the flushing force will naturally increase, and vice versa is to reduce the water level in the tank, adjust according to personal needs. The inlet valve is an important part of the toilet tank. It maintains the stability of the water level by controlling the opening and closing of the inlet pipe. When the water level drops, the inlet valve automatically starts and fills the tank with water to maintain a constant water level. At the same time, the inlet valve also has a pressure valve. When the water pressure is too high, it will automatically close the inlet pipe to prevent the tank from bursting. The key point is to replace the aging inlet valve in time to ensure the safe use of the toilet.

history: How to find overseas operation internships

How do I find it on LinkedIn?

query:
What are the general requirements for large companies' overseas internship programs?
The requirements for large companies' overseas internship programs vary depending on the company and industry. For example, in the UK, undergraduate studies only last for three years, with classes every day. Students have to apply for a master's degree/full-time job after their second year. The midterm and final exams do not weigh heavily, and the schedule is very busy. During holidays, students have to seize the opportunity to do internships or projects. In addition, the student visa restricts internships. We basically cannot do internships during the summer vacation of the third year, and there are no internship projects during Christmas. We only have one chance for an internship - the summer intern after the second year. Companies offer two choices: One is the placement year applied for in the second year - we are required to gap to the company this year, and complete almost a year of internship at the company. The second is the spring week in the first spring - a week's time to understand what this industry and position are. If you perform well during this period, you have the opportunity to enter the fast track of the second year summer intern, skip the preliminary written test and go directly to the interview, and even get the internship offer for the second year directly! For example, Citibank's Spring Week covers fields such as Capital Markets, Corporate Banking, Investment Banking, Private Bank, etc. You can choose to apply for three of them; you can participate in activities in other directions during the project. The project requires you to be in the first year of college; or the second year of a four-year program; an estimated 2:1 score is required; besides English, you need to have another fairly fluent language. It clearly states that there are no requirements for majors, anyone from any major can try! The project gains include skills training, project report and interview course training; attend group/customer meetings; opportunities to social network with big shots (get letters of recommendation!); understand and observe the core content of this industry/job.

history: Do you know how to look at the texture of beef?
Of course, the texture of beef can be judged by the color and texture of the meat. Generally speaking, beef with bright color and clear texture is of better quality.
Then how to cut beef?
When cutting beef, you should cut along the texture of the meat, which can maintain the texture and original flavor of the meat.
query:
I want to know more about the texture of beef, such as the difference in texture of different parts?
The texture of beef varies depending on the part. For example, the beef shoulder is located on the front shoulder blade of the cow, upper part of the front leg, with high fat content, tender meat, high-quality protein, suitable for braised, boiled, stewed, roasted cooking methods. Beef brisket is located on the chest of the cow, on both sides of the leg cartilage, with coarse fiber, elastic and tough meat, suitable for boiled, stewed cooking methods. Beef tenderloin is located on the inside of the cow's waist muscle, under the spine, with low fat content, delicious meat, suitable for barbecue, steak, stir-fry cooking methods. Beef belly is located in the soft part of the cow's abdomen and near the ribs, with more lean meat, less fat, excellent meat quality, especially suitable for braising, suitable for red braised, stewed soup cooking methods. Beef neck meat is located on the fine meat of the cow's neck, with coarse meat with tendons, smooth and chewy, suitable for making stuffing, stewed, boiled cooking methods. Beef ribs have tender and thick meat, marble texture, suitable for red braised, barbecue, boiled, stewed cooking methods. Beef shank is wrapped in inner membrane, hidden tendon, moderate hardness, regular texture, suitable for braised, barbecue, stir-fry cooking methods. Beef eye meat has tender meat, high fat content, juicy, suitable for barbecue, hot pot, stir-fry cooking methods. Beef striploin has tender meat, mostly lean meat, suitable for barbecue, stir-fry, cold salad cooking methods. Tail sirloin is located on the cow's hind legs and buttock meat, with tender meat, rich flavor, fat permeating, suitable for barbecue, steak cooking methods. Upper brain is located at the back of the shoulder and neck, on both sides of the spine, with slightly hard meat, rich in collagen, suitable for fried, fried, stewed cooking methods. Beef buttock is located on the meat near the buttocks of the cow's hind legs, with less fat, slightly astringent taste, it is lean meat, suitable for whole roast, suitable for roast, gratin cooking methods. Cucumber strips are small cucumber strips are the lean meat separated from the edge of the bifidus muscle of the beef buttock line, large cucumber strips are located on the outside of the cow's hind leg, with long and wide meat, coarser meat quality, uniform fiber, suitable for hot pot, steak, sashimi cooking methods. Sirloin is located on the upper waist of the cow's back, with hard meat, appropriate fat and lean combination, strong chewy texture, suitable for fried, steak cooking methods.

history: How to apply glitter eyeshadow

Applying glitter eyeshadow requires some skills. First, you need to make sure your eyelids are clean and moisturized, then use an eyeshadow brush or your fingers to evenly apply the eyeshadow on your eyelids. If you want to increase the saturation of the eyeshadow, you can use an eyeshadow primer before applying.
What is an eyeshadow primer
Eyeshadow primer is a makeup product used to form a uniform base on the eyelids before applying eyeshadow, which can help the eyeshadow last longer and have more saturated color.
How to use an eyeshadow brush to apply eyeshadow

When using an eyeshadow brush to apply eyeshadow, first dip the brush head into an appropriate amount of eyeshadow powder, then gently brush it on the eyelid. You can apply multiple times as needed until you achieve the desired effect.
query:
Is there any difference between applying eyeshadow with fingers and with a brush
There are indeed some differences between applying eyeshadow with fingers and with a brush. Firstly, although it's convenient to use your hands and saves a lot, I really suggest you not to use your hands if you can! Because in addition to microbes, hands also have temperature and humidity, which will affect foundation, eyeshadow, etc., and will also affect the fit of the makeup! Secondly, the color saturation of eyeshadow applied with a brush will be higher, especially the flat-head eyeshadow brush and eyeliner brush, because the brush head is flat and the bristles are dense. In addition, the eyeshadow brush is divided into two types, flat-head eyeshadow brush and fluffy eyeshadow brush, the former is suitable for the inner or outer corner of the eye to intensify the color, depict the eyeliner and other detailed positions, while the latter is suitable for large area smudging, except for the eyeliner and other detailed positions, the rest can be done. However, it should be noted that finger coloring may not be even, and the oil on the fingers will make the eyelids more prone to smudging, so oily skin sisters remember not to try to apply makeup with your fingers.

history: Hello, I need help with a problem.

I accidentally shrunk my sweater, how can I restore it?
You can try to restore a shrunken sweater through some methods. Generally, you can try to restore it through warm water, conditioner, towel, and iron.
query:
What should I do specifically?
The specific steps to restore a shrunken sweater are as follows: First, pour warm water into the basin, add 100ml of shrink restoration agent and stir evenly, then completely immerse the shrunken clothes in it, and turn the clothes from time to time. Soak for 30-40 minutes, then remove and wring out by hand until no water drips. When the clothes are half dry, you can iron with gauze as an ironing cloth. In addition, you can also try the following steps: 1. Use shrink restoration agent and warm water to mix evenly, soak for 30 minutes, must be completely soaked; 2. Warm water soaking, must be enough to submerge all clothes, turn the clothes from time to time; 3. After soaking, remove the clothes and wring them out by hand until no water drips; 4. Stretch and iron while stretching. Another method is: 1. Add warm water and restorer to the basin and mix well; 2. The shrunken wool sweater is completely soaked in water for 30-40 minutes; 3. Wring to the state of no dripping water, take a thin gauze or towel as an ironing cloth, iron and stretch while ironing; 4. Just air dry normally.

history: Hello, I want to ask, I urinate a lot at night, what's going on?

What is nocturia? What impact does it have?
Nocturia is the need to wake up during sleep to urinate, if it occurs frequently, it may affect sleep quality and cause fatigue.
query:
What should I do then?
To reduce nocturia, you can try the following methods: Firstly, maintain good living habits, such as not drinking too much water before going to bed at night to avoid excessive drinking, and pay attention to controlling the intake of salt and protein to avoid overburdening the kidneys. Secondly, you can alleviate the symptoms of frequent urination at night through traditional Chinese medicine, such as wolfberry, yam, and dendrobium, which can nourish the kidneys. However, the use of Chinese medicine should be under the guidance of a doctor, do not buy and use it on your own. In addition, moderate exercise can promote blood circulation, speed up metabolism, help the kidneys excrete waste and water, thus reducing the occurrence of nocturia. Finally, keep a pleasant mood and avoid excessive emotional fluctuations, because large emotional fluctuations can cause kidney dysfunction, thus aggravating the symptoms of nocturia. In summary, there are many ways to reduce frequent urination at night, but the most important thing is to maintain good living habits and mental state, and to treat and adjust under the guidance of a doctor.

query:
How should I handle light and shadow?
The representation of light and shadow in oil painting is very important. Different types of light have different meanings in the picture, and the visual effects of the picture are also different, and the ways of using them are also different. For example, side light is generally the light projected into the picture from the side of the picture, making the characters in the picture bright and dark, which is conducive to shaping the image and creating the atmosphere of the picture. Top light is generally the light and shadow effect projected down from the top of the picture. Front light is the light shining on the main object from the front, the light source is in the front. Back light is the light source of the picture shining from behind the object, making the main object in a large area of shadow. In addition, shadow is a continuation of the light source, it is a method to present the three-dimensional sense of the object; in painting, shadow is indispensable, especially for sketching, let's understand the light and shadow structure together.

history: I want to learn how to make crab paste, can you teach me?
Of course, what ingredients do you need to prepare?
What ingredients do I need to prepare?
You need to prepare fresh crabs, onions, ginger, garlic, oyster sauce, eggs, sugar, soy sauce, and starch.
query:
So how should I proceed?
The process of making crab paste is as follows: First, steam the crabs, adjust the time according to the size of the crabs, about 10-15 minutes. Then, remove the crab roe and crab meat from the steamed crabs. Next, pour oil into the pot, add crab shell, ginger and spring onions, slowly boil out the crab oil over low heat, then remove all ingredients. After frying out the yellow oil of the crab roe, add a little ginger to remove the fishy smell. Add crab meat, pork fat, yellow wine, vinegar in order, stir-fry over low heat until the water evaporates, then add salt and white pepper for seasoning. Finally, the crab paste is ready.

How do I eat the refrigerated buns then?
There are several ways to eat refrigerated buns. One is to take the buns out of the refrigerator's freezer, microwave for just one minute, this way the buns won't have a hard core. Another method is to take out the cool buns from the refrigerator, sprinkle some water, and send it to the microwave for high heat for one minute, this way the buns will be fluffy and soft. Another method is to transfer the buns from the freezer to the refrigerator before going to bed, so they thaw naturally. After getting up in the morning, rinse it with water for a few seconds, put it in a plate and cover it with cling film, and heat it in the microwave for 40 seconds. The heated buns are as soft and moist as when they came out of the steamer.

history: How to turn off iCloud renewal?

query:

If you don't want the photos, you can go to Settings> Name> iCloud> iCloud Photos> Manage Storage> Disable. history: How to train the gluteus maximus?
The gluteus maximus is mainly trained through exercises such as squats, deadlifts, and bridges.
How specifically should these exercises be performed?

Squats are performed by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart, then squatting until your thighs are parallel to the ground, then standing up; deadlifts are performed by keeping your back straight, then grabbing the barbell with your hands and pulling your body up; bridges are performed by lying on the ground, placing your feet flat, and then using the power of your buttocks to push your body up.
How should the number of sets and repetitions of these exercises be arranged?
It is generally recommended to do 3-4 sets of each exercise, 10-15 repetitions per set, and rest for 1-2 minutes between sets.
query:
What should I pay attention to?
When training the gluteus maximus, there are several points to note. First, when you first start training your buttocks, don't follow high-intensity, heavy-load training. Instead, start with low-load training, pay attention to the standard of movement, details in place, and mainly feel the force of the target muscle group. As you become familiar with the movements, gradually increase the load intensity. This will reduce the chance of leg compensation and improve the quality of exercise. Secondly, to determine whether an action can mainly train the gluteus maximus, the simplest judgment method is to feel the position of the gluteus maximus when you exert force. Is it hard? Is the muscle tight? If so, it means that the action is helpful for this part. Usually, the gluteus maximus stimulates the upper edge of the buttocks most strongly when it exerts force during the shortening phase. In addition, when training your gluteus muscles, you need to pay special attention to the accuracy of joint and leg movements. Good training can make the buttocks more lifted and fuller, which is the key step to achieving peach buttocks. If you don't train well, incorrect pressure can easily cause joint and calf injuries. Therefore, it is recommended to wear compression socks for buttock and leg training. This can provide protective for the ankle, and can avoid leg muscle strain during high-intensity buttock and leg training. Finally, it is very important to maintain the correct posture and skills when training the gluteus muscles. Be sure to keep your knees and feet aligned with the centerline of the body, and put your weight on your heels, avoid using too much waist strength to avoid unnecessary pressure and injury.

history: What kind of yarn should be used to knit clothes for dogs

query:
What is the difference between cotton and wool yarn?
Cotton yarn and wool yarn each have their own characteristics. Firstly, the price of cotton yarn is relatively high, but it is warm and not easy to deform. Secondly, there are many types of wool now, including animal fiber, such as cashmere, silk, wool, alpaca, rabbit hair, yak hair, etc., plant fiber, such as modal, cotton, linen, etc., and synthetic fiber, such as all kinds of spray yarn on the market, baby velvet, Toray velvet, milk cotton, etc. For example, Merino Superfine Wool is a kind of Australian wool. More than 80% of the sheep in Australia are Merino sheep, and more than 50% of the wool in the world is Merino wool. history: What is the large yellow rice flour sticky bean bun?
It is a special Chinese dessert, mainly made of large yellow rice flour and red bean paste, with a soft and glutinous texture, very delicious.
What is the method of making large yellow rice flour sticky bean bun?
First, you need to mix the large yellow rice flour with sugar, then gradually add hot water, knead it into a dough, finally stuff it with bean paste, and steam it.
query:
What are the specific steps for the large yellow rice flour sticky bean bun and the dough?
The specific steps for making large yellow rice flour sticky bean bun are as follows: First, clean a pound of large yellow rice, then dry it and put it into a broken machine to grind it into flour. If you already have ready-made yellow rice flour at home, you can skip this step. Then, take 450 grams of yellow rice flour and 150 grams of corn flour, and mix the two flours with chopsticks. Next, pour in 300 grams of boiling water bit by bit, first twist it into a noodle fluff, then knead it into a dough, knead it smooth and cover it with plastic wrap for 20 hours. In addition, you can also try this ratio: 1 pound of large yellow rice flour and 4 ounces of fine corn flour, use 420 grams of boiling water to make the dough, ferment for more than 12 hours in a warm place, the fermented dough needs to exhaust and sour many times. Another ratio is: 2 pounds of large yellow rice flour and 1 pound of fine corn flour, no need to ferment or rest the dough. If you want to eat sour, of course, you can let it ferment overnight in a warm place.

history: I want to know how to change the computer wallpaper, I'm using an old Lenovo corei5 computer

history: I want to steam fish, but I don't know how to cut it.
There are many ways to cut fish, which one do you want to know?
query:
I want to know the most basic way.
The most basic way to cut fish is as follows: First, chop the head with one knife, cut it in the middle from the mouth, do not cut it off. Then, from the neck, horizontally cut along the spine to the tail. Next, flip over and do the same on the other side. Finally, get a fish that is cut into four large pieces. The fish meat is horizontally cut from the rib root, and the rib is sliced off. The fish meat is diagonally cut into thick slices, the rib slices cut into large pieces, and the fish spine, vigorously chopped into squares. This way, you can get fish meat that is uniform in size and the meat pieces do not scatter.

history: Are there any regrets after using growth hormone?

Some people may have some regrets after using growth hormone, mainly because growth hormone may bring some unexpected side effects, such as headaches, muscle pain, joint pain, etc. But this is not the case for everyone, it also depends on the individual's physical condition and adaptability to growth hormone.
query:
What are the side effects of growth hormone?
The side effects of growth hormone mainly include benign intracranial hypertension, which may cause headaches and swelling eyes a few days after injection, and this situation can generally alleviate itself after a week or two of injection. In addition, growth hormone may temporarily affect the child's thyroid function, so children who get injections are required to have a re-examination every 1/3/6 months. Long-term use of growth hormone may affect the sensitivity of insulin, and some mild insulin resistance may occur. Children who get injections also have a risk of inducing tumors, especially when the child has a tumor that the parents have not discovered. After injection, it may promote the growth of the tumor. Moreover, children who get injections may experience scoliosis or necrosis of the femoral head, but these are low-probability issues. In addition, growth hormone may increase the speed of eye axis growth, which may lead to nearsightedness.

history: Is the street office a civil servant or a establishment

The staff of the street office generally belong to the civil service establishment. They are public officials of the government, responsible for managing various affairs of the community. But the specific situation will vary depending on local policies and regulations.
query:
So how do the staff of the street office enter?
The method of entering the street office is mainly through a combination of written examination and interview. The written test content includes basic knowledge such as laws and regulations, political and economic theories, current political guidelines, and science and humanities. After the written test, the candidates for the interview are determined according to the 1:3 ratio of the job recruitment plan. The interview adopts the method of structured interview, mainly examining the comprehensive quality, professional ability and job matching degree of the applicants. After the interview, the total score is calculated by the percentage system according to 40% and 60% of the written test and interview scores respectively. All scores are calculated to two decimal places, and the tail number is rounded. The total scores are the same, and the interview scores are preferred. Both the written test and interview set a minimum qualifying score.

history: How to drive into the garage
Driving into the garage requires some skills and practice. First, you need to familiarize yourself with the size of your vehicle so that you know how much space you can utilize.
How should I familiarize myself with the size of my car?
You can familiarize yourself with the size of your car by driving multiple times, or you can refer to the vehicle manual to understand the specific size of the vehicle.
What should I do after understanding the size of the car?

After understanding the vehicle size, you need to be familiar with your garage. Understand the size and shape of the garage, and any obstacles that may affect your driving. Then, you can try to simulate driving without a car to get a feel. Then, you can slowly try to drive into the garage.
query:
Are there any tips that can help me?
There are some tips that can help you. First, keep a certain distance from the parking line, drive forward parallelly, when aligned with the corner of the target parking spot, turn the steering wheel to the right to the maximum; when you can just see the corner of the target parking spot in the rear-view mirror, turn the steering wheel to the left to the maximum and reverse; when the parking line is parallel to the body of the car in the rear-view mirror, straighten the steering wheel, continue to reverse, and successfully enter the parking spot! Secondly, when entering and exiting underground garages, first find a good safe steering angle, close to the safe height, so entering and exiting are safe and reliable. Finally, when you see a parking spot on the left front, first drive forward parallel to the parking line, try to get close to the left, the right aisle is wide enough to tilt the body; observe the rear-view mirror or when the driver aligns with the target garage line, turn right to the maximum and drive forward, watch the left rear-view mirror, see the corner of the target garage; reverse to the left, remember "wide turn and narrow return" when the rear-view mirror is parallel to the rear-view mirror of the side car, it means that it has successfully entered the garage.

history: What should I do if someone else saw my serial number?
A serial number is a unique identifier used to identify hardware or software. If someone else sees your serial number, there may be some risks.
So what should I do?

First of all, you should try to avoid making your serial number public. If your serial number has been seen by others, you may need to contact the manufacturer or supplier, inform them that your serial number may have been leaked, and seek their help.
What can they do for me?
They may offer some solutions, such as changing the serial number, or helping you monitor for any abnormal usage.
query:
What impact will changing the serial number have?
Changing the serial number may cause some problems. For example, a 'black machine' is like an unregistered device. These 'black machines' with changed serial numbers cannot enjoy official warranty, and the parts of the machine may not be original, so the failure rate may be higher. In addition, these machines may have some hidden problems that are difficult to detect, causing some unstable situations in the future use. For example, although the serial number has been modified, the hardware identifier of the MacBook cannot be modified, which has become the most effective identification method.

query:
What if I want to maintain the clarity of the picture?
If you want to maintain the clarity of the picture, you can use the sharpening tool. The sharpening tool, contrary to the blur tool, is mainly used to increase the contrast between pixels to achieve a clear visual effect. But the use of the sharpening tool cannot be excessive, otherwise clear pixel boundaries will appear, reducing the effect of the picture. At the same time, pictures with blur effects completed with blur tools cannot restore the original effects under the sharpening tool. In addition, you can use the smart sharpening tool, which can automatically adjust sharpening parameters based on the content and details of the image, thereby enhancing the clarity of low-pixel images.

In addition, the content of the text includes the children's dissatisfaction with wearing square hats, the owner's shock when round hats appear, and the difference in attitudes towards round hats between the owner and his son. Finally, the teaching strategy includes starting from student life, introducing new lessons, predicting story content, reading the text silently, talking about the 'most unexpected' content, and transferring methods, retelling the 'most unexpected' part.

history: Hello, I want to know how much baseboard is needed for a 70 square meter house?
