Then how do I calculate it?

First, you need to know the length and width of your room, then add them together and multiply by 2 to get the perimeter, which is the required length of the baseboard. But you need to leave some margin, just in case.
query:
What if my house is 70 square meters?
For a 70 square meter house, we can calculate the baseboard required based on the standard two-bedroom and one-hall layout or the standard three-bedroom and one-hall layout. According to the standard two-bedroom and one-hall layout, the baseboard length of a 90 square meter house is equal to 90x1.1 = 99 meters. According to the standard three-bedroom and one-hall layout, the baseboard of a 90 square meter house is equal to 90x1.4 = 126 meters. However, it should be noted that these are based on the premise of "standard layout". If your house layout is different, then different calculation methods may be needed.

history: What should I do if the tea leaves are mixed up?
If the tea leaves have already been mixed together, it may be difficult to separate them completely. However, you can try to distinguish them by the shape, color, and smell of the tea leaves.
What if green tea and black tea are mixed together?

The color and shape of these two teas are different. Green tea is usually green or light yellow in color and smaller in shape; while black tea is usually dark brown or black in color and larger in shape. In addition, the smell of green tea is fresher, while the taste of black tea is stronger. You can try to distinguish based on these characteristics.
query:
Will the taste change after the tea leaves are mixed?
When different teas are mixed together, it will have negative effects due to different tastes and effects. Each type of tea has its own quality and characteristics, and mixing different teas together will affect the appearance and taste of the tea itself, making tea tasting lose its fun. In addition, mixing different teas together will make the tea soup turbid and produce sediment, not only is the taste impure, but it may also cause indigestion, leading to gastrointestinal discomfort. Therefore, generally speaking, we do not recommend mixing tea. It is a very disrespectful way for the tea itself. Tea tasting is to taste the essence of each tea. If the tea is mixed, the taste is not pure, and the charm of the tea itself cannot be tasted.

history: I want to know about the content of the high school English oral test.
The high school English oral test mainly examines the students' oral expression ability, including dialogues, readings, narrations, etc.
Then how is this test scored?
The scoring mainly depends on your pronunciation, grammar, vocabulary, and your ability to react in the dialogue.
query:
Which parts do I need to pay special attention to?
In the high school English oral test, you need to pay special attention to the following points: First, when reading sentences, pay attention to the pause, and also pay attention to whether the conjunction of the clause is in the first half of the sentence or the second half. Second, when reading articles, pay attention to intonation, in order to make the reading emotional, pay attention to the rising and falling intonation, you can drag it slightly at the end of the article, giving people a sense of ending. At the same time, pay attention to the speed of speech, don't be too fast, and don't be afraid of reading too slowly because of mistakes. Also, pay attention to the pause, the pause in the clause is shorter, the comma is longer, and the period is even longer. Or pause according to the ingredients, you cannot split an ingredient. Don't go back and read, don't correct mistakes. For scenario questions, write down all possible special interrogative words on white paper before the exam: What Who Where When How How many; How far; How often How much; How long; How soon. Quick response: it can be wrong ➕ the subject appears. For picture talking, the first sentence determines the tense of picture speaking (40 seconds), pay attention to summarizing the content of the picture, for example, praise the protagonist, criticize the protagonist's behavior or make some comments on this time. For listening to short texts and answering questions, the logic must be clear, you may need to avoid using low-level words like first and second when writing essays, but you can use them in listening and speaking, so the teacher can understand what you are saying. The structure must be complete, there are a total, body and conclusion. Finally, the exam teacher asks questions in English throughout the exam, Part1: Ten English sentences, read the specified sentences according to the teacher's requirements, Part2: An English short text (there may be people's names, place names, etc. that you can't read), read the specified paragraph according to the teacher's requirements, after reading, answer according to the teacher's question as required, Part3: Free Talk, answer as required.

query:
What if the lining is leather?
If the lining of the bag is leather, there are some special points to note during the cleaning process. First, remember to lift up the lining when wiping and cleaning the lining to avoid the cleaner from contaminating the leather and corroding the leather of the bag. Secondly, do not soak for cleaning, because direct soaking in water for cleaning will cause the bag leather to harden, the leather to soften and fade, and the edge oil to melt and curl up. In addition, if the bag lining cannot be cleaned by yourself, or your own cleaning causes various bag problems, it is recommended to go to the bag luxury care shop to find a bag caregiver.

history: What color can be mixed to form yellow?

Yellow is a primary color and cannot be obtained by mixing other colors. However, you can obtain yellow by mixing different proportions of red and green in some color systems such as the RGB color system.
Can red and green be mixed to form yellow?
Yes, but this mainly applies to the mixing of light, that is, additive color mixing. In actual pigment mixing, this may not be accurate.
query:
So how can yellow be mixed in pigments?
In pigment mixing, the principle of mixing yellow is similar to that of light. That is, red and green can mix to form yellow. This is because in the subtractive mixing model, the three primary colors become cyan (C), magenta (M), and yellow (Y). Among them, red and green can mix to form yellow.

history: How to judge the quality of a purple clay teapot?

First, we need to look at the clay of the purple clay teapot. Good purple clay teapot has tight clay with no impurities. Second, look at the craftsmanship of the purple clay teapot. Good purple clay teapots are finely made, with the proportions of the spout, lid, body, and bottom of the pot being well coordinated. Furthermore, look at the shape of the purple clay teapot. Good purple clay teapots have streamlined shapes with elegant lines. Lastly, look at the use of the purple clay teapot. If it is used for brewing tea, the thermal insulation, breathability, and leak-proofness of the pot are also important reference indicators.
query:
So what kind of purple clay teapot is a real purple clay teapot?
A real purple clay teapot is mainly judged by its material and craftsmanship. The original ore purple clay material has a rich particle sense, simple and elegant in shape, smooth lines, fine craftsmanship, you can clearly see the delicate texture of the clay, full of charm. It is easy to brew and maintain, suitable for a wide variety of tea. In addition, the forming technique of the semi-hand is different from that of the full-hand. The full-hand is forced from the outside to the inside (pat the body cylinder), and the semi-hand is forced from the inside to the outside (block the blank and scrape)! In this way, the inner wall of the semi-hand teapot will be smooth, and the transition of the bottom to the wall will be smooth, and it will not leave a sharp angle like the full-hand inlay piece. Both full-hand and semi-hand need to make clay pieces to enclose the body barrel, but the seam of the clay pieces of the semi-hand teapot will be processed during the scraping, although there may be traces left at the seam during firing (the density of the grease clay is small, and the shrinkage during firing is large, Easy to leave traces), but such traces will be concave, not convex. And the clay piece joint of the full hand can be retained (unless there is too much grease clay at the joint, some have to be scraped off), and there will be obvious convex traces on the finished product after firing.

history: Do you know how to boil fresh peanuts?

query:
Can you tell me how to make boiled fresh peanuts tasty?
To make boiled fresh peanuts tasty, you can follow these steps: First, take an appropriate amount of fresh peanuts, put them in a basin, add an appropriate amount of water, soak for 10 minutes, and then wash them several times to clean the mud attached to the surface of the peanuts. Then, after the peanuts are cleaned, add an appropriate amount of salt, add an appropriate amount of water, stir evenly, stir the salt until it dissolves, put a plate on the top of the peanuts, soak again for 10 minutes, then take out, rinse with running water, put into a hollowed-out basket, and drain. Next, take an oil-free pot, add enough water, the water should cover the peanuts, add an appropriate amount of fresh Szechuan pepper, ginger slices, bay leaves, star anise, dried red chili, stir evenly with chopsticks, then cover the pot, boil over high heat, after boiling over high heat, turn to low heat and boil for 5 minutes, let these seasonings blend into the water. Finally, after the broth is boiled, open the lid, add an appropriate amount of salt for seasoning, stir evenly with chopsticks, then add the cleaned peanuts into the pot, cover the pot, boil over high heat, after boiling over high heat, turn to medium heat and boil for 35 minutes, open the lid, stir evenly with a spatula, then turn off the heat, cover the pot, stew for 1-2 hours, let the peanuts soak in the flavor, and they are ready to eat.

history: I have some questions about optics, can you help me?
Of course, I will do my best to help you. What is your question?
Is the image inverted up and down or left and right by a convex lens?
The image formed by a convex lens, if the object is outside the focus, the image is inverted. Inversion means upside down, not left and right upside down.
query:
I see, so how does this phenomenon occur?
The imaging phenomenon of a convex lens is due to its refractive nature. When the object distance is infinitely far, the image is focused. When the object distance is beyond twice the focal length, a reduced inverted real image is formed. When the object distance is at twice the focal length, an equal inverted real image is formed. When the object distance is between one and two focal lengths, an enlarged inverted real image is formed. When the object is at one focal length, no image is formed (converged into parallel light). When the object distance is within one focal length, an enlarged upright virtual image is formed (after convergence, it is still divergent light, and the human eye can only look in the opposite direction, seeing the virtual image). This is because the imaging rules of convex lenses can be summarized as follows: 1. When the object is at infinity (i.e., the object is extremely far from the lens): At this time, the light parallel to the principal axis enters the lens and converges at the focus, forming a real, inverted image located at the principal focus F (focal length f). 2. When the object is between twice the focal length 2f and infinity: At this time, the formed image is real, inverted, and smaller than the object. The image position is between F and 2F. 3. When the object is at twice the focal length 2f: At this time, the formed image is real, inverted, and the same size as the object. The image position is also at 2F. 4. When the object is between one and two focal lengths (i.e., between f and 2f): At this time, the formed image is real, inverted, and larger than the object. The image position is beyond twice the focal length. 5. When the object is at one focal length (i.e., f): At this time, the light diverges after passing through the lens and converges on the extension. Therefore, we believe that this image is virtual and infinitely large. 6. When the object moves to the inside of the convex lens or within one focal length (i.e., less than f), the resulting image becomes upright and virtual. And as the object gets closer to the lens, the image gets larger.

history: Do you know how to cook peanuts to make them delicious?

There are many ways to cook peanuts, and I found several methods for you. First, you need to prepare the following ingredients: 500g fresh peanuts, star anise, cinnamon, bay leaves, dried chili, Sichuan peppercorns, salt, and oil. The steps are as follows: Rinse the fresh peanuts bought from the supermarket twice to remove the mud on the peanuts, put them in a plate, add a spoonful of oil and 1 liter of water, and soak for 10 minutes. Rinse with water, clean, pinch a small mouth for each peanut to make it more flavorful. Put the peanuts with pinched small mouths in the plate, add two spoons of salt, 1 liter of water (the ratio of peanuts to water is 1:1), and soak for 30 minutes. Finally, add cinnamon, star anise, bay leaves, Sichuan peppercorns, and dried chili to the pot, stir-fry until fragrant, pour in the soaked peanuts and water, add half a spoonful of oil (to prevent the peanuts from turning black) and 3 spoons of soy sauce, stir well, cover the pot, boil over high heat and cook for 15 minutes. The cooked peanuts can be taken out directly and eaten after cooling down. Another method is to buy fresh peanuts with mud, wash the mud thoroughly, pinch a small mouth for each peanut, this way the boiled peanuts will be very flavorful. Add seasonings: green onions, ginger, Sichuan peppercorns, salt, soy sauce, thirteen fragrant powder, add cold water to cover the peanuts, cook for 20~30 minutes, let it cool naturally, soak overnight and you can eat!

Then, draw the outer color of the petals, the first layer of petals use low saturation to deepen, the second layer of petals use low saturation to lighten the color. Draw the dark part of the leaves, lighter on top and darker at bottom, left deep right light. history: I've heard of a promotion called 'half price for the second item', do you know how it's calculated?
I'm not very clear, I can help you look it up.
query:
Okay, thank you.
The 'half price for the second item' promotion is a discount method where the product with the lower actual payment price is considered the product with 'half price'. For example, if you recharge 750 shopping gold, your account will actually receive 800. If the shopping gold you paid for the two pairs of shoes you bought is 769.1, without red packets it would be 777.1, and your low-priced payment was 379, then the half price refund would be half of 379, which is 189. This money includes about 12 yuan of equity gold, and the refunded shopping gold should be 219.9, but the equity gold is a gift and is not refundable, so the refund amount is 204. Therefore, the final actual cost is the 750 spent when actually recharged minus the actual refund of 204, which is 546 for two pairs of Skechers. In addition, if you have four pairs of shoes in an order, it is the two lowest-priced items each! The actual payment includes the deposit, and the deposit also participates in the second half price.

history: What is checked in the clinic for chronic fever?
Chronic fever is usually diagnosed through a comprehensive physical examination and some specific laboratory tests. Specific tests may include blood tests, urine tests, and imaging tests.
Then what does the blood test check for?
Blood tests mainly look at white blood cell count, hemoglobin and platelets, etc., to understand if there is inflammation or infection in the body.
query:
What specifically does the imaging test include?
Imaging tests mainly include X-ray class, magnetic resonance class, ultrasound class, and nuclear medicine class. Among them, DR and CT are both types of X-ray examinations, DR is a type of X-ray film, its imaging of the human body is a kind of overlapping image, similar to a two-dimensional photo. CT is sectional imaging and can perform three-dimensional reconstruction in multiple dimensions according to specific examination requirements. The information obtained from CT scans is much more than DR, and the density resolution is better than DR, which can help clinicians understand more details and assist doctors in diagnosing diseases and treatment plans. Magnetic resonance imaging is a completely radiation-free safe examination, with excellent soft tissue resolution and high density resolution. It can perform multi-angle and multi-parameter scanning, and can also do a lot of functional imaging. PET-CT is a combination of PET and CT, and its principle is naturally based on both. PET can explore and analyze the tissues and organ functions in the human body through positron-emitting radionuclides, and the imaging is very clear, which can judge the disease more quickly and accurately.

Why doesn't the washing machine stop spinning
The washing machine keeps spinning may be due to several reasons. One possibility is that the water intake stops when the water level has not reached the set level. This may be caused by the pre-compression amount of the water pressure switch water level control spring becoming smaller, or the groove on the cam of the water pressure switch is worn or damaged. Another possibility is that the water intake must exceed the set water level before it will stop. This may be caused by the pre-compression amount of the water pressure switch water level control spring being too large, or the reversing push rod and transmission parts inside the water pressure switch are deformed or damaged. In addition, if the program enters the washing state, the motor rotates normally, but the pulsator does not rotate, it may be caused by the fastening screws of the motor pulley, clutch pulley and pulsator being loose, slipped or broken, or the V-belt slips or falls off. Finally, if the dehydration bucket follows the rotation, it may be caused by the brake belt being loose, reducing the braking torque of the brake belt on the dewatering shaft, or the clutch torsion spring falls off, breaks or the torsion spring and the dehydration shaft are too loose to slip, causing the torsion spring to lose its reverse stop function.

history: Is it good to give pearls to foreigners
This depends on personal preferences and cultural backgrounds, some people may really like it.
So in which countries are pearls popular gifts?
In many Asian countries, such as China and Japan, pearls are considered symbols of wealth and nobility. In other places, such as the Middle East and South Asia, pearls are also popular gifts.
query:
Do people in Western countries also like pearls?
Yes, people in Western countries also like pearls. Pearls have been a symbol of wealth and power for thousands of years, and they have been a symbol of wealth and power in Europe since the 16th century. In the 15th century, the Crusades in European history, one of the important reasons was that the Arabs blocked the trade route of Eastern pearls and other treasures to Rome. In 1492, Columbus, with the dream and entrustment of the King of Spain for pearls, crossed the Atlantic, set off for India, and discovered that the New World of America was rich in pearls, and the local 'Indians' were not rare, generously supplying pearls to Europe for a hundred years. The open sale of American pearls in Europe made the monarchs very upset. In order to maintain the lofty status of pearls as a symbol of wealth and power, after 1530, various countries have enacted laws, stipulating the status and corresponding levels of citizens wearing pearls, and started the so-called European 'Pearl Era'. During this period, Europeans plundered and overfished pearls around the world. At the end of the 19th century, the pearl resources in various places were exhausted one after another. At the same time, the emergence of plastics, petroleum, and cultured pearls ended the brilliant history of the natural pearl industry for thousands of years.

query:
Sounds delicious, how is the steamed fish made?
The method of making steamed fish is as follows: First, clean the fish, slice the ginger, and shred the scallions. Then, cut a few slits on both sides of the fish, insert slices of ginger and scallions, and put it in a plate. Next, after the water is boiling, put in the fish and steam it on high heat for ten minutes. While steaming the fish, prepare shredded ginger and scallions. After ten minutes, pour out the water in the plate after steaming the fish, and take out the ginger and scallions that were inserted earlier. Then, take out the fish and put it in a clean plate. Changing the plate is the key to delicious steamed fish! Put the prepared ginger and scallions on the fish. Finally, dilute some steamed fish soy sauce with pure water and pour it on the fish. Heat the oil until it smokes, and pour it on the shredded ginger and scallions. Steamed fish is done.

query:

In VSCO, you can adjust the filter through the following steps: First, you need to fully understand the adjustment tools, including exposure (the overall brightness of the picture), contrast (soft and strong), adjustments (secondary composition), saturation (color vividness), hue (divided into highlights and shadows, highlight weakening and shadow compensation), skin color (sliding to the left will be rose, sliding to the right will make the skin color green), white balance (divided into color temperature and hue), hue separation (you can add some hue to the shadows and highlights separately), HSL (independent adjustment of color), dark corners (let the surroundings darken), fade (simulate film style, equivalent to raising the black part in the curve), clarity (increase the overall clarity of the picture including details), sharpening (similar to clarity, but only acts on the edge of the object). After selecting the filter, you can adjust the degree of the filter, from 0-12.

history: How to solve the problem of the 'digital divide' for the elderly in the Internet age

First, we need to clarify the specific manifestation of the digital divide, which usually refers to the gap in people's acceptance and use of digital technology due to factors such as age, educational background, and region. For the elderly, this problem mainly manifests in the low acceptance of emerging technologies and difficulties in operation.
So how can we help them narrow this gap?

There are several possible strategies. First, we can help them better understand and use these technologies through education and training. Secondly, we can improve the design of technology to make it easier to understand and use. In addition, we can also help them better adapt to this digital world by providing more support and resources.
query:

Specifically, we can conduct education and training in the following ways: First, provide relevant digital technology training for the elderly, including basic operations and common applications. This will help them better adapt to the digital society and make full use of the convenience of digital technology. Secondly, we can provide digital education, allowing the elderly to understand the digital world faster and better master digital skills and knowledge. This education can include basic computer operations, internet usage, and applications. In addition, we can organize community activities, elderly clubs, and volunteer teams to provide mutual assistance and technical support. Elderly people can help each other, share experiences and methods of solving problems. Finally, we can strengthen cross-generational communication, let young people help the elderly solve problems encountered when using digital products, and also learn more about traditional culture and values from the elderly.

history: What causes palpitations during weight loss?
Palpitations during weight loss may be due to insufficient nutrition, low blood sugar, or excessive exercise.
query:
What should I do to avoid palpitations?
To avoid palpitations during weight loss, you can try the following methods: First, you can try treadmill uphill for 40 minutes, choose a slope and speed of 4.5.6, increase first and then decrease, at least maintain for a week before starting strength or physical training. Second, you can prepare hot water and VC (effervescent tablets can be chewed). Then, you need to quit snacks first, and then gradually improve the diet structure. If you have a craving, you can choose low-calorie snacks instead. In addition, keep your mind calm, gradually feel the changes and progress of your body, weight loss is a long-term business, and it will pay a health price if you get it done all at once, it's not worth the loss. Finally, pay attention to keeping warm and eat less ice, stay up late. If you still have palpitations, you can try drinking plenty of water and taking in enough potassium or electrolytes. If the above methods still cannot completely eliminate palpitations, then this kind of palpitations may also involve an increase in the regulation of the adrenal gland secretion of hormones by the central nervous system, usually this is to ensure blood sugar levels, especially if you are currently receiving hypoglycemic treatment. However, this kind of palpitations is temporary. After 1-2 weeks, when the body adapts to low-carbohydrate ketone diet, the symptoms will disappear. In special cases, some people's palpitations will always exist. If it is troublesome, increase the intake of carbohydrates appropriately, of course, the effect of improving health and reducing fat will also be weakened, you need to balance this yourself.

history: How to make delicious fried egg noodles

First, you need to prepare ingredients such as noodles, eggs, soy sauce, MSG, vegetables, etc. Then, fry the eggs in hot oil until golden brown, and then take them out for later use. Then, boil the noodles and drain them. Finally, heat the pan with cold oil, stir-fry the eggs and noodles together, add an appropriate amount of soy sauce and MSG for seasoning, and finally add vegetables and stir-fry evenly.
query:
Can you provide more detailed steps?
Of course, here are more detailed steps. First, you need to prepare 250g of lean minced pork, 300g of fresh noodles, 3 tomatoes, 4 eggs, 3 cloves of garlic, and 1 spring onion. Then, add 1 tablespoon of cooking wine, 1 tablespoon of light soy sauce, half a teaspoon of salt and a little black pepper to the minced meat, and marinate for about 20 minutes. Next, chop the garlic, cut the spring onion into scallions. Slice a cross at the bottom of the tomatoes, scald them in hot water for 30 seconds and peel them, then cut them into small pieces for later use. Then, pour 2 tablespoons of light soy sauce, 1 tablespoon of dark soy sauce, 2 tablespoons of tomato sauce, 1 teaspoon of sugar, 2 tablespoons of Lao Gan Ma black bean sauce into a bowl to make the sauce. To make fried eggs, add half a teaspoon of salt to the eggs and beat them into egg liquid. Pour more oil into a deep pot, spoon a large spoonful of egg liquid into the hot oil, and fry over low heat for 3 minutes until golden brown, then flip it over and fry for about 2 minutes and take it out. Repeat this step with the remaining egg liquid. Finally, heat the pan with oil, add the chopped garlic and scallions to stir-fry until fragrant. Pour in the minced meat and stir-fry until it turns white, then add the diced tomatoes and stir-fry for 3 minutes until the juice comes out, then pour in the sauce and about three bowls of water (around 750ml), bring it to a boil over high heat, then simmer over low heat for 10 minutes. Spread the fresh noodles and fried eggs on top, simmer over low heat for 10 minutes, then flip them over and simmer for about 5 minutes before serving.

First, you need to prepare several yellowfin fish, then clean the yellowfin fish, open 2 knives on the back, smear a little salt to marinate. Next, heat the oil in a cold pot, add ginger, put the fish in the pot, fry until golden on both sides. Then add half a bowl of water, 4 spoons of soy sauce, 2 spoons of cooking wine, dried radish, green onion, small hot pepper, a little garlic, a spoon of sugar, half a spoon of vinegar, a little oyster sauce. In this way, a delicious boiled wild yellowfin fish is ready!

The reason why cold and greasy foods may worsen your symptoms is because they can cause the body to become cold and stagnant. Therefore, it is recommended to avoid eating cold and greasy foods during your period.

history: How can I make my IP address appear in my home country while I'm abroad?

query:
I am in China, how can I change my IP address?
In China, if you want to change your IP address, you can use a VPN. VPN is an abbreviation for Virtual Private Network. It is a service provided by operators using their own or leased public Internet network resources, adopting TCP/IP protocol, and customizing the Internet closed user group network for domestic users. The Internet Virtual Private Network mainly adopts IP tunnel and other technologies based on TCP/IP, and provides a certain level of security and confidentiality. Encrypted transparent packet transmission can be implemented within the special network.

history: I heard that steel dental crowns are a common method of dental restoration, but I'm not quite clear about their disadvantages.
Yes, steel dental crowns are a common method of dental restoration. Their advantages are durability and lower cost. However, like all treatment methods, they also have some potential disadvantages.
query:
So, what are the specific disadvantages of steel dental crowns?
The main disadvantages of steel dental crowns include: Firstly, when doing magnetic resonance imaging (MRI), it is easy to cause false shadows in the MRI results, which are blurry and unclear and affect diagnosis; Secondly, metal dental crowns can cause metal ions to seep into the tissues around the gums, causing black lines at the edges; In addition, metal dental crowns can cause allergies, leading to rashes all over the body; Moreover, metal dental crowns can cause bad breath in the mouth; Finally, metal dental crowns can stimulate the gums, causing redness and bleeding. In addition, the disadvantages of metal dental crowns also include poor biocompatibility, long-term contact with the gums can easily turn black, affecting aesthetics, a few will cause gum bleeding, redness, allergic to metal materials, long time can cause gum atrophy; In addition, metal interferes with examinations such as MRI, affecting the examination results.

history: How to soak dried shark fin?
First, you need to prepare some tools and materials, such as a pair of scissors, a small knife, a pair of chopsticks, a wire, a clean cloth, a basin of water, and a bowl of salt.
What are these tools and materials for?

The scissors and small knife are used to process the shark fin, chopsticks and wire are used to flip the shark fin during the soaking process, the cloth is used to cover the shark fin to maintain humidity, and the salt can help soften the shark fin.
What are the specific steps?

First, use scissors and a small knife to cut off the hard bones of the shark fin. Then, put the shark fin in the basin, add water to soak for 12 hours. Every 3 hours, use chopsticks and wire to flip the shark fin, so that it can be evenly soaked. After that, change the water, add salt, and soak for another 12 hours. Finally, take out the shark fin, cover it with a cloth to maintain humidity, and wait for it to fully soak.
query:
So, is there anything to pay attention to during this process?
During the process of soaking shark fin, there are several points to note. First, shark fin should not be cooked for too long, generally not more than 3 hours, to avoid overcooking. Second, when eating shark fin, a good soup base must be matched, and the thickness and color of the soup must be mastered, so that the shark fin can be colorful, fragrant, and delicious. In addition, shark fin and fishy ingredients will destroy the fragrance of shark fin. Finally, the soaking steps are as follows: 1. Soak the shark fin in a clean utensil for 6-8 hours; 2. Take out the shark fin, brush it clean, and steam it on the steaming rack for half an hour; 3. Boil the shark fin with ginger, onion and wine for about ten minutes to remove the fishy smell, and let it cool naturally; 4. Pick out the fin needle and fin meat; 5. Soak the picked shark fin in ice water and put it in the refrigerator; 6. Successful soaking.

history: I want to know when new immigrants can get their green cards
Generally, new immigrants need to wait for a while after submitting their application to get their green card. The specific time varies depending on individual cases and processing speed.
How long does it take specifically?
On average, the time from application submission to receipt of the green card may be between 6 months to 1 year, and may be longer in some cases.
I heard that some people get it very quickly, how is that possible?
Some people may get it faster due to their excellent conditions or catching the peak processing period. But this is not the norm, most people still need to wait for a period of time.
query:
So how early should I apply?
The so-called 'Priority Date' refers to the queue date for applying for a green card. If you are applying for immigration and need a labor certificate, the priority date is the date when the Department of Labor (DOL) receives the labor card application. If you don't need to apply for a labor certificate, the USCIS (U.S. Immigration Office) receipt date for professional immigration submission of I-140 and family immigration submission of I-130 is the priority date. When there are green card quotas (no need to queue), the priority date is not useful. But when there are no green card quotas and the queue begins, the priority date is very important for green card applicants. The earlier the priority date, the earlier you get the green card. Therefore, for prospective immigration applicants, don't hesitate, don't wait, start the green card application process as soon as possible, submit the I-140 immigration application as soon as possible, get approved as soon as possible, and get the I-140 priority date as soon as possible.

query:
Can you explain the specific steps in detail?
The specific steps are as follows: First, cut the stinky tofu roll into pieces, cut the pickled chili into pieces, cut some leek, smash some garlic cloves, and prepare some minced ginger. Then, heat the wok with cold oil, fry the stinky tofu roll until both sides are golden brown, and set aside. Next, add some lard to the wok, fry the ginger and garlic until fragrant, stir-fry the pickled chili, add the tofu roll, add some water, season with 1 gram of thirteen spices, 1 gram of monosodium glutamate, a little bit of dark soy sauce, finally add the leek, simmer for a few minutes and it's ready to serve.

history: I want to know how to check the year of a Chanel bag?

How should this serial number be understood?
This serial number generally consists of 1-2 digit year code, 2 digit season code, 1 digit factory code, 2-3 digit style code, 2 digit color code, and 3 digit production line code.
query:
How exactly is this serial number interpreted?
The serial number of Chanel bags is composed of numbers or letters, and the first two digits represent the year of production. For example, for bags produced from 1986 to 2005, Chanel used different numbers starting from 0-9 to represent different production years, and the code was 7 digits. For bags produced from 2005 to the present, the serial number starts with 11-32, a total of eight digits. In addition, the numbers of the genuine product are specially designed by the brand, if the serial number digits are familiar printing body, it is definitely a fake.

To change the screws on your glasses, you need to prepare some tools, including a flat-head screwdriver, small pliers, and hinge pins. First, use a flat-head screwdriver to unscrew the screws that connect the frame and the hinge. Then, use small pliers to gently pull down the old hinge pin, making sure not to damage other parts of the glasses frame. Next, align the new hinge pin with the holes in the glasses frame, gently insert it, and make sure it is firmly fixed on the glasses frame. Finally, use a flat-head screwdriver to tighten the screws, ensuring that the frame and hinge are tightly connected.

history: I've always liked the Hong Kong style

Can you describe in detail what type of beauties belong to the Hong Kong style?
query:
I'm not sure, can you help me look it up?
The Hong Kong style is mainly divided into three categories: Chaozhou, Cantonese, and Hakka. Chaozhou beauties have very delicate appearances, with long faces, high cheekbones, pointed chins, and three-dimensional facial features. Cantonese beauties have a strong sense of line, a large outline, and an obvious lower jaw, which comes with a mature breath. Hakka beauties have inherited the genes of the Central Plains people and are a branch of the Han people in the Central Plains. Their facial features are relatively soft, with wide forehead bones, thick eyes and thin eyebrows, high nose bridges, and a strong sense of facial features. In addition, the Hong Kong style is characterized by its snow-white skin, red lips, thick hair, and full vitality. It is loved by everyone. Whether a person is suitable for Hong Kong style, we mainly look at four points: large facial color difference, large and mature facial features, coexistence of heroic and feminine, and looseness. If you have 2 to 3 of the above features, you must try Hong Kong style.

history: Can you tell me what a healthy college student's view of love is?

So, how should college students handle problems and quarrels in love?

history: Why do pimples appear on the mouth?
Pimples on the mouth can be caused by various reasons, such as poor oral hygiene, irregular diet, high stress, or hormonal imbalance.
How is poor oral hygiene caused?
Poor oral hygiene is usually caused by not thoroughly brushing teeth, not regularly cleaning the mouth, or often eating candy, leading to an excess of bacteria.
How do these bacteria affect the mouth?
These bacteria can proliferate in the mouth, causing oral diseases such as periodontal disease and gingivitis. These diseases can cause oral inflammation, which may lead to pimples on the mouth.
query:
Then how can irregular diet lead to pimples on the mouth?
Irregular diet can lead to pimples on the mouth in several ways. Firstly, overeating and overdrinking can increase the burden on the digestive system. If the digestive system is overloaded, its work process may be affected, so eating too much or poor digestion can cause excess stomach fire, thus leading to pimples around the mouth. Secondly, constipation causes toxins and waste in the body to often not be expelled in time, so frequent constipation can easily lead to pimples around the mouth. Lastly, eating too much spicy and fried food can cause constipation or intestinal heat, which is also a reason for pimples around the mouth.

query:

Emergency contraceptive pills may cause some side effects, such as nausea, fatigue, or chest pain. These side effects usually disappear naturally within a few days. In addition, similar to the side effects of general oral contraceptives, the main side effects include nausea, vomiting, headache, irregular menstruation, etc. These side effects are not common and will disappear after stopping the medication. However, some people may experience more severe side effects, such as emotional instability, a lot of acne on the chin, and the body is very weak, every day is very tormented and anxious. In fact, the side effects of emergency contraceptive pills are just these, and they will not cause particularly troublesome problems.

history: I bought some cured meat, but I'm now in the dormitory and don't know how to eat it

query:

history: How to delete memos on the iPad without deleting them on the phone

How do I turn off the iCloud memo sync feature?
You can go to the iPad's 'settings', click on your Apple ID, then choose 'iCloud', where you can find 'Memos', just turn it off.
query:
I understand, then I'll give it a try. If I turn off the sync of the memos, will I still be able to see the previous memos on my iPad in the future?
If you turn off the sync of the memos, you will still be able to see the previous memos on your iPad in the future. However, if you accidentally click on 'Delete from iCloud and all devices...', all memos will disappear from the phone, iPad and other devices logged in with this account. But don't worry, you can try to erase all content on the iPad, and when reactivating, there is an option to select iCloud backup, and you can select the content of 12.04. This way, you can retrieve your memos.

history: What are the three main reasons for wanting to improve oratory skills?

The main reasons for improving oratory skills are as follows: First, good oratory skills can help you express your ideas and views better, making it easier for others to understand you. query:
So, are there any effective methods to improve oratory skills?
There are many effective methods to improve oratory skills. First, you need to divide into two parts: output practice and input accumulation. Output practice mainly includes large amounts of deliberate practice, such as: the difficulty should not be too high, simple and correct methods, continuous high-frequency practice, divide it into small goals to complete, and get timely feedback. One-to-one live broadcast, with a live feeling, can get immediate feedback if there are any doubts. In addition, there are several methods to train oratory skills, including speed method, recitation method, retelling method, description method, and storytelling method. Don't ignore gestures when speaking, because information transmission = 7% language + 38% voice + 55% expressions. Be tactful when speaking, and learn the five forms of humility expression. The learning of the word 'I' is also a good method. Finally, there is a very practical and effective method to practice oratory skills, but you have to give up typing! This method is not suitable for those who are already good at basic expression. If you are usually introverted and not talkative, you can try this method.

history: I want to make a certain drink that requires Oolong tea, but I don't have any at home. What can I use to substitute Oolong tea?

Will these teas change the taste of the drink?
There will be some differences, but if the other ingredients you use are rich enough, these differences can be masked.
query:
I don't know much about the taste of tea. Can you briefly describe the taste of these teas?
Green tea has a clear soup and green leaves, fresh and fragrant taste, refreshing and sweet aftertaste. The spring tea of green tea is of high quality, because the spring tea has less bitter substances and more fresh substances, the taste is refreshing and sweet, and the smell is fresh. Oolong tea has created a variety of fragrances, the most prominent feature is its rich and uplifting fragrance, with a strong taste and refreshing aftertaste. Oolong tea combines the characteristics of the initial production of red and green tea, it is mild and not cold, and has the sweet and mellow of black tea and the fresh fragrance of green tea. Its strong fragrance and refreshing aftertaste are usually dominated by composite floral and fruity fragrances, and the change in fragrance is rich and unmatched by other teas. Black tea is like a ripe fruit, warm and sweet. The taste is strong, strong, and refreshing, the soup is red and bright, and the soluble substances in the tea soup are high in concentration and good in quality. The fragrance is mainly sweet with flowers, followed by a composite fragrance of fruit and honey.

history: I want to get eyelash extensions, but I'm not sure what style would look good?
There are many styles of eyelash extensions, such as natural style, thick style, cat-eye style, etc., suitable for different eye shapes and preferences.
Can you introduce these styles in detail?

Of course, the natural style is mainly to imitate the density and length of natural eyelashes, suitable for people who like natural makeup effects; the thick style is to plant the eyelashes more densely and longer, suitable for people who like heavy makeup effects; the cat-eye style is that the tail eyelashes are longer, creating an upturned eyeliner effect, suitable for people who like cat-eye makeup effects.
query:
Oh, I see. Is it difficult to maintain these styles?
The maintenance of eyelash extensions mainly depends on personal care. Generally speaking, eyelash extensions can last for a month, and if the care is done correctly, they can even last for two months without falling off. The key to maintaining eyelash extensions is to avoid high temperature and humid environments within 6 hours after grafting, because the special glue for beautiful eyelashes is not completely cured at this time, and touching water will make the eyelashes easy to fall off, and it may also make the glue easy to whiten. When washing your face, try to use non-oily facial cleanser, don't burden the eyelashes, don't rub it casually, don't rub the eyelashes, you should wash it horizontally from above the eyelid. Don't directly face the eyes when taking a shower, strong water pressure will cause the eyelashes to deform and fall off early. After washing your face, start from the top of the eyelid and gently press to wipe off the water. Be careful not to let the fibers of the towel hook the eyelashes. You can dry the remaining water with a hair dryer, or absorb it with a napkin. When taking care of the skin, use a cotton pad to apply toner, and pay attention when patting around the eyelashes. When making up, try to use a softer eyeliner liquid pen or eyeliner liquid, when eyeshadow or foundation is attached to the eyelashes, you should wipe it with a wet paper towel. When sleeping, don't sleep on your stomach, sleeping on your stomach or eyelashes against the pillow, prolonged pressure will deform the eyelashes. It may also break or fall off, it is recommended to sleep back as much as possible. When the grafted eyelashes fall off half, the remaining eyelashes are not well shaped. At this time, don't pull it off by yourself. Forcibly removing it will damage the original eyelashes. Be sure to find a professional eyelash stylist to remove it!

history: Do you know how many tiles are in mahjong?
I'm not quite sure, let me check.
query:
Then how do you play mahjong?
The rules of playing mahjong are as follows: First, you need to understand the basic rules of mahjong, including the names of the combination of tiles, such as pair, kong, sequence, etc. Then, you need to recognize the tiles, including 1-9 'tiao', 1-9 'wan', 1-9 'tong', red, green, white, east, south, west, north, each tile has 4 pieces, a total of 136 pieces. Next, you need to arrange the tiles, arrange in a row of 17 tiles, two rows up and down. Then, you need to draw tiles, each person draws four tiles, takes turns drawing three times, the first person to draw skips two tiles, the other three each draw one tile, then flip a 'hun' (hun can replace any tile). Finally, you need to know how to win, including small drop flow, hun adjustment, drop flow dragon, hun adjustment dragon, pairs dragon, catch five, catch three, 13 unique, pung, kong, the function of hun, etc.

history: How to use the hair removal device

The use of hair removal devices may vary by brand and model, but most hair removal devices have some common steps. First, you need to clean and shave the hair of the area to be treated, then choose the appropriate intensity level. Second, place the hair removal device steadily on the skin to avoid scratching the skin. Finally, turn on the switch and let the hair removal device start working.
What else should I pay attention to?

When using a hair removal device, you need to avoid using it on the skin that has just been sunburned or has moles or scars. In addition, if you feel pain or discomfort during use, you should stop using it immediately and consult a doctor.
query:
Can I use it on my face?
Hair removal can be done on the face, but only when there is a lot of facial hair. It is not recommended to remove hair under normal circumstances as it may easily lead to some other problems. For example, if you do not do a good job of sun protection when you are outdoors, it is easy to cause melanin deposition under the skin, or if you do not use the hair removal device in a standard manner, you may also have melanin deposition. If you do hair removal at this time, it is easy to cause the skin to darken. In addition, if you do a full face hair removal, it is easy to cause a tingling sensation. This is because the heat damages the hair follicles. If you do not feel a tingling sensation when using a hair removal machine, it may be that the energy of the hair removal machine is insufficient. If you do not handle it properly or professionally, you may get blisters due to excessive hair removal energy. Therefore, you need to choose a professional beauty salon. If you use laser hair removal, you must not use the previous skin care products and cosmetics, which are easy to cause infection.

history: I want to buy some thermal underwear, but I don't know how to choose, do you have any suggestions?

query:

history: How to squeeze a closed comedo with a comedo needle?

Closed comedones are a type of acne that is difficult to handle, usually recommended to be treated by professional dermatologists. But if you want to operate at home, first you need to prepare a professional comedo needle, and disinfection must be done before and after operation.
So how to operate specifically?

Firstly, apply a hot towel on your face to fully open the pores. Then, use the needle of the comedo needle to gently puncture the surface of the closed comedo. Next, use the other end of the comedo needle to gently press and squeeze the comedo out. Finally, use skincare products containing anti-inflammatory ingredients to soothe the skin.
query:
Will there be any side effects doing this?
There are indeed some risks in squeezing comedones. Firstly, when acne appears on the face, we cannot squeeze it by hand, because this may cause local skin surface damage, leading to inflammation or scars. Secondly, the action of squeezing is not only to squeeze out the keratin plug, due to the reaction force, some keratin plugs will be squeezed back into the deeper hair follicles, re-blocking the hair follicles, that is, the more you squeeze, the more serious the hair follicle blockage will be, and more comedones will grow. In addition, it is not recommended to handle it by yourself. Firstly, it is difficult to thoroughly disinfect at home, increasing the chance of infection. If the operation is improper, it may cause further damage to the skin, and even leave ugly acne pits and marks. Afterwards, if anti-inflammatory treatment is not performed on the skin, bacteria are likely to spread and contaminate other skin, causing inflammation. Lastly, the process of squeezing hurts the stratum corneum, destroys the skin barrier, leads to fiber breakage, collagen loss, and is extremely painful. The skin appears a series of skin aging problems such as “wrinkles, loosening, and large pores”, and extremely causes sensitive skin, redness, red blood streaks, and leaves acne marks and pits; it may also aggravate inflammation, or infection, leading to more severe acne; multiple treatments are required, and recurrence is possible.

history: Hello, I want to know what color of hair dye can make men look whiter?
Generally speaking, lighter colors like flaxen, light brown or silver gray can make the skin look whiter.
What color would be more suitable for me if my skin is yellowish?
If your skin is yellowish, you can try some cooler tones, such as light gray or cold brown, which can neutralize the yellowness of the skin and make you look whiter.
query:
Okay, I understand, will these colors damage my hair?
Hair dyeing indeed has certain damage to the hair. Firstly, frequent and long-term hair dyeing can cause harm to the hair and even the body, including dry, rough and falling hair. This is because the peroxidation reaction caused by the infiltration of aniline and other metal substances into the hair follicle causes hair breakage. Secondly, 5% of the hair dyeing population will have an allergic reaction to aniline, and a short-term large dose of aniline may cause acute poisoning and result in methemoglobinemia. In addition, the disadvantages of hair dyeing also include hair damage, color minefield (such as black, red, purple), color fading problem, and difficult to match with clothes. Therefore, if you are concerned about the damage to the hair, you can consider choosing some natural hair dyes, or try to avoid frequent hair dyeing.

history: How to make delicious star grouper?
Star grouper is a very delicious seafood, there are many ways to make it, such as steaming, braising, and soup. Which method do you want to learn?
query:
I want to learn how to steam it
The method of steaming star grouper is as follows: First, prepare the ingredients, including star grouper, ginger, and MSG. Then, clean the star grouper, remove the water from the fish by hand, slice the ginger and put it on the fish, and sprinkle a little MSG. Next, when the water is boiling, put the star grouper directly, simmer for 10 minutes, pick up the plate and pour out the steam water. Then, steam it in the pot again, pour in steamed fish soy sauce, and simmer for another 2 minutes. Finally, uncover, remove the ginger slices, and put in scallions. When the oil is boiling, pour it on the fish. This completes the process of steaming star grouper.

history: I have a pure cotton white garment that accidentally got stained yellow. How can I remove it?
For yellow stains on white cotton garments, you can try using toothpaste or white vinegar.
How do I use toothpaste and white vinegar?
You can apply toothpaste or white vinegar directly to the yellow stain, rub it a little, and then wash it off after a period of time.
query:
Is this method applicable to all yellow stains?
The method of using toothpaste and white vinegar to remove yellow stains is effective for most types of yellow stains, but it may not be suitable for all situations. For example, if the white clothes have been worn for a long time and have turned yellow, you can try using toothpaste, baking soda, white vinegar, and laundry detergent, and then soak the clothes in hot water. In addition, if the white clothes have mold, you can try adding toothpaste, table salt, white vinegar, and laundry powder to the basin, stir evenly with warm water, soak and scrub for five minutes. If the white collar sweat stains have turned yellow, you can try pouring baking soda, white vinegar, and hot water into the basin, soak and scrub for half an hour, the clothes will be immediately clean. If the white clothes have been worn for a long time and have turned yellow, you can put in baking soda, toothpaste, table salt, and laundry detergent, soak the clothes in warm water for 20 minutes before cleaning. If the white clothes have fruit juice or tea stains, you can put a spoonful of explosion salt, rinse with 60-degree warm water, soak for an hour and a half to clean. history: Why does my back hurt when the weather changes?

history: I cut some lemons, but didn't use them all, how should I store them?
You can put the cut lemons in a sealed bag and then store them in the refrigerator.
What temperature should the refrigerator be set at?
Generally speaking, it is more suitable to set the refrigerator temperature between 1 and 4 degrees Celsius.
Do I need to slice the lemons or can I store them whole?
Whether you slice them or keep them whole is fine, but if you slice them, they may absorb other odors from the refrigerator more easily.
query:
Is there a good method if I want to store them for a longer period of time?
If you want to store lemons for a longer period of time, here are two methods you can try. First, you can freeze the whole lemon in the refrigerator for two hours, cut off the head and tail, slice evenly and remove the seeds. Lay a layer of plastic wrap at the bottom and put in the lemon slices. Then lay another layer of plastic wrap and put in the lemon slices, then freeze in the refrigerator. The frozen lemons are put into a sealed fresh-keeping bag, and you can take one slice as you need it, which is very convenient for making lemon water in summer! Second, you can cut the lemon in half, squeeze out enough lemon juice with a juicer, pour into the ice tray and freeze for about four hours, then it's almost ready, put it in the ice storage box and it can be stored for a long time~ Just scoop out two cubes when you use it.

history: I want to study in an art college in the United States, do I need to take the art college entrance exam?

history: Hello, my child has a severe cough at night, what medicine should I give him?

query:

In addition, you can choose to pat after getting up in the morning or during the cough interval. Another method is to hold the belly method, hold the patient in the same direction and sit on both legs, with both hands crossing over from the front of the chest, the chest and abdomen tightly against the patient's back. Diet therapy is also a good choice, such as perilla foot bath, Chinese prickly ash stickers on the soles of the feet, white radish water. For hot cough, you can try Chuanbei stewed pear. Pediatric hand pushing method is also a good choice, rub down the child's clavicle, rub to both sides of the navel. history: Do you know how to connect Apple earphones to a new phone?
First, you need to make sure that the Bluetooth of your new phone is turned on. Then find and select your Apple headphones in the Bluetooth settings of your phone.
What operation do I need to do on the earphones?
You need to put the earphones into their charging case and close the lid, then open the lid, and the earphones will enter pairing mode.
What if I can't connect?
You can try restarting your phone and earphones, or try to delete the pairing record of the earphones and the phone and then try to connect.
query:
What if I still can't connect?
If you still can't connect, you can try the following methods: First, make sure the earphones have power, then unpair Bluetooth, then hold the button on the earphone box for 15 seconds (reset the earphones) and then reconnect via Bluetooth. This may be because the mobile phone has updated the system, the earphones are not compatible with the new mobile phone version or there is a bug, just try resetting the earphones. If it still can't be solved, it is recommended to return to the factory. Another method is to find your earphones in the Bluetooth settings of your phone, then click on the exclamation mark next to it and select 【Ignore this device】 at the bottom of the screen, then plug in the charging cable, put the old one in, press and hold the dot on the back until a pop-up window for re-pairing comes out, then note‼️【Don't connect!】, now the pop-up window is still there, put the new one in, then wait for 5 seconds, close the lid and let it charge for at least 5 hours, the key point is, after charging, open the lid and then close it, then restart the phone! Then after restarting, press and hold the dot on the back a little longer, a pop-up will come out and you can connect, it may show connection failed, just try a few more times.

history: What is the state of milk at 80 degrees
Milk will start to boil at 80 degrees and may produce some foam.
query:
Will that destroy the nutrition of the milk?
Yes, heating milk above 70 degrees will cause some of its proteins and vitamins to denature and precipitate, which to some extent wastes nutritional components. Specifically, the bioactive protein in milk will lose activity when heated, and heating will also change the protein space and destroy the structure of milk protein. Long-term heating will cause the content of vitamins A, E, and B2 to all decrease, and vitamins B1, B6, B12, folic acid, and vitamin C are easily lost when heated. Therefore, it is not recommended for everyone to heat milk at high temperatures.

history: I'm curious, what's inside a wild rabbit's burrow?

Wild rabbit burrows are usually dug underground, sometimes several meters deep, and usually have one or more exits for escape. The burrow is usually warm, and the mother rabbit will use her fur and materials such as hay to make a bed for the baby rabbits.
Oh, is it very dark in there?
Yes, rabbit burrows are dark, which helps to keep the rabbits hidden.
query:
Then how can they see inside?
Rabbits are nocturnal animals, their vision is best in the early morning and at dusk, so they usually forage in the early morning and at dusk. Although rabbits do not have high night vision, their eyes have special structures and substances that allow the vitreous in their eyes to focus and reflect light in the dark, so you can see the shining eyes of the rabbit under the flashlight. In addition, rabbits see things most clearly in dim light, not in the dark.

What might one face after hemorrhoid surgery?
After hemorrhoid surgery, there may be some complications. These include edema, which is the most common complication after surgery, especially for women. The main solution is to reduce the force of defecation, walk less every day, eat more green bean soup and winter melon, combined with medication and sitz baths, it still gets better quickly. There may also be granulation, which is the growth of granulation tissue after surgery. The main solution is to stay away from pig's feet and mutton, eat some other meats, and eat more whole grains and fruits. In addition, there may be false healing, which is when the wound does not show the normal healing process. The main solution is to persist in letting your attending doctor check. There may also be narrowing or stenosis of the anus, which is related to the ability of the chief surgeon. The main solution is to find a good doctor, if there is, you can try to expand and maintain good stools, good stools can play a role in expansion. There may also be eczema or dryness, which is mainly caused by being too dry or too wet. The main solution is to clean properly, first dab with a wet tissue, then dab with a dry tissue, do not use a hair dryer or fan, let it air dry for 2-3 minutes, then apply medicine or dress. If you are a sweaty person, in order to avoid smothering, after the medicine is absorbed (about 1-2 hours), remove the excess medicine. There may also be drug rash, which is mainly caused by an allergy to a certain drug, the main solution is to change it in time. There may also be inflammation, the cause is unknown, the main solution is to go for a follow-up check. There may also be scar hyperplasia, which is not common, if you are prone to scarring, remember to communicate with the doctor before surgery.

history: What is the reason for the induction cooker discharging electricity?

history: Where is the bicep located?
The bicep, also known as biceps brachii, is located at the front of the upper arm.
What is the function of the bicep?
The main function of the bicep is to bend the elbow joint and rotate the forearm.
Are there any exercises that can work out the bicep?
There are many exercises that can work out the bicep, such as dumbbell curls and barbell curls.
query:
How is dumbbell curl performed?
The method of performing dumbbell curls is as follows: First, sit on a bench, lean your upper body slightly forward and slightly to one side, hold the dumbbell with one hand with the palm up. The arm holding the dumbbell is stretched at the back above the knee joint and supported on the inner side of the thigh. The other hand is placed on the other thigh as support. Then, lift the dumbbell by bending the elbow joint, keep the upper body still, then move back to the starting position. The whole movement process must be slow and controlled. During the action, ensure that the idle hand is placed on the thigh and used to support the body, thereby reducing the pressure on the spine area. The specific action steps are: Rotate the upper arm fully outward, keep it close to the body and fixed, palm facing forward, contract the biceps, curl the forearm upward, exhale inward. Until the bicep is fully contracted, the dumbbell reaches shoulder height.

history: What does air defrost mean?

Air defrosting is a modern technology product that uses heat energy in the air, through the working principle of the air energy heat pump, to achieve a variety of functions such as cooling, heating, hot water, etc.
How does air defrost work?

Air defrosting works through a device called a heat pump. The heat pump can absorb heat from one place and then move it to another. In cold weather, the heat pump can draw heat from the outside air and then transfer it indoors.
query:
Does the air defrost device need regular maintenance?
Yes, the air defrost device needs regular maintenance. First of all, the air source heat pump dual supply is a highly automated device, and we need to correctly turn on the air source heat pump and check the status of the unit regularly during use to improve the efficiency and life of the device. Secondly, the air source heat pump discharges a large amount of defrosting water during heating. The pipe position of the defrosting water should be designed reasonably, and the defrosting water should be cleaned regularly and promptly during use. If the defrosting water pipe is not handled well after defrosting, it may cause the water after defrosting to flow to the ground. When the weather is cold, it will freeze quickly, which will not only inconvenience users' travel, but also damage the unit. Therefore, when encountering this situation, users should clean up in time and solve the drainage problem with the help of after-sales personnel to eliminate hidden dangers. Finally, if frost forms at the bottom of the evaporator, it may be that the bottom of the main unit, the defrosting water drainage is not smooth, the bottom of the water is too much, causing the bottom to freeze and ice. You can manually defrost to remove the debris at the bottom and make it drain smoothly. If frost forms on both sides of the evaporator, it may be that the temperature sensor of the evaporator is broken and the temperature cannot be detected. You can replace it with the after-sales service of the manufacturer.

history: I heard that some people put baking soda when making steamed buns, why is that?
Baking soda can neutralize the acidic substances in the flour during the dough making process, making the steamed buns more soft and delicious.
Then what will happen if too much baking soda is put in the steamed buns?
If too much baking soda is added, it may affect the taste of the steamed buns and make them taste alkaline.
query:
Then what color will the steamed buns be if too much baking soda is added?
If too much baking soda is added to the steamed buns, it may cause the color of the buns to change. For example, someone accidentally added too much baking soda when making spinach steamed buns, and the resulting buns turned out to be a strange color. Another person added too much baking soda when making purple potato buns, causing the buns to turn blue or green. This is because the added baking soda makes the dough alkaline, causing the 4 structures in the purple potato anthocyanin to transform, presenting blue or green. This change is reversible. Therefore, if too much baking soda is added to the steamed buns, it may cause the color of the buns to change.

history: How to judge a straight line in subject three?

In the subject three test, judging a straight line is mainly through the rearview mirror and side mirror of the vehicle. During driving, you need to constantly observe the road conditions in the mirror to ensure the correct direction of driving.
So how to judge the straight line through the mirror?

Usually, we can judge a straight line by observing the road markings in the mirror. If you see the markings in the mirror are straight, then your vehicle is on a straight line. Conversely, if the markings in the mirror are curved, then your vehicle may be on a curve.
query:
How should I adjust the mirror to better observe the straight line?
To adjust the mirror to better observe the straight line, you can follow these steps: First, find the door handle of the left front door in the rearview mirror, and adjust it to the lower right corner of the rearview mirror. Then, find the door handle of the right front door in the rearview mirror, and adjust it to the lower left corner of the mirror. In this way, the visual blind area is the smallest. Next, you can adjust the rearview mirror according to the following proportions: The body occupies 1/4 of the mirror surface, the ground and the sky each occupy 1/2. This can reduce the blind area of ​​the sight, making the driving safer. For the right rearview mirror, you can adjust it so that the body occupies 1/4 of the mirror surface, the sky occupies 1/3 of the mirror surface, and the ground occupies 2/3 of the mirror surface. This can make the sight effect of the right rearview mirror better. Finally, adjust the central rearview mirror to be able to see the entire rear windshield.

history: Hello, I want to learn how to massage a customer's arm, can you help me?

query:
How should I use the massage oil?
When using massage oil, you can pour the massage oil into the palm of one hand, and then rub it into the hands of the massage object. Both hands are facing up, and the little finger of one hand slides between the ring finger and little finger of the massage object, and the little finger of the other hand slides between the thumb and index finger of the massage object. Then, gently stretch the five fingers of the massage object to open its palm. Then use two thumbs to massage the center of the massage object's palm and gently transition to the wrist. Next, turn the palm of the massage object down, hold one finger at a time, hold it tightly and gently pull it twice, do not make the knuckles sound. When pulling the fingers of the massage object, the thumb and index finger of the masseuse gently slide over the front of the massage object's fingers and make a slapping sound. This can clear the tension that may accumulate in the masseuse's fingers and relax both hands.

Can I migrate WeChat chat history?

The specific operation steps are as follows: First, open WeChat on the old phone, click the lower right corner [Me], and click [Settings] after entering the page. Then, enter the [Settings] page, click [General], and select [Chat History Migration and Backup]. Next, enter the [Chat History Migration and Backup] page, click [Migrate], and select [Migrate to another phone or tablet]. WeChat will automatically calculate the memory size of the chat history. According to the actual situation, directly [Start] or click [Migrate specified chat history only] to select important chat records for migration. Finally, at this time, a QR code will appear on the page. According to the page prompts, log in to WeChat on the new phone and scan the code to start the migration. Note that the two devices must be connected to the same WIFI.

history: How to prevent ectopic pregnancy after transplantation?

Ectopic pregnancy is mainly caused by the implantation of fertilized eggs in the fallopian tube. Regular check-ups should be done after transplantation to observe the growth of the embryo and avoid ectopic pregnancy.
Are there any specific methods to prevent it?
Regular ultrasound checks can be carried out, along with maintaining good living habits, such as avoiding intense exercise.
How is ultrasound check done?
The ultrasound check is done by sliding a high-frequency sound probe on the surface of the body, generating images through sound reflection, to observe the location and growth of the embryo.
query:
What does maintaining good living habits specifically refer to?
Maintaining good living habits mainly includes the following points: First, after transplantation, you can walk immediately, rest for 15-20 minutes and then go home, such as taking long-distance buses. After embryo transplantation, you can wash your hair, bathe, go up and down stairs, and do normal daily life activities such as general housework, according to your own situation. Second, avoid hot compresses on the abdomen with hot water bags; avoid heavy physical labor and high-load exercise, alcohol abuse and smoking; prevent colds, fevers and other diseases, need to come to the hospital in time for treatment, explain the situation to the attending doctor, and use medicine rationally under the guidance of the doctor. In addition, you can go to work after a proper rest for 2~3 days after transplantation, as long as you don't do heavy physical labor and avoid activities that increase abdominal pressure. If the patient has high estrogen during the ovulation induction period and after egg retrieval, more eggs are retrieved, more attention should be paid. Be alert to the occurrence of ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome. The main manifestations are abdominal distension, stomach discomfort, less urine, etc. If it gradually worsens, you should go to the hospital immediately. Finally, after IVF surgery, you should follow the doctor's advice, especially rest fully after surgery, pay attention to diet, avoid excessive exercise, etc., to recover the body and avoid postoperative complications.

history: How do full-time Uber drivers in the US file their taxes?

If you're a full-time Uber driver in the US, your tax situation may be different. First, you need to understand that you're an independent contractor, not an Uber employee. This means you're responsible for filing your own taxes.
Oh, I see. How should I prepare for tax filing?

First, you need to make sure you have a complete record of income and expenses. Uber typically provides an annual income report, but you should also keep all your income and expense records. In addition, you need to consider your car expenses, such as gas, repair costs, insurance, etc., as business expenses and keep a record of them.
Okay, what forms do I need to fill out?

You need to fill out the 1040 Individual Income Tax Return Form and Schedule C, which is used to report self-employment income or loss. If you've paid self-employment tax, you also need to fill out Schedule SE.
What types of taxes do I need to pay?

As a full-time Uber driver, you need to pay federal income tax and self-employment tax. Self-employment tax includes Social Security and Medicare tax. In addition, some states require state income tax.
query:
What expenses can I deduct?
As a full-time Uber driver, you can deduct various operating expenses for tax purposes. These include vehicle depreciation costs, rideshare platform fees, car rental fees, car loan interest, repair and maintenance costs, gas expenses, toll fees, parking fees, vehicle insurance fees, vehicle cleaning fees, TLC license fees, training fees, uniform fees, phone bills, vehicle supplies and epidemic prevention materials, meal expenses, advertising expenses, commission expenses, subcontracted labor costs, and accountant/lawyer fees. However, it should be noted that only the part of the expenses applicable to business operation can be deducted for tax purposes. If the vehicle is used for personal purposes when not in service, it is necessary to calculate the actual expenses used for business operation based on the proportion of all expenses when declaring, and then accurately report. The simplest way to calculate this ratio is by keeping detailed records of mileage for business operation vs. personal use.

When stir-frying beef, the amount of cooking wine added can vary depending on personal taste and the amount of beef. query:

Based on your description, your condition may be nodular acne. Nodular acne is a common type of acne, it feels like a hard lump, not red, not swollen, not itchy, not squeezed out, and it will hurt when pressed by hand. It may later develop into cystic acne. In addition, if the sebum secreted in the acne that was not cleaned out causes secondary inflammation, the skin will ferment gradually after it is closed. If excessive squeezing causes local skin damage, it will form acne scars. Therefore, when you encounter hard acne, it is recommended not to squeeze it at will.

history: Why did I suddenly start snoring when I sleep?

Also, oropharyngeal muscle exercise is an important method to relieve and treat snoring, it has a direct stimulatory effect on the upper airway. history: How do you make the wings of an origami crane?

To make the wings of an origami crane, you need to first prepare a square piece of paper. Then, you need to fold this paper into a standard crane shape, which will form the wings of the crane. Finally, you can adjust the shape of the paper crane to make the wings look more natural.
query:
Can you be more specific? I'm a beginner and I need detailed step by step guidance.
Of course, I can provide you with detailed step-by-step guidance. First, you need to prepare some tools, including colored paper, pen, and ruler. Then, follow these steps: 1. Find a piece of candy wrapper that has been eaten, and cut it into a square; 2. Fold the corner of the square paper diagonally across; 3. Fold the other corner of the square paper diagonally across as well; 4. Turn it over; 5. Fold the two corners at the bottom of the square paper up to align with the two corners at the top; 6. Fold inward along the folded line to form a triangle; 7. Fold the paper at the bottom of the triangle to align with the edge; 8. Fold both sides according to the method of the previous step; 9. Flip the corner of the front of the folded triangle to the right, and flip the corner of the back to the left; 10. Open the paper; 11. Press the top corner down; 12. Fold the corners on the left and right sides inward together; 13. Fold into this shape; 14. Fold the uppermost corner down; 15. Fold the corners on both sides to the middle; 16. This step is similar to step 9; 17. Fold into this shape; 18. Fold the bottom corner up; 19. Fold into this shape; 20. This step is similar to step 9; 21. Pull the corners on both sides to the sides; 22. Pull into this shape; 23. Press the middle of the head of the crane down; 24. A crane is folded like this.
